Pozrite sa na [každý] jeho ovocie keď to prináša a [at] jeho dozrievania. Naozaj v tom, že sú príznaky pre ľudí, ktorí veria.

trans-unit.source: But they have attributed to Allah partners - the jinn, while He has created them - and have fabricated for Him sons and daughters. Exalted is He and high above what they describe
trans-unit.target: Ale majú pripísať Alah partnerov - jinn, zatiaľ čo on vytvoril ich - a som vyrobená pre neho synov a dcér. Vyvýšený je on a vysoko nad to, čo opisujú

trans-unit.source: [He is] Originator of the heavens and the earth. How could He have a son when He does not have a companion and He created all things? And He is, of all things, Knowing.
trans-unit.target: [Je] Pôvodca nebo a zem. Ako mohol on mať syna, keď nemá spoločník a stvoril všetky veci? A on je zo všetkých vecí, vedieť.

trans-unit.source: That is Allah, your Lord; there is no deity except Him, the Creator of all things, so worship Him. And He is Disposer of all things.
trans-unit.target: To je Boh, svojho pána; Neexistuje žiadne božstvo okrem neho, tvorca všetkých vecí, tak sa mu pokloniť. A on je zneškodňovateľ všetkých vecí.

trans-unit.source: Vision perceives Him not, but He perceives [all] vision; and He is the Subtle, the Acquainted.
trans-unit.target: Vízia vníma ho, nie však vníma [všetko] videnie; a on je jemné, Acquainted.

trans-unit.source: There has come to you enlightenment from your Lord. So whoever will see does so for [the benefit of] his soul, and whoever is blind [does harm] against it. And [say], "I am not a guardian over you."
trans-unit.target: Tam prišiel ste osvietenie od svojho pána. Tak uvidíte, kto tak robí na [výhody] svoju dušu, a ten, kto je slepý [poškodenie] proti nemu. A [povedať], "ja nie som strážca nad vami."

trans-unit.source: And thus do We diversify the verses so the disbelievers will say, "You have studied," and so We may make the Qur'an clear for a people who know.
trans-unit.target: A tak sme diverzifikovať verše tak neveriacim povedia, "Ste študovali", a tak môžeme vykonať Koráne jasne pre ľudí, ktorí vedia.

trans-unit.source: Follow, [O Muhammad], what has been revealed to you from your Lord - there is no deity except Him - and turn away from those who associate others with Allah.
trans-unit.target: Riadia, [Mohamed], čo bolo odhalené na vás z vášho pána - neexistuje žiadne božstvo okrem neho - a odvrátiť sa od tých, ktorí pridružiť iné Alah.

trans-unit.source: But if Allah had willed, they would not have associated. And We have not appointed you over them as a guardian, nor are you a manager over them.
trans-unit.target: Ale ak Boh bol chcel, že by nie priradili. A sme nevymenovali ste nad nimi ako opatrovník, ani ste manažér nad nimi.

trans-unit.source: And do not insult those they invoke other than Allah, lest they insult Allah in enmity without knowledge. Thus We have made pleasing to every community their deeds. Then to their Lord is their return, and He will inform them about what they used to do.
trans-unit.target: A Neurážajte tých sa domáhajú okrem Alaha, inak sa urážajú Alaha v nepriateľstvo bez vedomia. Tak sme urobili príjemný pre každé spoločenstvo svoje skutky. Potom je ich návrat svojho pána, a on ich bude informovať o tom, čo boli zvyknutí robiť.

trans-unit.source: And they swear by Allah their strongest oaths that if a sign came to them, they would surely believe in it. Say, "The signs are only with Allah." And what will make you perceive that even if a sign came, they would not believe.
trans-unit.target: A oni prisahajú Alah ich najsilnejší prísahy že ak znamenie prišiel k nim, oni by určite veriť v to. Povedať: "príznaky sú len k Bohu." A čo vám bude vnímať, že aj v prípade, že prišlo znamenie, ktoré by neveril.

trans-unit.source: And We will turn away their hearts and their eyes just as they refused to believe in it the first time. And We will leave them in their transgression, wandering blindly.
trans-unit.target: A budeme zase preč svoje srdce a oči rovnako odmietli veriť v to prvýkrát. A necháme ich v ich prestúpenie putovanie slepo.

trans-unit.source: And even if We had sent down to them the angels [with the message] and the dead spoke to them [of it] and We gathered together every [created] thing in front of them, they would not believe unless Allah should will. But most of them, [of that], are ignorant.
trans-unit.target: A aj keď sme poslal až k nim angels [s] a mŕtvi prehovoril k nim [z] a sme zhromaždili každý [vytvorené] vec pred nimi, ktoré by neveril ak by sa Boh. Ale väčšina z nich [tohto], nepoznajú.

trans-unit.source: And thus We have made for every prophet an enemy - devils from mankind and jinn, inspiring to one another decorative speech in delusion. But if your Lord had willed, they would not have done it, so leave them and that which they invent.
trans-unit.target: A tak sme sa za každý prorok nepriateľa - devils z ľudstva a jinn, inšpiratívne navzájom dekoratívne reči v ilúzii. Ale ak váš pán mal vôľou, že by to neurobil, tak nechajte ich a že im vymyslieť.

trans-unit.source: And [it is] so the hearts of those who disbelieve in the Hereafter will incline toward it and that they will be satisfied with it and that they will commit that which they are committing.
trans-unit.target: A [je] tak srdcia tých, ktorí neveria v nižšie sa sklon k nemu a že sa s ňou spokojní a že budú spáchať, ktoré sa dopúšťajú.

trans-unit.source: [Say], "Then is it other than Allah I should seek as judge while it is He who has revealed to you the Book explained in detail?" And those to whom We [previously] gave the Scripture know that it is sent down from your Lord in truth, so never be among the doubters.
trans-unit.target: [Povedať], "Potom je to ako Boh, som mala ako sudca, aj keď je to on, kto vám ukázal knihu podrobne?" A tých, ktorým dali sme [predtým] písmo viem, že je zoslal svojho pána v pravde, tak nikdy sa medzi pochybovači.

trans-unit.source: And the word of your Lord has been fulfilled in truth and in justice. None can alter His words, and He is the Hearing, the Knowing.
trans-unit.target: A slovo vášho pána bolo splnené v pravde a spravodlivosti. Žiadny môže zmeniť jeho slová, a on je sluch, vedieť.

trans-unit.source: And if you obey most of those upon the earth, they will mislead you from the way of Allah. They follow not except assumption, and they are not but falsifying.
trans-unit.target: A ak budete počúvať väčšinu z tých na zemi, sa bude zavádzať od toho, ako Boh. Riadia sa nie s výnimkou predpoklad, a nie sú ale falšovanie.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, your Lord is most knowing of who strays from His way, and He is most knowing of the [rightly] guided.
trans-unit.target: Vskutku, svojho pána, je väčšina vedomím toho, kto zablúdi z jeho cesty, a on je väčšina poznanie [správne] interaktívny.

trans-unit.source: So eat of that [meat] upon which the name of Allah has been mentioned, if you are believers in His verses.
trans-unit.target: Takže jesť, [mäso] na meno Alláha, ktorý bol už bolo spomenuté, ak ste veriaci v jeho veršoch.

trans-unit.source: And why should you not eat of that upon which the name of Allah has been mentioned while He has explained in detail to you what He has forbidden you, excepting that to which you are compelled. And indeed do many lead [others] astray through their [own] inclinations without knowledge. Indeed, your Lord - He is most knowing of the transgressors.
trans-unit.target: A prečo by ste nemali jesť to, na ktorom bolo uvedené meno Alláha, kým mu vysvetlila podrobne vám to, čo bolo zakázané si okrem, na ktoré ste nútení. A naozaj to veľa olova [others] scestie cez vlastné [] sklony bez vedomia. Svojho pána - on je naozaj najviac vedel previnilcov.

trans-unit.source: And leave what is apparent of sin and what is concealed thereof. Indeed, those who earn [blame for] sin will be recompensed for that which they used to commit.
trans-unit.target: A nechať to, čo je zrejmé z hriechu, a čo je ukrytý jej. V skutočnosti tí, ktorí zarábajú [za] hriech bude odmenený za, ktoré používajú odovzdať.

trans-unit.source: And do not eat of that upon which the name of Allah has not been mentioned, for indeed, it is grave disobedience. And indeed do the devils inspire their allies [among men] to dispute with you. And if you were to obey them, indeed, you would be associators [of others with Him].
trans-unit.target: A nejedia to na ktorom nebolo uvedené meno Alláha, naozaj, je to vážne neposlušnosti. A naozaj sa diabli inšpirovať ich spojenci [medzi mužmi] spor s vami. A ak ste počúvať, naozaj, by byť priradení [druhých s ním].

trans-unit.source: And is one who was dead and We gave him life and made for him light by which to walk among the people like one who is in darkness, never to emerge therefrom? Thus it has been made pleasing to the disbelievers that which they were doing.
trans-unit.target: A je ten, kto bol mŕtvy a sme mu život a urobil pre neho svetlo ktoré chodiť medzi ľudí, ako jeden, kto je v tme, nikdy sa vynoriť z nich? Čím to dosiahol potešujúce k neveriacim, ktorý oni robili.

trans-unit.source: And thus We have placed within every city the greatest of its criminals to conspire therein. But they conspire not except against themselves, and they perceive [it] not.
trans-unit.target: A tak sme umiestnili v každom meste najväčších zločincov, sa v ňom spikli. Ale oni nie okrem konspirovat proti sebe, a [to] vnímajú nie.

trans-unit.source: And when a sign comes to them, they say, "Never will we believe until we are given like that which was given to the messengers of Allah." Allah is most knowing of where He places His message. There will afflict those who committed crimes debasement before Allah and severe punishment for what they used to conspire.
trans-unit.target: A keď znamenie príde k nim, oni hovoria, "nikdy sa veríme, kým budeme mať takého ktorý bol náchylný k poslov Boha." Alah je väčšina poznanie kde umiestňuje svoje posolstvo. Tam budú tí, ktorí spáchali zločiny poníženia pred Boha a prísne potrestanie čo bývali konspirovat postihujú.

trans-unit.source: So whoever Allah wants to guide - He expands his breast to [contain] Islam; and whoever He wants to misguide - He makes his breast tight and constricted as though he were climbing into the sky. Thus does Allah place defilement upon those who do not believe.
trans-unit.target: Tak kto chce Boh Sprievodca - on rozširuje svoje prsia [obsahovali] Islam; a kto chce zviesť - robí jeho prsia tesné a zúžené, akoby mu boli lezenie do neba. Teda Boh miesto Nepoškvrneného na tých, ktorí neveria.

trans-unit.source: And this is the path of your Lord, [leading] straight. We have detailed the verses for a people who remember.
trans-unit.target: A to je cesta, svojho pána, [vedúci] rovno. Môžeme mať podrobné verše pre ľudí, ktorí si pamätajú.

trans-unit.source: For them will be the Home of Peace with their Lord. And He will be their protecting friend because of what they used to do.
trans-unit.target: Pre nich bude doma pokoj s svojho pána. A bude ich ochrana priateľ vzhľadom na čo boli zvyknutí robiť.

trans-unit.source: And [mention, O Muhammad], the Day when He will gather them together [and say], "O company of jinn, you have [misled] many of mankind." And their allies among mankind will say, "Our Lord, some of us made use of others, and we have [now] reached our term, which you appointed for us." He will say, "The Fire is your residence, wherein you will abide eternally, except for what Allah wills. Indeed, your Lord is Wise and Knowing."
trans-unit.target: A [zmienka, Mohamed], v deň, keď sa stretnú ich spoločne [a že], "O spoločnosti jinn, máte [omyl] veľa ľudstva." A ich spojencov medzi ľudstvo bude hovoriť: "náš Pán, niektorí z nás sa pomocou druhých a [] dospeli sme náš termín, ktorý ste pre nás." Povie "oheň je vaše bydlisko, pričom sa dodržiavajú naveky, okrem čo Boh závetu. V skutočnosti, váš pán je múdry a vedel. "

trans-unit.source: And thus will We make some of the wrongdoers allies of others for what they used to earn.
trans-unit.target: A tak môžeme bude niektoré z zloèinci spojenci druhých, na čo boli zvyknutí zarábať.

trans-unit.source: "O company of jinn and mankind, did there not come to you messengers from among you, relating to you My verses and warning you of the meeting of this Day of yours?" They will say, "We bear witness against ourselves"; and the worldly life had deluded them, and they will bear witness against themselves that they were disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: "O spoločnosti jinn a ľudstva, tam neprišiel k vám poslovia spomedzi vás, týkajúce sa vám moje verše a upozornením na zasadnutí tento deň vy?" Oni povedia: "Sme svedkami proti sebe"; pozemský život mal pošetilou, a bude mať svedkov proti sebe, že oni boli neveriacim.

trans-unit.source: That is because your Lord would not destroy the cities for wrongdoing while their people were unaware.
trans-unit.target: To je, pretože váš pán by nezničí miest za previnenie, kým ich ľudia nevedeli.

trans-unit.source: And for all are degrees from what they have done. And your Lord is not unaware of what they do.
trans-unit.target: A pre všetky stupne od čo urobili. A váš pán nie je vedomý toho, čo robia.

trans-unit.source: And your Lord is the Free of need, the possessor of mercy. If He wills, he can do away with you and give succession after you to whomever He wills, just as He produced you from the descendants of another people.
trans-unit.target: A svojho pána je potreba, je vlastníkom milosrdenstva. Ak on wills, môže sa s vami a dať dedičstvo po vás koho on wills, rovnako ako on ste vyrobenej potomkovia ďalších ľudí.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, what you are promised is coming, and you will not cause failure [to Allah].
trans-unit.target: Skutočne to, čo ste sľúbil sa blíži, a vám nespôsobí zlyhanie [Allah].

trans-unit.source: Say, "O my people, work according to your position; [for] indeed, I am working. And you are going to know who will have succession in the home. Indeed, the wrongdoers will not succeed.
trans-unit.target: Povedať, "O mojich ľudí, prácu podľa vašej pozície; [pre] v skutočnosti som pracoval. A budete vedieť, kto bude mať za sebou v domácnosti. Vskutku, zloèinci nepodarí.

trans-unit.source: And the polytheists assign to Allah from that which He created of crops and livestock a share and say, "This is for Allah," by their claim, "and this is for our partners [associated with Him]." But what is for their "partners" does not reach Allah, while what is for Allah - this reaches their "partners." Evil is that which they rule.
trans-unit.target: A polyteisty priradenie Bohu, ktorý stvoril z plodín a dobytka podiel a povedať, "to je pre Alaha," podľa ich tvrdenia, "a to je pre našich partnerov [spojená s ním]." Ale čo je pre svoje "partnermi" nedosahuje Alaha, zatiaľ čo čo je Alah - dostane ich "partneri". Zlo je to, čo oni vládnuť.

trans-unit.source: And likewise, to many of the polytheists their partners have made [to seem] pleasing the killing of their children in order to bring about their destruction and to cover them with confusion in their religion. And if Allah had willed, they would not have done so. So leave them and that which they invent.
trans-unit.target: A podobne, veľa polyteisty žiakmi urobili [zrejme] príjemné zabíjanie svojich detí tak, aby o ich zničení a zakryť zmätok v ich náboženstvo. A ak Boh bol chcel, že by tak neurobili. Tak nechajte ich a že im vymyslieť.

trans-unit.source: And they say, "These animals and crops are forbidden; no one may eat from them except whom we will," by their claim. And there are those [camels] whose backs are forbidden [by them] and those upon which the name of Allah is not mentioned - [all of this] an invention of untruth about Him. He will punish them for what they were inventing.
trans-unit.target: A hovoria, že "tieto zvieratá a plodiny sú zakázané; nikto jesť z nich Okrem koho budeme,"podľa ich tvrdenia. A tam sú tie [ťavy] ktorého chrbtom sú zakázané [im], a tých, na ktorých nie je meno Alah zmienil - [všetko] vynález nepravdy o ňom. On sa potrestať ich za to, čo oni boli vynájsť.

trans-unit.source: And they say, "What is in the bellies of these animals is exclusively for our males and forbidden to our females. But if it is [born] dead, then all of them have shares therein." He will punish them for their description. Indeed, He is Wise and Knowing.
trans-unit.target: A oni hovoria, "čo je v bruchu týchto zvierat je určený výhradne pre našich mužov a naše ženy zakázané. Ale ak je [narodený] mŕtvych, potom všetci z nich majú podiely v ňom." On sa potrestať ich za ich opis. V skutočnosti, on je múdry a vedel.

trans-unit.source: Those will have lost who killed their children in foolishness without knowledge and prohibited what Allah had provided for them, inventing untruth about Allah. They have gone astray and were not [rightly] guided.
trans-unit.target: Tie sa stratili, kto zabil svojich detí v blaznovstvo bez vedomia a zakázaný, čo Boh za predpokladu, vynájsť nepravdy o Alah. Preč z cesty a nie sú [správne] riadiť.

trans-unit.source: And He it is who causes gardens to grow, [both] trellised and untrellised, and palm trees and crops of different [kinds of] food and olives and pomegranates, similar and dissimilar. Eat of [each of] its fruit when it yields and give its due [zakah] on the day of its harvest. And be not excessive. Indeed, He does not like those who commit excess.
trans-unit.target: A to je kto spôsobí záhrady rásť, [aj] trellised a untrellised, a palm stromov a plodín alebo iný [druhy z] potravín a olivy a granátové jablká, podobné a nepodobné. Jesť [každej] svoje ovocie, keď výnosy a dať jej [Zakát] v deň jeho zberu. A nesmie byť nadmerná. V skutočnosti, on nemá rád tých, ktorí páchajú prebytok.

trans-unit.source: And of the grazing livestock are carriers [of burdens] and those [too] small. Eat of what Allah has provided for you and do not follow the footsteps of Satan. Indeed, he is to you a clear enemy.
trans-unit.target: A pasenia hospodárskych zvierat sú nositeľmi [záťaže] a tie [] primalá. Jesť to, čo Boh pripravil pre vás a nie po stopách Satana. V skutočnosti je jasný nepriateľ.

trans-unit.source: [They are] eight mates - of the sheep, two and of the goats, two. Say, "Is it the two males He has forbidden or the two females or that which the wombs of the two females contain? Inform me with knowledge, if you should be truthful."
trans-unit.target: [Sú] osem kamarátov - oviec, dva a kôz, two. Povedať: "je to dvaja muži mu bolo zakázané alebo dve ženy, alebo ktoré obsahujú lona dve ženy? Informujte ma, s vedomím, ak by ste mali byť pravdivé."

trans-unit.source: And of the camels, two and of the cattle, two. Say, "Is it the two males He has forbidden or the two females or that which the wombs of the two females contain? Or were you witnesses when Allah charged you with this? Then who is more unjust than one who invents a lie about Allah to mislead the people by [something] other than knowledge? Indeed, Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people."
trans-unit.target: A tiav, dva a hovädzieho dobytka, dva. Povedať: "je to dvaja muži mu bolo zakázané alebo dve ženy, alebo ktoré obsahujú lona dve ženy? Alebo boli ste svedkom, keď Boh prikázal vám s týmto? Kto je potom viac nespravodlivé, ako ten, kto vymýšľa lož o Alah zavádzať ľudí [niečo] okrem vedomostí? V skutočnosti Boh nie je sprievodca previnenie ľudí."

trans-unit.source: Say, "I do not find within that which was revealed to me [anything] forbidden to one who would eat it unless it be a dead animal or blood spilled out or the flesh of swine - for indeed, it is impure - or it be [that slaughtered in] disobedience, dedicated to other than Allah. But whoever is forced [by necessity], neither desiring [it] nor transgressing [its limit], then indeed, your Lord is Forgiving and Merciful."
trans-unit.target: Povedať, "nájsť v to, čo bolo zjavené, aby mi [niečo] kto by jesť to, ak bolo mŕtve zviera krvi vysypali mäso ošípaných - v skutočnosti, to je nečistý - alebo to byť [zabitých] zakázané neposlušnosti, venované okrem Alaha. Ale ten, kto je nútený [potreba], [to] túžiť ani zaobchádzania v dôsledku porušenia [limit], potom v skutočnosti svojho pána, je odpúšťajúci a Milosrdných. "

trans-unit.source: And to those who are Jews We prohibited every animal of uncloven hoof; and of the cattle and the sheep We prohibited to them their fat, except what adheres to their backs or the entrails or what is joined with bone. [By] that We repaid them for their injustice. And indeed, We are truthful.
trans-unit.target: A pre tých, ktorí sú Židia sme zakázané každé zviera uncloven kopýt; a dobytok a ovce zakazuje im ich tuku, s výnimkou čo dodržiava ich chrbtom alebo vnútornosti, alebo čo je spojený s kosťou. [Podľa] ktoré sme vrátiť im za ich nespravodlivosti. A v skutočnosti sme pravdivé.

trans-unit.source: So if they deny you, [O Muhammad], say, "Your Lord is the possessor of vast mercy; but His punishment cannot be repelled from the people who are criminals."
trans-unit.target: Takže ak ste [Mohamed], popierajú, hovoria, "svojho pána je vlastníkom veľkú milosť; ale jeho trest nemôže odrazil od ľudí, ktorí sú zločinci."

trans-unit.source: Those who associated with Allah will say, "If Allah had willed, we would not have associated [anything] and neither would our fathers, nor would we have prohibited anything." Likewise did those before deny until they tasted Our punishment. Say, "Do you have any knowledge that you can produce for us? You follow not except assumption, and you are not but falsifying."
trans-unit.target: Tých, ktorí priradené Alah povedia, "Ak Boh bol chcel, máme by nie Spojené [všetko] a ani by naši otcovia, ani by sme nič zakázané." Podobne pred poprieť, kým Chutili náš trest. Napríklad: "máte vedomosti, ktoré môžu produkovať pre nás? Sledujete nie okrem predpoklad, a vy nie ale falšovanie. "

trans-unit.source: Say, "With Allah is the far-reaching argument. If He had willed, He would have guided you all."
trans-unit.target: Povedzme, že "Alah je ďalekosiahly argument. Ak on mal chcel, on by sa riadiť vás všetkých."

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "Bring forward your witnesses who will testify that Allah has prohibited this." And if they testify, do not testify with them. And do not follow the desires of those who deny Our verses and those who do not believe in the Hereafter, while they equate [others] with their Lord.
trans-unit.target: Napríklad: [Mohamed], "Predložiť vaše svedkov, ktorí budú svedčiť, že Alah zakázal to." A ak budú svedčiť, nemôže vypovedať s nimi. A nie podľa priania tých, ktorí popierajú naše verše a tých, ktorí neveria v ďalej, zatiaľ čo oni [others] roveň svojho pána.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Come, I will recite what your Lord has prohibited to you. [He commands] that you not associate anything with Him, and to parents, good treatment, and do not kill your children out of poverty; We will provide for you and them. And do not approach immoralities - what is apparent of them and what is concealed. And do not kill the soul which Allah has forbidden [to be killed] except by [legal] right. This has He instructed you that you may use reason."
trans-unit.target: Povedať, "príde, bude recitovať, čo sa zakázalo svojho pána. [Príkazy] že nie spájať čokoľvek s ním a rodičom, dobré zaobchádzanie, a nie zabiť svoje deti z chudoby; Poskytneme pre vás a ich. A nemajú prístup immoralities - čo je zrejmé z nich a to, čo je skryté. A zabiť dušu, ktoré Alah zakázané [zabil] s výnimkou [právo]. To on nariadil vám môže použiť dôvod. "

trans-unit.source: And do not approach the orphan's property except in a way that is best until he reaches maturity. And give full measure and weight in justice. We do not charge any soul except [with that within] its capacity. And when you testify, be just, even if [it concerns] a near relative. And the covenant of Allah fulfill. This has He instructed you that you may remember.
trans-unit.target: A nie prístup sirotský majetku s výnimkou spôsobom, ktorý je najlepšie, až keď dosiahne dospelosti. A dať plnej miere a hmotnosti spravodlivosti. Neúčtujeme žiadnu dušu, okrem [s tým v rámci] svojej kapacity. A keď budete svedčiť, rovnako, aj keď [ide] blízky príbuzný. A plniť pakt Alah. To má nariadil vám, že môžete pamätať.

trans-unit.source: And, [moreover], this is My path, which is straight, so follow it; and do not follow [other] ways, for you will be separated from His way. This has He instructed you that you may become righteous.
trans-unit.target: A [okrem], toto je moja cesta, ktorá je rovno, tak po nej; a nesledujú [Ostatné] spôsoby pre vás bude oddelený od jeho cestu. To má on vám pokyn, že sa môže stať spravodlivými.

trans-unit.source: Then We gave Moses the Scripture, making complete [Our favor] upon the one who did good and as a detailed explanation of all things and as guidance and mercy that perhaps in [the matter of] the meeting with their Lord they would believe.
trans-unit.target: Potom sme dali Moses písma, takže kompletné [náš prospech] na ten, ktorý urobil dobré a podrobné vysvetlenie všetkých veci a vedenie a milosrdenstva, že snáď v [otázka] stretnutie s ich pán im neveril.

trans-unit.source: And this [Qur'an] is a Book We have revealed [which is] blessed, so follow it and fear Allah that you may receive mercy.
trans-unit.target: A to [Korán] knihy sme odhalili, [ktoré] požehnaný, tak po nej a strach, Alah, že dostanete milosť.

trans-unit.source: [We revealed it] lest you say, "The Scripture was only sent down to two groups before us, but we were of their study unaware,"
trans-unit.target: [Sme to odhalili] inak hovoríte, "písmo bolo zaslané iba až dve skupiny pred nami, ale boli sme ich nevie, štúdia"

trans-unit.source: Or lest you say, "If only the Scripture had been revealed to us, we would have been better guided than they." So there has [now] come to you a clear evidence from your Lord and a guidance and mercy. Then who is more unjust than one who denies the verses of Allah and turns away from them? We will recompense those who turn away from Our verses with the worst of punishment for their having turned away.
trans-unit.target: Alebo inak ste povedal, "len keby nás bolo odhalené písmo, by sme boli lepšie riadiť ako oni." Tak tam [] dospela k vám jasný dôkaz od vášho pána a vedenie a milosrdenstva. Kto je potom viac nespravodlivé, ako ten, kto popiera verše Alah a odvráti od nich? Sme sa odmeniť tých, ktorí sa obracajú od našich verše s najhorší trest za ich so odvrátil.

trans-unit.source: Do they [then] wait for anything except that the angels should come to them or your Lord should come or that there come some of the signs of your Lord? The Day that some of the signs of your Lord will come no soul will benefit from its faith as long as it had not believed before or had earned through its faith some good. Say, "Wait. Indeed, we [also] are waiting."
trans-unit.target: Robiť [a] čakať nič okrem toho, že anjeli by mala prísť na ne ani vášho pána by mala prísť, alebo že tam príde niektoré z príznakov, svojho pána? Deň, že niektoré príznaky váš pán príde bez duše budú mať prospech z jeho vieru ako dlho veril nie pred alebo jeho vierou zarobil nejaké dobré. Povedať, "čakať. Vskutku, [i] čakáme."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who have divided their religion and become sects - you, [O Muhammad], are not [associated] with them in anything. Their affair is only [left] to Allah; then He will inform them about what they used to do.
trans-unit.target: Vskutku, sú tí, ktorí majú rozdeliť svoje náboženstvo a stal sekty - ste [Mohamed], nie [] sú s nimi spojené v ničom. Ich vzťah je iba [vľavo] Boha; potom on bude informovať o tom, čo boli zvyknutí robiť.

trans-unit.source: Whoever comes [on the Day of Judgement] with a good deed will have ten times the like thereof [to his credit], and whoever comes with an evil deed will not be recompensed except the like thereof; and they will not be wronged.
trans-unit.target: Ten, kto prichádza [na Súdny deň] s dobrý skutok bude desaťkrát ako jej [dobru], a ten, kto prichádza s zlý skutok bude nie byť odmenený s výnimkou podobne. a oni budú nie poškodené.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Indeed, my Lord has guided me to a straight path - a correct religion - the way of Abraham, inclining toward truth. And he was not among those who associated others with Allah."
trans-unit.target: Povedať: "Vskutku, môj pán ma viedla cesta priamo - správne náboženstvo - ako Abrahám, inklinující k pravde. A on nebol medzi tými, kto iní priradené Alaha."

trans-unit.source: Say, "Indeed, my prayer, my rites of sacrifice, my living and my dying are for Allah, Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: Povedať: "moja modlitba môj obradoch obete, môj život a moje zomiera sú v skutočnosti pre Alaha, pane svetov.

trans-unit.source: No partner has He. And this I have been commanded, and I am the first [among you] of the Muslims."
trans-unit.target: Partner má on. A to som bol prikázal, a ja som prvý [medzi vami] moslimov."

trans-unit.source: Say, "Is it other than Allah I should desire as a lord while He is the Lord of all things? And every soul earns not [blame] except against itself, and no bearer of burdens will bear the burden of another. Then to your Lord is your return, and He will inform you concerning that over which you used to differ."
trans-unit.target: Povedať: "je to ako Boh chcem by ako pán, hoci je pánom všetkého? A každá duša zarobí nie [vinu] okrem proti sebe, a žiadny nosič záťaže bude niesť bremeno druhého. Potom je váš návrat svojho pána, a on vás informuje o tom, ktoré ste použili na líšia."

trans-unit.source: And it is He who has made you successors upon the earth and has raised some of you above others in degrees [of rank] that He may try you through what He has given you. Indeed, your Lord is swift in penalty; but indeed, He is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: A to je ten, kto má ťa nástupcom na zemi a vzniesla niektoré z vás nad ostatnými v stupňoch [hodnosti] že on si skúsiť cez to, čo on vám dal. Svojho pána je skutočne rýchly trestu; ale v skutočnosti je odpúšťajúci, a Milosrdných.

trans-unit.source: Alif, Lam, Meem, Sad.
trans-unit.target: Alif, Lam, Mîm, smutné.

trans-unit.source: [This is] a Book revealed to you, [O Muhammad] - so let there not be in your breast distress therefrom - that you may warn thereby and as a reminder to the believers.
trans-unit.target: [Je] knihu odhalila na vás [Mohamed] - tak nech tam byť v núdzi vašich pŕs z nich - že môže varovať, čím a ako pripomienka pre veriacich.

trans-unit.source: Follow, [O mankind], what has been revealed to you from your Lord and do not follow other than Him any allies. Little do you remember.
trans-unit.target: Sledovať, [ľudstvo O], čo bolo odhalené na vás od vášho pána a nie ako ho nasledovať všetkých spojencov. Niečo pamätáte.

trans-unit.source: And how many cities have We destroyed, and Our punishment came to them at night or while they were sleeping at noon.
trans-unit.target: Koľko miest sme zničili a náš trest prišiel k nim v noci alebo keď oni spali na poludnie.

trans-unit.source: And their declaration when Our punishment came to them was only that they said, "Indeed, we were wrongdoers!"
trans-unit.target: A svoje vyhlásenie, keď náš trest prišiel k nim bol len to, že oni povedali: "Naozaj, boli sme zloèinci!"

trans-unit.source: Then We will surely question those to whom [a message] was sent, and We will surely question the messengers.
trans-unit.target: Potom sme sa určite otázka, tých ktorým [] bola odoslaná a my bude určite otázka poslov.

trans-unit.source: Then We will surely relate [their deeds] to them with knowledge, and We were not [at all] absent.
trans-unit.target: Potom budeme určite týkať [ich skutky] im s vedomím, a neboli sme [všetko] chýba.

trans-unit.source: And the weighing [of deeds] that Day will be the truth. So those whose scales are heavy - it is they who will be the successful.
trans-unit.target: A váženie [skutky] že deň bude pravda. Takže tých ktorých váhy sú ťažké - sú to oni, kto bude úspešný.

trans-unit.source: And those whose scales are light - they are the ones who will lose themselves for what injustice they were doing toward Our verses.
trans-unit.target: A tých, ktorých váhy sú svetlo - oni sú tí, ktorí prídete sami aké nespravodlivosti robia k našej verše.

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly established you upon the earth and made for you therein ways of livelihood. Little are you grateful.
trans-unit.target: A sme určite si založil na zemi a môžete v ňom spôsoby obživy. Trochu ste vďační.

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly created you, [O Mankind], and given you [human] form. Then We said to the angels, "Prostrate to Adam"; so they prostrated, except for Iblees. He was not of those who prostrated.
trans-unit.target: A sme určite vás [O ľudstvo], stvoril a dal vám [človeka] forme. Potom sme povedali anjeli, "Přemoci na Adama"; Takže oni prostrated, okrem Iblees. Nebol z tých, ktorí prostrated.

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "What prevented you from prostrating when I commanded you?" [Satan] said, "I am better than him. You created me from fire and created him from clay."
trans-unit.target: [Allah] povedal: "Čo vám zabránili prostrating keď som ti prikázal?" [Satan] povedal: "som lepší ako on. Ste vytvorili mňa z ohňa a vytvoril ho z hliny."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "Descend from Paradise, for it is not for you to be arrogant therein. So get out; indeed, you are of the debased.
trans-unit.target: [Allah] povedal: "zostúpiť z raja, nie je to pre vás byť arogantný v ňom. Takže dostať v skutočnosti ste znehodnotený.

trans-unit.source: [Satan] said, "Reprieve me until the Day they are resurrected."
trans-unit.target: [Satan] povedal: "Reprieve mi dovtedy, kým sú vstal z mŕtvych."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "Indeed, you are of those reprieved."
trans-unit.target: [Allah] povedal: "Naozaj, ty si z tých reprieved."

trans-unit.source: [Satan] said, "Because You have put me in error, I will surely sit in wait for them on Your straight path.
trans-unit.target: [Satan] povedal: "pretože ste vložili mi chyba, som určite sedieť v čakať na priamu cestu.

trans-unit.source: Then I will come to them from before them and from behind them and on their right and on their left, and You will not find most of them grateful [to You]."
trans-unit.target: Potom bude pochádzať z, pred nimi a za nimi a ich pravej a po ľavej strane, a nie nájdete väčšinu z nich vďačný [vás]."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "Get out of Paradise, reproached and expelled. Whoever follows you among them - I will surely fill Hell with you, all together."
trans-unit.target: [Allah] povedal: "dostať von z raja, vytýkal a vylúčený. Ten, kto vás sleduje medzi nimi - bude určite vyplním pekla s vami, všetko dohromady."

trans-unit.source: And "O Adam, dwell, you and your wife, in Paradise and eat from wherever you will but do not approach this tree, lest you be among the wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: "O Adam, bývať, vy a vaša manželka v raji a jesť z kdekoľvek budete, ale nemajú prístup tohto stromu, inak budete patriť medzi zloèinci."

trans-unit.source: But Satan whispered to them to make apparent to them that which was concealed from them of their private parts. He said, "Your Lord did not forbid you this tree except that you become angels or become of the immortal."
trans-unit.target: Ale Satan šepká, aby sa zrejmé, že čo bolo skryté od nich ich prirodzení. Povedal, "Svojho pána sa nesmú zakázať vám tento strom okrem toho, že sa stanete anjelov alebo stať nesmrteľný."

trans-unit.source: And he swore [by Allah] to them, "Indeed, I am to you from among the sincere advisors."
trans-unit.target: A ten prisahal [Allah], "v skutočnosti som vám spomedzi úprimné poradcov."

trans-unit.source: So he made them fall, through deception. And when they tasted of the tree, their private parts became apparent to them, and they began to fasten together over themselves from the leaves of Paradise. And their Lord called to them, "Did I not forbid you from that tree and tell you that Satan is to you a clear enemy?"
trans-unit.target: Takže on sa im prepadnúť podvod. A keď Chutili stromu, ich prirodzení zrejmé k nim začali upevnite dohromady cez seba druhu raj. A ich pán hovorí im, "urobil som chráň ste z toho stromu a povedať, že Satan je vám jasný nepriateľ?"

trans-unit.source: They said, "Our Lord, we have wronged ourselves, and if You do not forgive us and have mercy upon us, we will surely be among the losers."
trans-unit.target: Povedali: "náš Pán sme ublížili sebe, a ak nemáte odpusť nám a zmiluj sa nad nami, určite budeme medzi porazených."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "Descend, being to one another enemies. And for you on the earth is a place of settlement and enjoyment for a time."
trans-unit.target: [Allah] povedal: "zostúpiť, sú navzájom nepriatelia. A pre vás na zemi je miesto sporov a radosti čas."

trans-unit.source: He said, "Therein you will live, and therein you will die, and from it you will be brought forth."
trans-unit.target: On povedal: "v ňom bude žiť, a v nej zomriete a z nej budete presunutí späť."

trans-unit.source: O children of Adam, We have bestowed upon you clothing to conceal your private parts and as adornment. But the clothing of righteousness - that is best. That is from the signs of Allah that perhaps they will remember.
trans-unit.target: O deti Adama, sme zapožičaný na vás oblečenie zakryť svoj prirodzení a ako ozdobu. Ale oblečenie spravodlivosť - to je najlepšie. Čiže od znamenia Alaha, ktoré snáď budú pamätať.

trans-unit.source: O children of Adam, let not Satan tempt you as he removed your parents from Paradise, stripping them of their clothing to show them their private parts. Indeed, he sees you, he and his tribe, from where you do not see them. Indeed, We have made the devils allies to those who do not believe.
trans-unit.target: O deti Adama, nech nie Satan zvádzať vás vybral svojich rodičov z raja, vyfukovacieho im svoje oblečenie, aby im ukázať ich prirodzení. Vskutku, vidí, ty, on a jeho kmeňa, ak nechcete vidieť ich. V skutočnosti sme sa diabli spojenci tým, ktorí neveria.

trans-unit.source: And when they commit an immorality, they say, "We found our fathers doing it, and Allah has ordered us to do it." Say, "Indeed, Allah does not order immorality. Do you say about Allah that which you do not know?"
trans-unit.target: A keď sa dopustí Nemravnosť, hovoria: "Zistili sme, našich otcov, robiť to, a Alah nariadil nám to." Povedať: "Vskutku, Alah, aby nemorálnosť. Hovoríte o Alah, ktoré neviete?"

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "My Lord has ordered justice and that you maintain yourselves [in worship of Him] at every place [or time] of prostration, and invoke Him, sincere to Him in religion." Just as He originated you, you will return [to life] -
trans-unit.target: J. [Mohamed], "môj pán nariadil spravodlivosti a udržiavať sami [v uctievanie ho] každé miesto [alebo čas] vyčerpanie a vyvolať ho úprimne mu v náboženstve." Rovnako tak vznikol vám, vám vráti [k životu]-

trans-unit.source: A group [of you] He guided, and a group deserved [to be in] error. Indeed, they had taken the devils as allies instead of Allah while they thought that they were guided.
trans-unit.target: Skupina [vás] viedol a skupina zaslúžil [byť] chyba. Skutočne boli prijaté devils ako spojenci namiesto Alah, kým si mysleli, že boli vedení.

trans-unit.source: O children of Adam, take your adornment at every masjid, and eat and drink, but be not excessive. Indeed, He likes not those who commit excess.
trans-unit.target: O deti Adam, vziať vaše ozdoba každej mešity a jesť a piť, ale nesmie byť nadmerná. V skutočnosti, rád nie tí, ktorí páchajú prebytok.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Who has forbidden the adornment of Allah which He has produced for His servants and the good [lawful] things of provision?" Say, "They are for those who believe during the worldly life [but] exclusively for them on the Day of Resurrection." Thus do We detail the verses for a people who know.
trans-unit.target: Hovoria: "Kto má zakázané ozdobou Alláha, ktorý mu priniesla pre svojich zamestnancov a dobré [zákonné] ustanovenia?" Povedať: "Sú pre tých, ktorí veria, že počas pozemský život, [ale] výlučne pre ne v deň zmŕtvychvstania." Preto budeme podrobne verše pre ľudí, ktorí vedia.

trans-unit.source: Say, "My Lord has only forbidden immoralities - what is apparent of them and what is concealed - and sin, and oppression without right, and that you associate with Allah that for which He has not sent down authority, and that you say about Allah that which you do not know."
trans-unit.target: Povedať: "môj pán zakázal iba immoralities - čo je zrejmé z nich, a čo je ukrytý - a hriechu a útlaku bez práva a ktoré sa spájajú so Alah, že ktoré nie poslal uvedeným orgánom a hovoriť Alah, ktoré nepoznáte."

trans-unit.source: And for every nation is a [specified] term. So when their time has come, they will not remain behind an hour, nor will they precede [it].
trans-unit.target: A pre každý národ je [zadaný] termín. Takže keď nadišiel ich čas, nie zostanú za hodinu, ani sa im predchádzať [to].

trans-unit.source: O children of Adam, if there come to you messengers from among you relating to you My verses, then whoever fears Allah and reforms - there will be no fear concerning them, nor will they grieve.
trans-unit.target: O deti Adam, ak tam príde k vám poslovia spomedzi vás týkajúce sa vám moje verše, potom ten, kto sa obáva, Alah a reformy - bude bez strachu o ich, ani sa im truchlit.

trans-unit.source: But the ones who deny Our verses and are arrogant toward them - those are the companions of the Fire; they will abide therein eternally.
trans-unit.target: Ale tí, ktorí popierajú naše verše a arogantný k nim - sú to sú spoločníci požiaru; dodržia sa v ňom naveky.

trans-unit.source: And who is more unjust than one who invents about Allah a lie or denies His verses? Those will attain their portion of the decree until when Our messengers come to them to take them in death, they will say, "Where are those you used to invoke besides Allah?" They will say, "They have departed from us," and will bear witness against themselves that they were disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: A kto je viac nespravodlivé, ako ten, kto vymyslí o Alah lož alebo popiera jeho verše? Tie sa dosiahnuť ich časť vyhlášky až keď naši poslovia príde im aby im smrť, oni povedia: "Kde sú tie, ktoré sú vám slúži na vyvolanie okrem Boha?" Oni povedia: "Oni odišli od nás" a medveď svedkom proti sebe, boli neveriacim.

trans-unit.source: [Allah] will say, "Enter among nations which had passed on before you of jinn and mankind into the Fire." Every time a nation enters, it will curse its sister until, when they have all overtaken one another therein, the last of them will say about the first of them "Our Lord, these had misled us, so give them a double punishment of the Fire. He will say, "For each is double, but you do not know."
trans-unit.target: [Allah] povie "Enter medzi národmi, ktoré prešiel na pred vami jinn a ľudstvo do ohňa." Zakaždým, keď vstúpi do národa, bude preklínať jeho sestra do doby, kedy sa všetky predstihli navzájom, posledný z nich povedia o prvú z nich "nášho Pána, toto bol omyl nás, takže im Dvojlôžková trest ohňa. On bude hovoriť: "lebo každý je dvojnásobná, ale nepoznáte."

trans-unit.source: And the first of them will say to the last of them, "Then you had not any favor over us, so taste the punishment for what you used to earn."
trans-unit.target: Prvý z nich poviem posledný z nich, "potom ste nemal žiadny prospech nad nami, takže chuť trest za to, čo ste boli zvyknutí zarábať."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who deny Our verses and are arrogant toward them - the gates of Heaven will not be opened for them, nor will they enter Paradise until a camel enters into the eye of a needle. And thus do We recompense the criminals.
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti tí, ktorí popierajú naše verše a arogantný k nim - brány nebies sa neotvoria, ani vstúpi sa raj, kým camel vstupuje do oka ihly. A tak môžeme odmeniť zločincom.

trans-unit.source: They will have from Hell a bed and over them coverings [of fire]. And thus do We recompense the wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: Budú mať z pekla posteľ a nad nimi [z ohňom]. A čím máme odmeniť zloèinci.

trans-unit.source: But those who believed and did righteous deeds - We charge no soul except [within] its capacity. Those are the companions of Paradise; they will abide therein eternally.
trans-unit.target: Ale tí, ktorí verili a urobil spravodlivé skutky - účtujeme dušu okrem [v rámci] svojej kapacity. Tie sú spoločníci raja; dodržia sa v ňom naveky.

trans-unit.source: And We will have removed whatever is within their breasts of resentment, [while] flowing beneath them are rivers. And they will say, "Praise to Allah, who has guided us to this; and we would never have been guided if Allah had not guided us. Certainly the messengers of our Lord had come with the truth." And they will be called, "This is Paradise, which you have been made to inherit for what you used to do."
trans-unit.target: A sme sa odstránili, čo je v ich prsia zášť, [zatiaľ čo] tečie pod nimi sú rieky. A povedia, "Chvála Bohu, ktorý má riadiť nás a my by nikdy bol vedený ak Boh riadil nie nás. Určite poslov náš Pán prišiel s pravdou." A že sa bude nazývať, "To je rajom, ktorý ste urobili dediť na čo ste zvyknutí robiť."

trans-unit.source: And the companions of Paradise will call out to the companions of the Fire, "We have already found what our Lord promised us to be true. Have you found what your Lord promised to be true?" They will say, "Yes." Then an announcer will announce among them, "The curse of Allah shall be upon the wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: A spoločníci raja bude volať na spoločníci oheň, "sme si už našli, čo náš Pán sľúbil nás musí byť pravda. Našli ste to, čo váš pán sľúbil, že sa pravda?" Oni povedia: "Áno." Potom Vyhlasovateľ vyhlási, medzi nimi "prekliatie Alah sa na zloèinci."

trans-unit.source: Who averted [people] from the way of Allah and sought to make it [seem] deviant while they were, concerning the Hereafter, disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: Kto odvrátená [ľudia] z toho, ako Boh a snažila sa to [zrejme] deviantné kým boli ktoré sa týkajú ďalej, neveriacim.

trans-unit.source: And between them will be a partition, and on [its] elevations are men who recognize all by their mark. And they call out to the companions of Paradise, "Peace be upon you." They have not [yet] entered it, but they long intensely.
trans-unit.target: Medzi nimi bude oblasť a [jeho] nadmorských výškach sú muži, ktorí uznávajú všetky podľa ich značky. A hovoria aby spoločníci raja, "Mier je na vás." Oni neboli [ešte] zapísané, ale oni dlho intenzívne.

trans-unit.source: And when their eyes are turned toward the companions of the Fire, they say, "Our Lord, do not place us with the wrongdoing people."
trans-unit.target: A keď ich oči sú obrátené k spoločníci ohňa, hovoria, "Náš Pán Neumiestňujte nás s previnenie ľudí."

trans-unit.source: And the companions of the Elevations will call to men [within Hell] whom they recognize by their mark, saying, "Of no avail to you was your gathering and [the fact] that you were arrogant."
trans-unit.target: A spoločníci nadmorských výškach volať ľuďom [do pekla], ktorým si uvedomujú ich ochrannou známkou, riekol: "márne vám bol váš zhromažďovanie a [že] že ste arogantní."

trans-unit.source: [Allah will say], "Are these the ones whom you [inhabitants of Hell] swore that Allah would never offer them mercy? Enter Paradise, [O People of the Elevations]. No fear will there be concerning you, nor will you grieve."
trans-unit.target: [Allah povie], "sú tieto tie, ktorými ste [obyvateľov pekla] prisahal, že Alah by nikdy ponúknuť milosrdenstvo? Zadajte raja, [O ľudí nadmorských výškach]. Žiadny strach budú k dispozícii o vás, ani sa vás smúti."

trans-unit.source: And the companions of the Fire will call to the companions of Paradise, "Pour upon us some water or from whatever Allah has provided you." They will say, "Indeed, Allah has forbidden them both to the disbelievers."
trans-unit.target: A spoločníci oheň bude volať na spoločníci raja, "naliať na nás trochu vody alebo z akéhokoľvek Alah poskytol vám." Oni povedia: "Vskutku, Alah zakázal im tak neveriacim."

trans-unit.source: Who took their religion as distraction and amusement and whom the worldly life deluded." So today We will forget them just as they forgot the meeting of this Day of theirs and for having rejected Our verses.
trans-unit.target: Kto sa ich náboženstvo ako rozptýlenie a zábavu a koho pozemský život pošetilou." Takže dnes nezabudnem, rovnako ako oni zabudli na zasadnutí tento deň ich a odmietli našu verše.

trans-unit.source: And We had certainly brought them a Book which We detailed by knowledge - as guidance and mercy to a people who believe.
trans-unit.target: A sme určite priniesol im knihy, ktoré sme podrobné vedomosti - ako vedenie a milosrdenstva k ľuďom, ktorí veria.

trans-unit.source: Do they await except its result? The Day its result comes those who had ignored it before will say, "The messengers of our Lord had come with the truth, so are there [now] any intercessors to intercede for us or could we be sent back to do other than we used to do?" They will have lost themselves, and lost from them is what they used to invent.
trans-unit.target: Čakajú okrem jeho výsledok? Tí, ktorí si nevšímal, to príde deň jeho výsledok pred povedia, "poslov náš Pán prišiel s pravdou, tak sú tam teraz] žiadne intercessors sa prihovárať za nás, alebo by sme poslali späť do robiť iné ako sme zvyknutí robiť?" Že stratí seba a stratil z nich je to, čo bývali vymyslieť.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, your Lord is Allah, who created the heavens and earth in six days and then established Himself above the Throne. He covers the night with the day, [another night] chasing it rapidly; and [He created] the sun, the moon, and the stars, subjected by His command. Unquestionably, His is the creation and the command; blessed is Allah, Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: Váš pán je naozaj Boh, ktorý stvoril nebo a zem za šesť dní a potom nasledovala nad trón. Ten zahŕňa noci deň, [ďalší večer] naháňa rýchlo; a [On] slnko, mesiac a hviezdy, vystavené jeho príkazom. Nesporne, jeho je vytvorenie a velenie; požehnaný je Boh, pán, svetov.

trans-unit.source: Call upon your Lord in humility and privately; indeed, He does not like transgressors.
trans-unit.target: Vyzvať svojho pána, v pokore a súkromne; v skutočnosti, on nemá rád hriešnikov.

trans-unit.source: And cause not corruption upon the earth after its reformation. And invoke Him in fear and aspiration. Indeed, the mercy of Allah is near to the doers of good.
trans-unit.target: A spôsobiť nie korupcii na zemi po jeho reformácie. A uplatniť ho v strachu a ašpirácie. Vskutku, na milosť a nemilosť Alah je blízko konajte dobro.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who sends the winds as good tidings before His mercy until, when they have carried heavy rainclouds, We drive them to a dead land and We send down rain therein and bring forth thereby [some] of all the fruits. Thus will We bring forth the dead; perhaps you may be reminded.
trans-unit.target: A je to on, kto posiela vetry ako dobrá zvesť pred jeho milosrdenstvo, do doby, kedy urobili ťažkých rainclouds, budeme riadiť ich mŕtve pôdy a môžeme poslať nadol dážď v ňom, a priviesť späť tým [niektoré] zo všetkého ovocia. Tak sme prinesú mŕtvych; snáď vám môže pripomenúť.

trans-unit.source: And the good land - its vegetation emerges by permission of its Lord; but that which is bad - nothing emerges except sparsely, with difficulty. Thus do We diversify the signs for a people who are grateful.
trans-unit.target: A dobré pôdy - jej vegetácie sa vynorí so zvolením svojho pána; ale to, čo je zlé - nič sa ukáže okrem riedko, s ťažkosťami. Tak sme diverzifikovať príznaky pre ľudí, ktorí sú vďační.

trans-unit.source: We had certainly sent Noah to his people, and he said, "O my people, worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him. Indeed, I fear for you the punishment of a tremendous Day.
trans-unit.target: Určite sme poslal Noah na svoj ľud a povedal: "O môj ľud, uctievanie Boha; budete mať žiadne božstvo okrem neho. V skutočnosti som strach si trest hrozný deň.

trans-unit.source: Said the eminent among his people, "Indeed, we see you in clear error."
trans-unit.target: Povedal významných medzi jeho ľud, "v skutočnosti vidíme vás jasnú chybu."

trans-unit.source: [Noah] said, "O my people, there is not error in me, but I am a messenger from the Lord of the worlds."
trans-unit.target: [Noah] povedal: "O môj ľud, nie je chyba vo mne, ale som posol od pána svetov."

trans-unit.source: I convey to you the messages of my Lord and advise you; and I know from Allah what you do not know.
trans-unit.target: Sprostredkovať vám správy môjho Pána a poradiť; a viem, že od Boha, čo nepoznáte.

trans-unit.source: Then do you wonder that there has come to you a reminder from your Lord through a man from among you, that he may warn you and that you may fear Allah so you might receive mercy."
trans-unit.target: Potom zaujíma vás, že tam má prísť k vám upomienku od svojho pána skrze človeka spomedzi vás, že on môže vás varovať a že Alah môže strach, tak môžete získať milosť."

trans-unit.source: But they denied him, so We saved him and those who were with him in the ship. And We drowned those who denied Our signs. Indeed, they were a blind people.
trans-unit.target: Ale oni zaprel, tak sme uložili ho a tých, ktorí boli s ním na lodi. A my tých, ktorí poprel našich značiek utopil. V skutočnosti boli slepí ľudia.

trans-unit.source: And to the 'Aad [We sent] their brother Hud. He said, "O my people, worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him. Then will you not fear Him?"
trans-unit.target: A "Aad [sme poslali] ich brat Hud. On povedal: "O môj ľud, uctievanie Boha; budete mať žiadne božstvo okrem neho. Potom sa ste sa ho bojí?"

trans-unit.source: Said the eminent ones who disbelieved among his people, "Indeed, we see you in foolishness, and indeed, we think you are of the liars."
trans-unit.target: Povedal významných ty, kto pochyboval medzi jeho ľud, "v skutočnosti môžeme vidieť v blaznovstvo, a skutočne si myslíme, že ste klamár."

trans-unit.source: [Hud] said, "O my people, there is not foolishness in me, but I am a messenger from the Lord of the worlds."
trans-unit.target: [Hud] povedal: "O môj ľud, nie je bláznovstvo vo mne, ale som posol od pána svetov."

trans-unit.source: I convey to you the messages of my Lord, and I am to you a trustworthy adviser.
trans-unit.target: Som vám oznamujem, správy, môjho Pána, a ja som pre vás dôveryhodné poradca.

trans-unit.source: Then do you wonder that there has come to you a reminder from your Lord through a man from among you, that he may warn you? And remember when He made you successors after the people of Noah and increased you in stature extensively. So remember the favors of Allah that you might succeed.
trans-unit.target: Potom ste vedel, že tam má prísť k vám upomienku od svojho pána skrze človeka spomedzi vás, že on môže vás varovať? A Pamätajte si, keď ťa nástupcov po ľudí, Noe a zvýšili si postavy značne. Takže pamätajte zdvorilosti Alah, že môže uspieť.

trans-unit.source: They said, "Have you come to us that we should worship Allah alone and leave what our fathers have worshipped? Then bring us what you promise us, if you should be of the truthful."
trans-unit.target: Povedali, že "ste prišli k nám, že by sme mali uctievať Boha sám a nechať, čo našich otcov si uctievali? Privedie nás čo vám sľúbiť, nás, ak by ste mali byť o pravdivé."

trans-unit.source: [Hud] said, "Already have defilement and anger fallen upon you from your Lord. Do you dispute with me concerning [mere] names you have named them, you and your fathers, for which Allah has not sent down any authority? Then wait; indeed, I am with you among those who wait."
trans-unit.target: [Hud] povedal: "už bezchybné a hnev klesli na si od svojho pána. Spor so mnou o [len] názvy, ktoré ste pomenovali ich, vy a vaši otcovia, pre ktoré Alah nie zoslal orgán? Potom čakať; v skutočnosti som s vami medzi tými, ktorí čakajú. "

trans-unit.source: So We saved him and those with him by mercy from Us. And We eliminated those who denied Our signs, and they were not [at all] believers.
trans-unit.target: Tak sme spasení neho a s ním zľutovanie od nás. My odstrániť tých, ktorí poprel našich značiek a neboli [vôbec] veriacich.

trans-unit.source: And to the Thamud [We sent] their brother Salih. He said, "O my people, worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him. There has come to you clear evidence from your Lord. This is the she-camel of Allah [sent] to you as a sign. So leave her to eat within Allah 's land and do not touch her with harm, lest there seize you a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: A Thamud [sme poslali] ich brat Sálih. On povedal: "O môj ľud, uctievanie Boha; budete mať žiadne božstvo okrem neho. Tam má prísť k vám jasné dôkazy od svojho pána. To je ona-camel Alah [poslal] vám ako znamenie. Tak nechajte ju jesť v Alaha pôdy a nedotýkajte jej poškodenia, inak tam zabaviť vás bolestivé trest.

trans-unit.source: And remember when He made you successors after the 'Aad and settled you in the land, [and] you take for yourselves palaces from its plains and carve from the mountains, homes. Then remember the favors of Allah and do not commit abuse on the earth, spreading corruption."
trans-unit.target: A Pamätajte si, kedy ste urobil nástupcov po "Aad a usadil sa v krajine, [a] vy sa sami palácov z jeho roviny a vyrezať z hôr, domy. Potom nezabudnite zdvorilosti Alah a nedopustil zneužitia na zemi, rozšírenia korupcie."

trans-unit.source: Said the eminent ones who were arrogant among his people to those who were oppressed - to those who believed among them, "Do you [actually] know that Salih is sent from his Lord?" They said, "Indeed we, in that with which he was sent, are believers."
trans-unit.target: Povedal významných tí, ktorí boli arogantní, medzi jeho ľuďmi tým, ktorí boli utláčanie - pre tých, ktorí uverili, medzi nimi "[skutočne] viete že Sálíh je poslaný od svojho pána?" Povedali, že "V skutočnosti, v tom s ktorým bola poslaná, sme veriaci."

trans-unit.source: Said those who were arrogant, "Indeed we, in that which you have believed, are disbelievers."
trans-unit.target: Povedal, že tí, ktorí boli arogantní, "Naozaj v tom, čo ste uverili, sme neveriacim."

trans-unit.source: So they hamstrung the she-camel and were insolent toward the command of their Lord and said, "O Salih, bring us what you promise us, if you should be of the messengers."
trans-unit.target: Takže ochromená ona-ťavy a drzý na príkaz svojho pána a povedal: "O Sálih, prinesie nám, čo ste sľúbiť, nás, ak by ste mali byť posl."

trans-unit.source: So the earthquake seized them, and they became within their home [corpses] fallen prone.
trans-unit.target: Takže zemetrasenie chytil je a stali sa v rámci svojej domovskej [mŕtvoly] padol náchylné.

trans-unit.source: And he turned away from them and said, "O my people, I had certainly conveyed to you the message of my Lord and advised you, but you do not like advisors."
trans-unit.target: A sa odvrátil od nich a povedal: "O mojich ľudí, som určite sprostredkovať vám správu môjho Pána a poradili, ale vám nepáči poradcov."

trans-unit.source: And [We had sent] Lot when he said to his people, "Do you commit such immorality as no one has preceded you with from among the worlds?
trans-unit.target: A [sme poslal] veľa, keď povedal, že jeho ľud, "ste spáchať takéto nemorálnosť ako nikto vás predchádza spomedzi svety?

trans-unit.source: Indeed, you approach men with desire, instead of women. Rather, you are a transgressing people."
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti budete blížiť muži s túžbou, namiesto ženy. Skôr ste transgressing ľudia."

trans-unit.source: But the answer of his people was only that they said, "Evict them from your city! Indeed, they are men who keep themselves pure."
trans-unit.target: Ale odpoveď svojho ľudu bolo len to, že oni povedali: "vysťahovať sa z vášho mesta! Vskutku, sú muži, ktorí udržať čisté."

trans-unit.source: So We saved him and his family, except for his wife; she was of those who remained [with the evildoers].
trans-unit.target: Tak sme spasení, jemu a jeho rodine, s výnimkou jeho manželke; ona bola z tých, ktorí zostali [s zločincov].

trans-unit.source: And We rained upon them a rain [of stones]. Then see how was the end of the criminals.
trans-unit.target: A pršalo sme na ne dážď [kamene]. Presvedčte sa, ako bolo na konci zločinci.

trans-unit.source: And to [the people of] Madyan [We sent] their brother Shu'ayb. He said, "O my people, worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him. There has come to you clear evidence from your Lord. So fulfill the measure and weight and do not deprive people of their due and cause not corruption upon the earth after its reformation. That is better for you, if you should be believers.
trans-unit.target: A [ľudia] Madyan, [sme poslali] ich brat Shu'ayb. On povedal: "O môj ľud, uctievanie Boha; budete mať žiadne božstvo okrem neho. Tam má prísť k vám jasné dôkazy od svojho pána. Tak naplniť opatrenia a hmotnosti a nie zbavovať ľudí ich splatnosti a spôsobiť nie korupcii na zemi po jeho reformácie. To je lepšie pre vás, ak by ste mali byť veriaci.

trans-unit.source: And do not sit on every path, threatening and averting from the way of Allah those who believe in Him, seeking to make it [seem] deviant. And remember when you were few and He increased you. And see how was the end of the corrupters.
trans-unit.target: A nie sedieť na každej ceste, ohrozuje a odvrátiť od toho, ako Boh tých, ktorí veria v neho snaží, aby to [zrejme] deviantné. A Pamätajte si, kedy ste boli málo a ste sa mu zvýšil. A uvidíte, ako bolo na konci corrupters.

trans-unit.source: And if there should be a group among you who has believed in that with which I have been sent and a group that has not believed, then be patient until Allah judges between us. And He is the best of judges."
trans-unit.target: A ak by mala byť skupina medzi vami, kto uveril v tom, s ktorými som poslal a skupina, ktorá má nie veril, potom buďte trpezliví, kým Alah sudcovia medzi nami. A on je najlepší sudcov."

trans-unit.source: Said the eminent ones who were arrogant among his people, "We will surely evict you, O Shu'ayb, and those who have believed with you from our city, or you must return to our religion." He said, "Even if we were unwilling?"
trans-unit.target: Povedal významných tí, ktorí boli arogantní medzi jeho ľud, "sme sa určite vypudit vás, O Shu'ayb, a tí, ktorí uverili s vami z nášho mesta, alebo musí vrátiť naše náboženstvo." On povedal: "aj keď sme boli ochotní?"

trans-unit.source: We would have invented against Allah a lie if we returned to your religion after Allah had saved us from it. And it is not for us to return to it except that Allah, our Lord, should will. Our Lord has encompassed all things in knowledge. Upon Allah we have relied. Our Lord, decide between us and our people in truth, and You are the best of those who give decision."
trans-unit.target: My by to vymyslel proti Alah lež keď sme sa vrátili na svoje náboženstvo, potom Boh zachránil nás od nej. A to nie je pre nás vrátiť, okrem toho, že by sa Boh, náš Pán. Náš Pán má zahŕňala všetky veci vo vedomostiach. Na Boha sa spoliehame. Nášho Pána sa rozhodnúť medzi nás a našich ľudí, v skutočnosti, a vy ste najlepší z tých, ktorí dávajú rozhodnutie."

trans-unit.source: Said the eminent ones who disbelieved among his people, "If you should follow Shu'ayb, indeed, you would then be losers."
trans-unit.target: Povedal významných tí, ktorí pochyboval medzi jeho ľud, "Ak by ste mali dodržiavať Shu'ayb, v skutočnosti, by potom budete porazení."

trans-unit.source: So the earthquake seized them, and they became within their home [corpses] fallen prone.
trans-unit.target: Takže zemetrasenie chytil je a stali sa v rámci svojej domovskej [mŕtvoly] padol náchylné.

trans-unit.source: Those who denied Shu'ayb - it was as though they had never resided there. Those who denied Shu'ayb - it was they who were the losers.
trans-unit.target: Tí, ktorí poprel Shu'ayb - akoby mal nikdy tam. Tí, ktorí poprel Shu'ayb - boli to oni, ktorí boli porazení.

trans-unit.source: And he turned away from them and said, "O my people, I had certainly conveyed to you the messages of my Lord and advised you, so how could I grieve for a disbelieving people?"
trans-unit.target: A sa odvrátil od nich a povedal: "O mojich ľudí, som určite dopraviť k vám správy môjho Pána a radil vám, tak ako by som truchlit pre neveriacky ľudí?"

trans-unit.source: And We sent to no city a prophet [who was denied] except that We seized its people with poverty and hardship that they might humble themselves [to Allah].
trans-unit.target: A poslali sme žiadne mesto prorok [kto bol odmietnutý] Okrem toho, že sme sa chytil jeho ľudia sa chudoba a utrpenie, že môžu pokorí [aby Allah].

trans-unit.source: Then We exchanged in place of the bad [condition], good, until they increased [and prospered] and said, "Our fathers [also] were touched with hardship and ease." So We seized them suddenly while they did not perceive.
trans-unit.target: Potom sme si vymenili miesto zlé [stav], dobré, kým sa zvýšila [a prosperoval] a povedal: "naši otcovia [i] boli dotkol ťažkosti s ľahkosťou." Takže sme chytil je zrazu, keď ich nevníma.

trans-unit.source: And if only the people of the cities had believed and feared Allah, We would have opened upon them blessings from the heaven and the earth; but they denied [the messengers], so We seized them for what they were earning."
trans-unit.target: A keby len ľudia z miest veril a bál Alah, by sme otvorili na ne požehnanie z nebies a Zeme; ale oni popieral [poslov], tak sme sa chytil čo boli zarábať."

trans-unit.source: Then, did the people of the cities feel secure from Our punishment coming to them at night while they were asleep?
trans-unit.target: Potom si ľudia z mesta cítiť v bezpečí pred náš trest prichádza na ne v noci, zatiaľ čo oni boli spí?

trans-unit.source: Or did the people of the cities feel secure from Our punishment coming to them in the morning while they were at play?
trans-unit.target: Alebo si ľudia z miest cítiť v bezpečí pred náš trest prichádza na ne ráno, kým oni boli v hre?

trans-unit.source: Then did they feel secure from the plan of Allah? But no one feels secure from the plan of Allah except the losing people.
trans-unit.target: Potom sa cíti bezpečné z plánu Boha? Ale nikto cíti bezpečné z plánu Alah okrem straty ľudí.

trans-unit.source: Has it not become clear to those who inherited the earth after its [previous] people that if We willed, We could afflict them for their sins? But We seal over their hearts so they do not hear.
trans-unit.target: Sa to stalo nie jasné, tí, ktorí zdedili zem po jeho [predchádzajúci] ľudia, že ak sme vôľou, sme mohli postihnúť ich za svoje hriechy? Ale sme pečať nad ich sŕdc, takže nie je počuť.

trans-unit.source: Those cities - We relate to you, [O Muhammad], some of their news. And certainly did their messengers come to them with clear proofs, but they were not to believe in that which they had denied before. Thus does Allah seal over the hearts of the disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: Tieto mestá - môžeme sa k vám, [Mohamed], niektoré z ich správy. A určite si ich poslovia majú im jasné dôkazy, ale neboli veriť v to, čo oni mali predtým popieral. Preto sa Alah tesnenie cez srdce neveriacim.

trans-unit.source: And We did not find for most of them any covenant; but indeed, We found most of them defiantly disobedient.
trans-unit.target: A nenašli sme vo väčšine prípadov žiadne zmluvu; ale naozaj, sme zistili, väčšina z nich vyzývavo neposlušný.

trans-unit.source: Then We sent after them Moses with Our signs to Pharaoh and his establishment, but they were unjust toward them. So see how was the end of the corrupters.
trans-unit.target: Potom sme poslali po nich Moses s našich značiek faraóna a jeho zavedenie, ale oni boli nespravodlivé voči nim. Takže vidieť, aká bola na konci corrupters.

trans-unit.source: And Moses said, "O Pharaoh, I am a messenger from the Lord of the worlds
trans-unit.target: A povedal: Moses "O faraóna, som posol od pána svetov

trans-unit.source: [Who is] obligated not to say about Allah except the truth. I have come to you with clear evidence from your Lord, so send with me the Children of Israel."
trans-unit.target: [Kto je] nie povinný hovoriť Alah, okrem pravdy. Som prišiel k vám s jasným dôkazom od svojho pána, tak pošlite so mnou deti Izraela."

trans-unit.source: [Pharaoh] said, "If you have come with a sign, then bring it forth, if you should be of the truthful."
trans-unit.target: [Faraóna] povedal: "Ak ste prišli so znamienkom, potom priviesť ju späť, ak by ste mali byť o pravdivé."

trans-unit.source: So Moses threw his staff, and suddenly it was a serpent, manifest.
trans-unit.target: Moses hodil jeho zamestnanci, a zrazu to bol had, zjavne.

trans-unit.source: And he drew out his hand; thereupon it was white [with radiance] for the observers.
trans-unit.target: A nakreslil ruku; Následne bola biela [s radiance] pre pozorovateľov.

trans-unit.source: Said the eminent among the people of Pharaoh, "Indeed, this is a learned magician
trans-unit.target: Povedal významných medzi ľuďmi faraóna, "naozaj, je to dozvedel kúzelník

trans-unit.source: Who wants to expel you from your land [through magic], so what do you instruct?"
trans-unit.target: Kto chce, aby ste vyhnať zo svojho pozemku [prostredníctvom mágie], tak čo si pokyn? "

trans-unit.source: They said, "Postpone [the matter of] him and his brother and send among the cities gatherers
trans-unit.target: Oni povedali: "odložiť [otázka] ho a jeho brat a poslať medzi mestami zberača

trans-unit.source: Who will bring you every learned magician."
trans-unit.target: Kto vám prinesie každý naučil kúzelník."

trans-unit.source: And the magicians came to Pharaoh. They said, "Indeed for us is a reward if we are the predominant."
trans-unit.target: A kúzelníci faraóna. Oni povedali: "naozaj pre nás je odmena, ak sú prevládajúci."

trans-unit.source: He said, "Yes, and, [moreover], you will be among those made near [to me]."
trans-unit.target: On povedal: "áno, a [okrem], budete medzi tými, ktoré sú v blízkosti [ku mne]."

trans-unit.source: They said, "O Moses, either you throw [your staff], or we will be the ones to throw [first]."
trans-unit.target: Povedali: "O Moses, hodíte [Zamestnanci], alebo budeme tie hodiť [prvé]."

trans-unit.source: He said, "Throw," and when they threw, they bewitched the eyes of the people and struck terror into them, and they presented a great [feat of] magic.
trans-unit.target: On povedal: "Hoď," a keď vyhodili, očarovala oči ľudí a udrel hrôzy do nich a predvádzali skvelé [feat] mágia.

trans-unit.source: And We inspired to Moses, "Throw your staff," and at once it devoured what they were falsifying.
trans-unit.target: Sme inšpirovaní k Moses "Hodiť svojich zamestnancov" a naraz to hltal, čo boli falšovanie.

trans-unit.source: So the truth was established, and abolished was what they were doing.
trans-unit.target: Takže pravda bola založená a zrušené bolo, čo robili.

trans-unit.source: And Pharaoh and his people were overcome right there and became debased.
trans-unit.target: A faraóna a jeho ľudia boli tam prekonať a stal báz.

trans-unit.source: And the magicians fell down in prostration [to Allah].
trans-unit.target: A kúzelníci padol v vyčerpanie [aby Allah].

trans-unit.source: They said, "We have believed in the Lord of the worlds,
trans-unit.target: Povedali, že "sme uverili v pána svety,

trans-unit.source: The Lord of Moses and Aaron."
trans-unit.target: Pán Moses a Árona."

trans-unit.source: Said Pharaoh, "You believed in him before I gave you permission. Indeed, this is a conspiracy which you conspired in the city to expel therefrom its people. But you are going to know.
trans-unit.target: Povedal faraóna, "ste v neho verili predtým, než som dal povolenie. Naozaj, je to sprisahanie, ktoré sa spolčili v meste vyhnať z jeho ľudí. Ale budete vedieť.

trans-unit.source: I will surely cut off your hands and your feet on opposite sides; then I will surely crucify you all."
trans-unit.target: Bude určite odrezať ruky a nohy v protiľahlých stranách; potom som sa iste ukrižovať vás všetkých."

trans-unit.source: They said, "Indeed, to our Lord we will return.
trans-unit.target: Oni povedali: "naozaj, náš Pán vrátime.

trans-unit.source: And you do not resent us except because we believed in the signs of our Lord when they came to us. Our Lord, pour upon us patience and let us die as Muslims [in submission to You]."
trans-unit.target: A nie vadí nám okrem lebo sme verili v znamení nášho Pána, keď prišli k nám. Náš Pán, naliať na nás trpezlivosť a poďme zomrieť ako moslimovia [v podaní vám]."

trans-unit.source: And the eminent among the people of Pharaoh said," Will you leave Moses and his people to cause corruption in the land and abandon you and your gods?" [Pharaoh] said, "We will kill their sons and keep their women alive; and indeed, we are subjugators over them."
trans-unit.target: A významných ľudí faraón povedal,"cestuješ Moses a jeho ľudia spôsobujú poškodenie pôdy a opustiť vás a svojich bohov?" [Faraóna] povedal: "budeme zabíjať svojich synov a udržať ich ženy nažive; a skutočne sme subjugators nad nimi."

trans-unit.source: Said Moses to his people, "Seek help through Allah and be patient. Indeed, the earth belongs to Allah. He causes to inherit it whom He wills of His servants. And the [best] outcome is for the righteous."
trans-unit.target: Moses povedal svojim ľuďom, "vyhľadať pomoc prostredníctvom Alah a byť trpezlivý. Vskutku, zem patrí Alah. Spôsobí dediť to, koho on chce jeho zamestnancov. A [najlepšie] výsledok je spravodlivý."

trans-unit.source: They said, "We have been harmed before you came to us and after you have come to us." He said, "Perhaps your Lord will destroy your enemy and grant you succession in the land and see how you will do."
trans-unit.target: Povedali, že "Sme boli poškodené ako ste prišli k nám, a potom ste prišli k nám." On povedal: "Možno svojho pána sa zničiť svojho nepriateľa a poskytnúť vám dedičstvo v krajine a vidieť, ako budete robiť."

trans-unit.source: And We certainly seized the people of Pharaoh with years of famine and a deficiency in fruits that perhaps they would be reminded.
trans-unit.target: A sme určite ľudia faraóna s dlhoročnými hlad a nedostatok ovocia, že snáď by sa pripomínali.

trans-unit.source: But when good came to them, they said, "This is ours [by right]." And if a bad [condition] struck them, they saw an evil omen in Moses and those with him. Unquestionably, their fortune is with Allah, but most of them do not know.
trans-unit.target: Ale keď dobrý prišiel s nimi, povedal, "to je naša [vpravo]." A keď je zlý [stav] udrel, videl zlé znamenie v Moses a tie, ktoré sú s ním. Nesporne, svoje šťastie je Boh, ale väčšina z nich nevie.

trans-unit.source: And they said, "No matter what sign you bring us with which to bewitch us, we will not be believers in you."
trans-unit.target: A oni povedali: "bez ohľadu na to, aké znamenie ste priviesť nás na nás očaril, nebudeme veriacich vo vás."

trans-unit.source: So We sent upon them the flood and locusts and lice and frogs and blood as distinct signs, but they were arrogant and were a criminal people.
trans-unit.target: Tak sme poslali na nich povodní a kobylky a vši a žaby a krv ako zreteľné znamenie, ale boli arogantní a boli trestné ľudí.

trans-unit.source: And when the punishment descended upon them, they said, "O Moses, invoke for us your Lord by what He has promised you. If you [can] remove the punishment from us, we will surely believe you, and we will send with you the Children of Israel."
trans-unit.target: A keď trest zostúpil na nich, oni povedali, "O Moses odvolávať nás svojho pána čo vám sľúbil. Ak odstránite možno trest od nás, budeme určite presvedčení, že vás a pošleme s tebou deti Izraela."

trans-unit.source: But when We removed the punishment from them until a term which they were to reach, then at once they broke their word.
trans-unit.target: Ale keď sme odstránili trest od nich až obdobie, v ktorom bolo dosiahnuť, potom naraz sa rozbil svoje slovo.

trans-unit.source: So We took retribution from them, and We drowned them in the sea because they denied Our signs and were heedless of them.
trans-unit.target: Tak sme vzali odplata za ich a sme im utopil v mori, pretože popieral našich značiek a neboli nepozorný z nich.

trans-unit.source: And We caused the people who had been oppressed to inherit the eastern regions of the land and the western ones, which We had blessed. And the good word of your Lord was fulfilled for the Children of Israel because of what they had patiently endured. And We destroyed [all] that Pharaoh and his people were producing and what they had been building.
trans-unit.target: A sme ľudia, ktorí mali boli utláčaní dediť východných regiónoch krajiny a západnej tie, ktoré sme požehnal. A dobré slovo vášho pána bolo splnené pre deti Izraela kvôli čo mal trpezlivo znášať. A sme zničili [všetky] že faraóna a jeho ľudia boli výrobu a to, čo oni boli budovy.

trans-unit.source: And We took the Children of Israel across the sea; then they came upon a people intent in devotion to [some] idols of theirs. They said, "O Moses, make for us a god just as they have gods." He said, "Indeed, you are a people behaving ignorantly.
trans-unit.target: A Zobrali sme deti Izraela cez more; potom prišli na ľudí zámer v oddanosti [niektoré] modly ich. Oni povedali: "O Moses, aby pre nás Boh rovnako ako majú bohov." On povedal: "v skutočnosti sa ľudia správajú nevedome.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those [worshippers] - destroyed is that in which they are [engaged], and worthless is whatever they were doing."
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti tie [veriacich] - zničené, že v ktorom sú [zaoberajú], a bezcenné je, čo robia. "

trans-unit.source: He said, "Is it other than Allah I should desire for you as a god while He has preferred you over the worlds?"
trans-unit.target: On povedal: "Je to ako Boh som mali túžbu pre vás ako Boh, kým on vás má prednosť pred svety?"

trans-unit.source: And [recall, O Children of Israel], when We saved you from the people of Pharaoh, [who were] afflicting you with the worst torment - killing your sons and keeping your women alive. And in that was a great trial from your Lord.
trans-unit.target: A [odvolanie, O deti Izrael], keď sme ťa zachránil od ľudí faraóna, [ktoré boli] postihujúce ste s najhoršie trápenie - zabíjanie svojich synov a udržanie svojej ženy nažive. A to bol veľký súd od svojho pána.

trans-unit.source: And We made an appointment with Moses for thirty nights and perfected them by [the addition of] ten; so the term of his Lord was completed as forty nights. And Moses said to his brother Aaron, "Take my place among my people, do right [by them], and do not follow the way of the corrupters."
trans-unit.target: A sme sa dohodli s Moses tridsať nocí a zdokonalil ich pridaním [] desať; Takže termín jeho pán bol dokončený ako štyridsať nocí. A Moses povedal jeho brat Aaron, "brať svoje miesto medzi svoj ľud si právo [ich] a nenasledujú cestu corrupters."

trans-unit.source: And when Moses arrived at Our appointed time and his Lord spoke to him, he said, "My Lord, show me [Yourself] that I may look at You."
