trans-unit.target: A v rámci pozemku sú susedné pozemky a záhrady z vínnej révy a plodín a palmami, [stále] niekoľko z koreňa, alebo inak, polievajú vodou jeden; ale sme niektoré z nich presahujú ostatné [množstvo] ovocie. Naozaj v tom, že sú príznaky pre ľudí, ktorí z dôvodu.

trans-unit.source: And if you are astonished, [O Muhammad] - then astonishing is their saying, "When we are dust, will we indeed be [brought] into a new creation?" Those are the ones who have disbelieved in their Lord, and those will have shackles upon their necks, and those are the companions of the Fire; they will abide therein eternally.
trans-unit.target: A ak ste sa divili, [Mohamed] - prekvapujúce, potom je ich slovami: "keď sme prach, sme naozaj bude [privezený] nové stvorenie?" To sú tí, ktorí majú pochyboval v svojho pána, a tie budú mať putá na krku, a tie sú spoločníci požiaru; dodržia sa v ňom naveky.

trans-unit.source: They impatiently urge you to bring about evil before good, while there has already occurred before them similar punishments [to what they demand]. And indeed, your Lord is full of forgiveness for the people despite their wrongdoing, and indeed, your Lord is severe in penalty.
trans-unit.target: Im netrpezlivo žiadame, aby ste priniesť zlo pred dobrom, kým tu došlo už pred nimi podobné tresty [na to, čo žiadajú]. Vskutku, svojho pána, je úplné odpustenie pre ľudí cez ich previnenie a svojho pána je skutočne ťažké trestu.

trans-unit.source: And those who disbelieved say, "Why has a sign not been sent down to him from his Lord?" You are only a warner, and for every people is a guide.
trans-unit.target: A tí, kto pochyboval hovoria: "Prečo znamenie nebola odoslaná mu z jeho pána?" Ste len warner a pre všetkých ľudí je sprievodca.

trans-unit.source: Allah knows what every female carries and what the wombs lose [prematurely] or exceed. And everything with Him is by due measure.
trans-unit.target: Boh vie, čo každá žena nesie a stratiť [predčasne] lona alebo prekročiť. A všetko, čo s ním je vhodným spôsobom opatrenie.

trans-unit.source: [He is] Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, the Grand, the Exalted.
trans-unit.target: [Je] Vševedúci neviditeľné a svedkom, Grand postáv.

trans-unit.source: It is the same [to Him] concerning you whether one conceals [his] speech or one publicizes it and whether one is hidden by night or conspicuous [among others] by day.
trans-unit.target: To je to isté [s ním] o vás jeden ukrýva [jeho] reči alebo jeden propaguje a či je skryté v noci alebo nápadné [okrem iného] deň.

trans-unit.source: For each one are successive [angels] before and behind him who protect him by the decree of Allah. Indeed, Allah will not change the condition of a people until they change what is in themselves. And when Allah intends for a people ill, there is no repelling it. And there is not for them besides Him any patron.
trans-unit.target: Pre každý jeden sú následné [anjeli] pred a za ním, ktorý chránil vyhláškou Alah. Alah skutočne nezmení stav ľudí, kým sa nezmenia, čo je samé o sebe. A ak Boh chce pre ľudí chorých, neexistuje žiadny odpudzuje. A nie je pre nich Okrem neho žiadne patrón.

trans-unit.source: It is He who shows you lightening, [causing] fear and aspiration, and generates the heavy clouds.
trans-unit.target: To je ten, ktorý vám ukáže, osvetlenie, [spôsobuje] strachu a ašpirácie, a generuje ťažké mraky.

trans-unit.source: And the thunder exalts [Allah] with praise of Him - and the angels [as well] from fear of Him - and He sends thunderbolts and strikes therewith whom He wills while they dispute about Allah; and He is severe in assault.
trans-unit.target: Thunder povyšuje [Allah] chválu-a anjeli [aj] od strachu- a on posiela blesky a údery s nimi koho on wills, zatiaľ čo popierajú, že o Boh; a on je vážne v útoku.

trans-unit.source: To Him [alone] is the supplication of truth. And those they call upon besides Him do not respond to them with a thing, except as one who stretches his hands toward water [from afar, calling it] to reach his mouth, but it will not reach it [thus]. And the supplication of the disbelievers is not but in error [i.e. futility].
trans-unit.target: [Len] jemu je prosbe pravdy. A tí vyzývajú okrem neho nereaguje im vec, s výnimkou ako ten, kto ťahá ruky smerom k vode [z diaľky, volať to] na dosiahnuť svojich úst, ale to nedosiahne to [tak]. A prosbe neveriacim nie je ale chyba [t. j. márnosť].

trans-unit.source: And to Allah prostrates whoever is within the heavens and the earth, willingly or by compulsion, and their shadows [as well] in the mornings and the afternoons.
trans-unit.target: A Bohu prostrates, kto je do neba a Zeme, ochotne alebo nátlaku a ich tiene [aj] ráno a popoludní.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Who is Lord of the heavens and earth?" Say, "Allah." Say, "Have you then taken besides Him allies not possessing [even] for themselves any benefit or any harm?" Say, "Is the blind equivalent to the seeing? Or is darkness equivalent to light? Or have they attributed to Allah partners who created like His creation so that the creation [of each] seemed similar to them?" Say, "Allah is the Creator of all things, and He is the One, the Prevailing."
trans-unit.target: Povedať: "Kto je pán neba i Zeme?" Povedať: "Boh." Povedať, "ste potom prijali okrem neho spojenci nie vlastniť [i] pre seba nejaké výhody alebo ublížiť?" Povedať: "je rovná vidieť nevidiacich? Alebo sa rovná svetlo tma? Alebo sa pripisuje Alah partnerov, ktorý vytvoril ako jeho vzniku tak, aby vytvorením [každý] zdalo sa, že podobné s nimi?" Napríklad: "Boh je tvorcom všetkých vecí, a on je ten, Prevailing."

trans-unit.source: He sends down from the sky, rain, and valleys flow according to their capacity, and the torrent carries a rising foam. And from that [ore] which they heat in the fire, desiring adornments and utensils, is a foam like it. Thus Allah presents [the example of] truth and falsehood. As for the foam, it vanishes, [being] cast off; but as for that which benefits the people, it remains on the earth. Thus does Allah present examples.
trans-unit.target: Posiela obloha, dážď a údoliami tokov podľa ich kapacity a torrent nesie rastúce peny. A z tejto [rudy] ktoré sa teplo v ohni, so želaním, ozdoby a riadu, je pena to páči. Teda Boh predstavuje [Príklad] pravda a lož. Pokiaľ ide o peny, zmizne, že odhodiť; ale pokiaľ ide o to, čo prospieva ľuďom, zostáva na zemi. Preto Alah prezentovať príklady.

trans-unit.source: For those who have responded to their Lord is the best [reward], but those who did not respond to Him - if they had all that is in the earth entirely and the like of it with it, they would [attempt to] ransom themselves thereby. Those will have the worst account, and their refuge is Hell, and wretched is the resting place.
trans-unit.target: Pre tých, ktorí odpovedali na svojho pána je najlepšie [odmena], ale tí, ktorí neodpovedali na ho - keby všetko, čo je na zemi úplne, a ako to s tým, že by [pokúsi] výkupné seba tým. Tie budú mať najhoršie účet, svoje útočisko je peklo a úbohý je miesto posledného odpočinku.

trans-unit.source: Then is he who knows that what has been revealed to you from your Lord is the truth like one who is blind? They will only be reminded who are people of understanding -
trans-unit.target: Potom je ten, kto vie, že čo bolo odhalené na vás z vášho pána je pravda ako ten, kto je slepý? Oni len pripomenul kto sú ľudia porozumenie-

trans-unit.source: Those who fulfill the covenant of Allah and do not break the contract,
trans-unit.target: Tí, ktorí plniť pakt Alah a neporušujú zmluvy,

trans-unit.source: And those who join that which Allah has ordered to be joined and fear their Lord and are afraid of the evil of [their] account,
trans-unit.target: A tí, ktorí sa, ktoré Alah nariadil, aby sa pripojil a strach ich pána a bojí zla zo [svojho] účtu

trans-unit.source: And those who are patient, seeking the countenance of their Lord, and establish prayer and spend from what We have provided for them secretly and publicly and prevent evil with good - those will have the good consequence of [this] home -
trans-unit.target: A tí, ktorí sú trpezliví, hľadá tvár svojho pána, a vytvoriť modlitba a utrácať zo čo sme poskytli ich tajne a verejne a zabrániť zlo dobrom - tí majú dobré dôsledkom [to] domáci-

trans-unit.source: Gardens of perpetual residence; they will enter them with whoever were righteous among their fathers, their spouses and their descendants. And the angels will enter upon them from every gate, [saying],
trans-unit.target: Záhrady, trvalé bydlisko; vstúpia nimi s kto boli spravodliví medzi ich otcovia, ich manželov a ich potomkov. A anjeli budú vstupovať na ne z každej bráne [povedať],

trans-unit.source: "Peace be upon you for what you patiently endured. And excellent is the final home."
trans-unit.target: "Mier je na vás pre aké trpezlivo znášať. A výborná je posledný domov."

trans-unit.source: But those who break the covenant of Allah after contracting it and sever that which Allah has ordered to be joined and spread corruption on earth - for them is the curse, and they will have the worst home.
trans-unit.target: Ale tí, ktorí porušiť zmluvu Alah po zmluvné to a sever, ktoré Alah nariadil pripojiť a šíriť korupcie na zemi - pre nich je prekliatie, a majú najhoršie domov.

trans-unit.source: Allah extends provision for whom He wills and restricts [it]. And they rejoice in the worldly life, while the worldly life is not, compared to the Hereafter, except [brief] enjoyment.
trans-unit.target: Alah rozširuje ustanovenia pre koho chce, a [to] obmedzuje. A radovať sa v pozemský život, kým pozemský život nie je, v porovnaní s ďalej, okrem [krátke] pôžitok.

trans-unit.source: And those who disbelieved say, "Why has a sign not been sent down to him from his Lord?" Say, [O Muhammad], "Indeed, Allah leaves astray whom He wills and guides to Himself whoever turns back [to Him] -
trans-unit.target: A tí, kto pochyboval hovoria: "Prečo znamenie nebola odoslaná mu z jeho pána?" J. [Mohamed], "naozaj, Alah listy scestie koho on wills a sprievodca sám, ten, kto odvracia [s ním]-

trans-unit.source: Those who have believed and whose hearts are assured by the remembrance of Allah. Unquestionably, by the remembrance of Allah hearts are assured."
trans-unit.target: Tí, ktorí uverili a ktorých srdcia zabezpečená pamiatku Alah. Nepochybne, od pamiatku Alah srdce istí."

trans-unit.source: Those who have believed and done righteous deeds - a good state is theirs and a good return.
trans-unit.target: Tí, ktorí uverili a urobil spravodlivé skutky - dobrom stave je ich a dobrý return.

trans-unit.source: Thus have We sent you to a community before which [other] communities have passed on so you might recite to them that which We revealed to you, while they disbelieve in the Most Merciful. Say, "He is my Lord; there is no deity except Him. Upon Him I rely, and to Him is my return."
trans-unit.target: Preto sme vám poslali na obec, pred ktorým [Ostatné] obce prešli na takže môže prednášať na ne, ktoré sme odhalili, zatiaľ čo oni neveria v Most Milosrdných. Povedať: "on je môj pán; Neexistuje žiadne božstvo okrem neho. Mu môžem spoľahnúť a mu je môj návrat.

trans-unit.source: And if there was any qur'an by which the mountains would be removed or the earth would be broken apart or the dead would be made to speak, [it would be this Qur'an], but to Allah belongs the affair entirely. Then have those who believed not accepted that had Allah willed, He would have guided the people, all of them? And those who disbelieve do not cease to be struck, for what they have done, by calamity - or it will descend near their home - until there comes the promise of Allah. Indeed, Allah does not fail in [His] promise.
trans-unit.target: A ak tam bol žiadne Korán, ktorý hory by sa zrušilo alebo Zem by byť rozdelená alebo mŕtvi by sa hovoriť, [je to Korán], ale Alah patrí aféra úplne. Potom prijali tých, ktorí neverili, že mal Boh chcel, on by riadiť ľudí, všetky z nich? A tých, ktorí neveriť neprestávajú byť udrel, čo urobili, od kalamity - alebo to bude klesať v blízkosti ich domov - kým príde prísľub Alah. Vskutku, Alah nezabudla v [jeho] sľub.

trans-unit.source: And already were [other] messengers ridiculed before you, and I extended the time of those who disbelieved; then I seized them, and how [terrible] was My penalty.
trans-unit.target: Už boli zosmiešňovanie [Ostatné] poslov pred vami a som dlhšiu dobu tých, kto pochyboval; potom som ich chytil, a ako [hrozné] bol môj trest.

trans-unit.source: Then is He who is a maintainer of every soul, [knowing] what it has earned, [like any other]? But to Allah they have attributed partners. Say, "Name them. Or do you inform Him of that which He knows not upon the earth or of what is apparent of speech?" Rather, their [own] plan has been made attractive to those who disbelieve, and they have been averted from the way. And whomever Allah leaves astray - there will be for him no guide.
trans-unit.target: Potom je ten, kto je správcom každá duša [vedel] čo to získal, [ako každá iná]? Ale Bohu pridelili partnerov. Povedať: "meno je. Alebo informujete ho to, čo vie, nie na zemi, alebo čo je zrejmé z reči?" Skôr vlastné [] plán sa atraktívne pre tých, ktorí neveria, a už bola odvrátená od cesty. A koho Boh necháva scestie - tam bude pre neho žiadny sprievodca.

trans-unit.source: For them will be punishment in the life of [this] world, and the punishment of the Hereafter is more severe. And they will not have from Allah any protector.
trans-unit.target: Pre nich bude trest v živote [tohto] sveta a trest ďalej je ťažšie. A nebudú mať od Alaha niektorý chránič.

trans-unit.source: The example of Paradise, which the righteous have been promised, is [that] beneath it rivers flow. Its fruit is lasting, and its shade. That is the consequence for the righteous, and the consequence for the disbelievers is the Fire.
trans-unit.target: Príklad raja, ktoré boli prisľúbené spravodliví, [že] je pod ňou toku rieky. Jej ovocie je trvalý, a jeho tieň. To je dôsledok pre spravodlivý a dôsledkom pre neveriacim je oheň.

trans-unit.source: And [the believers among] those to whom We have given the [previous] Scripture rejoice at what has been revealed to you, [O Muhammad], but among the [opposing] factions are those who deny part of it. Say, "I have only been commanded to worship Allah and not associate [anything] with Him. To Him I invite, and to Him is my return."
trans-unit.target: A [veriaci medzi] komu sme dali [predchádzajúci] písmo radovať z čo bolo odhalené na vás [Mohamed], ale medzi [proti] frakcií sú tí, ktorí popierajú časti. Povedať: "som len bolo prikázané uctievať Boha, a nie je pridruženému [niečo] s ním. Mu I pozvať, a pre neho je môj návrat."

trans-unit.source: And thus We have revealed it as an Arabic legislation. And if you should follow their inclinations after what has come to you of knowledge, you would not have against Allah any ally or any protector.
trans-unit.target: A tak sme odhalili ako arabčina legislatívy. A ak by ste mali dodržiavať ich sklony po to, čo má prísť k vám znalosti, by ste nemali proti Alah každý spojenec alebo akékoľvek chránič.

trans-unit.source: And We have already sent messengers before you and assigned to them wives and descendants. And it was not for a messenger to come with a sign except by permission of Allah. For every term is a decree.
trans-unit.target: A máme už poslal poslov pred vami a ich manželky a potomkovia. A to nebolo pre messenger prísť s označením okrem súhlasu Alah. Pre každý termín je vyhláška.

trans-unit.source: Allah eliminates what He wills or confirms, and with Him is the Mother of the Book.
trans-unit.target: Alah eliminuje čo závetu alebo potvrdzuje, a s ním je matkou knihy.

trans-unit.source: And whether We show you part of what We promise them or take you in death, upon you is only the [duty of] notification, and upon Us is the account.
trans-unit.target: A či vám ukážeme časť toho, čo sľubujú im, alebo vás smrť na vás je len [povinnosť] Oznámenie a na nás účet.

trans-unit.source: Have they not seen that We set upon the land, reducing it from its borders? And Allah decides; there is no adjuster of His decision. And He is swift in account.
trans-unit.target: Oni nevideli že nastavíme na zemi, zníži zo svojich hraníc? A Boh sa rozhodne; Neexistuje žiadny prispôsobil jeho rozhodnutia. A je to rýchle na účte.

trans-unit.source: And those before them had plotted, but to Allah belongs the plan entirely. He knows what every soul earns, and the disbelievers will know for whom is the final home.
trans-unit.target: A tie pred nimi mal vyniesť, ale Alah patrí plán úplne. Vie, že každá duša, čo zarába a neveriacim vedieť pre koho je posledný domov.

trans-unit.source: And those who have disbelieved say, "You are not a messenger." Say, [O Muhammad], "Sufficient is Allah as Witness between me and you, and [the witness of] whoever has knowledge of the Scripture."
trans-unit.target: A tí, ktorí majú pochyboval povedať: "Nie ste posol." Povedať, [Mohamed], "stačí je Alah svedkom medzi mnou a vami, a [svedectvo] ten, kto má znalosti Biblie."

trans-unit.source: Alif, Lam, Ra. [This is] a Book which We have revealed to you, [O Muhammad], that you might bring mankind out of darknesses into the light by permission of their Lord - to the path of the Exalted in Might, the Praiseworthy -
trans-unit.target: Alif, Lam, Ra. [je] knihy, ktoré sme odhalili vám [Mohamed], že môžete priniesť ľudstvu z darknesses do svetla so zvolením svojho pána - cesta postáv by, Praiseworthy -

trans-unit.source: Allah, to whom belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. And woe to the disbelievers from a severe punishment
trans-unit.target: Alah, komu patrí, čo je v nebesiach a čo je na zemi. A Beda neveriacim prísne potrestanie

trans-unit.source: The ones who prefer the worldly life over the Hereafter and avert [people] from the way of Allah, seeking to make it (seem) deviant. Those are in extreme error.
trans-unit.target: Tí, ktorí radšej pozemský život cez nižšie a odvrátiť [ľudia] z cesty Boha, snaží sa to (zrejme) deviantné. Tie sú extrémne omylom.

trans-unit.source: And We did not send any messenger except [speaking] in the language of his people to state clearly for them, and Allah sends astray [thereby] whom He wills and guides whom He wills. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
trans-unit.target: Sme neposlali žiadne messenger, okrem [hovoriť] v jazyku ľudí, jeho štátu jasne pre nich a Alah pošle scestie [tak] koho on wills a sprievodcov, koho on chce. A on je postáv by, múdry.

trans-unit.source: And We certainly sent Moses with Our signs, [saying], "Bring out your people from darknesses into the light and remind them of the days of Allah." Indeed in that are signs for everyone patient and grateful.
trans-unit.target: A určite sme poslali Moses s našich značiek [povedať], "aby sa vaši ľudia z darknesses do svetla a pripomenúť im, dni Alaha." Naozaj v tom, že sú príznaky pre každého pacienta a vďačný.

trans-unit.source: And [recall, O Children of Israel], when Moses said to His people, "Remember the favor of Allah upon you when He saved you from the people of Pharaoh, who were afflicting you with the worst torment and were slaughtering your [newborn] sons and keeping your females alive. And in that was a great trial from your Lord.
trans-unit.target: A [odvolanie, O deti Izrael], keď Moses hovorí k svojmu ľudu, "pamäti prospech Boh na vás, keď zachrÃ¡nil ste od ľudí faraóna, ktorí boli postihujúce s najhoršie trápenie a boli zabitie [novorodenca] synov a udržať svoje ženy nažive. A to bol veľký súd od svojho pána.

trans-unit.source: And [remember] when your Lord proclaimed, 'If you are grateful, I will surely increase you [in favor]; but if you deny, indeed, My punishment is severe.' "
trans-unit.target: A [nezabudnite], keď váš pán vyhlásil, "Ak ste vďační, bude určite zvýšiť si [v prospech]; ale ak odmietnete, Vskutku, môj zločin je ťažká. " "

trans-unit.source: And Moses said, "If you should disbelieve, you and whoever is on the earth entirely - indeed, Allah is Free of need and Praiseworthy."
trans-unit.target: Moses povedal: "Ak by neveria, ste a kto je na zemi úplne - Vskutku, Alah je zadarmo, potreby a Praiseworthy."

trans-unit.source: Has there not reached you the news of those before you - the people of Noah and 'Aad and Thamud and those after them? No one knows them but Allah. Their messengers brought them clear proofs, but they returned their hands to their mouths and said, "Indeed, we disbelieve in that with which you have been sent, and indeed we are, about that to which you invite us, in disquieting doubt."
trans-unit.target: Tam nedosiahol vám novinky z tých, ktoré sú pred vami - ľudia z Noah a "Aad a Thamud a tí po nich? Nikto nevie, nich ale Alah. Ich poslovia priviedol jasné dôkazy, ale vrátil svoje ruky do úst a povedal: "V skutočnosti sme neveria v, ktoré vám boli odoslané, a skutočne sme, o tom, na ktorú pozvete nás znepokojujúca pochybnosti."

trans-unit.source: Their messengers said, "Can there be doubt about Allah, Creator of the heavens and earth? He invites you that He may forgive you of your sins, and He delays your death for a specified term." They said, "You are not but men like us who wish to avert us from what our fathers were worshipping. So bring us a clear authority."
trans-unit.target: Ich poslovia povedal: "môže existovať pochybnosť o Boha, Stvoriteľa neba i Zeme? Pozve, že mu odpustil vám vaše hriechy a on oneskorenia vašej smrti pre zadaný termín." Povedali: "nie, ale ľudia ako my, ktorí chcú odvrátiť nás od čo naši otcovia boli uctievať. Tak aby nám jasné orgánu."

trans-unit.source: Their messengers said to them, "We are only men like you, but Allah confers favor upon whom He wills of His servants. It has never been for us to bring you evidence except by permission of Allah. And upon Allah let the believers rely.
trans-unit.target: Ich poslovia povedal, "sme len ľudia ako vy, ale Alah udeľuje milosť na koho on chce jeho zamestnancov. Nikdy nebolo pre nás, aby sme si dôkazy okrem zvolením Alaha. A na Boha nech veriaci spoľahnúť.

trans-unit.source: And why should we not rely upon Allah while He has guided us to our [good] ways. And we will surely be patient against whatever harm you should cause us. And upon Allah let those who would rely [indeed] rely."
trans-unit.target: A prečo by sme nevychádza Allah keď má riadiť nás na našich cestách [dobrý]. A iste bude pacient proti akejkoľvek škody by spôsobiť nás. A na Boha nech tých, ktorí by sa spoľahnúť [naozaj] spoľahnúť."

trans-unit.source: And those who disbelieved said to their messengers, "We will surely drive you out of our land, or you must return to our religion." So their Lord inspired to them, "We will surely destroy the wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: A tí, kto pochyboval povedal ich poslov, "určite budeme riadiť vás mimo našej krajiny, alebo sa musí vrátiť do nášho náboženstva." Tak ich pán inšpiroval k nim, "sme určite zničí zloèinci.

trans-unit.source: And We will surely cause you to dwell in the land after them. That is for he who fears My position and fears My threat."
trans-unit.target: A sme určite spôsobí, že budete bývať v krajine po nich. To je ten, kto obáva svoju pozíciu a strach môj hrozbu."

trans-unit.source: And they requested victory from Allah, and disappointed, [therefore], was every obstinate tyrant.
trans-unit.target: Požadovali víťazstvo od Boha a sklamaný, [preto] bol každý tvrdohlavý tyrana.

trans-unit.source: Before him is Hell, and he will be given a drink of purulent water.
trans-unit.target: Pred ním je peklo, a on bude mať drink hnisavé vody.

trans-unit.source: He will gulp it but will hardly [be able to] swallow it. And death will come to him from everywhere, but he is not to die. And before him is a massive punishment.
trans-unit.target: On prehltnúť to, ale ťažko sa [mohli] prehltnúť. A smrť príde k nemu z všade, ale on nie je zomrieť. A pred ním je masívny trest.

trans-unit.source: The example of those who disbelieve in their Lord is [that] their deeds are like ashes which the wind blows forcefully on a stormy day; they are unable [to keep] from what they earned a [single] thing. That is what is extreme error.
trans-unit.target: Príklad z tých, ktorí neveriť v ich Hospodin je [to] ich skutky sú ako popol, ktoré vietor fúka silno búrlivý deň; nie sú schopní [aby] od čo si zarobil [jedinú] vec. To je to, čo je extrémne chyba.

trans-unit.source: Have you not seen that Allah created the heavens and the earth in truth? If He wills, He can do away with you and produce a new creation.
trans-unit.target: Už ste nevideli, že Alah stvoril nebesia a zem v pravde? Ak on chce, môže sa s vami a produkovať nové stvorenie.

trans-unit.source: And that is not difficult for Allah.
trans-unit.target: A to nie je ťažké pre Alaha.

trans-unit.source: And they will come out [for judgement] before Allah all together, and the weak will say to those who were arrogant, "Indeed, we were your followers, so can you avail us anything against the punishment of Allah?" They will say, "If Allah had guided us, we would have guided you. It is all the same for us whether we show intolerance or are patient: there is for us no place of escape."
trans-unit.target: Oni [pre posúdenie] vyjde pred Alah dohromady a slabé hovoriť s tými, ktorí boli arogantní, "naozaj, boli sme vaše nasledovníkmi, tak môžete využiť nás nič proti trestu Alah?" Oni povedia: "ak Boh mal riadiť nás, sme by sa riadil vás. Je to všetky rovnaké, pre nás, či sme Ukázať intolerancie sú pacienta: existuje u nás miesto úteku. "

trans-unit.source: And Satan will say when the matter has been concluded, "Indeed, Allah had promised you the promise of truth. And I promised you, but I betrayed you. But I had no authority over you except that I invited you, and you responded to me. So do not blame me; but blame yourselves. I cannot be called to your aid, nor can you be called to my aid. Indeed, I deny your association of me [with Allah] before. Indeed, for the wrongdoers is a painful punishment."
trans-unit.target: A Satan povie, kedy bola uzavretá záležitosť, "naozaj, Alah sľúbil ste sľub pravdy. A sľúbil som vám, ale som si zradil. Ale nemal žiadnu autoritu nad vami, okrem toho, že som vás pozvala, a ste nereagovali na mňa. Takže neobviňujte ma; ale obviňovat sami. Ja nemožno nazvať na vašu pomoc, ani môžu byť povolaní na moju pomoc. V skutočnosti som poprieť svoj pridruženie mi [Allah] pred. Pre zloèinci je skutočne bolestné trest."

trans-unit.source: And those who believed and did righteous deeds will be admitted to gardens beneath which rivers flow, abiding eternally therein by permission of their Lord; and their greeting therein will be, "Peace!"
trans-unit.target: A tí, ktorí verili a urobil spravodlivé skutky bude prijatý do záhrady pod ktoré toku rieky, v ňom naveky dodržiavanie súhlasu svojho pána; a ich pozdrav v ňom bude, "Pokoj!"

trans-unit.source: Have you not considered how Allah presents an example, [making] a good word like a good tree, whose root is firmly fixed and its branches [high] in the sky?
trans-unit.target: Uvažovali ste nie, ako Boh predstavuje príklad, [že] je dobré slovo, rovnako ako dobrý strom, ktorého koreň je pevne stanovený a jeho pobočiek [Vysoká] na oblohe?

trans-unit.source: It produces its fruit all the time, by permission of its Lord. And Allah presents examples for the people that perhaps they will be reminded.
trans-unit.target: Produkuje jeho ovocia všetkých dôb, so zvolením svojho pána. A Boh predstavuje príklady pre ľudí, že snáď budú upozornení.

trans-unit.source: And the example of a bad word is like a bad tree, uprooted from the surface of the earth, not having any stability.
trans-unit.target: A napríklad zlé slovo je ako zlý strom, vykoreniť z povrchu Zeme, ktoré nemajú akúkoľvek stabilitu.

trans-unit.source: Allah keeps firm those who believe, with the firm word, in worldly life and in the Hereafter. And Allah sends astray the wrongdoers. And Allah does what He wills.
trans-unit.target: Boh drží pevne tých, ktorí veria, s pevne word, pozemský život a ďalej. A Boh posiela scestie zloèinci. A Boh to, čo on chce.

trans-unit.source: Have you not considered those who exchanged the favor of Allah for disbelief and settled their people [in] the home of ruin?
trans-unit.target: Uvažovali ste nie tí, ktorí vymenili priazeň Alaha pre nedôveru a usadil ich ľudia [v] domácnosti krachu?

trans-unit.source: [It is] Hell, which they will [enter to] burn, and wretched is the settlement.
trans-unit.target: [Je] Peklo, ktoré bude [enter] horieť a úbohé je osada.

trans-unit.source: And they have attributed to Allah equals to mislead [people] from His way. Say, "Enjoy yourselves, for indeed, your destination is the Fire."
trans-unit.target: A oni majú pripísať Alah rovná zavádzať [ľudia] z jeho cesty. Povedať: "Užite si sami, v skutočnosti, váš cieľ je oheň."

trans-unit.source: [O Muhammad], tell My servants who have believed to establish prayer and spend from what We have provided them, secretly and publicly, before a Day comes in which there will be no exchange, nor any friendships.
trans-unit.target: [O Mohameda], povedzte moji služobníci, ktorí uverili modlitby a utrácať zo čo sme im poskytli, tajne a verejne, skôr, ako príde deň, v ktorom nebude žiadna výmena, ani žiadne priateľstvo.

trans-unit.source: It is Allah who created the heavens and the earth and sent down rain from the sky and produced thereby some fruits as provision for you and subjected for you the ships to sail through the sea by His command and subjected for you the rivers.
trans-unit.target: Je to Boh, ktorý stvoril nebesia a zem a zoslal dážď z neba a vyrobené tým nejaké ovocie ako ustanovenie pre vás a vystavené pre vás lodiam plaviť cez more jeho príkazom a vystavené pre vás riek.

trans-unit.source: And He subjected for you the sun and the moon, continuous [in orbit], and subjected for you the night and the day.
trans-unit.target: A podrobili si slnka a mesiaca, kontinuálne [na obežnej dráhe], vystavené pre vás, noc a deň.

trans-unit.source: And He gave you from all you asked of Him. And if you should count the favor of Allah, you could not enumerate them. Indeed, mankind is [generally] most unjust and ungrateful.
trans-unit.target: A dal si z vás požiadal, aby mu. A ak by mali počítať milosť Allaha, by sa ich vymenovať. Ľudstvo je skutočne [všeobecne] nespravodlivé a nevďačný.

trans-unit.source: And [mention, O Muhammad], when Abraham said, "My Lord, make this city [Makkah] secure and keep me and my sons away from worshipping idols.
trans-unit.target: A [zmienka, Mohamed], keď Abrahám povedal: "môj pane, zabezpečenie tohto mesta [Makkah] a držať mňa a mojich synov od uctievanie modly.

trans-unit.source: My Lord, indeed they have led astray many among the people. So whoever follows me - then he is of me; and whoever disobeys me - indeed, You are [yet] Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Môj pane, naozaj sa viedli na scestie spomedzi ľudí. Takže ten, kto takto mi - potom je mi; a kto nepočúva ma - skutočne ste [ešte] odpúšťajúci a Milosrdných.

trans-unit.source: Our Lord, I have settled some of my descendants in an uncultivated valley near Your sacred House, our Lord, that they may establish prayer. So make hearts among the people incline toward them and provide for them from the fruits that they might be grateful.
trans-unit.target: Náš Pán sa usadili niektoré z mojich potomkov v nevyužitej doline neďaleko sacred House, nášho Pána, že môže vytvoriť modlitba. Tak, aby srdcia medzi sklon ľudí k nim a poskytnúť pre ne z ovocia, že by mohli byť vďačný.

trans-unit.source: Our Lord, indeed You know what we conceal and what we declare, and nothing is hidden from Allah on the earth or in the heaven.
trans-unit.target: Nášho Pána, skutočne viete, že to, čo môžeme zakryť a čo môžeme vyhlásiť, a nič nie je skryté od Boha na zemi alebo v nebi.

trans-unit.source: Praise to Allah, who has granted to me in old age Ishmael and Isaac. Indeed, my Lord is the Hearer of supplication.
trans-unit.target: Chvála sa na Alaha, kto udelil mi v starobe a Izáka. Môj pán je naozaj poslucháčov prosbe.

trans-unit.source: My Lord, make me an establisher of prayer, and [many] from my descendants. Our Lord, and accept my supplication.
trans-unit.target: Môj pane, urob ma establisher modlitby, a to [veľa] z mojich potomkov. Náš Pán, a prijať mojej prosbe.

trans-unit.source: Our Lord, forgive me and my parents and the believers the Day the account is established."
trans-unit.target: Náš Pán odpustil ma a moji rodičia a veriaci deň je zriadený účet."

trans-unit.source: And never think that Allah is unaware of what the wrongdoers do. He only delays them for a Day when eyes will stare [in horror].
trans-unit.target: A nikdy myslieť, že je Alah nevie čo zloèinci nemajú. On iba meškanie je deň, kedy bude stare oči [s hrôzou].

trans-unit.source: Racing ahead, their heads raised up, their glance does not come back to them, and their hearts are void.
trans-unit.target: Rýchle napredovanie, ich hlavy zobudil, ich pohľad sa nevráti k nim a ich srdcia sú neplatné.

trans-unit.source: And, [O Muhammad], warn the people of a Day when the punishment will come to them and those who did wrong will say, "Our Lord, delay us for a short term; we will answer Your call and follow the messengers." [But it will be said], "Had you not sworn, before, that for you there would be no cessation?
trans-unit.target: A [Mohamed], varovať ľudí denne, keď trest príde k nim a tých, ktorí urobili zle bude hovoriť, "náš Pán meškania nás krátke časové obdobie; Váš hovor a budeme nasledovať poslov." [Ale to bude povedal], "ste nie prisahal, skôr, že pre vás bude bez zastavenia?

trans-unit.source: And you lived among the dwellings of those who wronged themselves, and it had become clear to you how We dealt with them. And We presented for you [many] examples."
trans-unit.target: Bývate u bytov, ktorí ublížili sebe a to sa stalo jasné, ako budeme riešiť s nimi. A predstavili sme pre vás príklady [veľa]."

trans-unit.source: And they had planned their plan, but with Allah is [recorded] their plan, even if their plan had been [sufficient] to do away with the mountains.
trans-unit.target: A mal v pláne ich plán, ale s Alláh [zaznamenáva] ich plánu, aj keď ich plán bol [dostatočné] skoncovať s horami.

trans-unit.source: So never think that Allah will fail in His promise to His messengers. Indeed, Allah is Exalted in Might and Owner of Retribution.
trans-unit.target: Takže nikdy myslieť, že Alah zlyhá v jeho sľub na svoje poslov. Vskutku, Alah je vyvýšené Might a majiteľom odplata.

trans-unit.source: [It will be] on the Day the earth will be replaced by another earth, and the heavens [as well], and all creatures will come out before Allah, the One, the Prevailing.
trans-unit.target: [Bude] deň Zeme bude nahradený ďalším Zeme a nebies [aj] a všetky stvorenia vyjde pred Boh, jeden, Prevailing.

trans-unit.source: And you will see the criminals that Day bound together in shackles,
trans-unit.target: Vidíte zločincov, ktorý deň sa spája v putá,

trans-unit.source: Their garments of liquid pitch and their faces covered by the Fire.
trans-unit.target: Ich odevy tekuté ihrisko a tvárach zachvátená požiarom.

trans-unit.source: So that Allah will recompense every soul for what it earned. Indeed, Allah is swift in account.
trans-unit.target: Tak že sa obrátim každá duša, za čo získal. Boh je naozaj rýchle účte.

trans-unit.source: This [Qur'an] is notification for the people that they may be warned thereby and that they may know that He is but one God and that those of understanding will be reminded.
trans-unit.target: Tento [Korán] je oznámenie pre ľudí môže byť upozornení tým a že oni môžu vedieť, že je ale jedinÃ½ Boh, a že tých, porozumení upozornený.

trans-unit.source: Alif, Lam, Ra. These are the verses of the Book and a clear Qur'an.
trans-unit.target: Alif, Lam, Ra. Sú to verše knihy a jasné Korán.

trans-unit.source: Perhaps those who disbelieve will wish that they had been Muslims.
trans-unit.target: Možno tých, ktorí neveriť bude chcieť, že oni boli moslimovia.

trans-unit.source: Let them eat and enjoy themselves and be diverted by [false] hope, for they are going to know.
trans-unit.target: Dajte im jesť, baví a byť zneužité [falošné] Dúfam, pre chcú vedieť.

trans-unit.source: And We did not destroy any city but that for it was a known decree.
trans-unit.target: A sme nezničil ktoréhokoľvek mesta, ale že to bol známy výnos.

trans-unit.source: No nation will precede its term, nor will they remain thereafter.
trans-unit.target: Žiadny národ bude predchádzať jeho termín, ani im zostane potom.

trans-unit.source: And they say, "O you upon whom the message has been sent down, indeed you are mad.
trans-unit.target: A oni hovoria, "O na ktorého správa bola odoslaná dole, naozaj ste šialený.

trans-unit.source: Why do you not bring us the angels, if you should be among the truthful?"
trans-unit.target: Prečo ste neprinášajú nás anjeli, ak je medzi pravdivé?"

trans-unit.source: We do not send down the angels except with truth; and the disbelievers would not then be reprieved.
trans-unit.target: Neposielame dole anjeli okrem pravdu; a neveriacim by nie potom sa reprieved.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it is We who sent down the Qur'an and indeed, We will be its guardian.
trans-unit.target: Naozaj, je to my, kto poslal Korán a Vskutku, budeme jej zákonného zástupcu.

trans-unit.source: And We had certainly sent [messengers] before you, [O Muhammad], among the sects of the former peoples.
trans-unit.target: A určite zaslané [poslov] pred vami, [Mohamed], medzi sekty bývalých obyvateľov.

trans-unit.source: And no messenger would come to them except that they ridiculed him.
trans-unit.target: A nie posol by sa na ne, okrem toho, že sa mu vysmieval.

trans-unit.source: Thus do We insert denial into the hearts of the criminals.
trans-unit.target: Preto vložíme popretie do sŕdc zločinci.

trans-unit.source: They will not believe in it, while there has already occurred the precedent of the former peoples.
trans-unit.target: Nebudú veriť, keď už došlo precedens bývalých obyvateľov.

trans-unit.source: And [even] if We opened to them a gate from the heaven and they continued therein to ascend,
trans-unit.target: A [i], keď sme otvorili im brány z neba a sú v ňom naďalej stúpať,

trans-unit.source: They would say, "Our eyes have only been dazzled. Rather, we are a people affected by magic."
trans-unit.target: Oni by hovorili: "naše oči majú nielen oslnený. Skôr sme ľuďom postihnutým mágie."

trans-unit.source: And We have placed within the heaven great stars and have beautified it for the observers.
trans-unit.target: A sme umiestnili do neba veľké hviezdy a majú skrášlil pre pozorovateľov.

trans-unit.source: And We have protected it from every devil expelled [from the mercy of Allah]
trans-unit.target: A budeme mať chránené pred každý čert vykázaná [na milosť Allaha]

trans-unit.source: Except one who steals a hearing and is pursued by a clear burning flame.
trans-unit.target: Okrem jedného, kto kradne vypočutie a sleduje jasný horenia.

trans-unit.source: And the earth - We have spread it and cast therein firmly set mountains and caused to grow therein [something] of every well-balanced thing.
trans-unit.target: A Zeme - sme ju šíriť a obsadenie v ňom pevne nastaviť hory a spôsobila v ňom rastie [niečo] každá vec, dobre vyvážená.

trans-unit.source: And We have made for you therein means of living and [for] those for whom you are not providers.
trans-unit.target: A urobili sme pre vás v ňom znamená žiť a [pre] tých, ktorým nie sú poskytovateľmi.

trans-unit.source: And there is not a thing but that with Us are its depositories, and We do not send it down except according to a known measure.
trans-unit.target: Nie je vec, ale u nás sa jej depozitármi a neposielame ho s výnimkou podľa známych opatrenie.

trans-unit.source: And We have sent the fertilizing winds and sent down water from the sky and given you drink from it. And you are not its retainers.
trans-unit.target: A sme odoslali živiny vetry a zoslal vody z neba a pijete z neho. A nie ste jeho poddaní.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, it is We who give life and cause death, and We are the Inheritor.
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti je to my, kto dal život a spôsobujú smrť a sme sa dedičovi.

trans-unit.source: And We have already known the preceding [generations] among you, and We have already known the later [ones to come].
trans-unit.target: Poznáme predchádzajúcich [generácií] už medzi vami a sme už známe [tie neskôr príde].

trans-unit.source: And indeed, your Lord will gather them; indeed, He is Wise and Knowing.
trans-unit.target: A skutočne, váš pán zhromaždí v skutočnosti, on je múdry a vedel.

trans-unit.source: And We did certainly create man out of clay from an altered black mud.
trans-unit.target: A urobil určite vytvoriť človeka z hliny z zmenené čierne bahno.

trans-unit.source: And the jinn We created before from scorching fire.
trans-unit.target: A jinn sme vytvorili pred kým oheň.

trans-unit.source: And [mention, O Muhammad], when your Lord said to the angels, "I will create a human being out of clay from an altered black mud.
trans-unit.target: A [zmienka, Mohamed], keď váš Pán povedal, anjelov, "budem vytvárať človeka z hliny z zmenené čierne bahno.

trans-unit.source: And when I have proportioned him and breathed into him of My [created] soul, then fall down to him in prostration."
trans-unit.target: A keď sa ním rástla, a vdýchol mu [vytvorené] duše potom padajú mu v vyčerpanie."

trans-unit.source: So the angels prostrated - all of them entirely,
trans-unit.target: Takže anjeli prostrated - všetky z nich

trans-unit.source: Except Iblees, he refused to be with those who prostrated.
trans-unit.target: Okrem Iblees, odmietol sa s tými, ktorí prostrated.

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, O Iblees, what is [the matter] with you that you are not with those who prostrate?"
trans-unit.target: [Allah] povedal, O Iblees, čo je [otázka] s vami, že nie ste s tými, ktorí přemoci?"

trans-unit.source: He said, "Never would I prostrate to a human whom You created out of clay from an altered black mud."
trans-unit.target: On povedal: "Nikdy by som přemoci človeka, ktorého ste vytvorili z hliny z zmenené čierne bahno."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "Then get out of it, for indeed, you are expelled.
trans-unit.target: [Allah] povedal, "potom si z nej, pre naozaj, je vylúčený.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, upon you is the curse until the Day of Recompense."
trans-unit.target: A naozaj, na vás je prekliatie až deň odmenu."

trans-unit.source: He said, "My Lord, then reprieve me until the Day they are resurrected."
trans-unit.target: On povedal: "Môj pán, potom reprieve mi dovtedy, kým sú vstal z mŕtvych."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "So indeed, you are of those reprieved
trans-unit.target: [Allah] povedal: "naozaj, tak si tých reprieved

trans-unit.source: Until the Day of the time well-known."
trans-unit.target: Až do dňa svojho času známy."

trans-unit.source: [Iblees] said, "My Lord, because You have put me in error, I will surely make [disobedience] attractive to them on earth, and I will mislead them all
trans-unit.target: [Iblees] povedal: "môj pán, pretože si ma omylom, určite urobím [neposlušnosti] atraktívny pre nich na zemi, a ja sa klamať všetkých

trans-unit.source: Except, among them, Your chosen servants."
trans-unit.target: Okrem toho, medzi nimi zvolenej zamestnancov."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "This is a path [of return] to Me [that is] straight.
trans-unit.target: [Allah] povedal: "Toto je cesta [o návrate] [že] rovno.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, My servants - no authority will you have over them, except those who follow you of the deviators.
trans-unit.target: Vskutku, moji služobníci - žiadny orgán budete mať nad nimi, s výnimkou tých, ktorí za vami deviators.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, Hell is the promised place for them all.
trans-unit.target: A skutočne, peklo je sľúbil miesto pre všetkých.

trans-unit.source: It has seven gates; for every gate is of them a portion designated."
trans-unit.target: Má sedem brán; na každej bráne je ich časť, Vyhradený priestor pre."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the righteous will be within gardens and springs.
trans-unit.target: Skutočne spravodliví budú do záhrady a pramene.

trans-unit.source: [Having been told], "Enter it in peace, safe [and secure]."
trans-unit.target: [Čo bolo povedané], "zadajte ho v pokoji, bezpečné [a bezpečné]."

trans-unit.source: And We will remove whatever is in their breasts of resentment, [so they will be] brothers, on thrones facing each other.
trans-unit.target: A odstránime, nech je v prsiach zášti, [tak budú], bratia, na tróny proti sebe.

trans-unit.source: No fatigue will touch them therein, nor from it will they [ever] be removed.
trans-unit.target: Sa dotknúť v ňom bez únavy, ani z nej sa [stále] sa odstráni.

trans-unit.source: [O Muhammad], inform My servants that it is I who am the Forgiving, the Merciful.
trans-unit.target: [O Mohameda], moji služobníci informovať, že som to ja, kto som odpúšťajúci, je Milosrdných.

trans-unit.source: And that it is My punishment which is the painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: A to je môj trest, ktorý je bolestivý trest.

trans-unit.source: And inform them about the guests of Abraham,
trans-unit.target: A informovať ich o postihnutých Abraháma,

trans-unit.source: When they entered upon him and said, "Peace." [Abraham] said, "Indeed, we are fearful of you."
trans-unit.target: Keď vstúpil na neho a povedal: "Mier". [Abraham] povedal: "V skutočnosti sme strašný vás."

trans-unit.source: [The angels] said, "Fear not. Indeed, we give you good tidings of a learned boy."
trans-unit.target: [Anjeli] povedal: "Neboj sa. V skutočnosti sme vám dobrá zvesť dozvedel chlapca."

trans-unit.source: He said, "Have you given me good tidings although old age has come upon me? Then of what [wonder] do you inform?"
trans-unit.target: On povedal: "ste mi dal dobrú zvesť hoci staroba má prísť na mňa? Potom, čo [diviť] robiť vám informovať? "

trans-unit.source: They said, "We have given you good tidings in truth, so do not be of the despairing."
trans-unit.target: Oni povedali: "Dali sme si dobrú zvesť v pravdu, tak byť zúfalý."

trans-unit.source: He said, "And who despairs of the mercy of his Lord except for those astray?"
trans-unit.target: Povedal: "a kto zúfa milosrdenstva svojho pána, s výnimkou tých scestie?"

trans-unit.source: [Abraham] said, "Then what is your business [here], O messengers?"
trans-unit.target: [Abraham] povedal: "tak čo je vaše podnikanie [tu], O poslov?"

trans-unit.source: They said, "Indeed, we have been sent to a people of criminals,
trans-unit.target: Povedali, že "v skutočnosti sme zaslali ľudia zločincov,

trans-unit.source: Except the family of Lot; indeed, we will save them all
trans-unit.target: Okrem rodinné dávky. v skutočnosti sme sa zachrániť všetky

trans-unit.source: Except his wife." Allah decreed that she is of those who remain behind.
trans-unit.target: Okrem jeho žena." Alah nariadil, že ona je z tých, ktorí zostali za.

trans-unit.source: And when the messengers came to the family of Lot,
trans-unit.target: A keď prišli poslovia rodinné dávky,

trans-unit.source: He said, "Indeed, you are people unknown."
trans-unit.target: On povedal: "Skutočne ste neznámych ľudí."

trans-unit.source: They said, "But we have come to you with that about which they were disputing,
trans-unit.target: Povedal, "ale prichádzame k vám s tým, o ktorých boli sporu,

trans-unit.source: And we have come to you with truth, and indeed, we are truthful.
trans-unit.target: Prichádzame k vám s pravdou a skutočne sme pravdivé.

trans-unit.source: So set out with your family during a portion of the night and follow behind them and let not anyone among you look back and continue on to where you are commanded."
trans-unit.target: Tak vyrazil s rodinou počas časť noci a nasledovať za sebou a nech nie niekto medzi vami obzrieť a pokračovať tam, kde sú prikázané."

trans-unit.source: And We conveyed to him [the decree] of that matter: that those [sinners] would be eliminated by early morning.
trans-unit.target: A sme mu [vyhláška] to príde: ktoré tieto [hriešnikov] by odstránené v skorých ranných hodinách.

trans-unit.source: And the people of the city came rejoicing.
trans-unit.target: A ľudia z mesta prišli radosti.

trans-unit.source: [Lot] said, "Indeed, these are my guests, so do not shame me.
trans-unit.target: [Veľa] povedal: "Vskutku, Toto sú moji hostia, takže škoda mi.

trans-unit.source: And fear Allah and do not disgrace me."
trans-unit.target: A strach Alah a nie hanbu ma."

trans-unit.source: They said, "Have we not forbidden you from [protecting] people?"
trans-unit.target: Oni povedali: "už sme nie je zakázané si od [ochrana] ľudia?"

trans-unit.source: [Lot] said, "These are my daughters - if you would be doers [of lawful marriage]."
trans-unit.target: [Veľa] povedal: "Toto sú moje dcéry - ak by ste mali činitelia [zákonné manželstva]."

trans-unit.source: By your life, [O Muhammad], indeed they were, in their intoxication, wandering blindly.
trans-unit.target: Svojím životom, [Mohamed], naozaj oni boli vo svojej opitosti, putovanie slepo.

trans-unit.source: So the shriek seized them at sunrise.
trans-unit.target: Takže výkrik ich chytil za svitania.

trans-unit.source: And We made the highest part [of the city] its lowest and rained upon them stones of hard clay.
trans-unit.target: A urobili sme najvyššiu časť [mesto], najnižšia a rained po nich kamene ťažké hliny.

trans-unit.source: Indeed in that are signs for those who discern.
trans-unit.target: Naozaj v tom sú znamenia pre tých, ktorí sa rozoznať.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, those cities are [situated] on an established road.
trans-unit.target: A skutočne, tie mestá [nachádzajú] sídlom ceste.

trans-unit.source: Indeed in that is a sign for the believers.
trans-unit.target: Naozaj v tom, že je znamenie pre veriacich.

trans-unit.source: And the companions of the thicket were [also] wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: A spoločníci křoví [i] zloèinci.

trans-unit.source: So We took retribution from them, and indeed, both [cities] are on a clear highway.
trans-unit.target: Tak sme vzali odplaty od nich, a obe mestá [:] sú skutočne na jasné ceste.

trans-unit.source: And certainly did the companions of Thamud deny the messengers.
trans-unit.target: A určite si spoločníci Thamud poprieť, posl.

trans-unit.source: And We gave them Our signs, but from them they were turning away.
trans-unit.target: A dali sme im naše znamenia, ale od nich sa odvrátil.

trans-unit.source: And they used to carve from the mountains, houses, feeling secure.
trans-unit.target: A používajú vyčleniť z hôr, domov, pocit bezpečia.

trans-unit.source: But the shriek seized them at early morning.
trans-unit.target: Ale výkrik chytil je v skorých ranných hodinách.

trans-unit.source: So nothing availed them [from] what they used to earn.
trans-unit.target: Takže nič využil ich [z], čo boli zvyknutí zarábať.

trans-unit.source: And We have not created the heavens and earth and that between them except in truth. And indeed, the Hour is coming; so forgive with gracious forgiveness.
trans-unit.target: A sme nevytvorili, nebesia a zem, a že medzi nimi okrem pravdy. A skutočne sa blíži hodina; tak odpusť s milostivý odpustenie.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, your Lord - He is the Knowing Creator.
trans-unit.target: Svojho pána - on je skutočne vedel, tvorca.

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly given you, [O Muhammad], seven of the often repeated [verses] and the great Qur'an.
trans-unit.target: A určite sme dali vám, [Mohamed], sedem často opakované [verše] a skvelé Korán.

trans-unit.source: Do not extend your eyes toward that by which We have given enjoyment to [certain] categories of the disbelievers, and do not grieve over them. And lower your wing to the believers
trans-unit.target: Nerozširuje oči ku ktorým sme radosti [] určitým neveriacim, a nie truchlit nad nimi. A nižšej krídla pre veriacich

trans-unit.source: And say, "Indeed, I am the clear warner" -
trans-unit.target: A hovoria: "Samozrejme, že som jasne warner"-

trans-unit.source: Just as We had revealed [scriptures] to the separators
trans-unit.target: Rovnako ako sme mali odhalil [Biblia] oddeľovače

trans-unit.source: Who have made the Qur'an into portions.
trans-unit.target: Ktorí sa Korán na porcie.

trans-unit.source: So by your Lord, We will surely question them all
trans-unit.target: Takže od svojho pána, sme bude určite otázka všetky

trans-unit.source: About what they used to do.
trans-unit.target: O tom, čo boli zvyknutí robiť.

trans-unit.source: Then declare what you are commanded and turn away from the polytheists.
trans-unit.target: Potom vyhlásiť, čo je prikázané a odvráti od polyteisty.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We are sufficient for you against the mockers
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti sme stačia proti posmievači

trans-unit.source: Who make [equal] with Allah another deity. But they are going to know.
trans-unit.target: Ktorí vyrovnať [] s Alah iného Božstva. Ale chcú vedieť.

trans-unit.source: And We already know that your breast is constrained by what they say.
trans-unit.target: A už vieme, že prsia sú obmedzené tým, čo hovoria.

trans-unit.source: So exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord and be of those who prostrate [to Him].
trans-unit.target: Takže oslavovať [Allah] s chválou svojho pána a tých, ktorí přemoci [s ním].

trans-unit.source: And worship your Lord until there comes to you the certainty (death).
trans-unit.target: A uctievať svojho pána, až príde k vám istotu (smrť).

trans-unit.source: The command of Allah is coming, so be not impatient for it. Exalted is He and high above what they associate with Him.
trans-unit.target: Príkaz Alah sa blíži, takže nemal byť netrpezlivý na to. Vyvýšený je on a vysoko nad to, čo sa spájajú s ním.

trans-unit.source: He sends down the angels, with the inspiration of His command, upon whom He wills of His servants, [telling them], "Warn that there is no deity except Me; so fear Me."
trans-unit.target: On posiela anjelov, s inšpiráciu z jeho príkazu na koho on chce jeho zamestnancov [hovoriť im], "upozorniť že tam je žiadne božstvo okrem mňa; Takže strach ma."

trans-unit.source: He created the heavens and earth in truth. High is He above what they associate with Him.
trans-unit.target: Stvoril nebo a zem v pravde. Vysoká je nad to, čo sa spájajú s ním.

trans-unit.source: He created man from a sperm-drop; then at once, he is a clear adversary.
trans-unit.target: Stvoril človeka z poklesu spermie; potom naraz, je to jasné protivníka.

trans-unit.source: And the grazing livestock He has created for you; in them is warmth and [numerous] benefits, and from them you eat.
trans-unit.target: A pasúce sa zvieratá, on vytvoril pre vás; v nich sa teplo a výhody [veľa], a z nich jesť.

trans-unit.source: And for you in them is [the enjoyment of] beauty when you bring them in [for the evening] and when you send them out [to pasture].
trans-unit.target: A pre vás v nich je [pôžitok z] krásy, ak ich v [večer] a kedy môžete poslať von [na pastvinách].

trans-unit.source: And they carry your loads to a land you could not have reached except with difficulty to yourselves. Indeed, your Lord is Kind and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: A vaše náklady na pôdu mohol nie dostanete Okrem problémov na seba. Naozaj, svojho pána, je druh a Milosrdných.

trans-unit.source: And [He created] the horses, mules and donkeys for you to ride and [as] adornment. And He creates that which you do not know.
trans-unit.target: A [On] kone, muly a somáre môžete jazdiť a [ako] ozdobou. A vytvára to, čo nepoznáte.

trans-unit.source: And upon Allah is the direction of the [right] way, and among the various paths are those deviating. And if He willed, He could have guided you all.
trans-unit.target: A Allah je smer [správne], a medzi rôznymi cestami sú odchyľujú. A ak on chcel, on by mohol riadiť vás všetkých.

trans-unit.source: It is He who sends down rain from the sky; from it is drink and from it is foliage in which you pasture [animals].
trans-unit.target: Je to on, kto pošle nadol dážď z neba; z je pitie a z nej je zeleň, v ktorom ste pasienky [zvierat].

trans-unit.source: He causes to grow for you thereby the crops, olives, palm trees, grapevines, and from all the fruits. Indeed in that is a sign for a people who give thought.
trans-unit.target: Spôsobí rast pre vás tým plodín, olivy, palmy, vínna réva, a z ovocia. Naozaj v tom, že je znamenie pre ľudí, ktorí myslel.

trans-unit.source: And He has subjected for you the night and day and the sun and moon, and the stars are subjected by His command. Indeed in that are signs for a people who reason.
trans-unit.target: On je vystavený pre vás, noc a deň a slnko a mesiac a hviezdy sú vystavené jeho príkazom. Naozaj v tom, že sú príznaky pre ľudí, ktorí z dôvodu.

trans-unit.source: And [He has subjected] whatever He multiplied for you on the earth of varying colors. Indeed in that is a sign for a people who remember.
trans-unit.target: A [on je vystavený] nech násobí pre vás na zemi rôzne farby. Naozaj v tom, že je znamenie pre ľudí, ktorí si pamätajú.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who subjected the sea for you to eat from it tender meat and to extract from it ornaments which you wear. And you see the ships plowing through it, and [He subjected it] that you may seek of His bounty; and perhaps you will be grateful.
trans-unit.target: A to je ten, kto sa podrobí mora môžete jesť z nej ponuky mäsa a extrahovať z neho ozdoby, ktoré môžete nosiť. Uvidíte lode, orbu, cez to, a [on ho podrobia] že môžete požiadať o jeho odmenu; a možno vám bude vďačný.

trans-unit.source: And He has cast into the earth firmly set mountains, lest it shift with you, and [made] rivers and roads, that you may be guided,
trans-unit.target: A ten obsadil do Zeme pevne nastaviť hory, inak to posun s vami, a [z] rieky a cesty, že môže riadiť,

trans-unit.source: And landmarks. And by the stars they are [also] guided.
trans-unit.target: A pamiatok. A hviezdy sú [i] riadiť.

trans-unit.source: Then is He who creates like one who does not create? So will you not be reminded?
trans-unit.target: Potom je ten, kto vytvorí ako ten, ktorý nevytvára? Tak sa vám nemôže byť pripomenul?

trans-unit.source: And if you should count the favors of Allah, you could not enumerate them. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: A ak by mali počítať láskavosti Boha, by sa ich vymenovať. Vskutku, Boh je odpúšťajúci a Milosrdných.

trans-unit.source: And Allah knows what you conceal and what you declare.
trans-unit.target: A Boh vie čo zakryť a prehlasujete, že čo.

trans-unit.source: And those they invoke other than Allah create nothing, and they [themselves] are created.
trans-unit.target: A tie sa domáhajú, iné než Alaha vytvoriť nič a [seba] sú vytvorené.

trans-unit.source: They are, [in fact], dead, not alive, and they do not perceive when they will be resurrected.
trans-unit.target: Sú [v skutočnosti], mŕtvy, nežije, a neprijmú, kedy budú vzkriesení.

trans-unit.source: Your god is one God. But those who do not believe in the Hereafter - their hearts are disapproving, and they are arrogant.
trans-unit.target: Tvoj Boh, je jeden Boh. Ale tí, ktorí neveria v nižšie - sú nesúhlasne svoje srdce a sú arogantné.

trans-unit.source: Assuredly, Allah knows what they conceal and what they declare. Indeed, He does not like the arrogant.
trans-unit.target: Veru, Alah vie čo skrývať a čo deklarujú. V skutočnosti, on nemá rád arogantný.

trans-unit.source: And when it is said to them, "What has your Lord sent down?" They say, "Legends of the former peoples,"
trans-unit.target: A keď sa im povedal, "čo má váš pán zoslal?" Oni hovoria, "Legendy bývalých obyvateľov"

trans-unit.source: That they may bear their own burdens in full on the Day of Resurrection and some of the burdens of those whom they misguide without knowledge. Unquestionably, evil is that which they bear.
trans-unit.target: Že budú znášať vlastné bremená v plnom rozsahu na deň vzkriesenia a niektoré zo bremená tých, ktorým sa zviesť bez vedomia. Nesporne, zlo je to, čo znášajú.

trans-unit.source: Those before them had already plotted, but Allah came at their building from the foundations, so the roof fell upon them from above them, and the punishment came to them from where they did not perceive.
trans-unit.target: Tí pred nimi mal už zakreslené, ale Alah prišiel na svoje budovy od základov, takže strecha padla na ne zhora ich a trest prišiel k nim z kde ich nevníma.

trans-unit.source: Then on the Day of Resurrection He will disgrace them and say, "Where are My 'partners' for whom you used to oppose [the believers]?" Those who were given knowledge will say, "Indeed disgrace, this Day, and evil are upon the disbelievers" -
trans-unit.target: Potom na deň vzkriesenia on im hanbu a povedať: "Kde sú moje"partneri"pre koho ste použili proti [veriacich]?" Tí, ktorí dostali vedomosti povie, "Naozaj hanba, tento deň a zla sú na neveriacim"-

trans-unit.source: The ones whom the angels take in death [while] wronging themselves, and [who] then offer submission, [saying], "We were not doing any evil." But, yes! Indeed, Allah is Knowing of what you used to do.
trans-unit.target: Tí, ktorých anjeli sa smrti [súčasne] wronging seba a [ktorí] potom ponúkajú podania [povedať], "Sme boli nerobí nič zlého." Ale áno! Alah je skutočne vedieť, na čo ste zvyknutí robiť.

trans-unit.source: So enter the gates of Hell to abide eternally therein, and how wretched is the residence of the arrogant.
trans-unit.target: Takže zadajte brány pekla dodržiavať večne v ňom, a ako úbohý je bydliska arogantný.

trans-unit.source: And it will be said to those who feared Allah, "What did your Lord send down?" They will say, "[That which is] good." For those who do good in this world is good; and the home of the Hereafter is better. And how excellent is the home of the righteous -
trans-unit.target: A to bude vraj tí, ktorí sa obávali, Alah, "Čo urobil váš pán poslať nadol?" Povedia, "[že je] dobré." Pre tých, ktorí robia dobro v tomto svete je dobrý; a doma ďalej je lepšie. A ako výborné je domovom spravodliví-

trans-unit.source: Gardens of perpetual residence, which they will enter, beneath which rivers flow. They will have therein whatever they wish. Thus does Allah reward the righteous -
trans-unit.target: Záhrady bydliska večné, ktorého vstúpia, pod ktoré toku rieky. Budú mať v ňom čo chcú. Preto Alah odmenou spravodliví -

trans-unit.source: The ones whom the angels take in death, [being] good and pure; [the angels] will say, "Peace be upon you. Enter Paradise for what you used to do."
trans-unit.target: Tí, ktorých anjeli sa smrti, [že] dobré a čisté; [anjeli] povie "mier je na vás. Zadajte raja na čo ste zvyknutí robiť."

trans-unit.source: Do the disbelievers await [anything] except that the angels should come to them or there comes the command of your Lord? Thus did those do before them. And Allah wronged them not, but they had been wronging themselves.
trans-unit.target: Urobiť neveriacim čakajú [niečo], okrem toho, že anjeli mali prísť k nim, alebo príde príkaz svojho pána Teda tie robil pred nimi. A Boh im ublížili, nie, ale oni boli wronging sami.

trans-unit.source: So they were struck by the evil consequences of what they did and were enveloped by what they used to ridicule.
trans-unit.target: Tak oni boli udreli zlé dôsledky toho, čo urobil a boli obalená aké oni použili na zesměšňování.

trans-unit.source: And those who associate others with Allah say, "If Allah had willed, we would not have worshipped anything other than Him, neither we nor our fathers, nor would we have forbidden anything through other than Him." Thus did those do before them. So is there upon the messengers except [the duty of] clear notification?
trans-unit.target: A tí, ktorí pridružiť iné Boh povedať, "ak Boh bol chcel, sme by nie si uctievali nič iné mu ani my, ani naši otcovia, ani by sme niečo cez okrem neho zakázané." Teda tie robil pred nimi. Takže je tam na posl okrem [povinnosť] jasné oznámenia?

trans-unit.source: And We certainly sent into every nation a messenger, [saying], "Worship Allah and avoid Taghut." And among them were those whom Allah guided, and among them were those upon whom error was [deservedly] decreed. So proceed through the earth and observe how was the end of the deniers.
trans-unit.target: A určite sme poslali do každého národa, posol, [povedať], "uctievanie Alaha a vyhnúť sa Taghut." Medzi nimi boli tí, ktorým Boh riadi a medzi nimi boli tí, na ktorých bola chyba [zaslúžene] nariadil. Takže pokračovať cez zem a pozorovať, ako bolo na konci popierači.

trans-unit.source: [Even] if you should strive for their guidance, [O Muhammad], indeed, Allah does not guide those He sends astray, and they will have no helpers.
trans-unit.target: [I], keď ste mali usilovať svoje usmernenia [Mohamed], naozaj, Boh nie je sprievodca tých pošle scestie a budú mať bez pomocníkov.

trans-unit.source: And they swear by Allah their strongest oaths [that] Allah will not resurrect one who dies. But yes - [it is] a true promise [binding] upon Him, but most of the people do not know.
trans-unit.target: A oni prisahajú Alah ich najsilnejší prísahy, [že] Alah vzkriesi nie ten, kto zomrie. Ale áno - [je] pravdivý sľub [záväzné] na neho, ale väčšina ľudí nevie.

trans-unit.source: [It is] so He will make clear to them [the truth of] that wherein they differ and so those who have disbelieved may know that they were liars.
trans-unit.target: [Je] tak on bude jasné, ktoré im [pravda] že čom sa líšia, a tak tí, ktorí majú pochyboval môže vedieť, že sú klamári.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Our word to a thing when We intend it is but that We say to it, "Be," and it is.
trans-unit.target: Naozaj, naše slovo vec, keď chceme, to je ale, že môžeme povedať, "byť" a je to.

trans-unit.source: And those who emigrated for [the cause of] Allah after they had been wronged - We will surely settle them in this world in a good place; but the reward of the Hereafter is greater, if only they could know.
trans-unit.target: A tí, ktorí emigrovali, pre [príčina] Alah po oni boli poškodené - budeme určite uspokojit ich vo svete dobré miesto; ale odmena ďalej je väčší, keby len oni mohli vedieť.

trans-unit.source: [They are] those who endured patiently and upon their Lord relied.
trans-unit.target: [Sú] kto vydržal trpezlivo a svojho pána sa spoliehal.

trans-unit.source: And We sent not before you except men to whom We revealed [Our message]. So ask the people of the message if you do not know.
trans-unit.target: A poslali sme ešte predtým si okrem mužov, ktorým sme odhalili [naše posolstvo]. Opýtajte sa ľudí správu Ak neviete.

trans-unit.source: [We sent them] with clear proofs and written ordinances. And We revealed to you the message that you may make clear to the people what was sent down to them and that they might give thought.
trans-unit.target: [Poslali sme im] s jasné dôkazy a písomné vyhlášky. A sme odhalili vám správu môžu aby ste jasné ľuďom čo bola zoslal im a že môžu dať myslel.

trans-unit.source: Then, do those who have planned evil deeds feel secure that Allah will not cause the earth to swallow them or that the punishment will not come upon them from where they do not perceive?
trans-unit.target: Potom tých, ktorí plánujú zlé skutky cítiť bezpečné, že Alah nespôsobí Zeme prehĺtať ich, alebo že trest nepríde na ne z kde nevideli?

trans-unit.source: Or that He would not seize them during their [usual] activity, and they could not cause failure?
trans-unit.target: Alebo že by on nie zabaviť počas svojej činnosti [obvyklé], a oni nemohli spôsobiť zlyhanie?

trans-unit.source: Or that He would not seize them gradually [in a state of dread]? But indeed, your Lord is Kind and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Alebo že by ich postupne [v stave strachu] nezhabú? Ale naozaj, svojho pána, je druh a Milosrdných.

trans-unit.source: Have they not considered what things Allah has created? Their shadows incline to the right and to the left, prostrating to Allah, while they are humble.
trans-unit.target: Nemáte sa za čo Boh vytvoril? Tiene stúpania napravo a naľavo, prostrating na Alaha, zatiaľ čo oni sú pokorní.

trans-unit.source: And to Allah prostrates whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth of creatures, and the angels [as well], and they are not arrogant.
trans-unit.target: A Boha prostrates, čo je v nebesiach a čo je na zemi tvorov a anjeli [aj], a nie arogantný.

trans-unit.source: They fear their Lord above them, and they do what they are commanded.
trans-unit.target: Sa obávajú ich Hospodin nad nimi, a robia to, čo je prikázané.

trans-unit.source: And Allah has said, "Do not take for yourselves two deities. He is but one God, so fear only Me."
trans-unit.target: A Boh povedal: "neberte sami dvoch božstiev. Je to ale jeden Boh, tak strach len Me."

trans-unit.source: And to Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and the earth, and to Him is [due] worship constantly. Then is it other than Allah that you fear?
trans-unit.target: K nemu patrí, čo je v nebesiach a na zemi, a k nemu je [spôsobené] stále uctievať. Potom je to ako Boh, že ste strach?

trans-unit.source: And whatever you have of favor - it is from Allah. Then when adversity touches you, to Him you cry for help.
trans-unit.target: A čo máte láskavosť - je od Boha. Potom keď nešťastie dotkne vás, ho budete volať o pomoc.

trans-unit.source: Then when He removes the adversity from you, at once a party of you associates others with their Lord
trans-unit.target: Potom keď sa odstráni nepriazeň osudu od vás, naraz strana vám priradí iní svojho pána

trans-unit.source: So they will deny what We have given them. Then enjoy yourselves, for you are going to know.
trans-unit.target: Tak budú popierať to, čo sme im dali. Potom si sami, lebo budete vedieť.

trans-unit.source: And they assign to what they do not know a portion of that which We have provided them. By Allah, you will surely be questioned about what you used to invent.
trans-unit.target: A ich priradenie k čo nevedia časť toho, čo sme im poskytli. Pri Alláhovi, určite sa pochybovali o tom, čo ste použili vymyslieť.

trans-unit.source: And they attribute to Allah daughters - exalted is He - and for them is what they desire.
trans-unit.target: A atribútom Alah dcéry - vyvýšený je on - a pre ne je, čo si želajú.

trans-unit.source: And when one of them is informed of [the birth of] a female, his face becomes dark, and he suppresses grief.
trans-unit.target: A keď jeden z nich je informovaný [narodenia] žena, jeho tvár sa stáva tmavý, a ten potláča smútok.

trans-unit.source: He hides himself from the people because of the ill of which he has been informed. Should he keep it in humiliation or bury it in the ground? Unquestionably, evil is what they decide.
trans-unit.target: On skrýva sa od ľudí kvôli zlému, o ktorých bol informovaný. By mu ju v poníženia alebo ho zakopal do Zeme? Nesporne, zlo je to, čo sa rozhodnú.

trans-unit.source: For those who do not believe in the Hereafter is the description of evil; and for Allah is the highest attribute. And He is Exalted in Might, the Wise.
trans-unit.target: Pre tých, ktorí neveria v nižšie je popis zla; a Boh je najvyšší atribút. A on je vyvýšené by, múdry.

trans-unit.source: And if Allah were to impose blame on the people for their wrongdoing, He would not have left upon the earth any creature, but He defers them for a specified term. And when their term has come, they will not remain behind an hour, nor will they precede [it].
trans-unit.target: A keby Alah Uložiť vinu na ľudí za ich previnenie, on by už nezostalo na zemi každý tvor, ale on ich odsúva pre zadaný termín. A keď ich termín prišiel, nie zostanú za hodinu, ani sa im predchádzať [to].

trans-unit.source: And they attribute to Allah that which they dislike, and their tongues assert the lie that they will have the best [from Him]. Assuredly, they will have the Fire, and they will be [therein] neglected.
trans-unit.target: A prisudzovať im Alah, že čo sa im nepáči a ich jazyky tvrdia lož, že budú mať najlepšie [od neho]. Veru, majú oheň, a bude [v] zanedbané.

trans-unit.source: By Allah, We did certainly send [messengers] to nations before you, but Satan made their deeds attractive to them. And he is the disbelievers' ally today [as well], and they will have a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: Pri Alláhovi, určite sme odoslali [poslov] národov pred vami, ale Satan sa ich skutky atraktívny pre nich. On je spojencom neveriacim dnes [aj] a majú bolestivé trest.

trans-unit.source: And We have not revealed to you the Book, [O Muhammad], except for you to make clear to them that wherein they have differed and as guidance and mercy for a people who believe.
trans-unit.target: Sme neboli odhalila vám knihu, [Mohamed], okrem vás na jasné im, pričom mať odlišný a ako usmernenie a milosť pre ľudí, ktorí veria.

trans-unit.source: And Allah has sent down rain from the sky and given life thereby to the earth after its lifelessness. Indeed in that is a sign for a people who listen.
trans-unit.target: A Allah zoslal dážď z neba a dal život tým na zem po jeho lifelessness. Naozaj v tom, že je znamenie pre ľudí, ktorí počúvajú.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, for you in grazing livestock is a lesson. We give you drink from what is in their bellies - between excretion and blood - pure milk, palatable to drinkers.
trans-unit.target: A naozaj, pre vás v pasúcich sa hospodárskych zvierat je poučenie. Dáme si drink z čoho je v bruchu - medzi vylučovanie a krv - pure mlieko, chutné na konzumentov.

trans-unit.source: And from the fruits of the palm trees and grapevines you take intoxicant and good provision. Indeed in that is a sign for a people who reason.
trans-unit.target: A z plodov palmy a vínnej révy sa omamný a dobrý ustanovenia. Naozaj v tom, že je znamenie pre ľudí, ktorí z dôvodu.

trans-unit.source: And your Lord inspired to the bee, "Take for yourself among the mountains, houses, and among the trees and [in] that which they construct.
trans-unit.target: A váš pán inšpiroval k včela, "vziať pre seba medzi horami, domy, a medzi stromami a [v], ktoré sa postaviť.

trans-unit.source: Then eat from all the fruits and follow the ways of your Lord laid down [for you]." There emerges from their bellies a drink, varying in colors, in which there is healing for people. Indeed in that is a sign for a people who give thought.
trans-unit.target: Potom jesť zo všetkých druhov ovocia a sledovať spôsoby svojho pána stanovené [si]." Tam sa vynorí z ich brucha, pitie, rôznej farby, v ktorom nie je uzdravenie pre ľudí. Naozaj v tom, že je znamenie pre ľudí, ktorí myslel.

trans-unit.source: And Allah created you; then He will take you in death. And among you is he who is reversed to the most decrepit [old] age so that he will not know, after [having had] knowledge, a thing. Indeed, Allah is Knowing and Competent.
trans-unit.target: A Alah stvoril potom on vás k smrti. A medzi vami je ten, kto sa obrátil na najviac schátraný [starého] vek tak, že nebude vedieť, po [ktoré boli] poznatkov, vec. Alah je skutočne vedieť a kompetentní.

trans-unit.source: And Allah has favored some of you over others in provision. But those who were favored would not hand over their provision to those whom their right hands possess so they would be equal to them therein. Then is it the favor of Allah they reject?
trans-unit.target: A Alah niektorí z vás má prednosť pred ostatnými rezervy. Ale nie tých, ktorí boli favorizoval by odovzdať ich poskytovanie tých, ktorých ruky právo vlastniť takže by sa v ňom pre seba. Potom je to láskavosť Alah odmietajú?

trans-unit.source: And Allah has made for you from yourselves mates and has made for you from your mates sons and grandchildren and has provided for you from the good things. Then in falsehood do they believe and in the favor of Allah they disbelieve?
trans-unit.target: A Allah sa pre vás od seba kamarátov a urobila si z kamarátov synovia a vnuci a pripravil pre vás z dobrých vecí. Potom v lož im veriť a len Boh im neveriť?

trans-unit.source: And they worship besides Allah that which does not possess for them [the power of] provision from the heavens and the earth at all, and [in fact], they are unable.
trans-unit.target: A uctievajú okrem Alaha, ktorá nemá pre nich [moc] poskytovanie z neba a Zeme vôbec, a [v skutočnosti], nie sú schopní.

trans-unit.source: So do not assert similarities to Allah. Indeed, Allah knows and you do not know.
trans-unit.target: Nie tak presadiť podobnosti Alah. Vskutku, Alah vie a vy neviete.

trans-unit.source: Allah presents an example: a slave [who is] owned and unable to do a thing and he to whom We have provided from Us good provision, so he spends from it secretly and publicly. Can they be equal? Praise to Allah! But most of them do not know.
trans-unit.target: Alah uvádza príklad: otrok, [ktorý] vlastní a schopný urobiť vec a ktorému sme poskytli od nás dobré zabezpečenie, tak trávi z neho tajne a verejne. Môžu byť rovnaké? Chvála Bohu! Ale väčšina z nich nevie.

trans-unit.source: And Allah presents an example of two men, one of them dumb and unable to do a thing, while he is a burden to his guardian. Wherever he directs him, he brings no good. Is he equal to one who commands justice, while he is on a straight path?
trans-unit.target: A Boh predstavuje príklad dvaja muži, jeden z nich hlúpe a nemôže robiť nič, zatiaľ čo on je záťaž na jeho strážca. Nech mu ho nasmeruje, privedie k ničomu. Sa rovná jednej, ktorý príkazy spravodlivosti, zatiaľ čo on je na priamu cestu?

trans-unit.source: And to Allah belongs the unseen [aspects] of the heavens and the earth. And the command for the Hour is not but as a glance of the eye or even nearer. Indeed, Allah is over all things competent.
trans-unit.target: A Bohu patrí neviditeľné [aspekty] nebo a zem. A príkaz za hodinu nie je, ale ako pohľad očí alebo dokonca bližšie. Alah je skutočne cez všetky veci príslušný.

trans-unit.source: And Allah has extracted you from the wombs of your mothers not knowing a thing, and He made for you hearing and vision and intellect that perhaps you would be grateful.
trans-unit.target: Alah má výkopovej lona vašej matky nevedia vec a urobil si vypočutie a videnie a intelektu, že snáď by ste byť vďačná.

trans-unit.source: Do they not see the birds controlled in the atmosphere of the sky? None holds them up except Allah. Indeed in that are signs for a people who believe.
trans-unit.target: Nie vidí vtákov riadené atmosféry neba? Nikto ich drží okrem Alaha. Naozaj v tom, že sú príznaky pre ľudí, ktorí veria.

trans-unit.source: And Allah has made for you from your homes a place of rest and made for you from the hides of the animals tents which you find light on your day of travel and your day of encampment; and from their wool, fur and hair is furnishing and enjoyment for a time.
trans-unit.target: A Boh má pre vás z vášho domova miesto odpočinku a si z koží zvierat stany, ktoré môžete nájsť svetlo na deň cestovné a váš deň tábora; a z ich vlny, kožušiny a vlasy sú bytové a radosti čas.

trans-unit.source: And Allah has made for you, from that which He has created, shadows and has made for you from the mountains, shelters and has made for you garments which protect you from the heat and garments which protect you from your [enemy in] battle. Thus does He complete His favor upon you that you might submit [to Him].
