trans-unit.target: A Alah urobil pre vás, od toho, ktorý stvoril, tiene a urobila si z hôr, prístrešky a urobila si odev, ktorý chráni vás z tepla a odevy, ktoré vás ochráni pred vašej bitky [nepriateľa v]. Tak sa mu dokončiť jeho láskavosť na vás, ktoré by mohli podať [s ním].

trans-unit.source: But if they turn away, [O Muhammad] - then only upon you is [responsibility for] clear notification.
trans-unit.target: Ale ak sa odvrátil, [Mohamed] - potom len na vás je jasné oznámenia [za].

trans-unit.source: They recognize the favor of Allah; then they deny it. And most of them are disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: Si uvedomujú, milosť Allaha; potom to popierajú. A väčšina z nich sú neveriacim.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] the Day when We will resurrect from every nation a witness. Then it will not be permitted to the disbelievers [to apologize or make excuses], nor will they be asked to appease [Allah].
trans-unit.target: A [] deň, kedy sme vzkriesi z každého národa svedka. Potom bude zakázané k neveriacim [sa ospravedlňovať a vyhovárať], ani sa pýtali upokojiť [Boh].

trans-unit.source: And when those who wronged see the punishment, it will not be lightened for them, nor will they be reprieved.
trans-unit.target: A keď tí, ktorí ublížili trest, to bude nie osvetlená pre nich, ani ich reprieved.

trans-unit.source: And when those who associated others with Allah see their "partners," they will say," Our Lord, these are our partners [to You] whom we used to invoke besides You." But they will throw at them the statement, "Indeed, you are liars."
trans-unit.target: A keď tí, kto iní priradené Alah vidieť svoje "partnermi", povedia"náš Pán, sú našimi partnermi [sa] koho sme použili na vyvolanie okrem vás." Ale budú hádzať na ne vyhlásenie, "Skutočne ste klamár."

trans-unit.source: And they will impart to Allah that Day [their] submission, and lost from them is what they used to invent.
trans-unit.target: A oni budú rozširovať až ten deň [ich] predloženie a stratil z nich je to, čo bývali vymyslieť.

trans-unit.source: Those who disbelieved and averted [others] from the way of Allah - We will increase them in punishment over [their] punishment for what corruption they were causing.
trans-unit.target: Tí, kto pochyboval a odvrátiť [others] z toho, ako Boh - zvýšime ich potrestania nad [ich] trest za korupciu, ktorý bol príčinou.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] the Day when We will resurrect among every nation a witness over them from themselves. And We will bring you, [O Muhammad], as a witness over your nation. And We have sent down to you the Book as clarification for all things and as guidance and mercy and good tidings for the Muslims.
trans-unit.target: A [] deň, kedy sme vzkriesi medzi každý národ svedkom nad ich od seba. A Prinášame vám [Mohamed], ako svedok počas svojho národa. A poslali sme vám knihu ako vysvetlenie všetkých veci a ako usmernenie a milosť a radostnú zvesť, pre moslimov.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah orders justice and good conduct and giving to relatives and forbids immorality and bad conduct and oppression. He admonishes you that perhaps you will be reminded.
trans-unit.target: Alah je naozaj spravodlivosti a dobré správanie a dáva príbuzných a zakazuje nemorálnosti a zlé správanie a útlaku. On nabáda, aby ste, že možno budete upozornený.

trans-unit.source: And fulfill the covenant of Allah when you have taken it, [O believers], and do not break oaths after their confirmation while you have made Allah, over you, a witness. Indeed, Allah knows what you do.
trans-unit.target: A plniť pakt Alah, keď ste vzali to [O veriacich], a neporušujú prísahy po ich potvrdení, kým ste urobili Alaha, nad vami, svedok. Vskutku, Alah vie, čo robiť.

trans-unit.source: And do not be like she who untwisted her spun thread after it was strong [by] taking your oaths as [means of] deceit between you because one community is more plentiful [in number or wealth] than another community. Allah only tries you thereby. And He will surely make clear to you on the Day of Resurrection that over which you used to differ.
trans-unit.target: A nechce byť ako ona, kto nekrútená jej točil vlákna, potom to bola silná [podľa] starostlivosti svoje prísahy [druh] machinácie medzi vami preto jedného spoločenstva je Hojná v číslo alebo bohatstva] ako iné komunity. Boh len snaží si tým. A určite bude vám jasné, na deň vzkriesenia že nad ktorou sa líšia.

trans-unit.source: And if Allah had willed, He could have made you [of] one religion, but He causes to stray whom He wills and guides whom He wills. And you will surely be questioned about what you used to do.
trans-unit.target: A ak Boh bol chcel, mohol on robil [o] jedno náboženstvo, ale spôsobí túlavé, ktorého vôle a sprievodcov, koho on chce. A vám bude určite pochybovali o tom, čo ste zvyknutí robiť.

trans-unit.source: And do not take your oaths as [means of] deceit between you, lest a foot slip after it was [once] firm, and you would taste evil [in this world] for what [people] you diverted from the way of Allah, and you would have [in the Hereafter] a great punishment.
trans-unit.target: A neberte svoje prísahy ako [druh] machinácie medzi vami, inak nohy sklzu po ňom bol [raz] firmy, a bude chutiť zlo [v tomto svete] pre čo [ľudia] ste odkloní od spôsobu Alah, a budete mať [v nižšie] veľký trest.

trans-unit.source: And do not exchange the covenant of Allah for a small price. Indeed, what is with Allah is best for you, if only you could know.
trans-unit.target: A nie výmeny pakt Alah za malú cenu. Vskutku, s Alláh je najlepšie pre vás, len keby ste mohli vedieť.

trans-unit.source: Whatever you have will end, but what Allah has is lasting. And We will surely give those who were patient their reward according to the best of what they used to do.
trans-unit.target: Nech máte skončí, ale čo má Alah je trvalé. A sme určite tých, ktorí boli pacient dá odmenu podľa najlepšieho čo boli zvyknutí robiť.

trans-unit.source: Whoever does righteousness, whether male or female, while he is a believer - We will surely cause him to live a good life, and We will surely give them their reward [in the Hereafter] according to the best of what they used to do.
trans-unit.target: Ten, kto robí spravodlivosť, či muž alebo žena, zatiaľ čo on je veriaci - sme určite spôsobí mu žiť dobrý život a budeme určite im ich odmena [ďalej] podľa najlepšieho čo boli zvyknutí robiť.

trans-unit.source: So when you recite the Qur'an, [first] seek refuge in Allah from Satan, the expelled [from His mercy].
trans-unit.target: Takže keď ste recitovať Korán, [prvé] hľadať útočisko v Alaha od Satana, vyhostený [z jeho milosrdenstva].

trans-unit.source: Indeed, there is for him no authority over those who have believed and rely upon their Lord.
trans-unit.target: Naozaj, tam je pre neho žiadnu právomoc nad tými, ktorí uverili a spoliehať sa na svojho pána.

trans-unit.source: His authority is only over those who take him as an ally and those who through him associate others with Allah.
trans-unit.target: Jeho orgán je iba cez tých, ktorí ho ako spojenca a tých, ktorí skrze neho iní spájajú s Alláh.

trans-unit.source: And when We substitute a verse in place of a verse - and Allah is most knowing of what He sends down - they say, "You, [O Muhammad], are but an inventor [of lies]." But most of them do not know.
trans-unit.target: A keď sme nahradiť verš namiesto verš - a Alah je väčšina vedomím toho, čo on pošle - hovoria, "si, [Mohamed], ale vynálezca [z]." Ale väčšina z nich nevie.

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "The Pure Spirit has brought it down from your Lord in truth to make firm those who believe and as guidance and good tidings to the Muslims."
trans-unit.target: J. [Mohamed], "čistého ducha priniesla to od vášho pána v pravde, aby firma, tých, ktorí veria a ako usmernenie a radostnú zvesť moslimov."

trans-unit.source: And We certainly know that they say, "It is only a human being who teaches the Prophet." The tongue of the one they refer to is foreign, and this Qur'an is [in] a clear Arabic language.
trans-unit.target: A určite vieme, že oni hovoria, "Je to len človek, ktorý učí prorok." Jazyk jeden oni sa odvolávajú na je cudzie a tento Korán je [v] jasne Arabský jazyk.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who do not believe in the verses of Allah - Allah will not guide them, and for them is a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti tí, ktorí neveria vo veršoch Alaha - Alah nie im sprievodca a je pre nich bolestivé trest.

trans-unit.source: They only invent falsehood who do not believe in the verses of Allah, and it is those who are the liars.
trans-unit.target: Oni len vymyslieť lož, ktorí neveria vo veršoch Alláha, a to je tých, ktorí sú klamári.

trans-unit.source: Whoever disbelieves in Allah after his belief... except for one who is forced [to renounce his religion] while his heart is secure in faith. But those who [willingly] open their breasts to disbelief, upon them is wrath from Allah, and for them is a great punishment;
trans-unit.target: Ten, kto neverí v Boha po jeho presvedčenie... s výnimkou jedného, kto je nútený [vzdať svojho náboženstva] jeho srdce je zabezpečené vo viere. Ale tí, ktorí [ochotne] otvorte svoje prsia na nedôveru, na nich je hnev od Boha, a pre ne je veľký trest;

trans-unit.source: That is because they preferred the worldly life over the Hereafter and that Allah does not guide the disbelieving people.
trans-unit.target: To je preto radšej pozemský život cez nižšie a že Boh nie je sprievodca neveriacky ľudí.

trans-unit.source: Those are the ones over whose hearts and hearing and vision Allah has sealed, and it is those who are the heedless.
trans-unit.target: To sú tie, cez ktorých srdcia a sluchom a zrakom Alah má uzavreté, a to je tých, ktorí sú nepozorný.

trans-unit.source: Assuredly, it is they, in the Hereafter, who will be the losers.
trans-unit.target: Veru, je v nižšie, ktorý je zabité.

trans-unit.source: Then, indeed your Lord, to those who emigrated after they had been compelled [to renounce their religion] and thereafter fought [for the cause of Allah] and were patient - indeed, your Lord, after that, is Forgiving and Merciful
trans-unit.target: Potom skutočne svojho pána, pre tých, ktorí emigrovali, potom, čo bol nútený [vzdať svojho náboženstva] a potom bojovali [za príčinu Allah] a boli pacienta - skutočne svojho pána za to, že je odpúšťajúci a Milosrdných

trans-unit.source: On the Day when every soul will come disputing for itself, and every soul will be fully compensated for what it did, and they will not be wronged.
trans-unit.target: V deň, kedy každá duša príde sporu za seba, každá duša bude plne kompenzované to urobil a oni budú nie poškodené.

trans-unit.source: And Allah presents an example: a city which was safe and secure, its provision coming to it in abundance from every location, but it denied the favors of Allah. So Allah made it taste the envelopment of hunger and fear for what they had been doing.
trans-unit.target: A Allah uvádza príklad: mesto, ktoré bolo bezpečné, jeho ustanovenie prichádza množstvo z každého miesta, ale poprel zdvorilosti Alah. Takže Alah robil to ochutnať envelopment hladu a strach o to, čo oni robili.

trans-unit.source: And there had certainly come to them a Messenger from among themselves, but they denied him; so punishment overtook them while they were wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: A tam určite príde k nim posla spomedzi seba, ale popreli, že ho; tak trest ich predbehol, kým oni boli zloèinci.

trans-unit.source: Then eat of what Allah has provided for you [which is] lawful and good. And be grateful for the favor of Allah, if it is [indeed] Him that you worship.
trans-unit.target: Potom jesť to, čo Boh pripravil pre vás, [ktoré] zákonné a dobré. A byť vďačný za láskavosť Alaha, ak je [naozaj] mu, že ste uctievanie.

trans-unit.source: He has only forbidden to you dead animals, blood, the flesh of swine, and that which has been dedicated to other than Allah. But whoever is forced [by necessity], neither desiring [it] nor transgressing [its limit] - then indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: On má iba zakázané uhynutých zvierat, krvi, mäso ošípaných a, ktorý bol venovaný ako Boh. Ale ten, kto je nútený [potreba], [to] túžiť ani zaobchádzania v dôsledku porušenia [limit] - potom naozaj, Boh je odpúšťajúci a Milosrdných.

trans-unit.source: And do not say about what your tongues assert of untruth, "This is lawful and this is unlawful," to invent falsehood about Allah. Indeed, those who invent falsehood about Allah will not succeed.
trans-unit.target: A nehovor o tom, čo vaše jazýčky assert nepravdy, "to je zákonné, a to je nezákonné," vymyslieť lož o Alah. V skutočnosti tí, ktorí vymyslieť lož o Alah nepodarí.

trans-unit.source: [It is but] a brief enjoyment, and they will have a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: [To je ale] krátke potešenie, a oni budú mať bolestivé trest.

trans-unit.source: And to those who are Jews We have prohibited that which We related to you before. And We did not wrong them [thereby], but they were wronging themselves.
trans-unit.target: A pre tých, ktorí sú Židia sme zakázali, ktoré sme v súvislosti s už predtým. A sme nemal zle im [tak], ale oni boli wronging sami.

trans-unit.source: Then, indeed your Lord, to those who have done wrong out of ignorance and then repent after that and correct themselves - indeed, your Lord, thereafter, is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Potom skutočne svojho pána, pre tých, ktorí urobili zle z nevedomosti a potom pokánie potom a opraviť sami - Vskutku, svojho pána, potom je odpúšťajúci a Milosrdných.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Abraham was a [comprehensive] leader, devoutly obedient to Allah, inclining toward truth, and he was not of those who associate others with Allah.
trans-unit.target: Vskutku, Abrahám bol vodcom [komplexné], vrúcne poslušný Bohu, inklinující k pravde, a on nebol z tých, ktorí pridružiť iné Alah.

trans-unit.source: [He was] grateful for His favors. Allah chose him and guided him to a straight path.
trans-unit.target: [Bol] vďačný za jeho láskavosti. Alah si ho vybral a riadiť ho cesta priamo.

trans-unit.source: And We gave him good in this world, and indeed, in the Hereafter he will be among the righteous.
trans-unit.target: Sme mu dal dobrú v tomto svete a v skutočnosti v ďalej bude medzi spravodlivými.

trans-unit.source: Then We revealed to you, [O Muhammad], to follow the religion of Abraham, inclining toward truth; and he was not of those who associate with Allah.
trans-unit.target: Potom sme odhalili vám [Mohamed], nasledovať náboženstvo Abraham, inklinující k pravde; a on nebol z tých, ktorí spájajú s Alláh.

trans-unit.source: The sabbath was only appointed for those who differed over it. And indeed, your Lord will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection concerning that over which they used to differ.
trans-unit.target: V sobotu bol vymenovaný iba pre tých, ktorí sa líšili nad ním. A skutočne, váš Pán bude súdiť medzi nimi na deň vzkriesenia, ktoré používajú líšiť o.

trans-unit.source: Invite to the way of your Lord with wisdom and good instruction, and argue with them in a way that is best. Indeed, your Lord is most knowing of who has strayed from His way, and He is most knowing of who is [rightly] guided.
trans-unit.target: Pozvať na cestu svojho pána s múdrosťou a dobrý návod, a hádať sa s nimi tak, že je najlepšie. Vskutku, svojho pána, je väčšina vedomím toho, ktorí sa odchýlili od svojej ceste, a on je väčšina poznanie [správne] kto riadi.

trans-unit.source: And if you punish [an enemy, O believers], punish with an equivalent of that with which you were harmed. But if you are patient - it is better for those who are patient.
trans-unit.target: A ak budete trestať [nepriateľa, O veriacich], potrestať s ekvivalent, ktoré boli poškodené. Ale ak ste pacienta - je to lepšie pre tých, ktorí sú trpezliví.

trans-unit.source: And be patient, [O Muhammad], and your patience is not but through Allah. And do not grieve over them and do not be in distress over what they conspire.
trans-unit.target: Buďte trpezliví, [Mohamed], a trpezlivosť nie je, ale vďaka Alah. A nie truchlit nad nimi, a nie je v núdzi, čo budú spoločne.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah is with those who fear Him and those who are doers of good.
trans-unit.target: Vskutku, Alah je s tými, ktorí sa ho bojí a tých, ktorí sú konajte dobro.

trans-unit.source: Exalted is He who took His Servant by night from al-Masjid al-Haram to al-Masjid al-Aqsa, whose surroundings We have blessed, to show him of Our signs. Indeed, He is the Hearing, the Seeing.
trans-unit.target: Vyvýšený je ten, kto vzal jeho sluha v noci z al Masjid al-Haram al Masjid al-Aksá, ktorého okolie sme požehnané, ukázať mu našich značiek. V skutočnosti je sluch, vidieť.

trans-unit.source: And We gave Moses the Scripture and made it a guidance for the Children of Israel that you not take other than Me as Disposer of affairs,
trans-unit.target: A sme dali Moses písmo a robil to usmernenie pre deti Izraela, že ste okrem mňa ako zneškodňovateľ vecí,

trans-unit.source: O descendants of those We carried [in the ship] with Noah. Indeed, he was a grateful servant.
trans-unit.target: O potomkov sme vyšetrovaní [v lodi] s Noah. V skutočnosti, on bol vďačný služobník.

trans-unit.source: And We conveyed to the Children of Israel in the Scripture that, "You will surely cause corruption on the earth twice, and you will surely reach [a degree of] great haughtiness.
trans-unit.target: A my sa dopraviť deti Izraela v Písme že "bude určite spôsobiť poškodenie na zemi dvakrát a určite reach [stupeň] veľký povýšenosť.

trans-unit.source: So when the [time of] promise came for the first of them, We sent against you servants of Ours - those of great military might, and they probed [even] into the homes, and it was a promise fulfilled.
trans-unit.target: Takže keď [čas] sľub prišiel prvý z nich, sme poslali proti vám zamestnancov náš - tie veľké armády by mohli, a oni skúmali [aj] do domovov, a to bol sľub splnený.

trans-unit.source: Then We gave back to you a return victory over them. And We reinforced you with wealth and sons and made you more numerous in manpower
trans-unit.target: Potom sme dali späť k vám vrátiť víťazstvo nad nimi. A vystužené bohatstva a synovia ťa početnejšie v manpower

trans-unit.source: [And said], "If you do good, you do good for yourselves; and if you do evil, [you do it] to yourselves." Then when the final promise came, [We sent your enemies] to sadden your faces and to enter the temple in Jerusalem, as they entered it the first time, and to destroy what they had taken over with [total] destruction.
trans-unit.target: [A povedal], "Ak robíte dobre, je to dobré pre seba; a ak si zlo, [to] pre seba. " Potom, keď posledný sľub prišiel, [sme poslali svojich nepriateľov] zarmoutit vašej tváre a vstúpiť do chrámu v Jeruzaleme, ako to vstúpil prvýkrát a zničiť čo mal prevzal [súčet] likvidáciu.

trans-unit.source: [Then Allah said], "It is expected, [if you repent], that your Lord will have mercy upon you. But if you return [to sin], We will return [to punishment]. And We have made Hell, for the disbelievers, a prison-bed."
trans-unit.target: [Potom Boh povedal:] "očakáva, [ak pokánia], že váš Pán bude mať zľutovanie na vás. Ale ak sa vrátite [pre hriech], vrátime [na trestanie]. A urobili sme sakra, neveriacim, väzenskej posteli."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, this Qur'an guides to that which is most suitable and gives good tidings to the believers who do righteous deeds that they will have a great reward.
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti tento Korán sprievodcov, ktorá je najvhodnejšia a dáva dobrá zvesť veriacich, ktorí spravodlivé skutky, že budú mať veľkú odmenu.

trans-unit.source: And that those who do not believe in the Hereafter - We have prepared for them a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: A že tí, ktorí neveria v nižšie - pripravili sme pre nich bolestivé trest.

trans-unit.source: And man supplicates for evil as he supplicates for good, and man is ever hasty.
trans-unit.target: A muž supplicates pre zlo, ako on supplicates za dobré, a človek je niekedy unáhlené.

trans-unit.source: And We have made the night and day two signs, and We erased the sign of the night and made the sign of the day visible that you may seek bounty from your Lord and may know the number of years and the account [of time]. And everything We have set out in detail.
trans-unit.target: Urobili sme noc a deň dve známky a sme vymazané znamenia v noci a znamenia dňa vidieť že požadovať odmenu od svojho pána, a možno viete, niekoľko rokov a na účet [čas]. A všetko, čo sme už podrobne.

trans-unit.source: And [for] every person We have imposed his fate upon his neck, and We will produce for him on the Day of Resurrection a record which he will encounter spread open.
trans-unit.target: [Pre] každého človeka sme uložili jeho osud po krku a vyrobíme pre neho na deň vzkriesenia, otvorte záznam, ktorý sa stretnete šíriť.

trans-unit.source: [It will be said], "Read your record. Sufficient is yourself against you this Day as accountant."
trans-unit.target: [To bude povedal] "čítať váš záznam. Dostatočná je sám proti vám tento deň ako účtovník."

trans-unit.source: Whoever is guided is only guided for [the benefit of] his soul. And whoever errs only errs against it. And no bearer of burdens will bear the burden of another. And never would We punish until We sent a messenger.
trans-unit.target: Ten, kto riadi riadi iba na [výhody] jeho dušu. A ten, kto len nesprávne nesprávne proti nemu. A žiadny nosič záťaže bude niesť bremeno druhého. A nikdy by sme trestať, kým sme poslal posla.

trans-unit.source: And when We intend to destroy a city, We command its affluent but they defiantly disobey therein; so the word comes into effect upon it, and We destroy it with [complete] destruction.
trans-unit.target: A keď máme v úmysle zničiť mesto, máme príkaz jeho bohatých ale vyzývavo porušujú v ňom; Takže slovo vstúpi do platnosti na ňu a my zničiť [doplňte] likvidáciu.

trans-unit.source: And how many have We destroyed from the generations after Noah. And sufficient is your Lord, concerning the sins of His servants, as Acquainted and Seeing.
trans-unit.target: A koľko sme zničili generácií po Noah. A dostatočná je váš pán, týkajúce sa hriechy svojich služobníkov, ako sú Acquainted a videl.

trans-unit.source: Whoever should desire the immediate - We hasten for him from it what We will to whom We intend. Then We have made for him Hell, which he will [enter to] burn, censured and banished.
trans-unit.target: Kto by mal túžbu okamžité - sme urýchliť pre neho z toho, čo budeme na koho chceme. Potom sme sa mu peklo, ktorú sa [enter] horieť, odsúdený a vyhnal.

trans-unit.source: But whoever desires the Hereafter and exerts the effort due to it while he is a believer - it is those whose effort is ever appreciated [by Allah].
trans-unit.target: Ale kto chce ďalej a vyvíja úsilie z dôvodu, že zatiaľ čo on je veriaci - to je tých, ktorých úsilie je stále oceňujú [Allah].

trans-unit.source: To each [category] We extend - to these and to those - from the gift of your Lord. And never has the gift of your Lord been restricted.
trans-unit.target: Každý [kategórie] rozširujeme - tieto a - z dar svojho pána. A nikdy dar svojho pána bol obmedzený.

trans-unit.source: Look how We have favored [in provision] some of them over others. But the Hereafter is greater in degrees [of difference] and greater in distinction.
trans-unit.target: Pozrite sa, ako sme zvýhodnili [v] niektoré z nich viac ako ostatní. Ale nižšie je väčšie stupne [rozdiel] a väčšie rozlíšenie.

trans-unit.source: Do not make [as equal] with Allah another deity and [thereby] become censured and forsaken.
trans-unit.target: Nie vyrovnať [ako] s Alah iného Božstva a [a] sa odsúdený, a opustený.

trans-unit.source: And your Lord has decreed that you not worship except Him, and to parents, good treatment. Whether one or both of them reach old age [while] with you, say not to them [so much as], "uff," and do not repel them but speak to them a noble word.
trans-unit.target: A váš pán rozhodol, nie uctievať okrem neho a rodičia, dobré zaobchádzanie. Či jeden alebo oba z nich dosiahnu vek [pri] s vami, povedať im, [toľko ako], že "uff", a nie odraziť, ale hovoriť im vznešené slovo.

trans-unit.source: And lower to them the wing of humility out of mercy and say, "My Lord, have mercy upon them as they brought me up [when I was] small."
trans-unit.target: A nižšej im krídla pokora z milosrdenstva a povedať "môj pane, zmiluj sa nad nimi ako oni ma priviedol až do [] malý."

trans-unit.source: Your Lord is most knowing of what is within yourselves. If you should be righteous [in intention] - then indeed He is ever, to the often returning [to Him], Forgiving.
trans-unit.target: Váš pán je najviac vedel, čo má vo svojom vnútri. Ak by ste mali byť spravodliví [v zámere] - potom naozaj je niekedy, často vracajú [s ním], odpúšťajúci.

trans-unit.source: And give the relative his right, and [also] the poor and the traveler, and do not spend wastefully.
trans-unit.target: Dať relatívne svoje právo a [i] chudobných a cestovateľ a netrávi márnotratne.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the wasteful are brothers of the devils, and ever has Satan been to his Lord ungrateful.
trans-unit.target: Vskutku, nehospodárne sú bratia devils a niekedy Satan bol jeho pána nevďačný.

trans-unit.source: And if you [must] turn away from the needy awaiting mercy from your Lord which you expect, then speak to them a gentle word.
trans-unit.target: A ak vypnete potrebné od potrebným čaká milosť od pána vášho, ktoré očakávate, potom hovoriť s nimi jemný slovo.

trans-unit.source: And do not make your hand [as] chained to your neck or extend it completely and [thereby] become blamed and insolvent.
trans-unit.target: A nie ruky [ako] pripútaný na krku alebo rozšíriť ho úplne a [a] sa za vinu a platobnej neschopnosti.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, your Lord extends provision for whom He wills and restricts [it]. Indeed He is ever, concerning His servants, Acquainted and Seeing.
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti svojho pána rozširuje ustanovenia pre koho chce, a [to] obmedzuje. Naozaj je, že niekedy, týkajúce sa jeho zamestnanci oboznámení, a videl.

trans-unit.source: And do not kill your children for fear of poverty. We provide for them and for you. Indeed, their killing is ever a great sin.
trans-unit.target: A nie zabiť svoje deti zo strachu z chudoby. Ponúkame pre nich a pre vás. Ich zabíjanie je skutočne niekedy veľký hriech.

trans-unit.source: And do not approach unlawful sexual intercourse. Indeed, it is ever an immorality and is evil as a way.
trans-unit.target: A nie prístup nezákonný pohlavný styk. V skutočnosti je niekedy nemorálnosť a je zlé, ako tak.

trans-unit.source: And do not kill the soul which Allah has forbidden, except by right. And whoever is killed unjustly - We have given his heir authority, but let him not exceed limits in [the matter of] taking life. Indeed, he has been supported [by the law].
trans-unit.target: A zabiť dušu, ktoré Alah zakázal, s výnimkou práva. A ten, kto je zabil nespravodlivo - máme daný orgán jeho dedič, ale nech sa nesmie presiahnuť limity uvedené v [otázka] užívať život. V skutočnosti, on je podporovaný [zákona].

trans-unit.source: And do not approach the property of an orphan, except in the way that is best, until he reaches maturity. And fulfill [every] commitment. Indeed, the commitment is ever [that about which one will be] questioned.
trans-unit.target: A prístup majetkom sirota, okrem spôsobom, ktorý je najlepšie, až keď dosiahne dospelosti. A splniť [každý] záväzok. V skutočnosti záväzok je niekedy [, o ktorom jeden bude] spochybnil.

trans-unit.source: And give full measure when you measure, and weigh with an even balance. That is the best [way] and best in result.
trans-unit.target: A plnej miere pri merať a vážiť s rovnováhy. To je najlepšie [cesta] a najlepší výsledok.

trans-unit.source: And do not pursue that of which you have no knowledge. Indeed, the hearing, the sight and the heart - about all those [one] will be questioned.
trans-unit.target: A nesledujú, ktoré ste žiadne vedomosti. Vskutku, sluch, zrak a srdce - o všetkých tých [jedna] má byť vypočutý.

trans-unit.source: And do not walk upon the earth exultantly. Indeed, you will never tear the earth [apart], and you will never reach the mountains in height.
trans-unit.target: A chodiť na zemi:. Skutočne ste sa nikdy roztrhať Zeme [], a budete nikdy nedosiahne hory na výšku.

trans-unit.source: All that - its evil is ever, in the sight of your Lord, detested.
trans-unit.target: Všetko-jeho zlo je vždy, v očiach svojho pána, nenávidel.

trans-unit.source: That is from what your Lord has revealed to you, [O Muhammad], of wisdom. And, [O mankind], do not make [as equal] with Allah another deity, lest you be thrown into Hell, blamed and banished.
trans-unit.target: To je od svojho pána, čo odhalila vám [Mohamed], múdrosti. A [O ľudstvo], a nie vyrovnať [ako] s Alah iného Božstva, aby bol hodený do pekla, vinu a vyhnal.

trans-unit.source: Then, has your Lord chosen you for [having] sons and taken from among the angels daughters? Indeed, you say a grave saying.
trans-unit.target: Potom váš pán vybral si [s] synov a spomedzi dcér anjelov? Skutočne, poviete hrob hovorí.

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly diversified [the contents] in this Qur'an that mankind may be reminded, but it does not increase the disbelievers except in aversion.
trans-unit.target: A určite sme rozložilo [obsah] v tejto Qur'an, že ľudstvo môže pripomenúť, ale nezvyšuje neveriacim okrem v odpor.

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "If there had been with Him [other] gods, as they say, then they [each] would have sought to the Owner of the Throne a way."
trans-unit.target: Povedať, [Mohamed], "keby tam bol s ním [Ostatné] bohov, ako hovoria, potom [každý] by sa snažili majiteľ trón spôsobom."

trans-unit.source: Exalted is He and high above what they say by great sublimity.
trans-unit.target: Vyvýšený je on a vysoko nad to, čo hovoria o veľkú vznešenosť.

trans-unit.source: The seven heavens and the earth and whatever is in them exalt Him. And there is not a thing except that it exalts [Allah] by His praise, but you do not understand their [way of] exalting. Indeed, He is ever Forbearing and Forgiving.
trans-unit.target: Siedmich nebies a Zeme a čo je v nich oslavovať ho. A nie je nič okrem toho, že ho povyšuje [Allah] podľa jeho chválu, ale tomu nerozumiem ich [spôsob] velebí. Naozaj, on je niekedy zhovievavý a odpúšťajúci.

trans-unit.source: And when you recite the Qur'an, We put between you and those who do not believe in the Hereafter a concealed partition.
trans-unit.target: A keď ste recitovať Korán, dáme medzi tebou a tými, ktorí neveria v nižšie skrytý oddiel.

trans-unit.source: And We have placed over their hearts coverings, lest they understand it, and in their ears deafness. And when you mention your Lord alone in the Qur'an, they turn back in aversion.
trans-unit.target: A máme umiestnené nad ich srdcia krytiny, inak chápu to, a ich uši hluchota. A keď ste spomenul vášho pána sám v Koráne, ale zase späť v odpor.

trans-unit.source: We are most knowing of how they listen to it when they listen to you and [of] when they are in private conversation, when the wrongdoers say, "You follow not but a man affected by magic."
trans-unit.target: Sme, že väčšina vedomím toho, ako počúvať na to keď počúvajú a [z], keď sú v súkromný rozhovor, keď zloèinci hovoria, "sledujete ale človek ovplyvnený mágie."

trans-unit.source: Look how they strike for you comparisons; but they have strayed, so they cannot [find] a way.
trans-unit.target: Pozrite sa, ako udrieť si porovnania; ale sa zatoulal, takže nemôžu [Hľadať] spôsobom.

trans-unit.source: And they say, "When we are bones and crumbled particles, will we [truly] be resurrected as a new creation?"
trans-unit.target: A oni hovoria, "keď sú kosti a rozpadali častice, bude [naozaj] budeme vzkriesení ako nové stvorenie?"

trans-unit.source: Say, "Be you stones or iron
trans-unit.target: Povedať: "sa vám kamene alebo železa

trans-unit.source: Or [any] creation of that which is great within your breasts." And they will say, "Who will restore us?" Say, "He who brought you forth the first time." Then they will nod their heads toward you and say, "When is that?" Say, "Perhaps it will be soon -
trans-unit.target: Alebo [žiadne] Vytvorenie toho, ktorý sa skvelo hodí do vašich pŕs. A oni povedia: "kto nás obnoví?" Znamená "ten, kto vyviedol prvýkrát." Potom budú kývajú hlavou smerom k vám a povedať: "Keď je to?" Povedal: "možno to bude čoskoro-

trans-unit.source: On the Day He will call you and you will respond with praise of Him and think that you had not remained [in the world] except for a little."
trans-unit.target: Deň sa bude volať a budete reagovať s chválou na neho a myslím, že nie ste zostal [v rámci] s výnimkou málo."

trans-unit.source: And tell My servants to say that which is best. Indeed, Satan induces [dissension] among them. Indeed Satan is ever, to mankind, a clear enemy.
trans-unit.target: A povedzte moji služobníci povedať to, čo je najlepšie. Vskutku, Satan vyvoláva [nezhody] medzi nimi. Naozaj Satan je vôbec, pre ľudstvo, jasný nepriateľ.

trans-unit.source: Your Lord is most knowing of you. If He wills, He will have mercy upon you; or if He wills, He will punish you. And We have not sent you, [O Muhammad], over them as a manager.
trans-unit.target: Váš pán je najviac poznať z vás. Ak on chce, bude mať zľutovanie na vás; alebo ak on chce, že navštívim vás. A posielame vám [Mohamed], nie nad nimi ako manažér.

trans-unit.source: And your Lord is most knowing of whoever is in the heavens and the earth. And We have made some of the prophets exceed others [in various ways], and to David We gave the book [of Psalms].
trans-unit.target: A váš pán je väčšina vedieť, kto je v nebesiach a na zemi. Urobili sme niektoré z prorokov presiahnuť iní [rôzne] a David My dal kniha [žalmy].

trans-unit.source: Say, "Invoke those you have claimed [as gods] besides Him, for they do not possess the [ability for] removal of adversity from you or [for its] transfer [to someone else]."
trans-unit.target: Povedať, "odvolávať tých ste tvrdil [ako bohovia] Okrem neho pre nemajú [schopnosť] Odstránenie úzkosťou z vás alebo [na jeho] prenos [niekto]."

trans-unit.source: Those whom they invoke seek means of access to their Lord, [striving as to] which of them would be nearest, and they hope for His mercy and fear His punishment. Indeed, the punishment of your Lord is ever feared.
trans-unit.target: Tých, ktorým sa domáhajú hľadať prostriedky prístupu k ich pán [usilovať o] ktorý z nich by bol najbližšie, a dúfam, že pre jeho milosrdenstvo, a strach jeho trest. Vskutku, trest svojho pána stále bál.

trans-unit.source: And there is no city but that We will destroy it before the Day of Resurrection or punish it with a severe punishment. That has ever been in the Register inscribed.
trans-unit.target: A nie je žiadne mesto, ale že budeme zničiť pred deň vzkriesenia alebo potrestať s ťažkým trest. Niekedy to bolo v registri zapísaný.

trans-unit.source: And nothing has prevented Us from sending signs except that the former peoples denied them. And We gave Thamud the she-camel as a visible sign, but they wronged her. And We send not the signs except as a warning.
trans-unit.target: A nič nám bráni odosielanie príznakov, okrem toho, že bývalý národy im odmietnutý. A dali sme Thamud ťava ona ako viditeľné znamenie, ale sa jej ublížili. A pošleme nie príznaky okrem ako varovanie.

trans-unit.source: And [remember, O Muhammad], when We told you, "Indeed, your Lord has encompassed the people." And We did not make the sight which We showed you except as a trial for the people, as was the accursed tree [mentioned] in the Qur'an. And We threaten them, but it increases them not except in great transgression.
trans-unit.target: A [Pamätajte, Mohamed], keď sme povedali, "Skutočne, váš pán sojej ľudí." A sme nerobil pohľad, ktorý sme vám okrem ukázal ako proces pre ľudí, ako bol prekliaty stromu [uvedených] v Koráne. A my im hrozí, ale zvyšuje nie len skvelý priestupok.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] when We said to the angles, "Prostrate to Adam," and they prostrated, except for Iblees. He said, "Should I prostrate to one You created from clay?"
trans-unit.target: A [zmienka] keď sme povedali uhly, "Přemoci na Adam," a oni prostrated, okrem Iblees. On povedal: "Mal přemoci, jeden si vytvoril z hliny?"

trans-unit.source: [Iblees] said, "Do You see this one whom You have honored above me? If You delay me until the Day of Resurrection, I will surely destroy his descendants, except for a few."
trans-unit.target: [Iblees] povedal: "Vidíš to, koho máte ctil nado mnou? Ak máte meškanie ma až deň vzkriesenia, som určite zničí jeho potomkov, okrem pár."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "Go, for whoever of them follows you, indeed Hell will be the recompense of you - an ample recompense.
trans-unit.target: [Allah] povedal: "Choď, pre toho, kto z nich takto, naozaj peklo bude odmenu z vás - dostatok odmenu.

trans-unit.source: And incite [to senselessness] whoever you can among them with your voice and assault them with your horses and foot soldiers and become a partner in their wealth and their children and promise them." But Satan does not promise them except delusion.
trans-unit.target: A podnecovať [na nezmyselnosť] kto môžete medzi nimi hlasom a ich útok s koňmi a pešiaci a Staňte sa partnerom v ich bohatstvo a ich deti a sľubujú im. " Ale Satan nezaručuje ich okrem klamu.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, over My [believing] servants there is for you no authority. And sufficient is your Lord as Disposer of affairs.
trans-unit.target: Vskutku, cez môj [veriť] zamestnancov neexistuje žiadny úrad. A dostatok svojho pána ako zneškodňovateľ vecí.

trans-unit.source: It is your Lord who drives the ship for you through the sea that you may seek of His bounty. Indeed, He is ever, to you, Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Je váš pán, kto riadi loď pre vás cez more, ktoré môžete požiadať o jeho štedrosť. Naozaj, on je niekedy, Milosrdných.

trans-unit.source: And when adversity touches you at sea, lost are [all] those you invoke except for Him. But when He delivers you to the land, you turn away [from Him]. And ever is man ungrateful.
trans-unit.target: A keď nešťastie sa dotýka vás na mori, stratené sú [všetky] ty vyvolať okrem neho. Ale keď on vám prináša do pôdy, dáte preč [od neho]. A niekedy je človek nevďačný.

trans-unit.source: Then do you feel secure that [instead] He will not cause a part of the land to swallow you or send against you a storm of stones? Then you would not find for yourselves an advocate.
trans-unit.target: Potom máte pocit, bezpečné, že [miesto] on nespôsobí, časť pôdy, aby vás prehltnúť alebo poslať proti vám búrka kamene? Potom by sa nájsť sami advokáta.

trans-unit.source: Or do you feel secure that He will not send you back into the sea another time and send upon you a hurricane of wind and drown you for what you denied? Then you would not find for yourselves against Us an avenger.
trans-unit.target: Alebo sa cítite zabezpečené, že on nebude posielať späť do mora iný čas a poslať na vás Hurikán veterné a utopí vás za to, čo ste poprel? Potom by ste nenašli pre seba proti nám pomstiteľ.

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly honored the children of Adam and carried them on the land and sea and provided for them of the good things and preferred them over much of what We have created, with [definite] preference.
trans-unit.target: A sme určite poctený deti Adam a odniesol na pozemných a námorných a podľa nich dobré veci a im prednosť pred veľa toho, čo sme vytvorili, s [konečné] preferencie.

trans-unit.source: [Mention, O Muhammad], the Day We will call forth every people with their record [of deeds]. Then whoever is given his record in his right hand - those will read their records, and injustice will not be done to them, [even] as much as a thread [inside the date seed].
trans-unit.target: [Spomenúť, Mohamed], deň budeme hovoriť ďalej každý ľudí s ich záznam [listín]. Potom kto je vzhľadom k jeho rekord v pravej ruke - tie bude čítať svoje záznamy a nespravodlivosť nebude vykonané, [i] rovnako ako vlákno [vnútri semeno dátum].

trans-unit.source: And whoever is blind in this [life] will be blind in the Hereafter and more astray in way.
trans-unit.target: A kto je slepý v tomto [život] bude slepý v ďalej a viac scestie spôsobom.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, they were about to tempt you away from that which We revealed to you in order to [make] you invent about Us something else; and then they would have taken you as a friend.
trans-unit.target: A naozaj, oni boli o to pokúšať vás od toho, ktoré sme odhalili vám aby [] môžete vymyslieť o nás niečo iné; a potom by vzali ste ako priateľ.

trans-unit.source: And if We had not strengthened you, you would have almost inclined to them a little.
trans-unit.target: A ak sme mali nie vás posilnilo, vám by som skoro sklon im trochu.

trans-unit.source: Then [if you had], We would have made you taste double [punishment in] life and double [after] death. Then you would not find for yourself against Us a helper.
trans-unit.target: Potom [Ak ste mali], by urobili sme si chuť dvojité [trest] život a dvojité [po] smrti. Potom by ste nenašli pre seba proti nám Pomocníka.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, they were about to drive you from the land to evict you therefrom. And then [when they do], they will not remain [there] after you, except for a little.
trans-unit.target: A naozaj, oni boli chystá riadiť vás z krajiny ktorá vás vysťahovať z nich. A potom [keď oni robia], že nezostane [nie] po vás, s výnimkou málo.

trans-unit.source: [That is Our] established way for those We had sent before you of Our messengers; and you will not find in Our way any alteration.
trans-unit.target: [To je naša] sídlom cestu pre tých, ktoré sú zaslané pred vami naši poslovia; a nenájdete v našej ceste akákoľvek zmena.

trans-unit.source: Establish prayer at the decline of the sun [from its meridian] until the darkness of the night and [also] the Qur'an of dawn. Indeed, the recitation of dawn is ever witnessed.
trans-unit.target: Stanoviť modlitba pokles [od svojej meridian] slnko do tmy v noci a [i] Korán svitania. V skutočnosti je svedkom recitácie svitania.

trans-unit.source: And from [part of] the night, pray with it as additional [worship] for you; it is expected that your Lord will resurrect you to a praised station.
trans-unit.target: A od [časť] v noci, modlite sa s ním ako ďalšie [uctievanie] pre vás; očakáva sa, že ste chválil stanicu vzkriesi svojho pána.

trans-unit.source: And say, "My Lord, cause me to enter a sound entrance and to exit a sound exit and grant me from Yourself a supporting authority."
trans-unit.target: A hovoria: "Môj pane, spôsobujú mi vstúpiť zvukový vstup a výstup zvuku výstupu a daj mi od seba podporný orgán."

trans-unit.source: And say, "Truth has come, and falsehood has departed. Indeed is falsehood, [by nature], ever bound to depart."
trans-unit.target: A povedať, "má prísť pravda a lož ochodu. Naozaj je lož, [povahou], niekedy povinný odchod."

trans-unit.source: And We send down of the Qur'an that which is healing and mercy for the believers, but it does not increase the wrongdoers except in loss.
trans-unit.target: A pošleme Koránu, ktorá je uzdravenie a milosrdenstvo pre veriacich, ale nezvyšuje zloèinci okrem úbytku.

trans-unit.source: And when We bestow favor upon the disbeliever, he turns away and distances himself; and when evil touches him, he is ever despairing.
trans-unit.target: A keď sme prepožičal milosť na neveriacich, otočí sa a vzdialenosti a keď zlo sa ho dotýka, on je stále zúfalý.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Each works according to his manner, but your Lord is most knowing of who is best guided in way."
trans-unit.target: Povedať: "každý pracuje podľa jeho spôsobom, ale svojho pána, je väčšina vedomím toho, kto je najlepšie riadiť spôsobom."

trans-unit.source: And they ask you, [O Muhammad], about the soul. Say, "The soul is of the affair of my Lord. And mankind have not been given of knowledge except a little."
trans-unit.target: A požiadať vás, [Mohamed], o dušu. Povedať: "duša je záležitosť môjho Pána. A ľudstvo dostali nie poznatkov, s výnimkou málo."

trans-unit.source: And if We willed, We could surely do away with that which We revealed to you. Then you would not find for yourself concerning it an advocate against Us.
trans-unit.target: A ak sme vôľou, sme mohli určite urobiť ďaleko, ktoré sme odhalili na vás. Potom by ste nenašli pre seba o to advokát proti nám.

trans-unit.source: Except [We have left it with you] as a mercy from your Lord. Indeed, His favor upon you has ever been great.
trans-unit.target: Okrem [sme ju s vami] ako milosť od pána vášho. Vskutku, jeho milosť na teba nebol nikdy veľký.

trans-unit.source: Say, "If mankind and the jinn gathered in order to produce the like of this Qur'an, they could not produce the like of it, even if they were to each other assistants."
trans-unit.target: Hovoria: "Ak ľudstva a jinn zhromaždili s cieľom vyrábať ako tento Korán, nemohli predložiť ako to, aj keby boli navzájom asistenti."

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly diversified for the people in this Qur'an from every [kind] of example, but most of the people refused [anything] except disbelief.
trans-unit.target: A určite sme rozložilo pre ľudí v tejto Qur'an každý [druh] príklad, ale väčšina ľudí odmietol [niečo] okrem neveriacky.

trans-unit.source: And they say, "We will not believe you until you break open for us from the ground a spring.
trans-unit.target: A hovoria, "sme neverili ste kým porušíte otvorenie pre nás zo Zeme a na jar.

trans-unit.source: Or [until] you have a garden of palm tress and grapes and make rivers gush forth within them in force [and abundance]
trans-unit.target: Alebo [do] máte záhradu príval palm stromy a hrozno a aby rieky späť do ich platnosti [a hojnosť]

trans-unit.source: Or you make the heaven fall upon us in fragments as you have claimed or you bring Allah and the angels before [us]
trans-unit.target: Alebo si urobiť neba na nás pokles fragmenty, ako ste tvrdil, alebo si priniesť Boh a anjeli pred [nás]

trans-unit.source: Or you have a house of gold or you ascend into the sky. And [even then], we will not believe in your ascension until you bring down to us a book we may read." Say, "Exalted is my Lord! Was I ever but a human messenger?"
trans-unit.target: Máte dom zlata alebo budete stúpať do neba. A [dokonca potom], sme neverili vo vašom vzostupe až vám prinesie k nám knihu čítame môže." Povedať: "môj pán vyvýšený je! Bol som niekedy, ale ľudské posol?"

trans-unit.source: And what prevented the people from believing when guidance came to them except that they said, "Has Allah sent a human messenger?"
trans-unit.target: A čo bráni ľuďom veriť, keď vedenie prišiel k nim, okrem toho, že hovorili, "Alah poslal posla človeka?"

trans-unit.source: Say, "If there were upon the earth angels walking securely, We would have sent down to them from the heaven an angel [as a] messenger."
trans-unit.target: Povedať: "keby tam boli na zemi anjeli chôdza bezpečne, by poslali sme k nim z neba anjel [ako] posol."

trans-unit.source: Say, "Sufficient is Allah as Witness between me and you. Indeed he is ever, concerning His servants, Acquainted and Seeing."
trans-unit.target: Povedať: "stačí je Boh ako svedok medzi ja a ty. V skutočnosti je niekedy, týkajúce sa jeho zamestnanci oboznámení, a videl."

trans-unit.source: And whoever Allah guides - he is the [rightly] guided; and whoever He sends astray - you will never find for them protectors besides Him, and We will gather them on the Day of Resurrection [fallen] on their faces - blind, dumb and deaf. Their refuge is Hell; every time it subsides We increase them in blazing fire.
trans-unit.target: A ten, kto vedie Alah - je [správne] riadiť; ten, kto pošle scestie - nikdy nájsť pre nich chrániče okrem neho a zhromažďujeme ich v deň vzkriesenia [padlých] na tvárach - slepé, nemý a hluchý. Svoje útočisko je peklo; zakaždým, keď to ustupuje sme ich nárast horiaci oheň.

trans-unit.source: That is their recompense because they disbelieved in Our verses and said, "When we are bones and crumbled particles, will we [truly] be resurrected [in] a new creation?"
trans-unit.target: To je ich odmenu, pretože pochyboval v našom verše a povedal: "keď sme kosti a rozpadali častice, bude [naozaj] budeme vzkriesení [v] nové stvorenie?"

trans-unit.source: Do they not see that Allah, who created the heavens and earth, is [the one] Able to create the likes of them? And He has appointed for them a term, about which there is no doubt. But the wrongdoers refuse [anything] except disbelief.
trans-unit.target: Oni nie sú vidieť, že Boh, ktorý stvoril nebo a zem, je [jedna] schopný vytvoriť si z nich? A bol vymenovaný pre nich termín, o ktorom nie je pochýb. Ale zloèinci odmietnuť [niečo] okrem neveriacky.

trans-unit.source: Say [to them], "If you possessed the depositories of the mercy of my Lord, then you would withhold out of fear of spending." And ever has man been stingy.
trans-unit.target: Povedz [im] ", ak ste vlastnil depozitárov milosrdenstva môjho Pána, potom by odmietnuť, zo strachu z výdavkov." A niekedy človek bol lakomý.

trans-unit.source: And We had certainly given Moses nine evident signs, so ask the Children of Israel [about] when he came to them and Pharaoh said to him, "Indeed I think, O Moses, that you are affected by magic."
trans-unit.target: Sme určite dal Moses deväť zjavné príznaky, tak požiadajte deti Izraela [o], keď prišiel k nim a faraón povedal mu: "Skutočne myslím, O Moses, že sú ovplyvnené mágie."

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "You have already known that none has sent down these [signs] except the Lord of the heavens and the earth as evidence, and indeed I think, O Pharaoh, that you are destroyed."
trans-unit.target: [Moses] povedal: "Vám už poznám, že nič poslal nadol tieto [príznaky] okrem Hospodin nebesia a zem ako dôkaz, a skutočne myslím O faraóna, že sú zničené."

trans-unit.source: So he intended to drive them from the land, but We drowned him and those with him all together.
trans-unit.target: Tak on plánuje riadiť ich z pôdy, ale sme utopil neho a s ním všetci dohromady.

trans-unit.source: And We said after Pharaoh to the Children of Israel, "Dwell in the land, and when there comes the promise of the Hereafter, We will bring you forth in [one] gathering."
trans-unit.target: A my sme povedali po faraóna deti Izraela, "bývať v krajine, a keď príde prísľub nižšie, budeme vás v [jedna] stretnutie."

trans-unit.source: And with the truth We have sent the Qur'an down, and with the truth it has descended. And We have not sent you, [O Muhammad], except as a bringer of good tidings and a warner.
trans-unit.target: S pravdou sme si zoslal Korán a pravdu má zostúpil. A my vám poslal, [Mohamed], s výnimkou ako prinášajúci dobrú zvesť a warner.

trans-unit.source: And [it is] a Qur'an which We have separated [by intervals] that you might recite it to the people over a prolonged period. And We have sent it down progressively.
trans-unit.target: A [je] Korán, ktoré sme oddelili [podľa intervalov], môže prednášať ľudí po dlhšiu dobu. A poslali sme ho postupne.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Believe in it or do not believe. Indeed, those who were given knowledge before it - when it is recited to them, they fall upon their faces in prostration,
trans-unit.target: Povedať: "Verím v to alebo neveria. V skutočnosti tí, ktorí dostali vedomosti pred tým - keď to je prednes na ne, oni padajú na tvárach v vyčerpanie,

trans-unit.source: And they say, "Exalted is our Lord! Indeed, the promise of our Lord has been fulfilled."
trans-unit.target: A oni hovoria, "povýšil je náš Pán! Vskutku, sľub, že náš Pán bol splnený."

trans-unit.source: And they fall upon their faces weeping, and the Qur'an increases them in humble submission.
trans-unit.target: Oni padajú na tvárach plač a Korán sa zvyšujú v pokornej predloženie;

trans-unit.source: Say, "Call upon Allah or call upon the Most Merciful. Whichever [name] you call - to Him belong the best names." And do not recite [too] loudly in your prayer or [too] quietly but seek between that an [intermediate] way.
trans-unit.target: Teda "výzvu Alah alebo výzvu najviac Milosrdných. Nech [meno] zavoláte - k nemu patria najlepšie mená. " A nie recitoval [príliš] hlasno, v modlitbe, alebo [príliš] ticho, ale Hľadať medzi ktoré [intermediate] spôsobom.

trans-unit.source: And say, "Praise to Allah, who has not taken a son and has had no partner in [His] dominion and has no [need of a] protector out of weakness; and glorify Him with [great] glorification."
trans-unit.target: A povedal: "Chvála Bohu, ktorý neprijal syna a má žiadny partnera v [jeho] panstva a nemá [potreba] chránič zo slabosti; a oslavujú ho s [veľký] velebenie."

trans-unit.source: [All] praise is [due] to Allah, who has sent down upon His Servant the Book and has not made therein any deviance.
trans-unit.target: [Všetky] chvála je [spôsobené] Boh, ktorý poslal na jeho sluha knihu a nie sa v nej všetky deviácie.

trans-unit.source: [He has made it] straight, to warn of severe punishment from Him and to give good tidings to the believers who do righteous deeds that they will have a good reward
trans-unit.target: [Urobil to] rovno varovať ťažkým trest od neho a dať dobrú zvesť veriacich, ktorí spravodlivé skutky, že budú mať dobrú odmenu

trans-unit.source: In which they will remain forever
trans-unit.target: V ktorom zostanú navždy

trans-unit.source: And to warn those who say, "Allah has taken a son."
trans-unit.target: A upozorniť tých, ktorí hovoria, "Alah vzala syna."

trans-unit.source: They have no knowledge of it, nor had their fathers. Grave is the word that comes out of their mouths; they speak not except a lie.
trans-unit.target: Nemajú žiadne vedomosti to, ani sa ich otcovia. Hrob je slovo, ktoré pochádza z ich úst; hovoria nie okrem lož.

trans-unit.source: Then perhaps you would kill yourself through grief over them, [O Muhammad], if they do not believe in this message, [and] out of sorrow.
trans-unit.target: Potom možno by zabiť seba cez smútok nad nimi [Mohamed], ak nie veria v tejto správe, [a] zo smútku.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We have made that which is on the earth adornment for it that We may test them [as to] which of them is best in deed.
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti sme urobili to, čo je na zemi ozdobou na to, že môžeme vyskúšať [,], ktorý z nich je najlepšie činy.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, We will make that which is upon it [into] a barren ground.
trans-unit.target: A Vskutku, budeme robiť to, čo je na ňom [do] neplodná zem.

trans-unit.source: Or have you thought that the companions of the cave and the inscription were, among Our signs, a wonder?
trans-unit.target: Alebo si myslel, že spoločníci jaskyne a nápis boli medzi naše známky zázrak?

trans-unit.source: [Mention] when the youths retreated to the cave and said, "Our Lord, grant us from Yourself mercy and prepare for us from our affair right guidance."
trans-unit.target: [Zmienka] keď mládenci ustúpil do jaskyne a povedal: "Náš Pán grant od seba milosrdenstva a pripraviť sa na nás z našich záležitosť správnym vedením."

trans-unit.source: So We cast [a cover of sleep] over their ears within the cave for a number of years.
trans-unit.target: Tak sme cast [kryt spánok] cez uši do jaskyne na niekoľko rokov.

trans-unit.source: Then We awakened them that We might show which of the two factions was most precise in calculating what [extent] they had remained in time.
trans-unit.target: Potom sme ich prebudil že sme mohli ukázať, čo dve frakcie bol najpresnejší výpočet čo [rozsah] zotrvali v čase.

trans-unit.source: It is We who relate to you, [O Muhammad], their story in truth. Indeed, they were youths who believed in their Lord, and We increased them in guidance.
trans-unit.target: Sme to my, ktorí sa k vám, [Mohamed], ich príbeh v pravde. V skutočnosti boli mladí ľudia, ktorí verili v ich pána a sme zvýšili ich usmernenia.

trans-unit.source: And We made firm their hearts when they stood up and said, "Our Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth. Never will we invoke besides Him any deity. We would have certainly spoken, then, an excessive transgression.
trans-unit.target: A urobili sme firma ich srdce keď vstal a povedal: "náš Pán je pán neba i Zeme. Nikdy bude sme odvolávať okrem neho žiadne božstvo. Sme by určite hovoril, potom nadmerné priestupok.

trans-unit.source: These, our people, have taken besides Him deities. Why do they not bring for [worship of] them a clear authority? And who is more unjust than one who invents about Allah a lie?"
trans-unit.target: Prijali toto našich ľudí, okrem neho božstiev. Prečo si nemusia priniesť pre [uctievanie] im jasné orgán? A kto je viac nespravodlivé, ako ten, kto vymýšľa o Alah lož?"

trans-unit.source: [The youths said to one another], "And when you have withdrawn from them and that which they worship other than Allah, retreat to the cave. Your Lord will spread out for you of His mercy and will prepare for you from your affair facility."
trans-unit.target: [Mládenci povedal jeden druhému] "a kedy ste stiahli z nich a to, čo uctievajú ako Boha, ústup do jaskyne. Váš pán sa rozložiť na jeho milosrdenstvo a pripraví pre vás od vášho zariadenia záležitosť."

trans-unit.source: And [had you been present], you would see the sun when it rose, inclining away from their cave on the right, and when it set, passing away from them on the left, while they were [laying] within an open space thereof. That was from the signs of Allah. He whom Allah guides is the [rightly] guided, but he whom He leaves astray - never will you find for him a protecting guide.
trans-unit.target: A [keby si bol prítomný], by vidieť slnko pri vzrástol, naklápanie od ich jaskyne na pravej strane, a keď ho, absolvovanie od nich na ľavej strane, zatiaľ čo oni boli [o] v otvorenom priestore. To bolo od znamenia Alaha. Ten komu Allah sprievodca je [správne] interaktívny, ale ten, koho on opustí scestie - nikdy sa vám nájsť pre neho ochranu sprievodca.

trans-unit.source: And you would think them awake, while they were asleep. And We turned them to the right and to the left, while their dog stretched his forelegs at the entrance. If you had looked at them, you would have turned from them in flight and been filled by them with terror.
trans-unit.target: A by ste si ich nahor, zatiaľ čo oni boli spí. A môžeme ich obrátil vpravo a vľavo, aj keď ich pes natiahol svoje končatiny pri vchode. Ak ste sa pozrel na ne, by sa odvrátil od nich v lete a boli nimi naplnený hrôzou.

trans-unit.source: And similarly, We awakened them that they might question one another. Said a speaker from among them, "How long have you remained [here]?" They said, "We have remained a day or part of a day." They said, "Your Lord is most knowing of how long you remained. So send one of you with this silver coin of yours to the city and let him look to which is the best of food and bring you provision from it and let him be cautious. And let no one be aware of you.
trans-unit.target: A podobne, sme ich, že si môže otázku navzájom prebudil. Povedal hovorca spomedzi nich, "ako dlho ste zostali [tu]?" Oni povedali: "My sme ostali deň alebo časť dňa." Povedali, "svojho pána, je väčšina vedomím toho, ako dlho ste zostal. Tak poslať jeden z vás sa striebornú mincu tvoje mesto a nech sa pozrieť čo je to najlepšie jedlo a priviesť ustanovenie z neho a nechajte ho byť opatrný. A nech nikto sa o vás.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, if they come to know of you, they will stone you or return you to their religion. And never would you succeed, then - ever."
trans-unit.target: Skutočne, ak prídu vedieť o vás, budú kameň vás alebo vás vrátiť svoje náboženstvo. A nikdy by uspieť, potom - niekedy."

trans-unit.source: And similarly, We caused them to be found that they [who found them] would know that the promise of Allah is truth and that of the Hour there is no doubt. [That was] when they disputed among themselves about their affair and [then] said, "Construct over them a structure. Their Lord is most knowing about them." Said those who prevailed in the matter, "We will surely take [for ourselves] over them a masjid."
trans-unit.target: A podobne môžeme prinútil ich, aby sa zistilo, že [kto našiel] by vedia, že sľub, že Boh je pravda a že hodinu nie je pochýb. [To bolo] keď sporu medzi sebou o ich záležitosť a [potom] povedal: "postaviť nad nimi štruktúru. Svojho pána, je väčšina vedel o nich." Povedal, že tí, ktorí v tejto veci, "Určite podnikneme [za nás] nad nimi masjid."

trans-unit.source: They will say there were three, the fourth of them being their dog; and they will say there were five, the sixth of them being their dog - guessing at the unseen; and they will say there were seven, and the eighth of them was their dog. Say, [O Muhammad], "My Lord is most knowing of their number. None knows them except a few. So do not argue about them except with an obvious argument and do not inquire about them among [the speculators] from anyone."
trans-unit.target: Oni si povedia, že tam boli tri, štvrtá je ich pes; a oni hovoria, bolo ich tam päť šestina z nich je ich pes - hádať neviditeľné; a oni hovoria, bolo sedem a ôsmy z nich bol ich pes. J. [Mohamed], "môj pán je najviac poznať ich počtu. Nikto nevie, nich Okrem niekoľkých. Takže argumentovať o nich Okrem argument zrejmé a nie informovať o nich medzi [špekulanti] od nikoho."

trans-unit.source: And never say of anything, "Indeed, I will do that tomorrow,"
trans-unit.target: A nikdy nepovedal nič, "naozaj, budem robiť zajtra"

trans-unit.source: Except [when adding], "If Allah wills." And remember your Lord when you forget [it] and say, "Perhaps my Lord will guide me to what is nearer than this to right conduct."
trans-unit.target: S výnimkou prípadov [pri pridávaní], "vôle Alaha." A Pamätajte si svojho pána, keď zabudnete [to] a povedať: "Možno môj Pán povedie ma to, čo je bližšie ako to správne správanie."

trans-unit.source: And they remained in their cave for three hundred years and exceeded by nine.
trans-unit.target: A zostal v ich jaskyni tristo rokov a prekročia deväť.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Allah is most knowing of how long they remained. He has [knowledge of] the unseen [aspects] of the heavens and the earth. How Seeing is He and how Hearing! They have not besides Him any protector, and He shares not His legislation with anyone."
trans-unit.target: Povedať "Alah je väčšina poznanie ako dlho zostal. Má [poznanie] neviditeľné [aspekty] nebo a zem. Vidieť, ako je on a ako rokovania! Majú nie mimo neho chránič, a on zdieľa nie svoju legislatívu s kýmkoľvek. "

trans-unit.source: And recite, [O Muhammad], what has been revealed to you of the Book of your Lord. There is no changer of His words, and never will you find in other than Him a refuge.
trans-unit.target: A recitovat, [Mohamed], čo bolo odhalené na vás knihu svojho pána. Neexistuje žiadna burza jeho slová a nikdy nájdete v iných ako mu útočisko.

trans-unit.source: And keep yourself patient [by being] with those who call upon their Lord in the morning and the evening, seeking His countenance. And let not your eyes pass beyond them, desiring adornments of the worldly life, and do not obey one whose heart We have made heedless of Our remembrance and who follows his desire and whose affair is ever [in] neglect.
trans-unit.target: A buďte trpezliví [ktoré boli] s tými, ktorí vyzývajú ich pán ráno a večer, hľadá jeho tvár. A nech nie vaše oči prejsť mimo nich, so želaním ozdoby pozemský život a nepočúvajú, ktorého srdce, urobili sme nepozorný naše spomienky, kto sleduje jeho túžby a ktorých pomer je niekedy [v] zanedbávať.

trans-unit.source: And say, "The truth is from your Lord, so whoever wills - let him believe; and whoever wills - let him disbelieve." Indeed, We have prepared for the wrongdoers a fire whose walls will surround them. And if they call for relief, they will be relieved with water like murky oil, which scalds [their] faces. Wretched is the drink, and evil is the resting place.
trans-unit.target: A povedať: "pravda je od svojho pána, tak ten, kto chce - nech veria; a kto chce - nech neveria." V skutočnosti sme pripravili pre zloèinci oheň, ktorých steny sa okolo nich. A ak si vyžadujú pomoc, budú uľavilo vodou ako nezreteľná olej, ktorý scalds [ich] tváre. Úbohý je nápoj, a zlo je miesto posledného odpočinku.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds - indeed, We will not allow to be lost the reward of any who did well in deeds.
trans-unit.target: Naozaj, tých, ktorí verili a urobil spravodlivé skutky - v skutočnosti sme nedovolí byť stratený odmenou všetkých, ktorí sa dobre v skutky.

trans-unit.source: Those will have gardens of perpetual residence; beneath them rivers will flow. They will be adorned therein with bracelets of gold and will wear green garments of fine silk and brocade, reclining therein on adorned couches. Excellent is the reward, and good is the resting place.
trans-unit.target: Tie budú mať záhrady, trvalé bydlisko; pod nimi riek budú plynúť. Bude v ňom ozdobená náramky zo zlata a nosiť zelené odevov z jemného hodvábu a brokátu, ležiaci v ňom zdobené maškrtením. Výborný je odmena, a je dobré miesto.

trans-unit.source: And present to them an example of two men: We granted to one of them two gardens of grapevines, and We bordered them with palm trees and placed between them [fields of] crops.
trans-unit.target: A prezentovať im príklad dvoch mužov: sme udelil jednému z nich dve záhrady z vínnej révy, a my im lemované palmami a umiestnené medzi nimi [oblasti] plodiny.

trans-unit.source: Each of the two gardens produced its fruit and did not fall short thereof in anything. And We caused to gush forth within them a river.
trans-unit.target: Každý z dvoch záhrady vyrába svoje ovocie a nespadla krátke jej v ničom. A sme na príval ďalej v nich rieka.

trans-unit.source: And he had fruit, so he said to his companion while he was conversing with him, "I am greater than you in wealth and mightier in [numbers of] men."
trans-unit.target: A on mal ovocie, tak povedal, že na jeho spoločník zatiaľ čo on bol konverzuje s ním, "ja som väčší ako ty v bohatstve a mocnejšie u mužov [počet]."

trans-unit.source: And he entered his garden while he was unjust to himself. He said, "I do not think that this will perish - ever.
trans-unit.target: A vstúpil jeho záhrady, zatiaľ čo on bol nespravodlivý k sebe. On povedal: "nemyslím, že to zahynie - niekedy.

trans-unit.source: And I do not think the Hour will occur. And even if I should be brought back to my Lord, I will surely find better than this as a return."
trans-unit.target: A ja si nemyslím, že hodinu dôjde. A aj keby mali byť priviezol do môjho Pána, som určite nájde lepší než tohle ako návrat."

trans-unit.source: His companion said to him while he was conversing with him, "Have you disbelieved in He who created you from dust and then from a sperm-drop and then proportioned you [as] a man?
trans-unit.target: Jeho spoločník, povedal mu zatiaľ čo on bol konverzuje s ním, "už ste pochyboval v ten, kto vás stvoril od prachu a potom od poklesu spermie a potom ste urastený [ako] človek?

trans-unit.source: But as for me, He is Allah, my Lord, and I do not associate with my Lord anyone.
trans-unit.target: Ale ako pre mňa, on je Boh, môj pán, a som sa nespájajú s môj pán ktokoľvek.

trans-unit.source: And why did you, when you entered your garden, not say, 'What Allah willed [has occurred]; there is no power except in Allah '? Although you see me less than you in wealth and children,
trans-unit.target: A prečo ste, keď ste vstúpil do vašej záhrady, som nepovedal, "čo Boh chcel [došlo]; nie je moc okrem v Boha "? Hoci ma menej ako si bohatstvo a deti,

trans-unit.source: It may be that my Lord will give me [something] better than your garden and will send upon it a calamity from the sky, and it will become a smooth, dusty ground,
trans-unit.target: Je možné, že môj pán sa mi [niečo] lepšie ako vaša záhrada a pošle mu kalamity z neba, a sa stane hladké, prašné zem,

trans-unit.source: Or its water will become sunken [into the earth], so you would never be able to seek it."
trans-unit.target: Alebo jeho vody sa stane zapadnuté [do Zeme], tak by ste nikdy mohli usilovať o to."

trans-unit.source: And his fruits were encompassed [by ruin], so he began to turn his hands about [in dismay] over what he had spent on it, while it had collapsed upon its trellises, and said, "Oh, I wish I had not associated with my Lord anyone."
trans-unit.target: A jeho plody boli zahrnuté [v krachu], tak sa začal zase ruky o [v hrôze] cez čo strávil na to, keď sa zrútila na jej trellises, a povedal: "Ach, kiež by som mal nebolo priradené k službe môj pán niekto"

trans-unit.source: And there was for him no company to aid him other than Allah, nor could he defend himself.
trans-unit.target: A tam bol pre neho žiadna spoločnosť, na pomoc mu okrem Alaha, ani by mu brániť sám.

trans-unit.source: There the authority is [completely] for Allah, the Truth. He is best in reward and best in outcome.
trans-unit.target: Úrad je [úplne] pre Alaha, pravda. On je najlepšie v odmenou a najlepší výsledok.

trans-unit.source: And present to them the example of the life of this world, [its being] like rain which We send down from the sky, and the vegetation of the earth mingles with it and [then] it becomes dry remnants, scattered by the winds. And Allah is ever, over all things, Perfect in Ability.
trans-unit.target: A prezentovať im príkladom života tohto sveta, [že] ako je dážď, ktorý vám zašleme z neba, a vegetácie na zemi prelína s ním a [potom] stáva suché zvyšky, rozptýlené vetry. A Allah je niekedy, nad všetkými vecami, perfektný v schopnosti.

trans-unit.source: Wealth and children are [but] adornment of the worldly life. But the enduring good deeds are better to your Lord for reward and better for [one's] hope.
trans-unit.target: Bohatstvo a deti sú [ozdobou pozemský život ale]. Ale trvalé dobré skutky sú lepšie na svojho pána za odmenu a lepšie pre [jedna] nádej.

trans-unit.source: And [warn of] the Day when We will remove the mountains and you will see the earth prominent, and We will gather them and not leave behind from them anyone.
trans-unit.target: A [z] v deň, keď odstránime hôr a uvidíte prominentnej krajinu, a budeme zbierať ich a nie zanechať z nich niekto.

trans-unit.source: And they will be presented before your Lord in rows, [and He will say], "You have certainly come to Us just as We created you the first time. But you claimed that We would never make for you an appointment."
trans-unit.target: Prezentovali pred svojho pána v radoch [a on povie], "určite ste nám rovnako, ako sme si vytvorili prvýkrát. Ale tvrdil, že nikdy by sme si schôdzku."

trans-unit.source: And the record [of deeds] will be placed [open], and you will see the criminals fearful of that within it, and they will say, "Oh, woe to us! What is this book that leaves nothing small or great except that it has enumerated it?" And they will find what they did present [before them]. And your Lord does injustice to no one.
trans-unit.target: A záznam [listín] budú umiestnené [otvoriť], zobrazia sa obávajú, že v ňom zločinci a povedia, "Ach, beda nám! Čo je to kniha, ktorá nenecháva nič malé alebo veľké, okrem toho, že ho vymenoval to?" A nájdu sa, čo si predstavujú [pred nimi]. A svojho pána sa nespravodlivosti na nikoho.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] when We said to the angels, "Prostrate to Adam," and they prostrated, except for Iblees. He was of the jinn and departed from the command of his Lord. Then will you take him and his descendants as allies other than Me while they are enemies to you? Wretched it is for the wrongdoers as an exchange.
trans-unit.target: A [zmienka] keď sme povedali anjeli, "Přemoci na Adam," a oni prostrated, okrem Iblees. On bol jinn a odklonila od príkaz svojho pána. Potom budete mať jemu a jeho potomkom ako spojenci okrem mňa sú nepriateľmi pre vás? Úbohý je zloèinci na výmenu.

trans-unit.source: I did not make them witness to the creation of the heavens and the earth or to the creation of themselves, and I would not have taken the misguiders as assistants.
trans-unit.target: Nerobil, je svedkom vzniku nebesia a zem alebo vzniku sami, a nie by sa brať misguiders ako pomocníci.

trans-unit.source: And [warn of] the Day when He will say, "Call 'My partners' whom you claimed," and they will invoke them, but they will not respond to them. And We will put between them [a valley of] destruction.
trans-unit.target: A [z] v deň, kedy si povedia, "Call"Mojich partnerov", ktorým ste tvrdil," a oni budú odvolávať ich, ale nebude reagovať na ne. A dáme medzi nimi [doline] ničenia.

trans-unit.source: And the criminals will see the Fire and will be certain that they are to fall therein. And they will not find from it a way elsewhere.
trans-unit.target: A zločinci budú vidieť oheň a mať istotu, že sú na jeseň v nej. A z neho nebudú nájsť spôsob, ako inde.

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly diversified in this Qur'an for the people from every [kind of] example; but man has ever been, most of anything, [prone to] dispute.
trans-unit.target: A určite sme rozložilo v tejto Qur'an pre ľudí z každej [druh] príklad; ale človek niekedy bol, väčšina nič [náchylný k] spor.

trans-unit.source: And nothing has prevented the people from believing when guidance came to them and from asking forgiveness of their Lord except that there [must] befall them the [accustomed] precedent of the former peoples or that the punishment should come [directly] before them.
trans-unit.target: A nič zabránila ľudia veriť, keď vedenie prišiel k nim a žiada odpustenie svojho pána s výnimkou že potrebné prihodiť nich [zvyknutí] precedens bývalých obyvateľov, alebo že trest by mal prísť [priamo] pred nimi.

trans-unit.source: And We send not the messengers except as bringers of good tidings and warners. And those who disbelieve dispute by [using] falsehood to [attempt to] invalidate thereby the truth and have taken My verses, and that of which they are warned, in ridicule.
trans-unit.target: A pošleme nie poslov okrem ako poslovia dobrú zvesť a warners. A tí, ktorí neveria sporu [prostredníctvom] lož pokúšať [] čím narúšali pravdu a moje verše, a ktoré sú varoval, v posmech.

trans-unit.source: And who is more unjust than one who is reminded of the verses of his Lord but turns away from them and forgets what his hands have put forth? Indeed, We have placed over their hearts coverings, lest they understand it, and in their ears deafness. And if you invite them to guidance - they will never be guided, then - ever.
trans-unit.target: A kto je viac nespravodlivý, než ten, kto je pripomenul verše svojmu pánovi, ale odvráti od nich a zabudne, čo ruky vystrel? V skutočnosti sme umiestnili nad ich srdcia krytiny, inak chápu to, a ich uši hluchota. A keď ich pozvete, aby vedenie - oni budú nikdy byť vedený, potom - niekedy.

trans-unit.source: And your Lord is the Forgiving, full of mercy. If He were to impose blame upon them for what they earned, He would have hastened for them the punishment. Rather, for them is an appointment from which they will never find an escape.
trans-unit.target: A váš pán je odpúšťajúci, plná milosrdenstva. Keby sa ukladať vinu na ne za to, čo si zarobil, on by sa ponáhľal pre nich trest. Skôr, pre nich je plánovaná činnosť, z ktorej nikdy nájdu únik.

trans-unit.source: And those cities - We destroyed them when they wronged, and We made for their destruction an appointed time.
trans-unit.target: A tých miest - sme ich zničil, keď sú poškodené, a urobili sme ich zničenie určený čas.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] when Moses said to his servant, "I will not cease [traveling] until I reach the junction of the two seas or continue for a long period."
trans-unit.target: A [spomenúť] keď Moses hovorí, že jeho sluha, "som neprestanú [cestovanie] kým sa dostanete na križovatke dvoch morí, alebo pokračovať po dlhú dobu."

trans-unit.source: But when they reached the junction between them, they forgot their fish, and it took its course into the sea, slipping away.
trans-unit.target: Ale keď došli na križovatku medzi nimi, oni zabudli svoje ryby a trvalo svojej púti do mora, vzďaľuje.

trans-unit.source: So when they had passed beyond it, [Moses] said to his boy, "Bring us our morning meal. We have certainly suffered in this, our journey, [much] fatigue."
trans-unit.target: Tak keď prešiel za to, [Moses] povedal, že jeho chlapec, "aby nás naše ráno jedlo. Sme určite utrpeli v tejto, našej cesty, [veľa] únava."

trans-unit.source: He said, "Did you see when we retired to the rock? Indeed, I forgot [there] the fish. And none made me forget it except Satan - that I should mention it. And it took its course into the sea amazingly".
trans-unit.target: On povedal: "videli ste kedy sme odišiel do Rock? V skutočnosti som zabudol [nie] ryby. A nikto ma zabudnúť okrem Satan - že by som mal spomenúť. A trvalo svojej púti do mora úžasne".

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "That is what we were seeking." So they returned, following their footprints.
trans-unit.target: [Moses] povedal: "Je to, čo sme hľadali." Tak sa vrátili, po ich stopy.

trans-unit.source: And they found a servant from among Our servants to whom we had given mercy from us and had taught him from Us a [certain] knowledge.
trans-unit.target: A našli zamestnanca z radov našich zamestnancov, ktorým sme dal milosť od nás učil a mal ho od nás [niektoré] znalosti.

trans-unit.source: Moses said to him, "May I follow you on [the condition] that you teach me from what you have been taught of sound judgement?"
trans-unit.target: Moses povedal mu "možno som za tebou na [stav] ktorý ma učiť od to, čo ste učil úsudok?"

trans-unit.source: He said, "Indeed, with me you will never be able to have patience.
trans-unit.target: On povedal: "Vskutku, so mnou nikdy nebudete môcť mať trpezlivosť.

trans-unit.source: And how can you have patience for what you do not encompass in knowledge?"
trans-unit.target: A ako môžete mať trpezlivosť, za čo ste nezahŕňala poznatkov?"

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "You will find me, if Allah wills, patient, and I will not disobey you in [any] order."
trans-unit.target: [Moses] povedal: "Nájdete ma, ak Alah závetov, pacient, a bude v nie porušiť, vám [žiadne] aby."

trans-unit.source: He said, "Then if you follow me, do not ask me about anything until I make to you about it mention."
trans-unit.target: Povedal, "potom ak ste za mnou, nepýtaj o nič až som sa vám o tom zmienil."

trans-unit.source: So they set out, until when they had embarked on the ship, al-Khidh r tore it open. [Moses] said, "Have you torn it open to drown its people? You have certainly done a grave thing."
trans-unit.target: Aby sa stanovili, až keď mal sa pustil na lodi, al-Khidh r roztrhal otvorené. [Moses] povedal: "už ste roztrhané ho otvorené utopiť svojich ľudí? Ste určite urobil vážnu vec."

trans-unit.source: [Al-Khidh r] said, "Did I not say that with me you would never be able to have patience?"
trans-unit.target: [Al-Khidh r] povedal: "Som nepovedal, že so mnou budete nikdy mať trpezlivosť?"

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "Do not blame me for what I forgot and do not cover me in my matter with difficulty."
