trans-unit.target: [Moses] povedal: "Ne obviňovat mne, čo zabudli, a nepokrývajú mi v mojej veci ťažké."

trans-unit.source: So they set out, until when they met a boy, al-Khidh r killed him. [Moses] said, "Have you killed a pure soul for other than [having killed] a soul? You have certainly done a deplorable thing."
trans-unit.target: Aby sa stanovili, až keď sa stretol s chlapcom, al-Khidh r ho zabil. [Moses] povedal, "si zabil čistou dušou pre iné [s zabitých] dušu? Ste určite urobil žalostné vec."

trans-unit.source: [Al-Khidh r] said, "Did I not tell you that with me you would never be able to have patience?"
trans-unit.target: [Al-Khidh r] povedal: "Nepovedal som vám, že so mnou budete nikdy mať trpezlivosť?"

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "If I should ask you about anything after this, then do not keep me as a companion. You have obtained from me an excuse."
trans-unit.target: [Moses] povedal: "Ak som mala opýtať čokoľvek po tomto, potom nebude ma ako spoločník. Dostávate odo mňa ospravedlnenie."

trans-unit.source: So they set out, until when they came to the people of a town, they asked its people for food, but they refused to offer them hospitality. And they found therein a wall about to collapse, so al-Khidh r restored it. [Moses] said, "If you wished, you could have taken for it a payment."
trans-unit.target: Takže tiahli až keď prišli pre obyvateľov mesta, občanov požiadal o jedlo, ale odmietli ponúkať pohostinnosť. A našli v ňom múr na pokraji kolapsu, tak al-Khidh r obnoviť. [Moses] povedal: "Ak ste si prial, mohol užijete to platby."

trans-unit.source: [Al-Khidh r] said, "This is parting between me and you. I will inform you of the interpretation of that about which you could not have patience.
trans-unit.target: [Al-Khidh r] povedal: "to je rozlúčka medzi ja a ty. Budem informovať vás o výklad, že o tom, ktoré ste nemohli mať trpezlivosť.

trans-unit.source: As for the ship, it belonged to poor people working at sea. So I intended to cause defect in it as there was after them a king who seized every [good] ship by force.
trans-unit.target: Pokiaľ ide o lode, patril chudobných ľudí pracujúcich na mori. Takže som v úmysle spôsobiť chyby v ňom, ako tam bol po nich kráľ, ktorý chytil všetkých lodí [dobré] silou.

trans-unit.source: And as for the boy, his parents were believers, and we feared that he would overburden them by transgression and disbelief.
trans-unit.target: Pokiaľ ide o chlapca, jeho rodičia boli veriaci a sme sa obávali, že on by preťažovať priestupok a neveriacky.

trans-unit.source: So we intended that their Lord should substitute for them one better than him in purity and nearer to mercy.
trans-unit.target: Tak sme chceli, aby ich pán mal nahradiť ich jedným lepšie ako ho v čistote a bližšie milosrdenstva.

trans-unit.source: And as for the wall, it belonged to two orphan boys in the city, and there was beneath it a treasure for them, and their father had been righteous. So your Lord intended that they reach maturity and extract their treasure, as a mercy from your Lord. And I did it not of my own accord. That is the interpretation of that about which you could not have patience."
trans-unit.target: A pokiaľ ide o stenu, patril dva ojedinelé ochorenia chlapcov v meste, a tam bol pod ňou poklad pre nich a ich otec bol spravodlivý. Takže váš pán určené, že dosiahnuť zrelosti a extrahovať ich poklad, ako milosť od pána vášho. A ja som to nie z vlastnej vôle. To je výklad, o ktorom ste nemohli mať trpezlivosť."

trans-unit.source: And they ask you, [O Muhammad], about Dhul-Qarnayn. Say, "I will recite to you about him a report."
trans-unit.target: A vy, [Mohamed], požiadať o dħul-Qarnayn. Povedať: "Som bude prednášať vám o ňom správu."

trans-unit.source: Indeed We established him upon the earth, and We gave him to everything a way.
trans-unit.target: Skutočne sme zriadili ho na zemi a dali sme mu všetko tak.

trans-unit.source: So he followed a way
trans-unit.target: Takže nasledoval spôsobom

trans-unit.source: Until, when he reached the setting of the sun, he found it [as if] setting in a spring of dark mud, and he found near it a people. Allah said, "O Dhul-Qarnayn, either you punish [them] or else adopt among them [a way of] goodness."
trans-unit.target: Až keď on dosiahol nastavenie slnka, zistil, že je [akoby] Nastavenie jar tmavé bahna a zistil, že v blízkosti ľudí. Boh povedal: "O dħul-Qarnayn, buď vám trestať [ich] alebo inak prijať medzi nimi [spôsob] Bože."

trans-unit.source: He said, "As for one who wrongs, we will punish him. Then he will be returned to his Lord, and He will punish him with a terrible punishment.
trans-unit.target: On povedal: "pokiaľ ide o ten, kto krivdy, sme potrestať ho. Potom sa vrátil do svojho pána, a on ho potrestať s hrozný trest.

trans-unit.source: But as for one who believes and does righteousness, he will have a reward of Paradise, and we will speak to him from our command with ease."
trans-unit.target: Ale ako ten, kto verí a je spravodlivosť, bude mať odmenu raja, a budeme hovoriť mu z nášho velenia s ľahkosťou."

trans-unit.source: Then he followed a way
trans-unit.target: Potom nasledoval spôsobom

trans-unit.source: Until, when he came to the rising of the sun, he found it rising on a people for whom We had not made against it any shield.
trans-unit.target: Až keď prišiel k východu slnka, zistil, že to rastie na ľudí, ktorým sme nie sa proti nemu žiadne štít.

trans-unit.source: Thus. And We had encompassed [all] that he had in knowledge.
trans-unit.target: Teda. A mali sme zahŕňala [všetko] že on poznatkov.

trans-unit.source: Then he followed a way
trans-unit.target: Potom nasledoval spôsobom

trans-unit.source: Until, when he reached [a pass] between two mountains, he found beside them a people who could hardly understand [his] speech.
trans-unit.target: Až keď on dosiahol [odovzdať] medzi dvoma pohoriami, nájdené vedľa nich ľudí, ktorí by mohli ťažko pochopiť [jeho] prejav.

trans-unit.source: They said, "O Dhul-Qarnayn, indeed Gog and Magog are [great] corrupters in the land. So may we assign for you an expenditure that you might make between us and them a barrier?"
trans-unit.target: Oni povedali: "O dħul-Qarnayn, skutočne Gog a Magog sú [veľký] corrupters v krajine. Tak sme pridelením si výdavky, ktoré by ste mohli medzi nami a nimi bariéra? "

trans-unit.source: He said, "That in which my Lord has established me is better [than what you offer], but assist me with strength; I will make between you and them a dam.
trans-unit.target: On povedal: ", v ktorom má sídlo môj pán, mi je lepšie [ako to, čo ponúkate] ale pomôcť mi silu; Bude medzi vami a priehrady.

trans-unit.source: Bring me sheets of iron" - until, when he had leveled [them] between the two mountain walls, he said, "Blow [with bellows]," until when he had made it [like] fire, he said, "Bring me, that I may pour over it molten copper."
trans-unit.target: Prines mi listy železa"- do doby, keď on mal vyrovnaný [ich] medzi dvoma horskými stien, povedal,"Ranu [s mechy],"až keď mal urobil to [ako] oheň, povedal" prines mi, že môže zalejeme to roztavenej medi. "

trans-unit.source: So Gog and Magog were unable to pass over it, nor were they able [to effect] in it any penetration.
trans-unit.target: Tak Gog a Magog neboli schopní preniesť cez to, ani oni boli mohli [vplyv] v ňom akýkoľvek prienik.

trans-unit.source: [Dhul-Qarnayn] said, "This is a mercy from my Lord; but when the promise of my Lord comes, He will make it level, and ever is the promise of my Lord true."
trans-unit.target: [Dħul-Qarnayn] povedal: "to je milosť od môjho Pána; ale keď prísľub môjho Pána, on bude úroveň, a niekedy je prísľub môjho Pána pravda."

trans-unit.source: And We will leave them that day surging over each other, and [then] the Horn will be blown, and We will assemble them in [one] assembly.
trans-unit.target: Sme nechať ten deň stúpajúcu nad sebou, a [potom] bude fúkané roh a montujeme ich v [jedna] zhromaždenia.

trans-unit.source: And We will present Hell that Day to the Disbelievers, on display -
trans-unit.target: A predstavíme peklo, ktoré deň neveriacim, na displeji -

trans-unit.source: Those whose eyes had been within a cover [removed] from My remembrance, and they were not able to hear.
trans-unit.target: Tie, ktorých oči boli do krytia, [odstrániť] hanbím, a oni neboli schopní počuť.

trans-unit.source: Then do those who disbelieve think that they can take My servants instead of Me as allies? Indeed, We have prepared Hell for the disbelievers as a lodging.
trans-unit.target: Potom tých, ktorí neveria myslia, že môžu mať moji služobníci namiesto mňa ako spojenci? V skutočnosti sme pripravili peklo pre neveriacim ako ubytovanie.

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "Shall we [believers] inform you of the greatest losers as to [their] deeds?
trans-unit.target: Povedať, [Mohamed], "sme [veriacich] informuje o Najväčší Chcípáci o [ich] skutky?

trans-unit.source: [They are] those whose effort is lost in worldly life, while they think that they are doing well in work."
trans-unit.target: [Sú] tí, ktorých úsilie sa stratia v pozemský život, keď si myslia, že robia aj v práci. "

trans-unit.source: Those are the ones who disbelieve in the verses of their Lord and in [their] meeting Him, so their deeds have become worthless; and We will not assign to them on the Day of Resurrection any importance.
trans-unit.target: To sú tí, ktorí neveria vo veršoch svojho pána a [ich] stretnutie s ním, takže ich skutky sa stali bezcenné; a sme sa priradiť k nim na deň vzkriesenia význam.

trans-unit.source: That is their recompense - Hell - for what they denied and [because] they took My signs and My messengers in ridicule.
trans-unit.target: To je ich odmenu - Hell - na čo popreli a [pretože] vzali moje príznaky a mojich poslov v posmechu.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds - they will have the Gardens of Paradise as a lodging,
trans-unit.target: Naozaj, tých, ktorí verili a urobil spravodlivé skutky - raj záhrady budú mať ako podanie,

trans-unit.source: Wherein they abide eternally. They will not desire from it any transfer.
trans-unit.target: Pričom dodržia naveky. Budú nie chcú od neho žiadne prevodu.

trans-unit.source: Say, "If the sea were ink for [writing] the words of my Lord, the sea would be exhausted before the words of my Lord were exhausted, even if We brought the like of it as a supplement."
trans-unit.target: Povedať, "keby mori atrament pre [zápis] slová môjho Pána mora budú vyčerpané pred vyčerpaním slová môjho Pána, aj keď sme priniesli ako to ako doplnok."

trans-unit.source: Say, "I am only a man like you, to whom has been revealed that your god is one God. So whoever would hope for the meeting with his Lord - let him do righteous work and not associate in the worship of his Lord anyone."
trans-unit.target: Povedať: "ja som len človek, ako ste vy, ktorým bolo odhalené, že tvoj Boh, je jeden Boh. Tak kto by nádeje na stretnutie s jeho pán - nech si spravodliví pracujú a spájať v uctievanie jeho pán nikoho."

trans-unit.source: Kaf, Ha, Ya, 'Ayn, Sad.
trans-unit.target: KAF, Ha, Ya, "Ayn, smutné.

trans-unit.source: [This is] a mention of the mercy of your Lord to His servant Zechariah
trans-unit.target: [Je] zmienka o milosť svojho pána, aby jeho sluha Zachariáš

trans-unit.source: When he called to his Lord a private supplication.
trans-unit.target: Keď zavolal jeho pán súkromné prosbe.

trans-unit.source: He said, "My Lord, indeed my bones have weakened, and my head has filled with white, and never have I been in my supplication to You, my Lord, unhappy.
trans-unit.target: On povedal: "môj pane, naozaj majú oslabený moje kosti, hlavu má plné biele a nikdy boli v mojej prosbe vám, môj pane, nešťastný.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, I fear the successors after me, and my wife has been barren, so give me from Yourself an heir
trans-unit.target: A v skutočnosti som strach nástupcu po mne, a moja žena bola neplodná, tak mi zo seba dediča

trans-unit.source: Who will inherit me and inherit from the family of Jacob. And make him, my Lord, pleasing [to You]."
trans-unit.target: Kto bude dediť ma a dedia z rodiny Jacob. A aby ho, môj pane, príjemné [vás]."

trans-unit.source: [He was told], "O Zechariah, indeed We give you good tidings of a boy whose name will be John. We have not assigned to any before [this] name."
trans-unit.target: [Mu bolo povedané,] "O Zachariáš, skutočne sme vám dobrá zvesť chlapca, ktorého meno je John. Sme nebolo priradené na ktorúkoľvek pred [tohto] názov."

trans-unit.source: He said, "My Lord, how will I have a boy when my wife has been barren and I have reached extreme old age?"
trans-unit.target: On povedal: "Môj pán, ako budem mať chlapca keď moja žena bola neplodná, a som dosiahol extrémne vysokého veku?"

trans-unit.source: [An angel] said, "Thus [it will be]; your Lord says, 'It is easy for Me, for I created you before, while you were nothing.' "
trans-unit.target: [Angel] povedal: "preto [bude]; Váš pán hovorí: "Je ľahké pre mňa, pre vytvoril som už predtým, keď ste bol nič." "

trans-unit.source: [Zechariah] said, "My Lord, make for me a sign." He said, "Your sign is that you will not speak to the people for three nights, [being] sound."
trans-unit.target: [Zachariáš] povedal: "Môj pán, aby pre mňa znamenie." On povedal: "vaše znamenie je, že sa nebude hovoriť s ľudia na tri noci, [je] zvuk."

trans-unit.source: So he came out to his people from the prayer chamber and signaled to them to exalt [Allah] in the morning and afternoon.
trans-unit.target: Tak vyšiel svojim ľuďom z modlitby komory a naznačil im vynášať [Allah] ráno a popoludní.

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "O John, take the Scripture with determination." And We gave him judgement [while yet] a boy
trans-unit.target: [Allah] povedal: "O John si písmo s odhodlaním." A my sme mu rozsudok [pričom ale] chlapec

trans-unit.source: And affection from Us and purity, and he was fearing of Allah
trans-unit.target: A lásku od nás a čistoty, a on bol zo strachu Alaha

trans-unit.source: And dutiful to his parents, and he was not a disobedient tyrant.
trans-unit.target: A poslušná, jeho rodičia a on bol neposlušný tyran.

trans-unit.source: And peace be upon him the day he was born and the day he dies and the day he is raised alive.
trans-unit.target: A mier sa na neho deň sa narodil a deň zomrie a deň zdvihol je nažive.

trans-unit.source: And mention, [O Muhammad], in the Book [the story of] Mary, when she withdrew from her family to a place toward the east.
trans-unit.target: A uznanie, [Mohamed], v knihe [príbeh] Mary, keď vytiahla z jej rodiny na miesto smerom na východ.

trans-unit.source: And she took, in seclusion from them, a screen. Then We sent to her Our Angel, and he represented himself to her as a well-proportioned man.
trans-unit.target: A ona sa v ústraní, obrazovka. Potom sme poslali jej náš anjel, a reprezentoval seba jej ako dobre urastený muž.

trans-unit.source: She said, "Indeed, I seek refuge in the Most Merciful from you, [so leave me], if you should be fearing of Allah."
trans-unit.target: Ona povedala: "naozaj, som hľadať útočisko v najviac Milosrdných od vás, [tak nech mi], ak ste mali báť Alaha."

trans-unit.source: He said, "I am only the messenger of your Lord to give you [news of] a pure boy."
trans-unit.target: On povedal: "ja som len poslem svojho pána, aby vám [Novinky] čistý chlapec."

trans-unit.source: She said, "How can I have a boy while no man has touched me and I have not been unchaste?"
trans-unit.target: Ona povedala: "Ako si budem mať chlapca, nikto sa ma nedotkol a nebol som unchaste?"

trans-unit.source: He said, "Thus [it will be]; your Lord says, 'It is easy for Me, and We will make him a sign to the people and a mercy from Us. And it is a matter [already] decreed.' "
trans-unit.target: On povedal: "preto [bude]; Váš pán hovorí: "je to pre mňa ľahké, a urobíme ho podpísať ľudí a milosť od nás. A je to otázka [už] nariadil. " "

trans-unit.source: So she conceived him, and she withdrew with him to a remote place.
trans-unit.target: Tak ona počala ho a vytiahla s ním do vzdialeného miesta.

trans-unit.source: And the pains of childbirth drove her to the trunk of a palm tree. She said, "Oh, I wish I had died before this and was in oblivion, forgotten."
trans-unit.target: A bolesti pri pôrode ju odviezol do kufra palmy. Ona povedala: "Ach, kiež by zomrel pred týmto a bol v zabudnutia, zabudol."

trans-unit.source: But he called her from below her, "Do not grieve; your Lord has provided beneath you a stream.
trans-unit.target: Ale on zavolal spod jej "nie truchlit; Váš pán poskytol pod vami prúd.

trans-unit.source: And shake toward you the trunk of the palm tree; it will drop upon you ripe, fresh dates.
trans-unit.target: A pohybom smerom k sebe kmeň palmy; klesne na zrelé, čerstvé dátumy.

trans-unit.source: So eat and drink and be contented. And if you see from among humanity anyone, say, 'Indeed, I have vowed to the Most Merciful abstention, so I will not speak today to [any] man.' "
trans-unit.target: Takže jesť a piť a byť spokojný. A keď vidíte spomedzi ľudstvo ktokoľvek, povedať, "Skutočne som majú sľúbil Najpodstatnejšou zdržanie, takže nebudem hovoriť dnes na [žiadne] človek." "

trans-unit.source: Then she brought him to her people, carrying him. They said, "O Mary, you have certainly done a thing unprecedented.
trans-unit.target: Potom ho priviedla do nej ľudia, nesúci ho. Oni povedali: "O Márii, ste určite urobil niečo bezprecedentné.

trans-unit.source: O sister of Aaron, your father was not a man of evil, nor was your mother unchaste."
trans-unit.target: O sestrou Árona, tvoj otec nebol človek zla ani nebol svoju matku unchaste."

trans-unit.source: So she pointed to him. They said, "How can we speak to one who is in the cradle a child?"
trans-unit.target: Tak ona poukázal k nemu. Povedali, že "Ako budeme hovoriť, kto je v kolíske dieťa?"

trans-unit.source: [Jesus] said, "Indeed, I am the servant of Allah. He has given me the Scripture and made me a prophet.
trans-unit.target: [Ježiš] povedal: "Vskutku, ja som služobník Boha. On mi dal písmo a ma proroka.

trans-unit.source: And He has made me blessed wherever I am and has enjoined upon me prayer and zakah as long as I remain alive
trans-unit.target: A on sa mi požehnal všade tam, kde som a má vymeral na mňa, modlitby a Zakát ako dlho môžem zostať nažive

trans-unit.source: And [made me] dutiful to my mother, and He has not made me a wretched tyrant.
trans-unit.target: A [ma] poslušná svoju matku, a on ma nie ubohý tyrana.

trans-unit.source: And peace is on me the day I was born and the day I will die and the day I am raised alive."
trans-unit.target: A mier je na mňa deň som sa narodil a deň zomriem a deň som zdvihol som nažive."

trans-unit.source: That is Jesus, the son of Mary - the word of truth about which they are in dispute.
trans-unit.target: To je Ježiš, syn Márie - slovo pravdy o tom, ktoré sú v spore.

trans-unit.source: It is not [befitting] for Allah to take a son; exalted is He! When He decrees an affair, He only says to it, "Be," and it is.
trans-unit.target: Nie je to [hodiť] pre Boha aby syn; vyvýšený je on! Keď sa rozhodol záležitosť, len hovorí, "Byť", a to je.

trans-unit.source: [Jesus said], "And indeed, Allah is my Lord and your Lord, so worship Him. That is a straight path."
trans-unit.target: [Ježiš povedal:] "a naozaj, Alah je môj pán a vášho pána, tak mu pokloniť. To je rovnou cestou."

trans-unit.source: Then the factions differed [concerning Jesus] from among them, so woe to those who disbelieved - from the scene of a tremendous Day.
trans-unit.target: Potom frakcie líšili [o Ježišovi] spomedzi nich, tak Beda tým, kto pochyboval - zo scény hrozný deň.

trans-unit.source: How [clearly] they will hear and see the Day they come to Us, but the wrongdoers today are in clear error.
trans-unit.target: Ako [jasne] budú počuť a vidieť ten deň prídu k nám, ale zloèinci dnes sú jasné chyba.

trans-unit.source: And warn them, [O Muhammad], of the Day of Regret, when the matter will be concluded; and [yet], they are in [a state of] heedlessness, and they do not believe.
trans-unit.target: A varovať, [Mohamed], deň ľutovať, keď ukončí záležitosti; a sú [ešte], [stav] nepozornosti, a im neveria.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it is We who will inherit the earth and whoever is on it, and to Us they will be returned.
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti je to my, ktorí zdedia zem a ten, kto je na ňom, a pre nás, oni sa vrátia.

trans-unit.source: And mention in the Book [the story of] Abraham. Indeed, he was a man of truth and a prophet.
trans-unit.target: A zmienka v knihe [príbeh] Abraham. Naozaj, on bol muž pravdy a prorok.

trans-unit.source: [Mention] when he said to his father, "O my father, why do you worship that which does not hear and does not see and will not benefit you at all?
trans-unit.target: [Zmienka], keď povedal, svojmu otcovi, "Otče môj, prečo si uctievanie, ktoré nepočuje a nie je vidieť a nebude vám vôbec?

trans-unit.source: O my father, indeed there has come to me of knowledge that which has not come to you, so follow me; I will guide you to an even path.
trans-unit.target: O môj otec, skutočne tam má prísť ku mne poznatkov, ktoré má prísť k vám, tak so mnou; Bude vás aj cestu.

trans-unit.source: O my father, do not worship Satan. Indeed Satan has ever been, to the Most Merciful, disobedient.
trans-unit.target: O mojom otcovi, nie uctievať Satan. Naozaj Satan bol niekedy, Most Milosrdných, neposlušný.

trans-unit.source: O my father, indeed I fear that there will touch you a punishment from the Most Merciful so you would be to Satan a companion [in Hellfire]."
trans-unit.target: O môj otec, skutočne obávam sa, že tam sa vás dotknúť trest od Najpodstatnejšou takže by mal byť Satan spoločník [v Hellfire]."

trans-unit.source: [His father] said, "Have you no desire for my gods, O Abraham? If you do not desist, I will surely stone you, so avoid me a prolonged time."
trans-unit.target: [Otec] povedal: "máte túžbu pre moje bohovia, O Abraham? Ak ustat, I bude určite kameň vás, aby sa zabránilo ma dlhší čas."

trans-unit.source: [Abraham] said, "Peace will be upon you. I will ask forgiveness for you of my Lord. Indeed, He is ever gracious to me.
trans-unit.target: [Abraham] povedal: "mier bude na vás. Žiadam odpustenie si môj pán. On je naozaj niekedy láskavý ku mne.

trans-unit.source: And I will leave you and those you invoke other than Allah and will invoke my Lord. I expect that I will not be in invocation to my Lord unhappy."
trans-unit.target: A nechám vás a vyvolať iné než Alaha a bude odvolávať môjho Pána. Očakávam, že nebudem v vzývanie môjho Pána nešťastný."

trans-unit.source: So when he had left them and those they worshipped other than Allah, We gave him Isaac and Jacob, and each [of them] We made a prophet.
trans-unit.target: Takže keď sa nechal im a tie uctievali ako Boha, sme mu Izáka a Jakuba a každý [] sme sa prorok.

trans-unit.source: And We gave them of Our mercy, and we made for them a reputation of high honor.
trans-unit.target: Dali sme im naše milosrdenstva a urobili sme im povesť vysokej česť.

trans-unit.source: And mention in the Book, Moses. Indeed, he was chosen, and he was a messenger and a prophet.
trans-unit.target: A spomínate v knihe, Moses. V skutočnosti bol zvolený, a on bol posol a prorok.

trans-unit.source: And We called him from the side of the mount at [his] right and brought him near, confiding [to him].
trans-unit.target: A vyzval ho na strane hory v [jeho] pravdu a priniesol ho v blízkosti, zveruje [s ním].

trans-unit.source: And We gave him out of Our mercy his brother Aaron as a prophet.
trans-unit.target: A dali sme ho z nášho brata Árona ako prorok.

trans-unit.source: And mention in the Book, Ishmael. Indeed, he was true to his promise, and he was a messenger and a prophet.
trans-unit.target: A spomínate v knihe, Izmael. V skutočnosti bol verný jeho sľub, a on bol posol a prorok.

trans-unit.source: And he used to enjoin on his people prayer and zakah and was to his Lord pleasing.
trans-unit.target: A on sa nariaďuje ľuďom modlitba a Zakát a bol na jeho príjemný pán.

trans-unit.source: And mention in the Book, Idrees. Indeed, he was a man of truth and a prophet.
trans-unit.target: A spomínate v knihe, Idrees. Naozaj, on bol muž pravdy a prorok.

trans-unit.source: And We raised him to a high station.
trans-unit.target: A my ho vzkriesil vysokej stanicu.

trans-unit.source: Those were the ones upon whom Allah bestowed favor from among the prophets of the descendants of Adam and of those We carried [in the ship] with Noah, and of the descendants of Abraham and Israel, and of those whom We guided and chose. When the verses of the Most Merciful were recited to them, they fell in prostration and weeping.
trans-unit.target: To boli tie na ktorých Boh prepožičal milosť spomedzi prorokov potomkov Adama a sme vyšetrovaní [v lodi] s Noah a potomkovia Abraháma a Izrael, a tých, ktorým sme vedení a vybral. Keď im boli recitoval verše Most Milosrdných, padli vyčerpanie a plač.

trans-unit.source: But there came after them successors who neglected prayer and pursued desires; so they are going to meet evil -
trans-unit.target: Ale tam prišiel po ich nástupcov, ktorí zanedbávať modlitbu a sleduje túžby; Takže sa chystáte splniť zlo-

trans-unit.source: Except those who repent, believe and do righteousness; for those will enter Paradise and will not be wronged at all.
trans-unit.target: S výnimkou tých, ktorí pokánie, veriť a robiť spravodlivosť; pre tých, ktorí vstúpia raj a bude nie ublížili vôbec.

trans-unit.source: [Therein are] gardens of perpetual residence which the Most Merciful has promised His servants in the unseen. Indeed, His promise has ever been coming.
trans-unit.target: [V ňom sú] záhrady večný pobyt, ktorých Najpodstatnejšou sľúbil jeho služobníci v neviditeľné. V skutočnosti, jeho sľub má stále prichádzajú.

trans-unit.source: They will not hear therein any ill speech - only [greetings of] peace - and they will have their provision therein, morning and afternoon.
trans-unit.target: Sú počuť v ňom zle slová - iba pokoj [pozdravy] - a oni budú mať ich poskytovania, ráno a popoludní.

trans-unit.source: That is Paradise, which We give as inheritance to those of Our servants who were fearing of Allah.
trans-unit.target: To je raj, ktorú dávame ako dedičstvo tým našich zamestnancov, ktorí boli zo strachu Alaha.

trans-unit.source: [Gabriel said], "And we [angels] descend not except by the order of your Lord. To Him belongs that before us and that behind us and what is in between. And never is your Lord forgetful -
trans-unit.target: [Gabriel povedal] "a my [anjeli] zostúpiť nie okrem poradím svojho pána. K nemu patrí, pred nami, a že za nami a čo je medzi nimi. A nikdy nie je zábudlivý - svojho pána

trans-unit.source: Lord of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them - so worship Him and have patience for His worship. Do you know of any similarity to Him?"
trans-unit.target: Pán neba a Zeme, čo je medzi nimi - tak mu pokloniť a trpezlivosť pre jeho uctievanie. Viete o akákoľvek podobnosť s ním?"

trans-unit.source: And the disbeliever says, "When I have died, am I going to be brought forth alive?"
trans-unit.target: A neveriaci hovorí: "Keď som zomrel, budem podávať ďalej nažive?"

trans-unit.source: Does man not remember that We created him before, while he was nothing?
trans-unit.target: Človek nebude pamätať, že sme vytvorili ho, zatiaľ čo on bol nič?

trans-unit.source: So by your Lord, We will surely gather them and the devils; then We will bring them to be present around Hell upon their knees.
trans-unit.target: Takže od svojho pána, sme určite stretnú ich a devils; potom prinášame ich prítomnosť v okolí letiska peklo na kolenách.

trans-unit.source: Then We will surely extract from every sect those of them who were worst against the Most Merciful in insolence.
trans-unit.target: Potom sme sa určite výpis z každého sekty tých z nich, ktorí boli najhoršie proti Najpodstatnejšou drzosť.

trans-unit.source: Then, surely it is We who are most knowing of those most worthy of burning therein.
trans-unit.target: Potom, určite je to my, ktorí sú najviac poznať tie najhodnotnejšie horenia v ňom.

trans-unit.source: And there is none of you except he will come to it. This is upon your Lord an inevitability decreed.
trans-unit.target: A nie je nikto z vás, okrem toho mu príde na to. To je na svojho pána, nevyhnutnosť nariadil.

trans-unit.source: Then We will save those who feared Allah and leave the wrongdoers within it, on their knees.
trans-unit.target: Potom sme sa zachrániť tých, ktorí sa obávali Alah a nechať zloèinci v ňom, na kolenách.

trans-unit.source: And when Our verses are recited to them as clear evidences, those who disbelieve say to those who believe, "Which of [our] two parties is best in position and best in association?"
trans-unit.target: A keď naše verše sa prednáša im ako jasné dôkazy, tých, ktorí neveriť povedať tým, ktorí veria, "Ktorý [naše] dvoch strán je najlepšie v polohe a najlepšie v spojení?"

trans-unit.source: And how many a generation have We destroyed before them who were better in possessions and [outward] appearance?
trans-unit.target: A koľko generácii sme zničili pred nimi, ktorí boli lepší majetky a [pasívneho] vzhľad?

trans-unit.source: Say, "Whoever is in error - let the Most Merciful extend for him an extension [in wealth and time] until, when they see that which they were promised - either punishment [in this world] or the Hour [of resurrection] - they will come to know who is worst in position and weaker in soldiers."
trans-unit.target: Znamená "kto je chyba - nech najviac Milosrdných rozšíriť pre neho predĺženie [podľa bohatstva a čas] až keď vidí, že to, čo oni boli sľuboval - trest [v tomto svete] ani hodinu [vzkriesenie] - prídu vedieť, kto je najhoršie pozície a slabší v vojakov."

trans-unit.source: And Allah increases those who were guided, in guidance, and the enduring good deeds are better to your Lord for reward and better for recourse.
trans-unit.target: Boh tých, ktorí boli vedení v usmernení, zvyšuje a trvalé dobré skutky sú lepšie na svojho pána za odmenu a lepšie využiť.

trans-unit.source: Then, have you seen he who disbelieved in Our verses and said, "I will surely be given wealth and children [in the next life]?"
trans-unit.target: Potom ste videli, kto pochyboval v našom verše a povedal: "Budem určite mať bohatstvo a deti [v ďalšom živote]?"

trans-unit.source: Has he looked into the unseen, or has he taken from the Most Merciful a promise?
trans-unit.target: Sa pozrel do neviditeľné, alebo on vzal z Most Milosrdných sľub?

trans-unit.source: No! We will record what he says and extend for him from the punishment extensively.
trans-unit.target: nie! Zaznamenáme, čo hovorí, a predĺžiť ho od trestu extenzívne.

trans-unit.source: And We will inherit him [in] what he mentions, and he will come to Us alone.
trans-unit.target: Môžeme ho zdedí [v] čo spomína a on príde k nám sám.

trans-unit.source: And they have taken besides Allah [false] deities that they would be for them [a source of] honor.
trans-unit.target: A prijali okrem Alaha [falošné] božstiev, ktoré by boli pre ne [zdroj] česť.

trans-unit.source: No! Those "gods" will deny their worship of them and will be against them opponents [on the Day of Judgement].
trans-unit.target: nie! Tých "bohov" popierať ich uctievanie je a bude proti nim súperov [na Súdny deň].

trans-unit.source: Do you not see that We have sent the devils upon the disbelievers, inciting them to [evil] with [constant] incitement?
trans-unit.target: Nie vidíte, že sme poslali devils na neveriacim podnecujúcich im [zlé] [konštanta] podnecovania?

trans-unit.source: So be not impatient over them. We only count out to them a [limited] number.
trans-unit.target: Takže nemal byť netrpezlivý nad nimi. Sme len počítať, im [niektoré].

trans-unit.source: On the Day We will gather the righteous to the Most Merciful as a delegation
trans-unit.target: Na deň, kedy sme sa zhromaždiť spravodliví k Najpodstatnejšou ako delegácia

trans-unit.source: And will drive the criminals to Hell in thirst
trans-unit.target: A sa budú riadiť zločinci do pekla v smäd

trans-unit.source: None will have [power of] intercession except he who had taken from the Most Merciful a covenant.
trans-unit.target: Nič nebude mať príhovor [moc] okrem ten, kto vzal z Most Milosrdných zmluvu.

trans-unit.source: And they say, "The Most Merciful has taken [for Himself] a son."
trans-unit.target: A oni hovoria, "najviac Milosrdných prijal [sám] syna."

trans-unit.source: You have done an atrocious thing.
trans-unit.target: Urobili ste brutálny vec.

trans-unit.source: The heavens almost rupture therefrom and the earth splits open and the mountains collapse in devastation
trans-unit.target: Neba takmer prasknutie z neho a zem rozdeľuje otvorené a hory zbaliť k devastácii

trans-unit.source: That they attribute to the Most Merciful a son.
trans-unit.target: Že im pripisovať Najpodstatnejšou syna.

trans-unit.source: And it is not appropriate for the Most Merciful that He should take a son.
trans-unit.target: A nie je vhodné pre Najpodstatnejšou, že on by mal mať syna.

trans-unit.source: There is no one in the heavens and earth but that he comes to the Most Merciful as a servant.
trans-unit.target: Nie je nikto na nebi i na zemi, ale to príde Najpodstatnejšou ako zamestnanec.

trans-unit.source: He has enumerated them and counted them a [full] counting.
trans-unit.target: On vymenoval ich a počítal [full] počítanie.

trans-unit.source: And all of them are coming to Him on the Day of Resurrection alone.
trans-unit.target: A všetky z nich prichádza k nemu v deň zmŕtvychvstania sami.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds - the Most Merciful will appoint for them affection.
trans-unit.target: Naozaj, tých, ktorí verili a urobil spravodlivé skutky - Most Milosrdných bude menovať ich náklonnosť.

trans-unit.source: So, [O Muhammad], We have only made Qur'an easy in the Arabic language that you may give good tidings thereby to the righteous and warn thereby a hostile people.
trans-unit.target: Tak, [Mohamed], sme urobili Korán ľahko v arabskom jazyku, že môže dať dobrú zvesť tým spravodlivým a varovať a nepriateľských ľudí.

trans-unit.source: And how many have We destroyed before them of generations? Do you perceive of them anyone or hear from them a sound?
trans-unit.target: A koľko sme zničili pred nimi generácií? Vnímajú ich niekto alebo z nich počuť zvuk?

trans-unit.source: Ta, Ha.
trans-unit.target: Ta, Ha.

trans-unit.source: We have not sent down to you the Qur'an that you be distressed
trans-unit.target: Sme neposlali vám Korán, aby ste sa v núdzi

trans-unit.source: But only as a reminder for those who fear [Allah] -
trans-unit.target: Ale len ako pripomienka pre tých, ktorí sa obávajú [Allah]-

trans-unit.source: A revelation from He who created the earth and highest heavens,
trans-unit.target: Zjavenie od ten, kto stvoril zem a najvyššieho neba,

trans-unit.source: The Most Merciful [who is] above the Throne established.
trans-unit.target: Najpodstatnejšou [ktorý] nad trón usadený.

trans-unit.source: To Him belongs what is in the heavens and what is on the earth and what is between them and what is under the soil.
trans-unit.target: K nemu patrí, čo je v nebesiach a čo je na zemi a to, čo je medzi nimi, a čo je v pôde.

trans-unit.source: And if you speak aloud - then indeed, He knows the secret and what is [even] more hidden.
trans-unit.target: A ak budete hovoriť nahlas - potom skutočne vie tajomstvo a to, čo je [ešte] skryté.

trans-unit.source: Allah - there is no deity except Him. To Him belong the best names.
trans-unit.target: Alah - neexistuje žiadne božstvo okrem neho. K ním patria najlepšie mená.

trans-unit.source: And has the story of Moses reached you? -
trans-unit.target: A má príbeh Moses ste dosiahol? -

trans-unit.source: When he saw a fire and said to his family, "Stay here; indeed, I have perceived a fire; perhaps I can bring you a torch or find at the fire some guidance."
trans-unit.target: Keď videla oheň a hovorí, že jeho rodina, "Zostaň tu; v skutočnosti majú vnímané požiaru; snáď nemôžem priniesť baterku alebo oheň nájsť nejaký návod."

trans-unit.source: And when he came to it, he was called, "O Moses,
trans-unit.target: A keď prišiel k nej, bol povolaný, "O Moses,

trans-unit.source: Indeed, I am your Lord, so remove your sandals. Indeed, you are in the sacred valley of Tuwa.
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti som svojho pána, tak odstrániť vaše sandále. V skutočnosti ste posvätné údolie Nell.

trans-unit.source: And I have chosen you, so listen to what is revealed [to you].
trans-unit.target: A vybrali si, tak počúvať, čo sa ukázalo [sa].

trans-unit.source: Indeed, I am Allah. There is no deity except Me, so worship Me and establish prayer for My remembrance.
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti som Alah. Neexistuje žiadne božstvo okrem mňa, tak mi pokloniť a vytvoriť modlitba za moje spomienky.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the Hour is coming - I almost conceal it - so that every soul may be recompensed according to that for which it strives.
trans-unit.target: Skutočne, hodinu príde - som takmer zakryť - tak, že každá duša môže byť odmenený podľa, ktorých sa snaží.

trans-unit.source: So do not let one avert you from it who does not believe in it and follows his desire, for you [then] would perish.
trans-unit.target: Tak nechajte jeden odvrátiť vás od ju kto neverí v to a sleduje jeho želanie, pre ktoré [potom] by zahynuli.

trans-unit.source: And what is that in your right hand, O Moses?"
trans-unit.target: A čo je, že v pravej ruke, O Moses?"

trans-unit.source: He said, "It is my staff; I lean upon it, and I bring down leaves for my sheep and I have therein other uses."
trans-unit.target: On povedal: "to je môj personál; Oprieť sa na neho, a znížiť listy za svoje ovce a mám v ňom iné."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "Throw it down, O Moses."
trans-unit.target: [Allah] povedal: "Hoď to, O Moses."

trans-unit.source: So he threw it down, and thereupon it was a snake, moving swiftly.
trans-unit.target: Tak ho hodil, a následne bol had, bleskovo.

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "Seize it and fear not; We will return it to its former condition.
trans-unit.target: [Allah] povedal: "chopiť sa ho a Neboj; Vrátime ju do pôvodného stavu.

trans-unit.source: And draw in your hand to your side; it will come out white without disease - another sign,
trans-unit.target: A čerpať do ruky na svoju stranu; to vyjde biela bez ochorenia - ďalší znak,

trans-unit.source: That We may show you [some] of Our greater signs.
trans-unit.target: Že môže vám ukážeme [niektorí] našich viac značiek.

trans-unit.source: Go to Pharaoh. Indeed, he has transgressed."
trans-unit.target: Prejsť na faraóna. V skutočnosti, on má prestúpil."

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "My Lord, expand for me my breast [with assurance]
trans-unit.target: [Moses] povedal: "môj pane, rozšírenie pre mňa moje prsia [s poistenia]

trans-unit.source: And ease for me my task
trans-unit.target: A jednoduché pre mňa moje úlohy

trans-unit.source: And untie the knot from my tongue
trans-unit.target: A rozviazať uzol z môjho jazyka

trans-unit.source: That they may understand my speech.
trans-unit.target: Že môžu rozumieť Moja reč.

trans-unit.source: And appoint for me a minister from my family -
trans-unit.target: A vymenujú pre mňa minister z mojej rodiny -

trans-unit.source: Aaron, my brother.
trans-unit.target: Aaron, môj brat.

trans-unit.source: Increase through him my strength
trans-unit.target: Zvýšiť prostredníctvom ním Moja sila

trans-unit.source: And let him share my task
trans-unit.target: A nechať ho zdieľať moje úlohy

trans-unit.source: That we may exalt You much
trans-unit.target: Aby sme vám môže oslavovať moc

trans-unit.source: And remember You much.
trans-unit.target: A Pamätajte si veľa.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, You are of us ever Seeing."
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti nás niekedy vidíte."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "You have been granted your request, O Moses.
trans-unit.target: [Allah] povedal: "ste získali vašu žiadosť O Moses.

trans-unit.source: And We had already conferred favor upon you another time,
trans-unit.target: A sme mali už láskavosť na vás iný čas,

trans-unit.source: When We inspired to your mother what We inspired,
trans-unit.target: Keď sme sa inšpirovať svojej matke čo sme vás inšpirovalo,

trans-unit.source: [Saying], 'Cast him into the chest and cast it into the river, and the river will throw it onto the bank; there will take him an enemy to Me and an enemy to him.' And I bestowed upon you love from Me that you would be brought up under My eye.
trans-unit.target: [Povedať], "hodil ho do hrudníka a obsadenie do rieky a rieky bude hodiť do banky; tam sa ho nepriateľ ma a nepriateľa mu. " A som obdarila milujete odo mňa, že by byť vychovaný pod mojím okom.

trans-unit.source: [And We favored you] when your sister went and said, 'Shall I direct you to someone who will be responsible for him?' So We restored you to your mother that she might be content and not grieve. And you killed someone, but We saved you from retaliation and tried you with a [severe] trial. And you remained [some] years among the people of Madyan. Then you came [here] at the decreed time, O Moses.
trans-unit.target: [A my vám favorizoval] kedy vaša sestra šiel a povedal: "Sa vás nasmerujú na niekoho, kto bude zodpovedný za neho?" Tak sme si obnoviť svojej matke, že ona môže byť spokojný a nie truchlit. A ste niekoho zabil, ale my ťa zachránil pred odvetou a skúšali ste súde [vážne]. A ste zostal [asi] rokov medzi ľuďmi Madyan. Potom si prišiel [tu] v čase nariadil O Moses.

trans-unit.source: And I produced you for Myself.
trans-unit.target: A ja sa vyrába si pre seba.

trans-unit.source: Go, you and your brother, with My signs and do not slacken in My remembrance.
trans-unit.target: Ísť, vy a váš brat mojej označené a nie spomaliť v moja spomienka.

trans-unit.source: Go, both of you, to Pharaoh. Indeed, he has transgressed.
trans-unit.target: Cestách, obaja si Pharaoh. V skutočnosti má prestúpil.

trans-unit.source: And speak to him with gentle speech that perhaps he may be reminded or fear [Allah]."
trans-unit.target: A s ním hovoriť s jemným reči, že snáď môže byť pripomenul alebo strach [Boh]."

trans-unit.source: They said, "Our Lord, indeed we are afraid that he will hasten [punishment] against us or that he will transgress."
trans-unit.target: Povedali, že "Nášho Pána, skutočne sme strach, že to bude urýchliť [trest] proti nám, alebo že on sa prestúpiť."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "Fear not. Indeed, I am with you both; I hear and I see.
trans-unit.target: [Allah] povedal: "Neboj sa. Samozrejme, že som s vami oboma; Počujem a vidím.

trans-unit.source: So go to him and say, 'Indeed, we are messengers of your Lord, so send with us the Children of Israel and do not torment them. We have come to you with a sign from your Lord. And peace will be upon he who follows the guidance.
trans-unit.target: Takže ísť k nemu a hovoria, "v skutočnosti sme poslov svojho pána, tak nám poslať deti Izraela a ich trápiť. Sme dospeli vám so znamením od pána vášho. A pokoj bude na ten, ktorý sa riadi usmernením.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it has been revealed to us that the punishment will be upon whoever denies and turns away.' "
trans-unit.target: Naozaj, to bolo ukázal nám, že trest bude ten, kto popiera a odvracia. " "

trans-unit.source: [Pharaoh] said, "So who is the Lord of you two, O Moses?"
trans-unit.target: [Faraóna] povedal: "Tak kto je pánom vy dvaja, O Moses?"

trans-unit.source: He said, "Our Lord is He who gave each thing its form and then guided [it]."
trans-unit.target: On povedal: "Náš Pán je ten, ktorý dal každá vec, jeho formu a potom riadiť [to]."

trans-unit.source: [Pharaoh] said, "Then what is the case of the former generations?"
trans-unit.target: [Faraóna] povedal, "Potom, čo je prípad bývalého generácie?"

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "The knowledge thereof is with my Lord in a record. My Lord neither errs nor forgets."
trans-unit.target: [Moses] povedal: "poznať je môj pán v zázname. Môj pán nesprávne ani zabudne."

trans-unit.source: [It is He] who has made for you the earth as a bed [spread out] and inserted therein for you roadways and sent down from the sky, rain and produced thereby categories of various plants.
trans-unit.target: [Je to] kto urobil pre vás Zeme ako posteľ [rozložené] a vložený v nej pre vás vozoviek a zoslal z neba, dážď a produkoval tým kategórie rôznych rastlín.

trans-unit.source: Eat [therefrom] and pasture your livestock. Indeed, in that are signs for those of intelligence.
trans-unit.target: [Z] jesť a vaše hospodárskych zvierat na pastviny. Vskutku, v tom sú znamenia pre tých, inteligencie.

trans-unit.source: From the earth We created you, and into it We will return you, and from it We will extract you another time.
trans-unit.target: Zo Zeme sme vytvorili, a do nej vrátime vám od neho budeme rozbaliť ste inokedy.

trans-unit.source: And We certainly showed Pharaoh Our signs - all of them - but he denied and refused.
trans-unit.target: A sme určite ukázal faraóna našich značiek - všetky z nich - ale bol odmietnutý a odmietol.

trans-unit.source: He said, "Have you come to us to drive us out of our land with your magic, O Moses?
trans-unit.target: On povedal: "ste prišli na nás riadiť nás z našej pôdy svoje kúzlo, O Moses?

trans-unit.source: Then we will surely bring you magic like it, so make between us and you an appointment, which we will not fail to keep and neither will you, in a place assigned."
trans-unit.target: Potom budeme určite vás mágia, ako to, aby sa medzi nami a ste schôdzku, ktoré sme nedokážu udržať, a ani nebude, vo vyhradenom mieste.

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "Your appointment is on the day of the festival when the people assemble at mid-morning."
trans-unit.target: [Moses] povedal: "vaše vymenovanie je deň festivalu, keď ľudia zhromažďovať v polovici-ráno."

trans-unit.source: So Pharaoh went away, put together his plan, and then came [to Moses].
trans-unit.target: Tak faraóna odišiel, dokopy svoj plán, a potom prišiel [Moses].

trans-unit.source: Moses said to the magicians summoned by Pharaoh, "Woe to you! Do not invent a lie against Allah or He will exterminate you with a punishment; and he has failed who invents [such falsehood]."
trans-unit.target: Moses hovorí, že kúzelníci predvolaní faraóna, "Beda vám! Vymýšľať klamstvá proti Alah alebo mu budú vyhladit ste s trestom; a on zlyhal, kto vymýšľa [takéto lož]."

trans-unit.source: So they disputed over their affair among themselves and concealed their private conversation.
trans-unit.target: Takže sporné nad ich vzťah medzi sebou a skryté ich súkromného rozhovoru.

trans-unit.source: They said, "Indeed, these are two magicians who want to drive you out of your land with their magic and do away with your most exemplary way.
trans-unit.target: Povedali, že "v skutočnosti sú dve kúzelníkov, ktorí chcú riadiť vás mimo vašej krajiny s svoje kúzlo a skoncovať s najviac príkladným spôsobom.

trans-unit.source: So resolve upon your plan and then come [forward] in line. And he has succeeded today who overcomes."
trans-unit.target: Tak vyriešiť na svoj plán a potom prišla [] v riadku. A on sa podarilo dnes kto prekoná."

trans-unit.source: They said, "O Moses, either you throw or we will be the first to throw."
trans-unit.target: Oni povedali: "O Moses, hodíte alebo budeme prvý hodiť."

trans-unit.source: He said, "Rather, you throw." And suddenly their ropes and staffs seemed to him from their magic that they were moving [like snakes].
trans-unit.target: On povedal: "Skôr sa hodíte." A zrazu ich lán a štáby sa mu zdalo z ich magické, že oni sa pohybovali [ako hady].

trans-unit.source: And he sensed within himself apprehension, did Moses.
trans-unit.target: A cítil v sebe obavy, Moses.

trans-unit.source: Allah said, "Fear not. Indeed, it is you who are superior.
trans-unit.target: Boh povedal: "Neboj sa. V skutočnosti je vás, ktorí sú lepší.

trans-unit.source: And throw what is in your right hand; it will swallow up what they have crafted. What they have crafted is but the trick of a magician, and the magician will not succeed wherever he is."
trans-unit.target: A hodiť, čo je v pravej ruke; to prehltnúť čo majú vytvorený. Čo majú vytvorený je ale kúzelník a mág trik nepodarí, nech je kdekoľvek."

trans-unit.source: So the magicians fell down in prostration. They said, "We have believed in the Lord of Aaron and Moses."
trans-unit.target: Takže kúzelníkov zamiloval vyčerpanie. Povedali, že "Sme uverili v pána Aaron a Moses."

trans-unit.source: [Pharaoh] said, "You believed him before I gave you permission. Indeed, he is your leader who has taught you magic. So I will surely cut off your hands and your feet on opposite sides, and I will crucify you on the trunks of palm trees, and you will surely know which of us is more severe in [giving] punishment and more enduring."
trans-unit.target: [Faraóna] povedal: "ste uverili mu predtým, než som dal povolenie. V skutočnosti, on je váš vodca, ktorý sa vyučuje mágia. Takže určite sa zníži z ruky a nohy v protiľahlých stranách, som sa ukrižovať si na kmene palmy a určite budete vedieť, ktorý z nás je vážnejšie u [dať] trest a ďalšie trvalé."

trans-unit.source: They said, "Never will we prefer you over what has come to us of clear proofs and [over] He who created us. So decree whatever you are to decree. You can only decree for this worldly life.
trans-unit.target: Oni povedali: "nikdy sme radšej vám znova čo sa stalo nám jasné dôkazy a [] ten, ktorý nás stvoril. Takže vyhláška nech ste na vyhlášku. Môžete len vyhláška pre tento pozemský život.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, we have believed in our Lord that He may forgive us our sins and what you compelled us [to do] of magic. And Allah is better and more enduring."
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti sme uverili v nášho Pána, že on môže, odpusť nám naše hriechy, a čo ste nútení nás [k] mágie. A Boh je lepšie a trvalejší."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, whoever comes to his Lord as a criminal - indeed, for him is Hell; he will neither die therein nor live.
trans-unit.target: Naozaj, kto prichádza k svojmu pánovi ako trestné - v skutočnosti, pre neho je peklo; on bude umierať v ňom ani žiť.

trans-unit.source: But whoever comes to Him as a believer having done righteous deeds - for those will be the highest degrees [in position]:
trans-unit.target: Ale ten, kto príde k nemu, ako veriaci majú urobiť spravodlivé skutky - pre tých najvyšších stupňov [do pozície]:

trans-unit.source: Gardens of perpetual residence beneath which rivers flow, wherein they abide eternally. And that is the reward of one who purifies himself.
trans-unit.target: Záhrady trvalý pobyt pod ktoré riek prietoku, pričom dodržia naveky. A to je odmenou za jeden, ktorý sa čistí sám.

trans-unit.source: And We had inspired to Moses, "Travel by night with My servants and strike for them a dry path through the sea; you will not fear being overtaken [by Pharaoh] nor be afraid [of drowning]."
trans-unit.target: A sme mali inšpirovaný Moses, "Cestovanie v noci s moji služobníci a strike pre nich suchá cesta cez more; ste nebude báť predbiehania [faraóna] ani báť [kúriť]."

trans-unit.source: So Pharaoh pursued them with his soldiers, and there covered them from the sea that which covered them,
trans-unit.target: Tak faraóna sledovaný s jeho vojakmi, a tam sa na ne vzťahovala z mora, aby im, ktoré

trans-unit.source: And Pharaoh led his people astray and did not guide [them].
trans-unit.target: A Faraon zviesť svojho ľudu a nie robil sprievodcu [ich].

trans-unit.source: O Children of Israel, We delivered you from your enemy, and We made an appointment with you at the right side of the mount, and We sent down to you manna and quails,
trans-unit.target: O deti Izraela, sme vám dodali z vášho nepriateľa, a my sa s vami schôdzku na pravej strane hory sme zoslali ste manu a prepelice,

trans-unit.source: [Saying], "Eat from the good things with which We have provided you and do not transgress [or oppress others] therein, lest My anger should descend upon you. And he upon whom My anger descends has certainly fallen."
trans-unit.target: [Povedať], "Jedzte z dobrých vecí, ktoré ste poskytli a prestúpiť [ani utláčať iné], inak môj hnev by mali zostúpiť na vás. A on na ktorého zostupuje môj hnev určite klesla."

trans-unit.source: But indeed, I am the Perpetual Forgiver of whoever repents and believes and does righteousness and then continues in guidance.
trans-unit.target: Ale v skutočnosti som večný Forgiver kto pokánie a verí, a to spravodlivosť, a potom pokračuje v usmernení.

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "And what made you hasten from your people, O Moses?"
trans-unit.target: [Allah] povedal: "a čo sa budete ponáhľať od svojich ľudí, O Moses?"

trans-unit.source: He said, "They are close upon my tracks, and I hastened to You, my Lord, that You be pleased."
trans-unit.target: On povedal: "sú blízko pri mojich skladieb, a ponáhľali, vám, môj pán, že budete spokojný."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "But indeed, We have tried your people after you [departed], and the Samiri has led them astray."
trans-unit.target: [Allah] povedal, "ale v skutočnosti sme vyskúšali vaši ľudia po vás [odišiel] a Samiri má zviesť ich."

trans-unit.source: So Moses returned to his people, angry and grieved. He said, "O my people, did your Lord not make you a good promise? Then, was the time [of its fulfillment] too long for you, or did you wish that wrath from your Lord descend upon you, so you broke your promise [of obedience] to me?"
trans-unit.target: Tak Moses sa vrátil k svojmu ľudu, zlosť a zarmútený. On povedal: "O môj ľud, urobil váš pán nie sľúbiť vám dobré? Potom bola doba [jeho naplnenie] príliš dlho pre vás, alebo si prajete tento hnev od svojho pána zostúpi na vás, tak si zlomil svoj sľub [poslušnosti] ku mne? "

trans-unit.source: They said, "We did not break our promise to you by our will, but we were made to carry burdens from the ornaments of the people [of Pharaoh], so we threw them [into the fire], and thus did the Samiri throw."
trans-unit.target: Oni povedali: "sme neporušili náš sľub na vás v našej vôli, ale boli sme nesú z ozdoby ľudí [faraóna], tak sme im hodil [do ohňa] a teda Samiri hodiť."

trans-unit.source: And he extracted for them [the statue of] a calf which had a lowing sound, and they said, "This is your god and the god of Moses, but he forgot."
trans-unit.target: A on im [socha] teľa ktorý mal vniesť zvuk, a oni povedali, "to je tvoj Boh a Boh Moses, ale zabudol."

trans-unit.source: Did they not see that it could not return to them any speech and that it did not possess for them any harm or benefit?
trans-unit.target: Oni nevideli že to nemôže vrátiť k nim žiadne reči, a že nemá pre nich akékoľvek poškodenie alebo prospech?

trans-unit.source: And Aaron had already told them before [the return of Moses], "O my people, you are only being tested by it, and indeed, your Lord is the Most Merciful, so follow me and obey my order."
trans-unit.target: A Aaron už povedali im pred [návrat Moses], "O mojich ľudí, ste len testované to, a váš pán je skutočne najviac Milosrdných, tak so mnou a počúvať mojej objednávky."

trans-unit.source: They said, "We will never cease being devoted to the calf until Moses returns to us."
trans-unit.target: Povedali, že "Sme sa nikdy neprestane, je venovaná teľa, kým Moses vráti k nám."

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "O Aaron, what prevented you, when you saw them going astray,
trans-unit.target: [Moses] povedal: "O Aaron, čo bránia vám, keď ste videl ísť z cesty,

trans-unit.source: From following me? Then have you disobeyed my order?"
trans-unit.target: Z po mne? Potom sa vás neposlúchol svoju objednávku?"

trans-unit.source: [Aaron] said, "O son of my mother, do not seize [me] by my beard or by my head. Indeed, I feared that you would say, 'You caused division among the Children of Israel, and you did not observe [or await] my word.' "
trans-unit.target: [Aaron] povedal: "O syna mojej matky, neutícha [mi] mojej fúzy alebo hlavu. V skutočnosti som sa obával, že by ste povedať, "ste spôsobili rozkol medzi deti Izraela a nie pozorovať [alebo čakajú] moje slovo." "

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "And what is your case, O Samiri?"
trans-unit.target: [Moses] povedal: "a čo je váš prípad, O Samiri?"

trans-unit.source: He said, "I saw what they did not see, so I took a handful [of dust] from the track of the messenger and threw it, and thus did my soul entice me."
trans-unit.target: On povedal: "videl som, čo som nevidel, tak som vzal hrsť [prachu] z trate posol a hodil ju, a tak moja duša lákajú ma."

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "Then go. And indeed, it is [decreed] for you in [this] life to say, 'No contact.' And indeed, you have an appointment [in the Hereafter] you will not fail to keep. And look at your 'god' to which you remained devoted. We will surely burn it and blow it into the sea with a blast.
trans-unit.target: [Moses] povedal, "potom ísť. A naozaj, to je [nariadil] v [tomto] život povedať, "žiadny kontakt. A naozaj, máte schôdzku [v nižšie] vám nepodarí udržať. A pozrieť si váš "Boh", ktoré ste zostal venoval. Budeme určite spáliť a vyhodiť ho do mora s výbuchom.

trans-unit.source: Your god is only Allah, except for whom there is no deity. He has encompassed all things in knowledge."
trans-unit.target: Tvoj Boh, je len Alah, okrem ktorým neexistujú žiadne božstvo. On má zahŕňala všetky veci vo vedomostiach."

trans-unit.source: Thus, [O Muhammad], We relate to you from the news of what has preceded. And We have certainly given you from Us the Qur'an.
trans-unit.target: Teda [Mohamed], môžeme vzťahovať na vás z Novinky čo predchádza. A sme určite dali si od nás Korán.

trans-unit.source: Whoever turns away from it - then indeed, he will bear on the Day of Resurrection a burden,
trans-unit.target: Ten, kto sa odvráti od- potom skutočne bude niesť na deň vzkriesenia záťaži

trans-unit.source: [Abiding] eternally therein, and evil it is for them on the Day of Resurrection as a load -
trans-unit.target: [Rešpektujúci] večne v ňom, a zlo je pre nich na deň vzkriesenia ako náklad -

trans-unit.source: The Day the Horn will be blown. And We will gather the criminals, that Day, blue-eyed.
trans-unit.target: Deň bude fúkané roh. A sme sa stretnú zločinci, že deň, modrooký.

trans-unit.source: They will murmur among themselves, "You remained not but ten [days in the world]."
trans-unit.target: Oni sa šelest medzi sebou, "ste ostali ale ten [dní vo svete]."

trans-unit.source: We are most knowing of what they say when the best of them in manner will say, "You remained not but one day."
trans-unit.target: Sme, že väčšina vedieť, čo hovoria, kedy najlepšie z nich spôsobom bude hovoriť, "ste zostal nie ale jeden deň."

trans-unit.source: And they ask you about the mountains, so say, "My Lord will blow them away with a blast.
trans-unit.target: A požiadať vás o horách, tak hovoria, "môj Pán bude vyhodiť preč s výbuchom.

trans-unit.source: And He will leave the earth a level plain;
trans-unit.target: A opustí krajinu úrovni obyčajný;

trans-unit.source: You will not see therein a depression or an elevation."
trans-unit.target: Vidíte v ňom depresie a nadmorskej výške."

trans-unit.source: That Day, everyone will follow [the call of] the Caller [with] no deviation therefrom, and [all] voices will be stilled before the Most Merciful, so you will not hear except a whisper [of footsteps].
trans-unit.target: Ten deň, budú všetci nasledovať [volanie] volajúceho [s] žiadna odchýlka z neho a [všetky] hlasy sa utíšil pred Most Milosrdných, takže nebudete počuť okrem šepot [kroky].

trans-unit.source: That Day, no intercession will benefit except [that of] one to whom the Most Merciful has given permission and has accepted his word.
trans-unit.target: Ten deň, žiadne prosby budú mať prospech, okrem [] ten komu Najpodstatnejšou dala povolenie a prijal jeho slova.

trans-unit.source: Allah knows what is [presently] before them and what will be after them, but they do not encompass it in knowledge.
trans-unit.target: Boh vie, čo momentálne [] pred nimi, a čo bude po nich, ale oni nezahŕňala poznatkov.

trans-unit.source: And [all] faces will be humbled before the Ever-Living, the Sustainer of existence. And he will have failed who carries injustice.
trans-unit.target: A [všetky] tváre sa pokoril pred Ever-žijúci, podporovateľom existencie. A sa mu nepodarilo, kto nesie nespravodlivosti.

trans-unit.source: But he who does of righteous deeds while he is a believer - he will neither fear injustice nor deprivation.
trans-unit.target: Ale ten, kto robí spravodlivé skutky, zatiaľ čo on je veriaci - on sa ani strach, nespravodlivosť, ani deprivácia.

trans-unit.source: And thus We have sent it down as an Arabic Qur'an and have diversified therein the warnings that perhaps they will avoid [sin] or it would cause them remembrance.
trans-unit.target: A tak sme ho poslali ako Korán v arabčine a rozložilo v ňom varovania, že snáď sa vyhnete [hriech] alebo to by spôsobilo ich pamiatku.

trans-unit.source: So high [above all] is Allah, the Sovereign, the Truth. And, [O Muhammad], do not hasten with [recitation of] the Qur'an before its revelation is completed to you, and say, "My Lord, increase me in knowledge."
trans-unit.target: Tak vysoko [predovšetkým] je Alah, panovníka, je pravda. A [Mohamed], nebude ponáhľať s [recitácie] Korán pred jeho zjavenia neskončí na vás a povedať, "môj pán, mi zvýšenie poznatkov."

trans-unit.source: And We had already taken a promise from Adam before, but he forgot; and We found not in him determination.
trans-unit.target: A sme už prijali sľub od Adama pred, ale zabudol; a našli sme v ňom stanovenie.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] when We said to the angels, "Prostrate to Adam," and they prostrated, except Iblees; he refused.
trans-unit.target: A [zmienka] keď sme povedali anjeli, "Přemoci na Adam," a oni prostrated, okrem Iblees; odmietol.

trans-unit.source: So We said, "O Adam, indeed this is an enemy to you and to your wife. Then let him not remove you from Paradise so you would suffer.
trans-unit.target: Tak sme povedali, "O Adam, naozaj je to nepriateľ vás a vaša žena. Potom nech nie ste odstrániť z raja, takže by ste trpieť.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it is [promised] for you not to be hungry therein or be unclothed.
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti, to je [sľúbil] pre vás mať hlad v ňom alebo byť neoblečený.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, you will not be thirsty therein or be hot from the sun."
trans-unit.target: A naozaj, nebudete sa v ňom smäd alebo horúce zo slnka.

trans-unit.source: Then Satan whispered to him; he said, "O Adam, shall I direct you to the tree of eternity and possession that will not deteriorate?"
trans-unit.target: Potom Satan šepká mu; on povedal: "O Adam, budú vás nasmerujú stromu večnosti a vlastníctve, ktoré sa neznehodnotí?"

trans-unit.source: And Adam and his wife ate of it, and their private parts became apparent to them, and they began to fasten over themselves from the leaves of Paradise. And Adam disobeyed his Lord and erred.
trans-unit.target: Adam a jeho žena zjedol, a ich prirodzení zrejmé, k nim a začali na upevnenie cez seba druhu raj. A Adam neposlúchol svojho pána a nesprávne.

trans-unit.source: Then his Lord chose him and turned to him in forgiveness and guided [him].
trans-unit.target: Potom jeho pán si ho vybral a obrátil sa k nemu v odpustenie a riadiť [ho].

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "Descend from Paradise - all, [your descendants] being enemies to one another. And if there should come to you guidance from Me - then whoever follows My guidance will neither go astray [in the world] nor suffer [in the Hereafter].
trans-unit.target: [Allah] povedal: "zostúpiť z raja - všetko [potomkovia] sa nepriateľov k jednému iný. A ak tam mali prísť k vám poradenstvo odo mňa - potom ten, kto sleduje môj návod bude zabloudit [v rámci] ani trpieť [ďalej].

trans-unit.source: And whoever turns away from My remembrance - indeed, he will have a depressed life, and We will gather him on the Day of Resurrection blind."
trans-unit.target: Ten, kto sa odvráti od moja spomienka - v skutočnosti, že bude mať depresívne život a zhromažďujeme ho na deň vzkriesenia slepý."

trans-unit.source: He will say, "My Lord, why have you raised me blind while I was [once] seeing?"
trans-unit.target: On bude hovoriť: "Môj pane, prečo ste vyvolali mi slepý zatiaľ čo som [raz] videl?"

trans-unit.source: [Allah] will say, "Thus did Our signs come to you, and you forgot them; and thus will you this Day be forgotten."
trans-unit.target: [Allah] povie "tak našich značiek prísť k vám a zabudli ste a tak sa vám dnes zabúdať."

trans-unit.source: And thus do We recompense he who transgressed and did not believe in the signs of his Lord. And the punishment of the Hereafter is more severe and more enduring.
trans-unit.target: A tak sme odmenu ten, kto prestúpil a neverili v znamení svojho pána. A trest ďalej je vážnejšie a trvalejší.

trans-unit.source: Then, has it not become clear to them how many generations We destroyed before them as they walk among their dwellings? Indeed in that are signs for those of intelligence.
trans-unit.target: Potom sa nestal jasné, koľko generácií sme zničili pred nimi, ako chodí medzi svojich obydlí? Naozaj v tom sú znamenia pre tých inteligencie.

trans-unit.source: And if not for a word that preceded from your Lord, punishment would have been an obligation [due immediately], and [if not for] a specified term [decreed].
trans-unit.target: A ak sa o slovo, ktoré predchádzali od pána vášho, trest by nebola povinnosť [splatná okamžite], a [nie] zadaný výraz [nariadil].

trans-unit.source: So be patient over what they say and exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord before the rising of the sun and before its setting; and during periods of the night [exalt Him] and at the ends of the day, that you may be satisfied.
trans-unit.target: Tak buďte trpezliví cez to, čo hovoria a povýši [Allah] s chválou svojho pána a pred vychádzajúceho slnka a jeho nastavenia. a počas noci [oslavovať ho] a na konci dňa, ktorý môže byť spokojný.

trans-unit.source: And do not extend your eyes toward that by which We have given enjoyment to [some] categories of them, [its being but] the splendor of worldly life by which We test them. And the provision of your Lord is better and more enduring.
trans-unit.target: A nerozšíri svoje oči k, ktorý sme dali pôžitok z [] niektorým z nich, [jeho bytia, ale] nádheru pozemský život, ktorý budeme testovať. A svojho pána je lepšie a trvalejší.

trans-unit.source: And enjoin prayer upon your family [and people] and be steadfast therein. We ask you not for provision; We provide for you, and the [best] outcome is for [those of] righteousness.
trans-unit.target: A nariaďuje modlitba rodiny [a ľudí] a byť vytrvalý v ňom. Žiadame vás za ustanovenie; Ponúkame pre vás, a je [najlepšie] výsledky [tí] spravodlivosť.

trans-unit.source: And they say, "Why does he not bring us a sign from his Lord?" Has there not come to them evidence of what was in the former scriptures?
trans-unit.target: A hovoria: "prečo on neprináša nám znamenie od svojho pána?" Tam neprišiel ich dôkaz toho, čo bolo v bývalej písma?

trans-unit.source: And if We had destroyed them with a punishment before him, they would have said, "Our Lord, why did You not send to us a messenger so we could have followed Your verses before we were humiliated and disgraced?"
trans-unit.target: A ak sme mali zničil trest pred ním, oni by povedali, "nášho Pána, prečo ste neposlal nás messenger tak sme mohli nasledovať vaše verše ako sme boli ponížení a nemilosti?"

trans-unit.source: Say, "Each [of us] is waiting; so wait. For you will know who are the companions of the sound path and who is guided."
trans-unit.target: Napríklad: "všetkých [nás] čaká; Takže čakať. Pre vás vedieť, kto sú spoločníci zvuku cestu a kto riadi."

trans-unit.source: [The time of] their account has approached for the people, while they are in heedlessness turning away.
trans-unit.target: [Čas] ich účet má priblížil pre ľudí, zatiaľ čo oni sú v nepozornosti odvrátil.

trans-unit.source: No mention comes to them anew from their Lord except that they listen to it while they are at play
trans-unit.target: Žiadna zmienka pochádza ich znovu svojho pána s výnimkou, že počúvajú to, keď sú v hre

trans-unit.source: With their hearts distracted. And those who do wrong conceal their private conversation, [saying], "Is this [Prophet] except a human being like you? So would you approach magic while you are aware [of it]?"
trans-unit.target: Srdcom nepozorný. A tých, ktorí zle skrývať ich súkromný rozhovor [hovoriť], "je tento [prorok] okrem ľudskej bytosti, ako ste? Takže by ste prístup magic zatiaľ, čo ste si vedomí [to]?"

trans-unit.source: The Prophet said, "My Lord knows whatever is said throughout the heaven and earth, and He is the Hearing, the Knowing."
trans-unit.target: Prorok povedal: "môj pán vie, čo sa hovorí v celej neba a Zeme, a on je sluch, znalosť."

trans-unit.source: But they say, "[The revelation is but] a mixture of false dreams; rather, he has invented it; rather, he is a poet. So let him bring us a sign just as the previous [messengers] were sent [with miracles]."
trans-unit.target: Ale oni hovoria, "[zjavenia je ale] zmes falošných snov; trochu, on vymyslel Naopak, on je básnik. Tak nech nám priniesť znamenie, rovnako ako predchádzajúce [poslov] boli zaslané [s zázraky]."

trans-unit.source: Not a [single] city which We destroyed believed before them, so will they believe?
trans-unit.target: Nie [jednotného] mesto, ktoré sme zničili veril pred nimi, tak im veriť?

trans-unit.source: And We sent not before you, [O Muhammad], except men to whom We revealed [the message], so ask the people of the message if you do not know.
trans-unit.target: A poslali sme si, [Mohamed], okrem mužov, ktorým sme ukázalo [správa] takže požiadať ľudí, správy, ak neviete.

trans-unit.source: And We did not make the prophets forms not eating food, nor were they immortal [on earth].
trans-unit.target: A sme nerobil prorokov formy nie jedlom, ani oni boli nesmrteľný [na zemi].

trans-unit.source: Then We fulfilled for them the promise, and We saved them and whom We willed and destroyed the transgressors.
trans-unit.target: Potom sme splniť ich sľub, a sme spasení, a koho sme vôľou a zničil previnilcov.

trans-unit.source: We have certainly sent down to you a Book in which is your mention. Then will you not reason?
trans-unit.target: Sme určite poslali vám knihu, v ktorej je vaša zmienka. Potom budete nie je dôvod?

trans-unit.source: And how many a city which was unjust have We shattered and produced after it another people.
trans-unit.target: A koľko mesto, ktoré bolo nespravodlivé sme rozbila a potom ďalší ľudia.

trans-unit.source: And when its inhabitants perceived Our punishment, at once they fled from it.
trans-unit.target: A keď jeho obyvatelia vnímajú náš trest, hneď utekali od neho.

trans-unit.source: [Some angels said], "Do not flee but return to where you were given luxury and to your homes - perhaps you will be questioned."
trans-unit.target: [Niektoré anjelov povedal] "nie utiecť ale vrátiť tam, kde ste dostali luxusné a domov - snáď vám bude vypočúvaný."

trans-unit.source: They said, "O woe to us! Indeed, we were wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: Oni povedali: "O Beda nám! V skutočnosti sme boli zloèinci."

trans-unit.source: And that declaration of theirs did not cease until We made them [as] a harvest [mowed down], extinguished [like a fire].
trans-unit.target: A toto vyhlásenie ich neskončilo, kým sme sa im [úrodu [posekane], zanikne [ako oheň] ako].

trans-unit.source: And We did not create the heaven and earth and that between them in play.
trans-unit.target: A nestvoril nebo a zem, a že medzi nimi v hre.

trans-unit.source: Had We intended to take a diversion, We could have taken it from [what is] with Us - if [indeed] We were to do so.
trans-unit.target: Mali sme určené na rozptýlenie, mohol prijali sme to od [to] s nami - keby [naozaj] sme tak urobili.

trans-unit.source: Rather, We dash the truth upon falsehood, and it destroys it, and thereupon it departs. And for you is destruction from that which you describe.
trans-unit.target: Skôr sme pomlčka pravdu na lož, a to zničí, a následne sa líši. A pre vás je zničenie od tej, ktorú opisujú.

trans-unit.source: To Him belongs whoever is in the heavens and the earth. And those near Him are not prevented by arrogance from His worship, nor do they tire.
trans-unit.target: K nemu patrí, kto je v nebesiach a na zemi. A tie v blízkosti mu nebráni arogancia z jeho uctievanie, ani robiť sú pneumatiky.

trans-unit.source: They exalt [Him] night and day [and] do not slacken.
trans-unit.target: Oni [mu] oslavovať deň a noc a nepoľavila.

trans-unit.source: Or have men taken for themselves gods from the earth who resurrect [the dead]?
trans-unit.target: Alebo muži vzali pre seba bohov zo Zeme, ktorý vzkriesiť [mŕtvych]?

trans-unit.source: Had there been within the heavens and earth gods besides Allah, they both would have been ruined. So exalted is Allah, Lord of the Throne, above what they describe.
trans-unit.target: Tam bol do neba a Zeme Boha okrem Alaha, ako by boli v troskách. Tak povýšil je Boh, pán trónu, nad to, čo oni popisujú.

trans-unit.source: He is not questioned about what He does, but they will be questioned.
trans-unit.target: On nie je pochybovali o tom, čo robí, ale bude vypočúvaný.

trans-unit.source: Or have they taken gods besides Him? Say, [O Muhammad], "Produce your proof. This [Qur'an] is the message for those with me and the message of those before me." But most of them do not know the truth, so they are turning away.
trans-unit.target: Alebo berú bohov okrem neho? Napríklad: [Mohamed], "produkovať svoj doklad. Tento [Korán] je správa pre tých, ktorí so mnou a správu týchto predo mnou." Ale väčšina z nich nevie pravdu, tak sa otočil.

trans-unit.source: And We sent not before you any messenger except that We revealed to him that, "There is no deity except Me, so worship Me."
trans-unit.target: A poslali sme nie pred vami, posol žiadne, okrem toho, že sme mu ukázalo, že, "neexistuje žiadne božstvo okrem mňa, tak uctievanie Me."

trans-unit.source: And they say, "The Most Merciful has taken a son." Exalted is He! Rather, they are [but] honored servants.
trans-unit.target: A oni hovoria, "najviac Milosrdných vzala syna." Vyvýšený je on! Trochu, oni sú, [ale] poctený zamestnancov.

trans-unit.source: They cannot precede Him in word, and they act by His command.
trans-unit.target: Oni nemôžu predchádzať mu v programe word, a konajú podľa jeho príkazu.

trans-unit.source: He knows what is [presently] before them and what will be after them, and they cannot intercede except on behalf of one whom He approves. And they, from fear of Him, are apprehensive.
trans-unit.target: On vie, čo momentálne [] pred nimi, a čo bude po nich a s výnimkou nemôže zakročiť v mene koho sa schvaľuje. A oni, zo strachu z neho, majú strach.

trans-unit.source: And whoever of them should say, "Indeed, I am a god besides Him"- that one We would recompense with Hell. Thus do We recompense the wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: A ten, kto z nich by mal povedať: "Vskutku, ja som Boh okrem neho" - že by sme jeden odmenu s peklom. Čím máme odmeniť zloèinci.

trans-unit.source: Have those who disbelieved not considered that the heavens and the earth were a joined entity, and We separated them and made from water every living thing? Then will they not believe?
trans-unit.target: Tých, kto pochyboval, nie za nebo a zem sa pripojil jednotka a sme oddeľovala a vyrobený z vody každý živý tvor? Potom sa im veriť?

trans-unit.source: And We placed within the earth firmly set mountains, lest it should shift with them, and We made therein [mountain] passes [as] roads that they might be guided.
trans-unit.target: A sme v zemi pevne stanovenej hôr, inak by sa presunúť s nimi, a môžeme sa v nej [hory] cesty prechádza [ako], že by mohli vychádzať.

trans-unit.source: And We made the sky a protected ceiling, but they, from its signs, are turning away.
trans-unit.target: A sme sa obloha chránené strop, ale oni, jej príznaky sú preč odbočka.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who created the night and the day and the sun and the moon; all [heavenly bodies] in an orbit are swimming.
trans-unit.target: A to je ten, ktorý vytvoril, noc a deň a slnko a mesiac; plávanie všetkých [nebeské telesá] na obežnej dráhe.

trans-unit.source: And We did not grant to any man before you eternity [on earth]; so if you die - would they be eternal?
trans-unit.target: A sme nepriznáva k nejakému mužovi pred ste večnosť [na zemi]; Takže ak zomriete - by mali byť večný?

trans-unit.source: Every soul will taste death. And We test you with evil and with good as trial; and to Us you will be returned.
trans-unit.target: Každá duša bude chuť smrti. A my vám test s zlo a dobro ako skúšobné; a nám sa vrátia.

trans-unit.source: And when those who disbelieve see you, [O Muhammad], they take you not except in ridicule, [saying], "Is this the one who insults your gods?" And they are, at the mention of the Most Merciful, disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: A keď tí, ktorí neveria vidieť, [Mohamed], berú vás nie okrem zesměšňování, [že], "Je to ten, kto uráža svojich bohov?" A oni sa zmienka o Most Milosrdných, neveriacim.

trans-unit.source: Man was created of haste. I will show you My signs, so do not impatiently urge Me.
trans-unit.target: Človek bol stvorený v zhone. Ja vám ukážem moje príznaky, takže nie netrpezlivo naliehala na mňa.

trans-unit.source: And they say, "When is this promise, if you should be truthful?"
trans-unit.target: A oni hovoria, "keď je to sľub, ak by ste mali byť pravdivé?"

trans-unit.source: If those who disbelieved but knew the time when they will not avert the Fire from their faces or from their backs and they will not be aided...
trans-unit.target: Ak tí, kto pochyboval, ale vedel, že doba, kedy sa bude odvrátiť nie oheň, ich tváre alebo od ich operadlami a nie napomôcť...

trans-unit.source: Rather, it will come to them unexpectedly and bewilder them, and they will not be able to repel it, nor will they be reprieved.
trans-unit.target: Skôr, bude sa s nimi nečakane a zmiasť, a nebudú môcť odraziť to, ani oni reprieved.

trans-unit.source: And already were messengers ridiculed before you, but those who mocked them were enveloped by what they used to ridicule.
trans-unit.target: A už boli vysmievali poslov pred vami, ale boli tí, ktorí sa im posmievali obalená tým, čím bývali zosmiešniť.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Who can protect you at night or by day from the Most Merciful?" But they are, from the remembrance of their Lord, turning away.
trans-unit.target: Hovoria: "Kto vás môže ochrániť v noci alebo cez deň z najviac Milosrdných?" Ale oni sú od pamiatku svojho pána, odvrátil.

trans-unit.source: Or do they have gods to defend them other than Us? They are unable [even] to help themselves, nor can they be protected from Us.
trans-unit.target: Alebo nemajú bohov, aby ich obranu okrem nás? Nie sú schopní [i] aby si pomohli sami, ani chránené od nás.
