trans-unit.source: But, [on the contrary], We have provided good things for these [disbelievers] and their fathers until life was prolonged for them. Then do they not see that We set upon the land, reducing it from its borders? So it is they who will overcome?
trans-unit.target: Ale [naopak], sme poskytli dobré veci pre tieto [neveriacim] a ich otcovia až život bola predĺžená na nich. Potom oni nie vidieť, že sme si stanovili na zemi, zníži zo svojich hraníc? Takže je to oni, kto bude prekonať?

trans-unit.source: Say, "I only warn you by revelation." But the deaf do not hear the call when they are warned.
trans-unit.target: Povedať: "Som len varovať skrze zjavenia." Ale nepočujúcich počuť volanie, keď oni sú varovaní.

trans-unit.source: And if [as much as] a whiff of the punishment of your Lord should touch them, they would surely say, "O woe to us! Indeed, we have been wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: A ak [ako] závan smrti svojho pána mali dotknúť sa ich, oni by určite povedať, "O Beda nám! V skutočnosti sme boli zloèinci."

trans-unit.source: And We place the scales of justice for the Day of Resurrection, so no soul will be treated unjustly at all. And if there is [even] the weight of a mustard seed, We will bring it forth. And sufficient are We as accountant.
trans-unit.target: A kladieme váhy spravodlivosti pre deň vzkriesenia, takže žiadna duša bude zaobchádzať nespravodlivo vôbec. A ak nie je [ešte] hmotnosť horčičné semienko, my to prinesie späť. A dostatočne sme ako účtovník.

trans-unit.source: And We had already given Moses and Aaron the criterion and a light and a reminder for the righteous
trans-unit.target: A sme dali Moses a Aaron kritérium a svetlo a pripomenutie pre spravodlivý

trans-unit.source: Who fear their Lord unseen, while they are of the Hour apprehensive.
trans-unit.target: Ktorí sa obávajú ich pán neviditeľné, keď sú hodiny strach.

trans-unit.source: And this [Qur'an] is a blessed message which We have sent down. Then are you with it unacquainted?
trans-unit.target: A to [Korán] požehnaný správy, ktoré sme poslali dole. Potom ste ho nepozná?

trans-unit.source: And We had certainly given Abraham his sound judgement before, and We were of him well-Knowing
trans-unit.target: Sme určite dal Abraham jeho úsudok pred a boli sme o neho dobre vedieť

trans-unit.source: When he said to his father and his people, "What are these statues to which you are devoted?"
trans-unit.target: Keď povedal, že jeho otec a jeho ľudia, "Aké sú tieto sochy, ku ktorému sa venoval?"

trans-unit.source: They said, "We found our fathers worshippers of them."
trans-unit.target: Oni povedali: "Zistili sme, našich otcov veriacich, z nich."

trans-unit.source: He said, "You were certainly, you and your fathers, in manifest error."
trans-unit.target: On povedal: "Ste určite, vy a váš otcovia zjavnou."

trans-unit.source: They said, "Have you come to us with truth, or are you of those who jest?"
trans-unit.target: Povedali: "Už ste sa na nás s pravdou, alebo ste z tých, kto jest?"

trans-unit.source: He said, "[No], rather, your Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth who created them, and I, to that, am of those who testify.
trans-unit.target: Povedal: "[nie], skôr váš pán je pán neba a Zeme, ktorý stvoril, a ja, že som z tých, ktorí svedčia.

trans-unit.source: And [I swear] by Allah, I will surely plan against your idols after you have turned and gone away."
trans-unit.target: A [prisahať] pri Alláhovi, bude určite plánujem proti svoje idoly po otočil a odišiel."

trans-unit.source: So he made them into fragments, except a large one among them, that they might return to it [and question].
trans-unit.target: Tak on sa na kúsky, s výnimkou jeden veľký medzi nimi, že môžu vrátiť a to [otázka].

trans-unit.source: They said, "Who has done this to our gods? Indeed, he is of the wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: Oni povedali: "kto to robí na našich bohov? V skutočnosti, on je zloèinci."

trans-unit.source: They said, "We heard a young man mention them who is called Abraham."
trans-unit.target: Oni povedali: "Počuli sme mladý muž spomínať, ktorý je nazývaný Abrahám."

trans-unit.source: They said, "Then bring him before the eyes of the people that they may testify."
trans-unit.target: Povedali: "potom ho priviedol pred očami ľudí, ktorí môžu dosvedčiť, že."

trans-unit.source: They said, "Have you done this to our gods, O Abraham?"
trans-unit.target: Povedali, že "Ste nespravili naši bohovia O Abraham?"

trans-unit.source: He said, "Rather, this - the largest of them - did it, so ask them, if they should [be able to] speak."
trans-unit.target: Povedal: "skôr to - najväčší z nich - to, takže spýtajte sa ich, ak by [sa mohli] hovoriť."

trans-unit.source: So they returned to [blaming] themselves and said [to each other], "Indeed, you are the wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: Tak sa vrátil do [obviňujú] seba a hovorí [k sebe], "Naozaj, ty si zloèinci."

trans-unit.source: Then they reversed themselves, [saying], "You have already known that these do not speak!"
trans-unit.target: Potom sa obrátil sami [povedať], "Ste už poznám, že toto nehovorí!"

trans-unit.source: He said, "Then do you worship instead of Allah that which does not benefit you at all or harm you?
trans-unit.target: Povedal, "potom vás uctievať namiesto Alah, že čo nie je prínosom pre vás vôbec alebo ublížiť?

trans-unit.source: Uff to you and to what you worship instead of Allah. Then will you not use reason?"
trans-unit.target: Uff aby ste a čo vás uctievať namiesto Alah. Potom sa nepoužije dôvod?"

trans-unit.source: They said, "Burn him and support your gods - if you are to act."
trans-unit.target: Oni povedal: "Spáliť a podporu svojich bohov - Ak ste konať."

trans-unit.source: Allah said, "O fire, be coolness and safety upon Abraham."
trans-unit.target: Boh povedal: "O oheň, byť chlad a bezpečnosť na Abraháma."

trans-unit.source: And they intended for him harm, but We made them the greatest losers.
trans-unit.target: A určené pre neho škodu, ale urobili sme ich najväčší porazení.

trans-unit.source: And We delivered him and Lot to the land which We had blessed for the worlds.
trans-unit.target: A sme dodali ho a veľa na pozemky, ktorých sme požehnal svety.

trans-unit.source: And We gave him Isaac and Jacob in addition, and all [of them] We made righteous.
trans-unit.target: A sme mu Izáka a Jakuba, a všetky [ich] sme učinení spravodlivými.

trans-unit.source: And We made them leaders guiding by Our command. And We inspired to them the doing of good deeds, establishment of prayer, and giving of zakah; and they were worshippers of Us.
trans-unit.target: A my sa ich predstavitelia vedenia nášho velenia. A sme sa inšpirovať im robiť dobré skutky, zriadenie modlitby a dáva Zakát; a oni boli veriacich z nás.

trans-unit.source: And to Lot We gave judgement and knowledge, and We saved him from the city that was committing wicked deeds. Indeed, they were a people of evil, defiantly disobedient.
trans-unit.target: Veľa sme dali úsudku a vedomosti a môžeme ho zachránil od mesta, ktorý sa dopúšťa zlých skutkov. V skutočnosti boli ľuďom zlo, vyzývavo neposlušný.

trans-unit.source: And We admitted him into Our mercy. Indeed, he was of the righteous.
trans-unit.target: A my mu priznal do nášho milosrdenstva. Naozaj, on bol spravodlivý.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] Noah, when he called [to Allah] before [that time], so We responded to him and saved him and his family from the great flood.
trans-unit.target: A [] Noe, keď nazval [aby Allah] dovtedy [], takže sme odpovedal mu, a zachránil ho a jeho rodinu z veľkej potope.

trans-unit.source: And We saved him from the people who denied Our signs. Indeed, they were a people of evil, so We drowned them, all together.
trans-unit.target: A my ho zachránil od ľudí, ktorí poprel našich značiek. V skutočnosti boli ľuďom zlo, tak sme sa utopil, všetko dohromady.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] David and Solomon, when they judged concerning the field - when the sheep of a people overran it [at night], and We were witness to their judgement.
trans-unit.target: A [Uveďte] David a Šalamún, keď sa súdil o oblasti - ovce ľudí ho obsadil [v noci] a sme boli svedkami ich úsudok.

trans-unit.source: And We gave understanding of the case to Solomon, and to each [of them] We gave judgement and knowledge. And We subjected the mountains to exalt [Us], along with David and [also] the birds. And We were doing [that].
trans-unit.target: Dali sme chápanie prípade Šalamúnovi a v [ich] dali sme úsudku a vedomosti. A sme podrobili hory vynášať [nás], spolu s David a [i] vtáky. A [že] robíme.

trans-unit.source: And We taught him the fashioning of coats of armor to protect you from your [enemy in] battle. So will you then be grateful?
trans-unit.target: A my ho učil ujímání kabáty zbroj chrániť vás z vašej bitky [nepriateľa v]. Tak potom budeš vďačný?

trans-unit.source: And to Solomon [We subjected] the wind, blowing forcefully, proceeding by his command toward the land which We had blessed. And We are ever, of all things, Knowing.
trans-unit.target: A Šalamúnove [sme podrobili] vietor fúka silno, konanie podľa jeho príkazu k pozemky, ktorých sme požehnal. A sme vôbec, všetko, vedieť.

trans-unit.source: And of the devils were those who dived for him and did work other than that. And We were of them a guardian.
trans-unit.target: A démonov boli tí, kto potopil pre neho a robil prácu, ako je. A boli sme z nich opatrovníka.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] Job, when he called to his Lord, "Indeed, adversity has touched me, and you are the Most Merciful of the merciful."
trans-unit.target: A [spomenúť] prácu, keď zavolal na svojho pána, "naozaj, nepriazeň osudu sa ma nedotkol a ste najviac Milosrdných z milosrdný."

trans-unit.source: So We responded to him and removed what afflicted him of adversity. And We gave him [back] his family and the like thereof with them as mercy from Us and a reminder for the worshippers [of Allah].
trans-unit.target: Tak sme reagovali na neho a odstránené, čo mu protivenstvá postihnutý. A my sme mu [späť] jeho rodina a podobne jej s nimi ako milosť od nás a pripomenutie pre ctitelia [Boh].

trans-unit.source: And [mention] Ishmael and Idrees and Dhul-Kifl; all were of the patient.
trans-unit.target: A [Uveďte] Izmael a Idrees a dħul-Kifl; všetky boli pacienta.

trans-unit.source: And We admitted them into Our mercy. Indeed, they were of the righteous.
trans-unit.target: A my im priznal do nášho milosrdenstva. V skutočnosti boli spravodliví.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] the man of the fish, when he went off in anger and thought that We would not decree [anything] upon him. And he called out within the darknesses, "There is no deity except You; exalted are You. Indeed, I have been of the wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: A [] muž ryby, keď on odišiel v hneve, a myslel, že by sme nie vyhlášky [niečo] mu. A zavolal do darknesses, "nie je žiadne božstvo okrem vás; vyvýšený ste. V skutočnosti som bol z zloèinci."

trans-unit.source: So We responded to him and saved him from the distress. And thus do We save the believers.
trans-unit.target: Tak sme reagovali na neho a ho zachránil od utrpenia. A tak sme zachrániť veriaci.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] Zechariah, when he called to his Lord, "My Lord, do not leave me alone [with no heir], while you are the best of inheritors."
trans-unit.target: A [spomenúť] Zachariáš, keď zavolal na svojho pána, "môj pán, nie Nechaj ma [s žiadny dedič], aj keď ste najlepší dedičmi."

trans-unit.source: So We responded to him, and We gave to him John, and amended for him his wife. Indeed, they used to hasten to good deeds and supplicate Us in hope and fear, and they were to Us humbly submissive.
trans-unit.target: Tak sme reagovali na neho, a my dal ho John a doplnkov pre neho jeho manželka. Vskutku, urýchliť dobré skutky a snažně prosiť nás nádej a strach, a boli nám pokorne submisívny.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] the one who guarded her chastity, so We blew into her [garment] through Our angel [Gabriel], and We made her and her son a sign for the worlds.
trans-unit.target: A [] ten, kto stráži jej čistoty, takže sme do nej [oblečenie] vyhodil cez náš anjel [Gabriel], a urobili sme jej a jej syna znamenie pre svety.

trans-unit.source: Indeed this, your religion, is one religion, and I am your Lord, so worship Me.
trans-unit.target: Naozaj je to vaše náboženstvo, jedno náboženstvo, a ja som svojho pána, tak uctievanie Me.

trans-unit.source: And [yet] they divided their affair among themselves, [but] all to Us will return.
trans-unit.target: A [ešte] ich rozdeliť ich vzťah medzi sebou, [ale] všetky sa nám vráti.

trans-unit.source: So whoever does righteous deeds while he is a believer - no denial will there be for his effort, and indeed We, of it, are recorders.
trans-unit.target: Tak kto to spravodlivé skutky, zatiaľ čo on je veriaci - bez odmietnutia budú za svoje úsilie a naozaj, sme rekordéry.

trans-unit.source: And there is prohibition upon [the people of] a city which We have destroyed that they will [ever] return
trans-unit.target: A tam je zákaz na [ľudia] mesto, ktoré sme zničili, že sa vráti [stále]

trans-unit.source: Until when [the dam of] Gog and Magog has been opened and they, from every elevation, descend
trans-unit.target: Do kedy [priehrade] otvoril Gog a Magog a oni z každý vrchol, zostúpiť

trans-unit.source: And [when] the true promise has approached; then suddenly the eyes of those who disbelieved will be staring [in horror, while they say], "O woe to us; we had been unmindful of this; rather, we were wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: A [keď] pravdivý sľub sa priblížil; potom zrazu v očiach tých, kto pochyboval sa pozeral [s hrôzou, keď hovoria], "O Beda nám; boli sme nedbanlivý skôr sme zloèinci."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, you [disbelievers] and what you worship other than Allah are the firewood of Hell. You will be coming to [enter] it.
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti ste [neveriacim] a to, čo uctievajú ako Alah sú palivové drevo z pekla. Príde do [enter].

trans-unit.source: Had these [false deities] been [actual] gods, they would not have come to it, but all are eternal therein.
trans-unit.target: Boli tieto [falošné božstvá] [aktuálna] bohov, že by nemala prísť na to, ale sú večné v nich.

trans-unit.source: For them therein is heavy sighing, and they therein will not hear.
trans-unit.target: Pre nich je v ňom ťažkým povzdychom a sú v ňom nebude počuť.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those for whom the best [reward] has preceded from Us - they are from it far removed.
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti tí, pre koho najlepšie [odmena] predchádzali od nás - oni sú od nej ďaleko.

trans-unit.source: They will not hear its sound, while they are, in that which their souls desire, abiding eternally.
trans-unit.target: Nebudete počuť zvuk, zatiaľ čo oni sú, ktoré túžbu ich duše, rešpektujúci naveky.

trans-unit.source: They will not be grieved by the greatest terror, and the angels will meet them, [saying], "This is your Day which you have been promised" -
trans-unit.target: Oni budú nie zarmútené najväčšiu hrôzu a anjeli splnia, [povedať], "To je tvoj deň, ktorý ste sľúbili"-

trans-unit.source: The Day when We will fold the heaven like the folding of a [written] sheet for the records. As We began the first creation, We will repeat it. [That is] a promise binding upon Us. Indeed, We will do it.
trans-unit.target: V deň, kedy môžeme zložiť neba, ako skladanie [písomné] list pre záznamy. Ako sme začali prvý tvorby, budeme opakovať. [Je] záväzný prísľub na nás. Vskutku, urobíme to.

trans-unit.source: And We have already written in the book [of Psalms] after the [previous] mention that the land [of Paradise] is inherited by My righteous servants.
trans-unit.target: A sme už písali v knihe [žalmy] po [predchádzajúci] zmienka, že krajiny [raj] zdedil môj spravodlivý zamestnancov.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, in this [Qur'an] is notification for a worshipping people.
trans-unit.target: Naozaj, v tomto [Korán] je oznámenie pre uctievanie ľudí.

trans-unit.source: And We have not sent you, [O Muhammad], except as a mercy to the worlds.
trans-unit.target: A my vám poslal, [Mohamed], s výnimkou ako milosť svety.

trans-unit.source: Say, "It is only revealed to me that your god is but one God; so will you be Muslims [in submission to Him]?"
trans-unit.target: Povedať: "je to len ukázalo sa mi, že váš Boh je ale jedinÃ½ Boh; Takže budete moslimov [v podaní mu]?"

trans-unit.source: But if they turn away, then say, "I have announced to [all of] you equally. And I know not whether near or far is that which you are promised.
trans-unit.target: Ale ak sa zase preč, potom povedal, "som oznámil na [všetky] ste rovnako. A neviem, či blízko alebo ďaleko, je to, čo ste sľúbil.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, He knows what is declared of speech, and He knows what you conceal.
trans-unit.target: Naozaj, on vie, čo sa deklaruje prejavu a vie, čo ste skryť.

trans-unit.source: And I know not; perhaps it is a trial for you and enjoyment for a time."
trans-unit.target: A viem, že nie. možno je to skúšobnú dobu vás a radosti čas."

trans-unit.source: [The Prophet] has said, "My Lord, judge [between us] in truth. And our Lord is the Most Merciful, the one whose help is sought against that which you describe."
trans-unit.target: [Prorok] povedal: "môj pane, sudca [medzi nami] v pravde. A náš Pán je Most Milosrdných, ten, ktorého pomoc žiada proti vám opísať."

trans-unit.source: O mankind, fear your Lord. Indeed, the convulsion of the [final] Hour is a terrible thing.
trans-unit.target: O ľudstvo, a strach, svojho pána. Vskutku, kŕč [posledný] hodiny je hrozná vec.

trans-unit.source: On the Day you see it every nursing mother will be distracted from that [child] she was nursing, and every pregnant woman will abort her pregnancy, and you will see the people [appearing] intoxicated while they are not intoxicated; but the punishment of Allah is severe.
trans-unit.target: Deň vidíte, že každá dojčiaca matka budú rozptyľovať z [deti] Ona bola ošetrovateľstvo, a Každá tehotná žena sa prerušiť jej tehotenstvo, a uvidíte, ľudia [sú] pod vplyvom alkoholu, kým nie sú pod vplyvom alkoholu; ale trest Alah je ťažké.

trans-unit.source: And of the people is he who disputes about Allah without knowledge and follows every rebellious devil.
trans-unit.target: A z ľudí je ten, kto pochybuje o Alah bez vedomia a takto každá vzdorujúcich diabla.

trans-unit.source: It has been decreed for every devil that whoever turns to him - he will misguide him and will lead him to the punishment of the Blaze.
trans-unit.target: To exmanžela pre každý čert že kto sa otočí k nemu - on bude zviesť ho a povedie ho na trest požiar.

trans-unit.source: O People, if you should be in doubt about the Resurrection, then [consider that] indeed, We created you from dust, then from a sperm-drop, then from a clinging clot, and then from a lump of flesh, formed and unformed - that We may show you. And We settle in the wombs whom We will for a specified term, then We bring you out as a child, and then [We develop you] that you may reach your [time of] maturity. And among you is he who is taken in [early] death, and among you is he who is returned to the most decrepit [old] age so that he knows, after [once having] knowledge, nothing. And you see the earth barren, but when We send down upon it rain, it quivers and swells and grows [something] of every beautiful kind.
trans-unit.target: O ľudí, ak by mala byť na pochybách o vzkriesení, potom [za to] Vskutku, vytvorili sme si pred prachom, potom rozbaľovacej spermií, potom z zrazeniny usadené, AZ potom kus mäsa, tvoril a nedokončený - že môže vám ukážeme. A môžeme usadiť lona, koho budeme pre zadaný výraz, potom vám prinášame ako dieťa, a potom [si rozvíjame], že dostanete svoje splatnosti [čas]. Medzi vami je ten, kto odoberá v [] zomrel a medzi vami je ten, kto sa vracia do najviac schátraný [starého] veku tak, že vie, že po [raz so] znalosti, nič. A vidíte, neúrodné Zeme, ale keď sme poslať nadol na dážď, priechodky a zväčší a rastie [niečo] každý krásny druhu.

trans-unit.source: That is because Allah is the Truth and because He gives life to the dead and because He is over all things competent
trans-unit.target: To je preto, že Boh je pravda a pretože on dáva život mŕtvych, a preto, že on je nad všetkými vecami príslušným

trans-unit.source: And [that they may know] that the Hour is coming - no doubt about it - and that Allah will resurrect those in the graves.
trans-unit.target: A [že oni môžu vedieť] že hodina sa blíži - nie je pochýb o tom - a že sa vzkriesiť tí, v hroboch.

trans-unit.source: And of the people is he who disputes about Allah without knowledge or guidance or an enlightening book [from Him],
trans-unit.target: A z ľudí je ten, kto pochybuje o Alah bez vedomostí alebo usmernenie alebo poučné knihy [od neho],

trans-unit.source: Twisting his neck [in arrogance] to mislead [people] from the way of Allah. For him in the world is disgrace, and We will make him taste on the Day of Resurrection the punishment of the Burning Fire [while it is said],
trans-unit.target: Krútenie krku [v arogancia] do omylu [ľudia] z toho, ako Boh. Pre neho na svete je hanba, a bude mu chuť na deň vzkriesenia trest oheň, horiace [kým hovorí],

trans-unit.source: "That is for what your hands have put forth and because Allah is not ever unjust to [His] servants."
trans-unit.target: "To je to, čo vaše ruky sa vystrel, a preto Alah nie je niekedy nespravodlivý [jeho] zamestnancov."

trans-unit.source: And of the people is he who worships Allah on an edge. If he is touched by good, he is reassured by it; but if he is struck by trial, he turns on his face [to the other direction]. He has lost [this] world and the Hereafter. That is what is the manifest loss.
trans-unit.target: A z ľudí je ten, kto uctieva Boha na okraj. Ak sa dotkne dobré, uisťoval ale ak mu je zasiahnutý trial, obráti na tvár [na opačnom smere]. On stratil [tohto] sveta a ďalej. To je to, čo je zjavne straty.

trans-unit.source: He invokes instead of Allah that which neither harms him nor benefits him. That is what is the extreme error.
trans-unit.target: Ten vyvolá namiesto Alah, že ktoré škodí mu a ani ho ťaží. To je to, čo je extrémne chyba.

trans-unit.source: He invokes one whose harm is closer than his benefit - how wretched the protector and how wretched the associate.
trans-unit.target: Ten vyvolá ktorého poškodenie je bližšie ako jeho výhody - ako úbohý ochranca a ako úbohý pridruženého podniku.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah will admit those who believe and do righteous deeds to gardens beneath which rivers flow. Indeed, Allah does what He intends.
trans-unit.target: Vskutku, Alah priznať tých, ktorí veria, a robiť spravodlivé skutky do záhrady pod ktoré toku rieky. Vskutku, Alah robí, čo zamýšľa.

trans-unit.source: Whoever should think that Allah will not support [Prophet Muhammad] in this world and the Hereafter - let him extend a rope to the ceiling, then cut off [his breath], and let him see: will his effort remove that which enrages [him]?
trans-unit.target: Kto by si, že Alah nepodporuje [proroka Mohameda] v tomto svete a ďalej - nechajte ho rozšíriť lano k stropu, potom odrezať [dych] a nechať ho vidieť: jeho úsilie odstrániť, ktorá [mu] rozzúri?

trans-unit.source: And thus have We sent the Qur'an down as verses of clear evidence and because Allah guides whom He intends.
trans-unit.target: A tak sme poslali Korán ako veršoch jasný dôkaz, a preto Alah sprievodcov, ktorých má v úmysle.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who have believed and those who were Jews and the Sabeans and the Christians and the Magians and those who associated with Allah - Allah will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection. Indeed Allah is, over all things, Witness.
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti tí, kto veril, a tých, ktorí boli Židia a Sabeans a kresťania a Magians a tí, ktorí spojené s Boh - Boh bude súdiť medzi nimi na deň vzkriesenia. Alah je naozaj nad všetkými vecami, svedok.

trans-unit.source: Do you not see that to Allah prostrates whoever is in the heavens and whoever is on the earth and the sun, the moon, the stars, the mountains, the trees, the moving creatures and many of the people? But upon many the punishment has been justified. And he whom Allah humiliates - for him there is no bestower of honor. Indeed, Allah does what He wills.
trans-unit.target: Vidíte nie, až prostrates ten, kto je v nebi a toho, kto je na zem a slnko, mesiac, hviezdy, hory, stromy, pohybujúcich sa tvorov a veľa ľudí? Ale po mnohých trest je opodstatnená. A ten komu Allah ponižuje - pre neho neexistuje žiadna bestower cti. Vskutku, Alah to, čo on chce.

trans-unit.source: These are two adversaries who have disputed over their Lord. But those who disbelieved will have cut out for them garments of fire. Poured upon their heads will be scalding water
trans-unit.target: Toto sú dve protivníkov, ktorí sa sporné nad svojho pána. Ale tí, kto pochyboval bude mať stvorený pre ich odevy z ohňa. Nalial na ich hlavy sa horúcej vody

trans-unit.source: By which is melted that within their bellies and [their] skins.
trans-unit.target: Ktorým sa roztopí, ktoré v bruchu a [ich] kože.

trans-unit.source: And for [striking] them are maces of iron.
trans-unit.target: A pre [štrajkujúci] im palce železa.

trans-unit.source: Every time they want to get out of Hellfire from anguish, they will be returned to it, and [it will be said], "Taste the punishment of the Burning Fire!"
trans-unit.target: Zakaždým, keď sa chcú dostať z Hellfire od utrpenia, sa vrátil k nej, a [to bude povedal], "chuť trest horiaci oheň!"

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah will admit those who believe and do righteous deeds to gardens beneath which rivers flow. They will be adorned therein with bracelets of gold and pearl, and their garments therein will be silk.
trans-unit.target: Vskutku, Alah priznať tých, ktorí veria, a robiť spravodlivé skutky do záhrady pod ktoré toku rieky. Oni sa budú v ňom ozdobená náramky zo zlata a perly a ich odevov v ňom bude hodvábu.

trans-unit.source: And they had been guided [in worldly life] to good speech, and they were guided to the path of the Praiseworthy.
trans-unit.target: By mal riadiť [v pozemský život] dobrá reč a oni boli vedení k ceste Praiseworthy.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who have disbelieved and avert [people] from the way of Allah and [from] al-Masjid al-Haram, which We made for the people - equal are the resident therein and one from outside; and [also] whoever intends [a deed] therein of deviation [in religion] or wrongdoing - We will make him taste of a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti tí, ktorí majú pochyboval a odvrátiť [ľudia] z toho, ako Boh a [z] Abraj al-Haram, ktoré sme urobili pre ľudí - sú rovnaké s pobytom v nej, a jeden z vonku; a [i] kto chce [skutok] v nej odchýlka [v náboženstve] alebo previnenie - urobíme mu chuť bolestivé trest.

trans-unit.source: And [mention, O Muhammad], when We designated for Abraham the site of the House, [saying], "Do not associate anything with Me and purify My House for those who perform Tawaf and those who stand [in prayer] and those who bow and prostrate.
trans-unit.target: A [zmienka, Mohamed], keď sme poverené Abraham miesto v dome, [povedať], "nič spájať so mnou a čistiť môj dom pre tých, ktorí vykonávajú Tawaf, a tí, ktorí stoja [v modlitbe] a tých, ktorí lúk a přemoci.

trans-unit.source: And proclaim to the people the Hajj [pilgrimage]; they will come to you on foot and on every lean camel; they will come from every distant pass -
trans-unit.target: A hlásať ľudu Hajj [púť]; prídu na vás pešo a na každý štíhle camel; prídu z každej vzdialených pass-

trans-unit.source: That they may witness benefits for themselves and mention the name of Allah on known days over what He has provided for them of [sacrificial] animals. So eat of them and feed the miserable and poor.
trans-unit.target: Že môžu svedok dávky pre seba a spomenúť meno Alah známe dní čo má podľa nich [obetné] zvierat. Takže jesť z nich a krmivá úbohý a chudobný.

trans-unit.source: Then let them end their untidiness and fulfill their vows and perform Tawaf around the ancient House."
trans-unit.target: Potom nech je koniec ich neporiadok a splniť svoje sľuby a vykonávať Tawaf okolo starobylého domu."

trans-unit.source: That [has been commanded], and whoever honors the sacred ordinances of Allah - it is best for him in the sight of his Lord. And permitted to you are the grazing livestock, except what is recited to you. So avoid the uncleanliness of idols and avoid false statement,
trans-unit.target: Že [bolo prikázané], a ten, kto ctí posvätné obrady Alaha - je to najlepšie pre neho v očiach svojho pána. A povoliť, aby ste sú pasúce sa zvieratá, s výnimkou, čo je prednes na vás. Vyhnúť sa uncleanliness idoly a vyhnúť sa nepravdivé vyhlásenie,

trans-unit.source: Inclining [only] to Allah, not associating [anything] with Him. And he who associates with Allah - it is as though he had fallen from the sky and was snatched by the birds or the wind carried him down into a remote place.
trans-unit.target: [Len] inklinující k Bohu, nie [niečo] spájali s ním. A ten, kto spája so Alah - je to akoby mu spadla z neba a bol chytený vtáky, alebo vietor odniesol ho dole do vzdialeného miesta.

trans-unit.source: That [is so]. And whoever honors the symbols of Allah - indeed, it is from the piety of hearts.
trans-unit.target: Že [je to]. A ten, kto ctí symbolov Boha - je naozaj zo zbožnosti srdce.

trans-unit.source: For you the animals marked for sacrifice are benefits for a specified term; then their place of sacrifice is at the ancient House.
trans-unit.target: Pre vás sú zvieratá označené za obetu výhody stanovené obdobie; potom ich obeť je v starom dome.

trans-unit.source: And for all religion We have appointed a rite [of sacrifice] that they may mention the name of Allah over what He has provided for them of [sacrificial] animals. For your god is one God, so to Him submit. And, [O Muhammad], give good tidings to the humble [before their Lord]
trans-unit.target: A pre všetky náboženstva sme určili obrad [obeť] že zmieňujú meno Alah cez poskytol ich [obetné] zvierat. Tvoj Boh, je jeden Boh, tak ho podať. A [Mohamed], dať dobrú zvesť pokorným [pred ich pán]

trans-unit.source: Who, when Allah is mentioned, their hearts are fearful, and [to] the patient over what has afflicted them, and the establishers of prayer and those who spend from what We have provided them.
trans-unit.target: Kto, keď Alah je uvedené, ich srdcia sú hrozné, a [o] pacienta nad tým, čo má postihnutý, a zriaďovatelia modlitby a tí, ktorí trávia zo čo sme im poskytli.

trans-unit.source: And the camels and cattle We have appointed for you as among the symbols of Allah; for you therein is good. So mention the name of Allah upon them when lined up [for sacrifice]; and when they are [lifeless] on their sides, then eat from them and feed the needy and the beggar. Thus have We subjected them to you that you may be grateful.
trans-unit.target: A tiav a dobytka sme určili pre vás ako medzi symbolmi Alah; budete sa v ňom dobre. Tak spomenul meno Alah im pri zoradení [pre obeť]; a keď sú [mŕtve] na ich stranách, potom jesť od nich a potrebným a žobrák. Tak sme podrobili ich na vás, aby ste boli vďační.

trans-unit.source: Their meat will not reach Allah, nor will their blood, but what reaches Him is piety from you. Thus have We subjected them to you that you may glorify Allah for that [to] which He has guided you; and give good tidings to the doers of good.
trans-unit.target: Ich mäso nie dosiahnuť Alah, ani sa ich krv, ale to, čo ho dosiahne je zbožnosti od vás. Tak sme im podrobený vám že môže oslavovať Boha pre tento [k], ktoré má riadiť; a dať dobrú zvesť, konajte dobro.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah defends those who have believed. Indeed, Allah does not like everyone treacherous and ungrateful.
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti Boh chráni tých, ktorí uverili. Naozaj, Boh nemá rád každý zradné a nevďačný.

trans-unit.source: Permission [to fight] has been given to those who are being fought, because they were wronged. And indeed, Allah is competent to give them victory.
trans-unit.target: Povolenie [Ak chcete bojovať] bol daný tým, ktorí sú bojoval, pretože oni boli poškodené. A skutočne, Alah je kompetentný im víťazstvo.

trans-unit.source: [They are] those who have been evicted from their homes without right - only because they say, "Our Lord is Allah." And were it not that Allah checks the people, some by means of others, there would have been demolished monasteries, churches, synagogues, and mosques in which the name of Allah is much mentioned. And Allah will surely support those who support Him. Indeed, Allah is Powerful and Exalted in Might.
trans-unit.target: [Sú] tých, ktorí už boli vysťahovaní zo svojich domovov bez pravej - len pretože oni hovoria, "náš Pán je Boh." A nebyť toho, že Alah kontroly ľudí, niektoré prostredníctvom iné, tam by boli zbúrané kláštory, kostoly, synagógy a mešity, v ktorom je oveľa uvedené meno Alah. A Boh iste podporí tých, ktorí ho podporujú. Boh je naozaj mocný a postáv by.

trans-unit.source: [And they are] those who, if We give them authority in the land, establish prayer and give zakah and enjoin what is right and forbid what is wrong. And to Allah belongs the outcome of [all] matters.
trans-unit.target: [A] tých, ktorí, keď sme im úrad v krajine, vytvoriť modlitba a dať Zakát a nariaďuje, čo je správne a chráň, čo je zle. A Bohu patrí výsledku [všetky] záležitosti.

trans-unit.source: And if they deny you, [O Muhammad] - so, before them, did the people of Noah and 'Aad and Thamud deny [their prophets],
trans-unit.target: A ak ste [Mohamed] - popierajú, pred nimi, rovnako tak ľudia Noah a "Aad a Thamud poprieť [ich proroci],

trans-unit.source: And the people of Abraham and the people of Lot
trans-unit.target: A ľudia z Abraham a ľudia veľa

trans-unit.source: And the inhabitants of Madyan. And Moses was denied, so I prolonged enjoyment for the disbelievers; then I seized them, and how [terrible] was My reproach.
trans-unit.target: A obyvateľov Madyan. A Moses bola zamietnutá, takže môžem predĺžiť potešenie pre neveriacim; potom som ich chytil, a ako [hrozné] bolo moje pohanenie.

trans-unit.source: And how many a city did We destroy while it was committing wrong - so it is [now] fallen into ruin - and [how many] an abandoned well and [how many] a lofty palace.
trans-unit.target: A koľko mesto si môžeme zničiť, zatiaľ čo to sa dopúšťa zle - tak to je teraz] padol do skazy - a [počet] opustené dobre a [počet] vznešené palác.

trans-unit.source: So have they not traveled through the earth and have hearts by which to reason and ears by which to hear? For indeed, it is not eyes that are blinded, but blinded are the hearts which are within the breasts.
trans-unit.target: Tak už nie cestoval cez zem a majú srdce ktoré dôvod a uši, ktoré počuť? V skutočnosti to nie je oči, ktoré sú zaslepení, ale oslepený v srdciach, ktoré spadajú pod prsiami.

trans-unit.source: And they urge you to hasten the punishment. But Allah will never fail in His promise. And indeed, a day with your Lord is like a thousand years of those which you count.
trans-unit.target: A ich žiadame, aby ste urýchlili trest. Ale Boh sa nikdy nepodarí v jeho sľub. A skutočne, deň váš pán je ako tisíc rokov, ktoré sa môžete spoľahnúť.

trans-unit.source: And for how many a city did I prolong enjoyment while it was committing wrong. Then I seized it, and to Me is the [final] destination.
trans-unit.target: A za koľko mesto urobil som predĺžiť potešenie zatiaľ čo to sa dopúšťa zle. Potom to chytil, a pre mňa je [konečné] miesto určenia.

trans-unit.source: Say, "O people, I am only to you a clear warner."
trans-unit.target: Povedať, "O ľudí, ja som len vám jasné warner."

trans-unit.source: And those who have believed and done righteous deeds - for them is forgiveness and noble provision.
trans-unit.target: A tí, ktorí uverili a urobil spravodlivé skutky - pre nich je odpustenie a ušľachtilý ustanovenie.

trans-unit.source: But the ones who strove against Our verses, [seeking] to cause failure - those are the companions of Hellfire.
trans-unit.target: Ale tí, ktorí sa usiloval proti našej verše [Hľadám] spôsobiť zlyhanie - tie sú spoločníci Hellfire.

trans-unit.source: And We did not send before you any messenger or prophet except that when he spoke [or recited], Satan threw into it [some misunderstanding]. But Allah abolishes that which Satan throws in; then Allah makes precise His verses. And Allah is Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: A sme neposlal predtým, než akýkoľvek messenger alebo proroka okrem toho, že keď on hovoril [alebo recitovali], Satan hodil do nej [niektoré nedorozumenia]. Ale Boh ruší to, čo Satan hodí; potom Boh robí presné jeho verše. A Allah je znalosť a múdry.

trans-unit.source: [That is] so He may make what Satan throws in a trial for those within whose hearts is disease and those hard of heart. And indeed, the wrongdoers are in extreme dissension.
trans-unit.target: [Je] tak on môže robiť čo Satan hádže v súdnom konaní pre tých, v rámci ktorého srdce je choroba a tie tvrdé srdce. A skutočne, zloèinci sú extrémne nezhody.

trans-unit.source: And so those who were given knowledge may know that it is the truth from your Lord and [therefore] believe in it, and their hearts humbly submit to it. And indeed is Allah the Guide of those who have believed to a straight path.
trans-unit.target: A tak tí, ktorí dostali vedomosti môže vedieť, že to je pravda od svojho pána a [preto] veriť v to a ich srdcia pokorne predložiť. A skutočne je Alah sprievodca priamu cestu tých, ktorí uverili.

trans-unit.source: But those who disbelieve will not cease to be in doubt of it until the Hour comes upon them unexpectedly or there comes to them the punishment of a barren Day.
trans-unit.target: Ale tí, ktorí neveria neprestanú byť na pochybách o tom, kým hodinu príde na nich nečakane, alebo príde k nim trest neplodné dni.

trans-unit.source: [All] sovereignty that Day is for Allah; He will judge between them. So they who believed and did righteous deeds will be in the Gardens of Pleasure.
trans-unit.target: [Všetky] suverenity, ktorý deň je pre Boha; Súdiť medzi nimi. Takže kto veril, a urobil spravodlivé skutky budú v záhrade potešenie.

trans-unit.source: And they who disbelieved and denied Our signs - for those there will be a humiliating punishment.
trans-unit.target: A oni, kto pochyboval, a poprieť naše značky - tým, že bude poni ujúce tresty.

trans-unit.source: And those who emigrated for the cause of Allah and then were killed or died - Allah will surely provide for them a good provision. And indeed, it is Allah who is the best of providers.
trans-unit.target: A tých, ktorí emigrovali za príčinu Alah a potom boli zabití alebo zomrel - Alah určite poskytne im dobrý ustanovenia. A naozaj, je to Boh, ktorý je najlepší poskytovateľa.

trans-unit.source: He will surely cause them to enter an entrance with which they will be pleased, and indeed, Allah is Knowing and Forbearing.
trans-unit.target: On určite spôsobí im vstúpiť vchodom, s ktorými budú mať radosť, a naozaj, Alah je znalosť a Forbearing.

trans-unit.source: That [is so]. And whoever responds [to injustice] with the equivalent of that with which he was harmed and then is tyrannized - Allah will surely aid him. Indeed, Allah is Pardoning and Forgiving.
trans-unit.target: Že [je to]. A ten, kto zodpovedá [bezprávie] s ekvivalentom že s ktorým on bol poškodený a potom sa chrbtoch - Alah určite pomôže mu. Boh je naozaj Pardoning a odpúšťajúci.

trans-unit.source: That is because Allah causes the night to enter the day and causes the day to enter the night and because Allah is Hearing and Seeing.
trans-unit.target: To je, pretože Alah spôsobuje v noci do dňa a spôsobuje dňom do noci a pretože Alah je sluch, a vidieť.

trans-unit.source: That is because Allah is the Truth, and that which they call upon other than Him is falsehood, and because Allah is the Most High, the Grand.
trans-unit.target: To je preto, že Boh je pravda a to, čo hovoria na iného, než ho je lož, a preto Alah je Most High, Grand.

trans-unit.source: Do you not see that Allah has sent down rain from the sky and the earth becomes green? Indeed, Allah is Subtle and Acquainted.
trans-unit.target: Nie vidíte že Alah má zoslal dážď z neba a Zeme sa stáva zelená? Alah je skutočne jemné a Acquainted.

trans-unit.source: To Him belongs what is in the heavens and what is on the earth. And indeed, Allah is the Free of need, the Praiseworthy.
trans-unit.target: K nemu patrí, čo je v nebesiach a čo je na zemi. A skutočne, Alah je bez potreby Praiseworthy.

trans-unit.source: Do you not see that Allah has subjected to you whatever is on the earth and the ships which run through the sea by His command? And He restrains the sky from falling upon the earth, unless by His permission. Indeed Allah, to the people, is Kind and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Nie ste vidieť, že Alah vám vystavené, čo je na zemi a lode, ktoré beží cez more jeho príkazom? A on zadržiava neba pred pádom na zem, ak jeho zvolením. Naozaj Boh k ľuďom, je láskavý a Milosrdných.

trans-unit.source: And He is the one who gave you life; then He causes you to die and then will [again] give you life. Indeed, mankind is ungrateful.
trans-unit.target: A on je ten, ktorý vám dal život; potom mu spôsobí, že budete zomrieť a potom bude [znova] vám život. Samozrejme, ľudstvo je nevďačný.

trans-unit.source: For every religion We have appointed rites which they perform. So, [O Muhammad], let the disbelievers not contend with you over the matter but invite them to your Lord. Indeed, you are upon straight guidance.
trans-unit.target: Pre každé náboženstvo sme určili obrady, ktoré vykonávajú. Takže nech [Mohamed], neveriacim nie zápasiť s vami nad hmotou, ale pozvať do svojho pána. V skutočnosti ste na rovné vedenie.

trans-unit.source: And if they dispute with you, then say, "Allah is most knowing of what you do.
trans-unit.target: A ak sa spor s vami, potom povedal, "Alah je väčšina vedieť, čo robíte.

trans-unit.source: Allah will judge between you on the Day of Resurrection concerning that over which you used to differ."
trans-unit.target: Boh bude súdiť medzi vami na deň vzkriesenia, ktoré ste sa líšia o."

trans-unit.source: Do you not know that Allah knows what is in the heaven and earth? Indeed, that is in a Record. Indeed that, for Allah, is easy.
trans-unit.target: To neviete že Alah vie, čo je na nebi i na zemi? Samozrejme, že sa to v zázname. V skutočnosti, že na Alaha, je ľahké.

trans-unit.source: And they worship besides Allah that for which He has not sent down authority and that of which they have no knowledge. And there will not be for the wrongdoers any helper.
trans-unit.target: A uctievajú okrem Alaha, že ktoré nie poslal orgán a ktoré z nich majú vedomosti. A sa nepoužije pre zloèinci žiadne pomocné.

trans-unit.source: And when Our verses are recited to them as clear evidences, you recognize in the faces of those who disbelieve disapproval. They are almost on the verge of assaulting those who recite to them Our verses. Say, "Then shall I inform you of [what is] worse than that? [It is] the Fire which Allah has promised those who disbelieve, and wretched is the destination."
trans-unit.target: A keď naše verše sa prednáša im ako jasné dôkazy, spoznáte v tvárach tých, ktorí neveriť nesúhlas. Sú takmer na pokraji napadnutie osoby recitovať im naše verše. Povedal, "potom informuje o [] horšie ako? [Je] požiaru, ktorý Boh prisľúbil tým, ktorí neveria, a úbohý je miesto. "

trans-unit.source: O people, an example is presented, so listen to it. Indeed, those you invoke besides Allah will never create [as much as] a fly, even if they gathered together for that purpose. And if the fly should steal away from them a [tiny] thing, they could not recover it from him. Weak are the pursuer and pursued.
trans-unit.target: O ľudí, napríklad, je tak počúvať. V skutočnosti tie vyvolaní okrem Alah nikdy vytvoriť [rovnako ako] lietať, a to aj v prípade, že sa zhromaždili na tento účel. A ak fly by kradnúť od nich [drobné] vec, oni by mohli obnoviť to od neho. Slabé sú prenasledovateľ a sledované.

trans-unit.source: They have not appraised Allah with true appraisal. Indeed, Allah is Powerful and Exalted in Might.
trans-unit.target: Oni majú nie hodnotí Alah s skutočný zhodnotenia. Boh je naozaj mocný a postáv by.

trans-unit.source: Allah chooses from the angels messengers and from the people. Indeed, Allah is Hearing and Seeing.
trans-unit.target: Alah vyberie z poslov Anjeli a ľudia. Vskutku, Alah je vypočutie a videnie.

trans-unit.source: He knows what is [presently] before them and what will be after them. And to Allah will be returned [all] matters.
trans-unit.target: On vie, čo momentálne [] pred nimi, a čo bude po nich. A Allah sa vrátiť [všetko] veciach.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, bow and prostrate and worship your Lord and do good - that you may succeed.
trans-unit.target: O vás, ktorí ste uverili, lúk a přemoci a uctievať svojho pána a dobro - že môže uspieť.

trans-unit.source: And strive for Allah with the striving due to Him. He has chosen you and has not placed upon you in the religion any difficulty. [It is] the religion of your father, Abraham. Allah named you "Muslims" before [in former scriptures] and in this [revelation] that the Messenger may be a witness over you and you may be witnesses over the people. So establish prayer and give zakah and hold fast to Allah. He is your protector; and excellent is the protector, and excellent is the helper.
trans-unit.target: A usilovať sa o Alah s usilovať kvôli nemu. Vybral si a nepodal na vás v náboženstve žiadne ťažkosti. [Je] náboženstva svojho otca Abraháma. Alah pomenovaný "Moslimov" pred [v bývalej písma] a v tejto [zjavenia], že posol môže byť svedkom viac a vy možno svedkov nad ľuďmi. Takže vytvoriť modlitba a dať Zakát a držte sa Alah. On je váš ochranca; Výborný je ochranca a výborný je Pomocník.

trans-unit.source: Certainly will the believers have succeeded:
trans-unit.target: Určite sa podarilo veriacich:

trans-unit.source: They who are during their prayer humbly submissive
trans-unit.target: Tí, ktorí sú počas ich modlitba pokorne submisívny

trans-unit.source: And they who turn away from ill speech
trans-unit.target: A oni, kto sa odvráti od zlého reči

trans-unit.source: And they who are observant of zakah
trans-unit.target: A tí, ktorí sú pozorný Zakát

trans-unit.source: And they who guard their private parts
trans-unit.target: A tí, ktorí chránia ich prirodzení

trans-unit.source: Except from their wives or those their right hands possess, for indeed, they will not be blamed -
trans-unit.target: Okrem toho od svojej manželky, alebo tie majú pravej ruky na skutočnosti, že bude byť obviňovaný-

trans-unit.source: But whoever seeks beyond that, then those are the transgressors -
trans-unit.target: Ale ten, kto hľadá ďalej, tie sú potom previnilcov-

trans-unit.source: And they who are to their trusts and their promises attentive
trans-unit.target: A tí, ktorí sú ich fondy a ich sľuby pozorný

trans-unit.source: And they who carefully maintain their prayers -
trans-unit.target: A oni, ktorí dôkladne udržujú svoje modlitby-

trans-unit.source: Those are the inheritors
trans-unit.target: Tie sú dedičmi

trans-unit.source: Who will inherit al-Firdaus. They will abide therein eternally.
trans-unit.target: Kto zdedí al-Firdaus. Dodržia sa v ňom naveky.

trans-unit.source: And certainly did We create man from an extract of clay.
trans-unit.target: A určite sme vytvorili muž z úryvku z hliny.

trans-unit.source: Then We placed him as a sperm-drop in a firm lodging.
trans-unit.target: Potom sme umiestnili ho ako spermií pokles pevné zloženie.

trans-unit.source: Then We made the sperm-drop into a clinging clot, and We made the clot into a lump [of flesh], and We made [from] the lump, bones, and We covered the bones with flesh; then We developed him into another creation. So blessed is Allah, the best of creators.
trans-unit.target: Potom sme sa spermie-drop zrazeniny usadené, a sme sa zrazeniny do paušálne [mäso], a urobili sme [z] paušálne, kosti, a ktoré sme kosti s telom; potom sme vyvinuli ho do ďalšej tvorbe. Tak požehnaný je Alah, najlepšie z tvorcov.

trans-unit.source: Then indeed, after that you are to die.
trans-unit.target: Vskutku, potom potom, čo ste zomrieť.

trans-unit.source: Then indeed you, on the Day of Resurrection, will be resurrected.
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti potom, na deň vzkriesenia, budú vzkriesení.

trans-unit.source: And We have created above you seven layered heavens, and never have We been of [Our] creation unaware.
trans-unit.target: Vytvorili sme nad vami sedem vrstiev neba a nikdy sme neboli [naše] tvorby nevie.

trans-unit.source: And We have sent down rain from the sky in a measured amount and settled it in the earth. And indeed, We are Able to take it away.
trans-unit.target: A máme zoslal dážď z neba nameraná hodnota a usadili na zemi. A naozaj, sme schopní vziať to preč.

trans-unit.source: And We brought forth for you thereby gardens of palm trees and grapevines in which for you are abundant fruits and from which you eat.
trans-unit.target: A sme vyviedol si tým záhradami s palmami a vínnej révy, ktoré pre vás sú hojné ovocie a čo jete.

trans-unit.source: And [We brought forth] a tree issuing from Mount Sinai which produces oil and food for those who eat.
trans-unit.target: A [sme vyviedol] strom vydaním z Mount Sinai, ktorý produkuje ropy a potravín pre tých, ktorí jedia.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, for you in livestock is a lesson. We give you drink from that which is in their bellies, and for you in them are numerous benefits, and from them you eat.
trans-unit.target: A naozaj, pre vás v hospodárskych zvierat je poučenie. Dávame pijete z toho, čo je v bruchu, a ste v nich sú početné výhody, a z nich budete jesť.

trans-unit.source: And upon them and on ships you are carried.
trans-unit.target: A na ne a na lodiach sú vykonávané.

trans-unit.source: And We had certainly sent Noah to his people, and he said, "O my people, worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him; then will you not fear Him?"
trans-unit.target: Určite sme poslal Noah na svoj ľud a povedal: "O môj ľud, uctievanie Boha; budete mať žiadne božstvo okrem neho; potom sa ste sa ho bojí?"

trans-unit.source: But the eminent among those who disbelieved from his people said, "This is not but a man like yourselves who wishes to take precedence over you; and if Allah had willed [to send a messenger], He would have sent down angels. We have not heard of this among our forefathers.
trans-unit.target: Ale významných medzi tými, kto pochyboval zo svojho ľudu, povedal, "nie je to ale človek ako sami, kto chce mať prednosť pred a ak Boh mal vôľou [zaslať posol], by poslali dole anjelov. Sme počuli to medzi našich predkov.

trans-unit.source: He is not but a man possessed with madness, so wait concerning him for a time."
trans-unit.target: Nie je ale človek posadnutý šialenstvo, tak Počkajte, ktoré sa ho týkajú na dobu."

trans-unit.source: [Noah] said, "My Lord, support me because they have denied me."
trans-unit.target: [Noah] povedal: "Môj pane, podporu mi pretože oni majú odmietnutý ma."

trans-unit.source: So We inspired to him, "Construct the ship under Our observation, and Our inspiration, and when Our command comes and the oven overflows, put into the ship from each [creature] two mates and your family, except those for whom the decree [of destruction] has proceeded. And do not address Me concerning those who have wronged; indeed, they are to be drowned.
trans-unit.target: Tak sme sa inšpirovať ho, "postaviť loď, podľa našich pozorovaní a naše inšpirácie, a keď príde náš príkaz a rúra pretečeniu, dať do lode z každej [tvor] dvaja kamaráti a rodinou, s výnimkou tých, pre ktorých dekrét [ničenia] postupovala. A neriešia mi o tých, ktorí ublížili; v skutočnosti sa utopil.

trans-unit.source: And when you have boarded the ship, you and those with you, then say, 'Praise to Allah who has saved us from the wrongdoing people.'
trans-unit.target: A keď majú palubu lode, ty a tie s vami, potom povedal, "Chvála Bohu, ktorý nás zachránil od ľudí previnenie."

trans-unit.source: And say, 'My Lord, let me land at a blessed landing place, and You are the best to accommodate [us].' "
trans-unit.target: A povedal: "môj pán, nech ma pozemok požehnaný vstupné miesto, a tie sú najlepšie vyhovieť [nás]." "

trans-unit.source: Indeed in that are signs, and indeed, We are ever testing [Our servants].
trans-unit.target: Naozaj v tom, že sa príznaky, a v skutočnosti stále testujeme [našich zamestnancov].

trans-unit.source: Then We produced after them a generation of others.
trans-unit.target: Potom sme vyrobili po nich ďalšie generácie.

trans-unit.source: And We sent among them a messenger from themselves, [saying], "Worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him; then will you not fear Him?"
trans-unit.target: A poslali sme medzi nimi posol od seba, [povedať], "uctievanie Boha; budete mať žiadne božstvo okrem neho; potom sa ste sa ho bojí?"

trans-unit.source: And the eminent among his people who disbelieved and denied the meeting of the Hereafter while We had given them luxury in the worldly life said, "This is not but a man like yourselves. He eats of that from which you eat and drinks of what you drink.
trans-unit.target: A významných medzi jeho ľud, kto pochyboval a poprel stretnutie ďalej, keď sme im dal luxus v pozemský život povedal: "to nie je, ale človek ako vy. Sníva, že odkiaľ budete jesť a pije čo pijete.

trans-unit.source: And if you should obey a man like yourselves, indeed, you would then be losers.
trans-unit.target: A ak ste dodržiavali človek ako vy, v skutočnosti ste potom by porazení.

trans-unit.source: Does he promise you that when you have died and become dust and bones that you will be brought forth [once more]?
trans-unit.target: Robí mu sľúbiť, že keď zomrel a prachu a kosti, ktoré budete presunutí späť [raz]?

trans-unit.source: How far, how far, is that which you are promised.
trans-unit.target: Ako ďaleko, ako ďaleko je to, čo ste sľúbil.

trans-unit.source: Life is not but our worldly life - we die and live, but we will not be resurrected.
trans-unit.target: Život nie je, ale náš pozemský život - môžeme umrieť a žiť, ale sme nie byť vzkriesený.

trans-unit.source: He is not but a man who has invented a lie about Allah, and we will not believe him."
trans-unit.target: On nie je, ale človeka, ktorý vymyslel lož o Boha a sme neverili mu."

trans-unit.source: He said, "My Lord, support me because they have denied me."
trans-unit.target: On povedal: "Môj pane, podporu mi pretože oni majú odmietnutý ma."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "After a little, they will surely become regretful."
trans-unit.target: [Allah] povedal, "potom trochu, určite bude poľutovaniahodné."

trans-unit.source: So the shriek seized them in truth, and We made them as [plant] stubble. Then away with the wrongdoing people.
trans-unit.target: Takže výkrik zachyteného v pravde, a urobili sme im ako [závod] strnisko. Potom preč s ľuďmi previnenie.

trans-unit.source: Then We produced after them other generations.
trans-unit.target: Potom sme vyrobili po nich ďalších generácií.

trans-unit.source: No nation will precede its time [of termination], nor will they remain [thereafter].
trans-unit.target: Žiadny národ bude predchádzať jeho čas [zrušenie], ani oni zostanú [potom].

trans-unit.source: Then We sent Our messengers in succession. Every time there came to a nation its messenger, they denied him, so We made them follow one another [to destruction], and We made them narrations. So away with a people who do not believe.
trans-unit.target: Potom sme poslali naši poslovia za sebou. Zakaždým, keď tam prišiel k národu, jeho posol, popreli ho, tak sme sa ich dodržiavať jeden druhého [ničenia], a my sa im rozprávania. Takže preč s ľudí, ktorí neveria.

trans-unit.source: Then We sent Moses and his brother Aaron with Our signs and a clear authority
trans-unit.target: Potom sme poslali Moses a jeho brat Áron našich značiek a jasné orgánu

trans-unit.source: To Pharaoh and his establishment, but they were arrogant and were a haughty people.
trans-unit.target: Faraón a jeho zavedenie, ale boli arogantní a boli povýšene ľudí.

trans-unit.source: They said, "Should we believe two men like ourselves while their people are for us in servitude?"
trans-unit.target: Povedali, že "By sme presvedčení, dvaja muži ako sami ich ľudia sú pre nás v nevoľníctva?"

trans-unit.source: So they denied them and were of those destroyed.
trans-unit.target: Takže im odmietnutý a boli tie, ktoré sú zničené.

trans-unit.source: And We certainly gave Moses the Scripture that perhaps they would be guided.
trans-unit.target: A určite sme dali Moses písmo, že možno oni by sa mala riadiť.

trans-unit.source: And We made the son of Mary and his mother a sign and sheltered them within a high ground having level [areas] and flowing water.
trans-unit.target: A sme sa syn Márie a jeho matka znamenie a je chránené v rámci prevahu majú úroveň [oblasti] a tečúcej vody.

trans-unit.source: [Allah said], "O messengers, eat from the good foods and work righteousness. Indeed, I, of what you do, am Knowing.
trans-unit.target: [Allah povedal] "O poslov, jesť z dobrého jedla a fungovať spravodlivosť. V skutočnosti, čo robíte, som vedieť.

trans-unit.source: And indeed this, your religion, is one religion, and I am your Lord, so fear Me."
trans-unit.target: A naozaj je to vaše náboženstvo, jedno náboženstvo, a ja som váš pán tak strach ma."

trans-unit.source: But the people divided their religion among them into sects - each faction, in what it has, rejoicing.
trans-unit.target: Ale ľudí rozdeliť svoje náboženstvo medzi nimi do sekty - Každá frakcia, čo to má, raduje.

trans-unit.source: So leave them in their confusion for a time.
trans-unit.target: Nechajte ich v ich zámene čas.

trans-unit.source: Do they think that what We extend to them of wealth and children
trans-unit.target: Myslíte si myslia, že to, čo sme sa rozšíriť ich bohatstva a deti

trans-unit.source: Is [because] We hasten for them good things? Rather, they do not perceive.
trans-unit.target: Je [pretože] môžeme urýchliť ich dobré veci? Skôr, že nevnímajú.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, they who are apprehensive from fear of their Lord
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti tí, ktorí majú strach zo strachu o svojho pána

trans-unit.source: And they who believe in the signs of their Lord
trans-unit.target: A tí, ktorí veria v znamení svojho pána

trans-unit.source: And they who do not associate anything with their Lord
trans-unit.target: A tí, ktorí niečo nie spájať s svojho pána

trans-unit.source: And they who give what they give while their hearts are fearful because they will be returning to their Lord -
trans-unit.target: A tí, ktorí dávajú, čo dať, hoci ich srdce sa bojí, pretože sa bude vracať do svojho pána-

trans-unit.source: It is those who hasten to good deeds, and they outstrip [others] therein.
trans-unit.target: Je tých, ktorí urýchliť dobrých skutkov a že predstihnúť [others] v nej.

trans-unit.source: And We charge no soul except [with that within] its capacity, and with Us is a record which speaks with truth; and they will not be wronged.
trans-unit.target: A účtujeme dušu okrem [s tým v rámci] svojej kapacity a u nás je záznam, ktorý hovorí pravdu; a oni budú nie poškodené.

trans-unit.source: But their hearts are covered with confusion over this, and they have [evil] deeds besides disbelief which they are doing,
trans-unit.target: Ale ich srdcia sú pokryté zmätok nad tým, a oni majú [zlé] skutky okrem neveriacky, čo robia,

trans-unit.source: Until when We seize their affluent ones with punishment, at once they are crying [to Allah] for help.
trans-unit.target: Až keď sme využiť svojich bohatých tie s trestom, naraz ich plačú [aby Allah] o pomoc.

trans-unit.source: Do not cry out today. Indeed, by Us you will not be helped.
trans-unit.target: Neplač dnes. Vskutku, u nás budete nie pomohol.

trans-unit.source: My verses had already been recited to you, but you were turning back on your heels
trans-unit.target: Moje verše mal už boli prednášal na vás, ale boli ste sa obrátil na päty

trans-unit.source: In arrogance regarding it, conversing by night, speaking evil.
trans-unit.target: V arogancia, pokiaľ ide o to, konverzovať v noci, hovoriť zlo.

trans-unit.source: Then have they not reflected over the Qur'an, or has there come to them that which had not come to their forefathers?
trans-unit.target: Potom sa nie odráža cez Korán, alebo sa tam prísť k nim, ktorý neprišiel k ich predkovia?

trans-unit.source: Or did they not know their Messenger, so they are toward him disacknowledging?
trans-unit.target: Alebo si nevedel ich Messenger, takže sú k nemu disacknowledging?

trans-unit.source: Or do they say, "In him is madness?" Rather, he brought them the truth, but most of them, to the truth, are averse.
trans-unit.target: Alebo si povedia, "v ňom je šialenstvo?" Skôr ten priviedol pravdu, ale väčšina z nich, k pravde, je odmietavý.

trans-unit.source: But if the Truth had followed their inclinations, the heavens and the earth and whoever is in them would have been ruined. Rather, We have brought them their message, but they, from their message, are turning away.
trans-unit.target: Ale ak pravdu mal nasledovať svoje sklony, neba a Zeme a ten, kto je v nich by boli v troskách. Skôr sme im priniesli svoje posolstvo, ale oni z ich správy sa odvrátil.

trans-unit.source: Or do you, [O Muhammad], ask them for payment? But the reward of your Lord is best, and He is the best of providers.
trans-unit.target: Alebo ste [Mohamed], je požiadať o platbu? Ale najlepšie je odmenou za svojho pána, a on je najlepšie poskytovateľov.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, you invite them to a straight path.
trans-unit.target: A skutočne vás pozvať na priamu cestu.

trans-unit.source: But indeed, those who do not believe in the Hereafter are deviating from the path.
trans-unit.target: Ale naozaj, tých, ktorí neveria v nižšie sa odchyľujú od cesty.

trans-unit.source: And even if We gave them mercy and removed what was upon them of affliction, they would persist in their transgression, wandering blindly.
trans-unit.target: A aj keď sme im dal milosť a odstránené, čo bolo na nich trápenie, oni by trvať na ich hriech, putovanie slepo.

trans-unit.source: And We had gripped them with suffering [as a warning], but they did not yield to their Lord, nor did they humbly supplicate, [and will continue thus]
trans-unit.target: A sme mali zvierala je s utrpením [ako varovanie], ale že nepriniesol do svojho pána, ani som sa pokorne snažně prosiť, [a tak pokračovať]

trans-unit.source: Until when We have opened before them a door of severe punishment, immediately they will be therein in despair.
trans-unit.target: Až keď sme otvorili pred nimi dvere prísne potrestanie, okamžite bude v nej v zúfalstve.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who produced for you hearing and vision and hearts; little are you grateful.
trans-unit.target: A to je ten, kto vyrába pre vás sluchu a zraku a srdce; trochu ste vďační.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who has multiplied you throughout the earth, and to Him you will be gathered.
trans-unit.target: Je to on, kto sa násobí po celej krajine a k nemu ste zhromaždili.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who gives life and causes death, and His is the alternation of the night and the day. Then will you not reason?
trans-unit.target: To je ten, ktorý dáva život a spôsobuje smrť a jeho je striedanie noci a dňa. Potom budete nie je dôvod?

trans-unit.source: Rather, they say like what the former peoples said.
trans-unit.target: Skôr hovoria, ako to, čo povedal bývalý obyvateľov.

trans-unit.source: They said, "When we have died and become dust and bones, are we indeed to be resurrected?
trans-unit.target: Oni povedali: "keď sme zomreli a prachu a kosti, sme v skutočnosti byť vzkriesený?

trans-unit.source: We have been promised this, we and our forefathers, before; this is not but legends of the former peoples."
trans-unit.target: Sme sľúbili sme a našich predkov. to nie je ale legendy bývalého národov."

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "To whom belongs the earth and whoever is in it, if you should know?"
trans-unit.target: Povedať, [Mohamed], "Komu patri Zeme a ten, kto je v ňom, ak by ste mali vedieť?"

trans-unit.source: They will say, "To Allah." Say, "Then will you not remember?"
trans-unit.target: Povedia "K Bohu." Napríklad: "Potom si zapamätá?"

trans-unit.source: Say, "Who is Lord of the seven heavens and Lord of the Great Throne?"
trans-unit.target: Povedať: "Kto je pán zo siedmich nebies a pán veľký trón?"

trans-unit.source: They will say, "[They belong] to Allah." Say, "Then will you not fear Him?"
trans-unit.target: Oni povedia: "[patrí] do Boha." Napríklad: "Potom sa ste sa ho bojí?"

trans-unit.source: Say, "In whose hand is the realm of all things - and He protects while none can protect against Him - if you should know?"
trans-unit.target: Povedal, "v ktorého ruke je realm všetkých vecí - a chráni Hoci žiadny môžete chrániť proti nemu - ak by ste mali vedieť?"

trans-unit.source: They will say, "[All belongs] to Allah." Say, "Then how are you deluded?"
trans-unit.target: Oni povedia: "[všetky patrí] Bohu." Povedal, "potom ako ste pošetilou?"

trans-unit.source: Rather, We have brought them the truth, and indeed they are liars.
trans-unit.target: Skôr sme priniesli im pravdu, a v skutočnosti sú klamári.

trans-unit.source: Allah has not taken any son, nor has there ever been with Him any deity. [If there had been], then each deity would have taken what it created, and some of them would have sought to overcome others. Exalted is Allah above what they describe [concerning Him].
trans-unit.target: Alah neprijal žiadne syna, ani tam bol niekedy s ním žiadne božstvo. [Ak došlo k], potom každé božstvo by vzali to, čo vytvoril, a niektoré z nich by sa snažili prekonať ostatných. Vyvýšený je Alah vyššie čo sa opísať [týkajúce sa ním].

trans-unit.source: [He is] Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, so high is He above what they associate [with Him].
trans-unit.target: [Je] Vševedúci neviditeľné a svedkom, tak vysoko, je to nad čo spájajú [s ním].

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "My Lord, if You should show me that which they are promised,
trans-unit.target: Napríklad: [Mohamed], "môj pán, ak by mi ukázal, ktoré sú sľúbil,

trans-unit.source: My Lord, then do not place me among the wrongdoing people."
trans-unit.target: Môj pán, potom Neumiestňujte mi medzi ľuďmi previnenie."

trans-unit.source: And indeed, We are able to show you what We have promised them.
trans-unit.target: A naozaj, sme schopní vám ukázať, čo sme sľúbili im.

trans-unit.source: Repel, by [means of] what is best, [their] evil. We are most knowing of what they describe.
trans-unit.target: Odpudzujú prostriedkami [z] čo je najlepšie, [ich] zla. Sme, že väčšina vedomím toho, čo oni popisujú.

trans-unit.source: And say, "My Lord, I seek refuge in You from the incitements of the devils,
trans-unit.target: A hovoria: "môj pane, som hľadať útočisko v sebe od stimuly diabli,

trans-unit.source: And I seek refuge in You, my Lord, lest they be present with me."
trans-unit.target: A som hľadať útočisko v tebe, môj pane, inak sa so mnou."

trans-unit.source: [For such is the state of the disbelievers], until, when death comes to one of them, he says, "My Lord, send me back
trans-unit.target: [Pre taký štát neveriacim], až keď smrť príde k jednému z nich, hovorí: "môj pane, Pošli mi späť

trans-unit.source: That I might do righteousness in that which I left behind." No! It is only a word he is saying; and behind them is a barrier until the Day they are resurrected.
trans-unit.target: Že som mohol urobiť spravodlivosti, ktoré po sebe zanechal." nie! Je to len slovo, hovorí; a za nimi je prekážkou dovtedy, kým sú vstal z mŕtvych.

trans-unit.source: So when the Horn is blown, no relationship will there be among them that Day, nor will they ask about one another.
trans-unit.target: Takže keď roh je fúkané, žiadny vzťah bude medzi nimi tento deň, ani sa žiadajú o jeden druhého.

trans-unit.source: And those whose scales are heavy [with good deeds] - it is they who are the successful.
trans-unit.target: A tých, ktorých váhy sú ťažké [s dobrými skutkami] - je to oni, ktorí sú úspešní.

trans-unit.source: But those whose scales are light - those are the ones who have lost their souls, [being] in Hell, abiding eternally.
trans-unit.target: Ale tí, ktorých váhy sú svetlo - to sú tie, ktorí stratili ich duše, [je] v pekle, rešpektujúce naveky.

trans-unit.source: The Fire will sear their faces, and they therein will have taut smiles.
trans-unit.target: Oheň sa spáliť ich tváre, a v ňom budú mať napnuté úsmevy.

trans-unit.source: [It will be said]. "Were not My verses recited to you and you used to deny them?"
trans-unit.target: [To bude povedal:]. "Boli nie moje verše prednášal na vás a ste sa ich poprieť?"

trans-unit.source: They will say, "Our Lord, our wretchedness overcame us, and we were a people astray.
trans-unit.target: Povedia, "náš Pán naše trápenie prekonal nás, a boli sme ľudí z cesty.

trans-unit.source: Our Lord, remove us from it, and if we were to return [to evil], we would indeed be wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: Náš Pán nás z neho odstraňovať, a keď sme sa vrátiť [zlo], naozaj by sme zloèinci."

trans-unit.source: He will say, "Remain despised therein and do not speak to Me.
trans-unit.target: On povie, "zostať pohŕdal v ňom a hovoriť na mňa.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, there was a party of My servants who said, 'Our Lord, we have believed, so forgive us and have mercy upon us, and You are the best of the merciful.'
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti, tam bol stranou mojich zamestnancov, ktorý povedal: "Náš Pán, sme uverili, tak odpusť nám a zmiluj sa nad nami a ste najlepšie milosrdný."

trans-unit.source: But you took them in mockery to the point that they made you forget My remembrance, and you used to laugh at them.
trans-unit.target: Ale vzal výsmech do tej miery, že ich zabudnete hanbím, a budete sa smiať na ne.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, I have rewarded them this Day for their patient endurance - that they are the attainers [of success]."
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti som si odmenený im tento deň za ich trpezlivosť - že sú attainers [na úspech]."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] will say, "How long did you remain on earth in number of years?"
trans-unit.target: [Allah] bude hovoriť: "ako dlho to zostane na zemi vo niekoľko rokov?"

trans-unit.source: They will say, "We remained a day or part of a day; ask those who enumerate."
trans-unit.target: Povedia, "zostali sme deň alebo časť dňa; Opýtajte sa tých, ktorí sa enumerovať."

trans-unit.source: He will say, "You stayed not but a little - if only you had known.
trans-unit.target: On povie, "ste zostal ale trochu -, len keby si poznal.

trans-unit.source: Then did you think that We created you uselessly and that to Us you would not be returned?"
trans-unit.target: Potom si myslíte, že sme vytvorili ste zbytočne a že s nami ste by nevrátia?"

trans-unit.source: So exalted is Allah, the Sovereign, the Truth; there is no deity except Him, Lord of the Noble Throne.
trans-unit.target: Tak povýšil je Alah, suverénne, pravdu; Neexistuje žiadne božstvo okrem neho pána Noble trónu.

trans-unit.source: And whoever invokes besides Allah another deity for which he has no proof - then his account is only with his Lord. Indeed, the disbelievers will not succeed.
trans-unit.target: A ten, kto sa dovoláva okrem Alaha iného Božstva, pre ktoré nemá žiaden dôkaz - potom jeho účet je len svojho pána. Vskutku, neveriacim nepodarí.

trans-unit.source: And, [O Muhammad], say, "My Lord, forgive and have mercy, and You are the best of the merciful."
trans-unit.target: A [Mohamed], povedzme, "môj pane, odpusť a zmiluj sa a ste najlepšie milosrdný."

trans-unit.source: [This is] a surah which We have sent down and made [that within it] obligatory and revealed therein verses of clear evidence that you might remember.
trans-unit.target: [Je] surah, ktoré sme zoslal a [že v ňom] povinné a odhalila v ňom verše jasný dôkaz, že ste si možno spomeniete.

trans-unit.source: The [unmarried] woman or [unmarried] man found guilty of sexual intercourse - lash each one of them with a hundred lashes, and do not be taken by pity for them in the religion of Allah, if you should believe in Allah and the Last Day. And let a group of the believers witness their punishment.
trans-unit.target: [Slobodné] žena alebo [slobodné] muž uznaný vinným z pohlavného styku - lash každý jeden z nich s sto riasy a neberú škoda pre nich v náboženstvu Alaha, ak by ste mali veriť v Boha a v posledný deň. A nechať skupinu veriaci svedkom ich trest.

trans-unit.source: The fornicator does not marry except a [female] fornicator or polytheist, and none marries her except a fornicator or a polytheist, and that has been made unlawful to the believers.
trans-unit.target: Smilník oženiť s výnimkou [žena] smilník, alebo polytheist, nikto ju vezme okrem smilník alebo polytheist a to bolo protiprávne veriacich.

trans-unit.source: And those who accuse chaste women and then do not produce four witnesses - lash them with eighty lashes and do not accept from them testimony ever after. And those are the defiantly disobedient,
trans-unit.target: A tí, ktorí obviňujú cudné ženy a potom neprodukujú štyroch svedkov - bič, s osemdesiat riasy a neprijíma od nich svedectvo naveky. A tie sú vyzývavé neposlušný,

trans-unit.source: Except for those who repent thereafter and reform, for indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: S výnimkou tých, ktorí pokánie potom a reformy, v skutočnosti Boh je odpúšťajúci a Milosrdných.

trans-unit.source: And those who accuse their wives [of adultery] and have no witnesses except themselves - then the witness of one of them [shall be] four testimonies [swearing] by Allah that indeed, he is of the truthful.
trans-unit.target: A tí, ktorí obviňujú svoje manželky [z cudzoložstva] a žiadni svedkovia okrem seba - potom svedectvo jedného z nich [bude] štyri svedectvo [] podľa sľubu Alah, že v skutočnosti je pravdivé.

trans-unit.source: And the fifth [oath will be] that the curse of Allah be upon him if he should be among the liars.
trans-unit.target: A piaty [prísaha bude] že prekliatie Alah sa na neho, ak by mal byť medzi klamárov.

trans-unit.source: But it will prevent punishment from her if she gives four testimonies [swearing] by Allah that indeed, he is of the liars.
trans-unit.target: Ale to zabráni trest od nej, ak ona dáva štyri svedectvo [] podľa sľubu Alah, že v skutočnosti je klamár.

trans-unit.source: And the fifth [oath will be] that the wrath of Allah be upon her if he was of the truthful.
trans-unit.target: A piaty [prísaha bude] že hnev Alah sa na ňu ak on bol pravdivý.

trans-unit.source: And if not for the favor of Allah upon you and His mercy... and because Allah is Accepting of repentance and Wise.
trans-unit.target: A ak nie je na prospech Alah vám a jeho milosrdenstvo... a preto Alah je akceptovanie pokánia a múdry.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who came with falsehood are a group among you. Do not think it bad for you; rather it is good for you. For every person among them is what [punishment] he has earned from the sin, and he who took upon himself the greater portion thereof - for him is a great punishment.
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti tí, ktorí prišli s lož sú skupinou medzi vami. Nemyslím, že je zlé pre vás; skôr je to pre vás dobré. Pre každého z nich je aký [trest] získal od hriechu, a ten, kto vzal na seba väčšiu časť jej - pre neho je veľký trest.

trans-unit.source: Why, when you heard it, did not the believing men and believing women think good of one another and say, "This is an obvious falsehood"?
trans-unit.target: Prečo, keď to počul, robil nie veriť mužov a veriť ženy myslia dobre navzájom a povedať: "Toto je zrejmý lož"?

trans-unit.source: Why did they [who slandered] not produce for it four witnesses? And when they do not produce the witnesses, then it is they, in the sight of Allah, who are the liars.
trans-unit.target: Prečo oni, [ktorí ohovárala] nepriniesla to štyroch svedkov? A keď sa nevytvárajú svedkov, potom, je v očiach Alah, ktorí sú klamári.

trans-unit.source: And if it had not been for the favor of Allah upon you and His mercy in this world and the Hereafter, you would have been touched for that [lie] in which you were involved by a great punishment
trans-unit.target: A keby to bolo nie pre priazeň Alah vám a jeho milosrdenstvo v tomto svete a ďalej, že by bol dojatý, že [lož] v ktorej boli zapojené v veľký trest

trans-unit.source: When you received it with your tongues and said with your mouths that of which you had no knowledge and thought it was insignificant while it was, in the sight of Allah, tremendous.
trans-unit.target: Keď dostal s Tvojou jazyky a povedal vaše ústa, ktoré ste nemali vedomosti a myslel, že to je nepodstatný, keď to bolo v očiach Alah, obrovský.

trans-unit.source: And why, when you heard it, did you not say, "It is not for us to speak of this. Exalted are You, [O Allah]; this is a great slander"?
trans-unit.target: A prečo, keď ste sa dozvedeli, ste nepovedal, "nie je pre nás hovoriť to. Vyvýšený ste, [Ó Alláhu]; to je skvelé ohovárania"?

trans-unit.source: Allah warns you against returning to the likes of this [conduct], ever, if you should be believers.
trans-unit.target: Alah varuje pred návratom do rád tento [riadenia], niekedy, ak by ste mali byť veriaci.

trans-unit.source: And Allah makes clear to you the verses, and Allah is Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: Boh jasne vám verše a Alah je znalosť a múdry.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who like that immorality should be spread [or publicized] among those who have believed will have a painful punishment in this world and the Hereafter. And Allah knows and you do not know.
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti tí, ktorí ako že nemorálnosť by sa mali šíriť [alebo propagoval] medzi tých, ktorí uverili bude mať bolestivé trest v tomto svete a ďalej. Alah vie a vy neviete.

trans-unit.source: And if it had not been for the favor of Allah upon you and His mercy... and because Allah is Kind and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: A keby to bolo nie pre priazeň Alah vám a jeho milosrdenstvo... a pretože Alah je láskavý a Milosrdných.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, do not follow the footsteps of Satan. And whoever follows the footsteps of Satan - indeed, he enjoins immorality and wrongdoing. And if not for the favor of Allah upon you and His mercy, not one of you would have been pure, ever, but Allah purifies whom He wills, and Allah is Hearing and Knowing.
trans-unit.target: O vás, ktorí ste uverili, nie po stopách Satana. A ten, kto nadväzuje na stopách Satana - v skutočnosti, on nariaÄ uje nemorálnosť a previnenie. A ak nie pre priazeň Alah vám a jeho milosrdenstvo, ani jeden z vás by bol čistý, niekedy, ale Boh očisťuje, koho on chce, a Alah je sluch a vedomím.

trans-unit.source: And let not those of virtue among you and wealth swear not to give [aid] to their relatives and the needy and the emigrants for the cause of Allah, and let them pardon and overlook. Would you not like that Allah should forgive you? And Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
