trans-unit.target: A nedaj tých cnosti medzi vami a bohatstvo prisahať dať [Pomoc] svojich príbuzných a potrebným a emigranti pre príčinu Boha, a nech milosť a prehliadnuť. By ste rád by že Alah odpustí? A Boh je odpúšťajúci a Milosrdných.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who [falsely] accuse chaste, unaware and believing women are cursed in this world and the Hereafter; and they will have a great punishment
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti tí, ktorí obviňujú [falošne] cudný, nevedomý a veriť ženy sú prekliate v tomto svete a ďalej; a majú veľký trest

trans-unit.source: On a Day when their tongues, their hands and their feet will bear witness against them as to what they used to do.
trans-unit.target: V deň, kedy ich jazyky, ruky a nohy bude svedčiť proti nim, čo boli zvyknutí robiť.

trans-unit.source: That Day, Allah will pay them in full their deserved recompense, and they will know that it is Allah who is the perfect in justice.
trans-unit.target: Že deň, Boh sa hradí v plnej výške ich zaslúženú odmenu a budú vedieť, že je to Boh, kto je dokonalý v spravodlivosť.

trans-unit.source: Evil words are for evil men, and evil men are [subjected] to evil words. And good words are for good men, and good men are [an object] of good words. Those [good people] are declared innocent of what the slanderers say. For them is forgiveness and noble provision.
trans-unit.target: Zlé slová sú zloby a zloby [podliehajú] zlých slov. Dobrá slová sú dobrí ľudia a dobrí muži sú [objekt] dobrých slov. Tie [dobrých ľudí] prihlásený nevinný ohováračské, čo povedať. Pre nich je odpustenie a ušľachtilý ustanovenie.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, do not enter houses other than your own houses until you ascertain welcome and greet their inhabitants. That is best for you; perhaps you will be reminded.
trans-unit.target: O vás, ktorí ste uverili, nezadávajte domy iné ako svoje vlastné domy až zistiť Vitajte a pozdraviť svojich obyvateľov. To je najlepšie pre vás; možno budete upozornený.

trans-unit.source: And if you do not find anyone therein, do not enter them until permission has been given you. And if it is said to you, "Go back," then go back; it is purer for you. And Allah is Knowing of what you do.
trans-unit.target: A Ak nenájdete nikoho v ňom, do nich kým boli udelené povolenie, sa. A ak to je povedal, aby ste, "Vrátiť späť," potom vrátiť späť; je to čistejšie pre vás. A Allah je vedieť, čo robíte.

trans-unit.source: There is no blame upon you for entering houses not inhabited in which there is convenience for you. And Allah knows what you reveal and what you conceal.
trans-unit.target: Neexistuje žiadny vinu na vás na zadanie domy nie je obývaný, v ktorom je pohodlie pre vás. A Boh vie, čo vám odhaliť a čo ste skryť.

trans-unit.source: Tell the believing men to reduce [some] of their vision and guard their private parts. That is purer for them. Indeed, Allah is Acquainted with what they do.
trans-unit.target: Povedzte veriť muži [niektorí] znížiť svoju víziu a strážiť ich prirodzení. To je čistejšie pre nich. Vskutku, Alah je oboznámený s čo robia.

trans-unit.source: And tell the believing women to reduce [some] of their vision and guard their private parts and not expose their adornment except that which [necessarily] appears thereof and to wrap [a portion of] their headcovers over their chests and not expose their adornment except to their husbands, their fathers, their husbands' fathers, their sons, their husbands' sons, their brothers, their brothers' sons, their sisters' sons, their women, that which their right hands possess, or those male attendants having no physical desire, or children who are not yet aware of the private aspects of women. And let them not stamp their feet to make known what they conceal of their adornment. And turn to Allah in repentance, all of you, O believers, that you might succeed.
trans-unit.target: A povedzte veriť ženy [niektorí] znížiť ich vízie a stráži ich súkromné súčiastky a nevystavujte ich ozdobou, okrem tých, ktoré [nevyhnutne] sa objaví jej a zabaliť [časť] ich headcovers na hrudi a nevystavujte ich ozdobou okrem ich manželia, ich otcovia, ich manželia, otcovia, svojich synov, synovia ich manželia, ich bratia, synovia ich bratia , ich sestry synov, ich ženy, ktoré ich pravej ruky majú, alebo tie male účastníci nemajú žiaden fyzickej túžby alebo deti, ktorí ešte nie sú vedomí súkromné aspektov ženy. A nech nie pečiatka nohy vyjadriť čo skrývať ich ozdobou. A zase Alah úpenlivo vás O veriacich, že môže uspieť.

trans-unit.source: And marry the unmarried among you and the righteous among your male slaves and female slaves. If they should be poor, Allah will enrich them from His bounty, and Allah is all-Encompassing and Knowing.
trans-unit.target: A vziať si slobodné medzi vami a spravodlivý medzi otrokov a otrokmi samica. Ak by mali byť chudobný, Alah ich obohatí z jeho štedrosť a Boh je všetci-zahŕňať a vedel.

trans-unit.source: But let them who find not [the means for] marriage abstain [from sexual relations] until Allah enriches them from His bounty. And those who seek a contract [for eventual emancipation] from among whom your right hands possess - then make a contract with them if you know there is within them goodness and give them from the wealth of Allah which He has given you. And do not compel your slave girls to prostitution, if they desire chastity, to seek [thereby] the temporary interests of worldly life. And if someone should compel them, then indeed, Allah is [to them], after their compulsion, Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Ale nech, ktorí hľadajú nie [prostriedkov] manželstvo zdržať [sexuálne vzťahy] kým Alah ich obohacuje z jeho štedrosť. A tých, ktorí hľadajú zmluvy [pre prípadné emancipácie] spomedzi ktorých ruky právo vlastniť - potom sa s nimi zmluvu, ak viete, že je v nich dobro a dať im z bohatstva Alláha, ktorý on vám dal. A nútiť svoje otrokyne prostitúcii, ak chcú cudnosti, Hľadať [tak] dočasné záujmy pozemský život. A ak niekto mal nútiť ich, potom v skutočnosti Alah je [ho], po ich nátlaku, odpúšťajúci a Milosrdných.

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly sent down to you distinct verses and examples from those who passed on before you and an admonition for those who fear Allah.
trans-unit.target: A sme určite poslali odlišné verše a príklady z tých, ktorí prešli predtým máte a napomenutie pre tých, ktorí sa obávajú Alah.

trans-unit.source: Allah is the Light of the heavens and the earth. The example of His light is like a niche within which is a lamp, the lamp is within glass, the glass as if it were a pearly [white] star lit from [the oil of] a blessed olive tree, neither of the east nor of the west, whose oil would almost glow even if untouched by fire. Light upon light. Allah guides to His light whom He wills. And Allah presents examples for the people, and Allah is Knowing of all things.
trans-unit.target: Boh je svetlo neba a Zeme. Jeho svetlo je výklenok, v ktorej je svietidlo, svietidlo je sklo, sklo ako keby perleťovo [biela] hviezda svieti z [oleja] požehnal olivový strom, východ, ani západ, ktorých olej by takmer svietia, aj v prípade, že nedotknuté oheň. Svetlo na svetlo. Alah návody na jeho svetlo, koho on chce. Alah uvádza príklady pre ľudí a Alah je znalosť všetkých vecí.

trans-unit.source: [Such niches are] in mosques which Allah has ordered to be raised and that His name be mentioned therein; exalting Him within them in the morning and the evenings
trans-unit.target: [Tieto výklenky sú] v mešitách, ktoré Alah nariadil neutíchajú, a že jeho meno uviesť v tejto prílohe; velebí ho v nich ráno a večer

trans-unit.source: [Are] men whom neither commerce nor sale distracts from the remembrance of Allah and performance of prayer and giving of zakah. They fear a Day in which the hearts and eyes will [fearfully] turn about -
trans-unit.target: [Sú] muži, ktorých obchod ani predaj odvádza pozornosť od pamiatku Alah a výkon modlitby a dávať Zakát. Obávajú sa dňom, v ktorom srdce a oči [bojazlivo] zase o-

trans-unit.source: That Allah may reward them [according to] the best of what they did and increase them from His bounty. And Allah gives provision to whom He wills without account.
trans-unit.target: Že Alah môže odmena [podľa] najlepšie čo robili a zvýšenie ich z jeho štedrosť. A Boh dáva ustanovenie komu on chce bez účtu.

trans-unit.source: But those who disbelieved - their deeds are like a mirage in a lowland which a thirsty one thinks is water until, when he comes to it, he finds it is nothing but finds Allah before Him, and He will pay him in full his due; and Allah is swift in account.
trans-unit.target: Ale tí, kto pochyboval - ich skutky sú mirage v nížiny, ktoré smäd jeden si myslí, že je vody až, keď príde na to, zistí, že to nie je nič, ale nájde Alah pred ním, a on mu bude platiť v plnom rozsahu jeho dôsledku; a Allah je swift na účte.

trans-unit.source: Or [they are] like darknesses within an unfathomable sea which is covered by waves, upon which are waves, over which are clouds - darknesses, some of them upon others. When one puts out his hand [therein], he can hardly see it. And he to whom Allah has not granted light - for him there is no light.
trans-unit.target: Alebo [sú] ako darknesses v nesmiernej mora, ktoré je pokryté vlny, ktoré sú vlny, nad ktorým sú mraky - darknesses, niektoré z nich na ostatné. Keď jeden stavia ruku [v], on len ťažko vidieť. A ten koho Boh nebol udelený svetlo - pre neho nie je svetlo.

trans-unit.source: Do you not see that Allah is exalted by whomever is within the heavens and the earth and [by] the birds with wings spread [in flight]? Each [of them] has known his [means of] prayer and exalting [Him], and Allah is Knowing of what they do.
trans-unit.target: Nie ste vidieť, že Alah je vyvýšené koho je nebo a zem a [] vtáky s krídlami, ktoré sa šíria v lete]? Každý [] je známe, jeho modlitba [druh] a velebí [mu], a Alah je vedieť, čo robia.

trans-unit.source: And to Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth, and to Allah is the destination.
trans-unit.target: Bohu patrí panstva nebies a Zeme a Alah je cieľ.

trans-unit.source: Do you not see that Allah drives clouds? Then He brings them together, then He makes them into a mass, and you see the rain emerge from within it. And He sends down from the sky, mountains [of clouds] within which is hail, and He strikes with it whom He wills and averts it from whom He wills. The flash of its lightening almost takes away the eyesight.
trans-unit.target: Nie vidíte, že Alah disky mraky? Potom mu ich spája, potom robí im do hmoty a vidieť dážď vynorí z v ňom. A pošle z neba, hory [mraky] dokedy je krupobitie, a on udrie s tým koho on wills a averts od koho on chce. Flash jej osvetlenie takmer sníma zrak.

trans-unit.source: Allah alternates the night and the day. Indeed in that is a lesson for those who have vision.
trans-unit.target: Alah strieda noc a deň. Naozaj v tom je lekcia pre tých, ktorí majú víziu.

trans-unit.source: Allah has created every [living] creature from water. And of them are those that move on their bellies, and of them are those that walk on two legs, and of them are those that walk on four. Allah creates what He wills. Indeed, Allah is over all things competent.
trans-unit.target: Boh vytvoril každý tvor [Zamienia] z vody. Z nich sú tie, ktoré sa pohybovať na bruchu, a z nich sú tie, že chodiť na dvoch nohách a z nich sú tie, ktoré idú na štyri. Alah vytvára to, čo on chce. Alah je skutočne cez všetky veci príslušný.

trans-unit.source: We have certainly sent down distinct verses. And Allah guides whom He wills to a straight path.
trans-unit.target: Určite sme poslali dole odlišné verše. A Allah sprevádza koho on chce cesta priamo.

trans-unit.source: But the hypocrites say, "We have believed in Allah and in the Messenger, and we obey"; then a party of them turns away after that. And those are not believers.
trans-unit.target: Ale pokrytci povedal, "sme uverili v Boha a posla, a budeme počúvať"; potom party z nich odvracia po tom. A tie nie sú veriaci.

trans-unit.source: And when they are called to [the words of] Allah and His Messenger to judge between them, at once a party of them turns aside [in refusal].
trans-unit.target: A keď oni sú povolaní [so slovami] Alah a jeho posol súdiť medzi nimi, naraz party z nich otočí stranou [odmietnutie].

trans-unit.source: But if the right is theirs, they come to him in prompt obedience.
trans-unit.target: Ale ak sa priamo ich, prídu mu okamžité poslušnosti.

trans-unit.source: Is there disease in their hearts? Or have they doubted? Or do they fear that Allah will be unjust to them, or His Messenger? Rather, it is they who are the wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: Je ochorenie vo svojom srdci? Alebo majú pochybnosti o tom? Alebo sa obávajú, že Boh bude nespravodlivé, alebo jeho posol? Skôr je to oni, ktorí sú zloèinci.

trans-unit.source: The only statement of the [true] believers when they are called to Allah and His Messenger to judge between them is that they say, "We hear and we obey." And those are the successful.
trans-unit.target: Jediné vyjadrenie [pravda] veriacich, keď sa nazývajú Alah a jeho posol súdiť medzi nimi je, že oni hovoria, "môžeme počuť a poslúchame." A tie sú úspešné.

trans-unit.source: And whoever obeys Allah and His Messenger and fears Allah and is conscious of Him - it is those who are the attainers.
trans-unit.target: A kto počúva Alah a jeho posol a obavy Alah a je pri vedomí-to je tých, ktorí sú attainers.

trans-unit.source: And they swear by Allah their strongest oaths that if you ordered them, they would go forth [in Allah 's cause]. Say, "Do not swear. [Such] obedience is known. Indeed, Allah is Acquainted with that which you do."
trans-unit.target: A oni prisahajú Alah ich najsilnejší prísahy, že ak ste si objednali, pôjdu [v Alaha príčinou]. Povedať, "Nechcem Prisahám. [Ako] poslušnosť je známy. Vskutku, Alah je oboznámený s tým, čo robíte."

trans-unit.source: Say, "Obey Allah and obey the Messenger; but if you turn away - then upon him is only that [duty] with which he has been charged, and upon you is that with which you have been charged. And if you obey him, you will be [rightly] guided. And there is not upon the Messenger except the [responsibility for] clear notification."
trans-unit.target: Povedať, "Alah počúvať a počúvať posla; ale ak vás zase preč - potom mu je iba [dane], ktoré mu boli účtované, a na vás je, že s ktorou ste boli obvinení. A ak ste ho počúvajú, budete [správne] vedení. A nie je na Messenger, okrem jasné oznámenia [za]."

trans-unit.source: Allah has promised those who have believed among you and done righteous deeds that He will surely grant them succession [to authority] upon the earth just as He granted it to those before them and that He will surely establish for them [therein] their religion which He has preferred for them and that He will surely substitute for them, after their fear, security, [for] they worship Me, not associating anything with Me. But whoever disbelieves after that - then those are the defiantly disobedient.
trans-unit.target: Boh sľúbil, že tých, ktorí verili medzi vami a urobil spravodlivé skutky, ktoré mu budú určite poskytnúť im dedičstvo [úrad] na zemi rovnako ako mu udelený na tých pred nimi, a on bude určite zapracujú ich [] ich náboženstvo, ktoré má radšej pre nich, a že on určite nahradí, po ich strach , bezpečnosť, [o] ma uctievajú, nie nič spájali s Me. Ale ten, kto neverí, potom - potom sú vyzývavé neposlušný.

trans-unit.source: And establish prayer and give zakah and obey the Messenger - that you may receive mercy.
trans-unit.target: A vytvoriť modlitba a dať Zakát a počúvať Messenger - môžete získať milosť.

trans-unit.source: Never think that the disbelievers are causing failure [to Allah] upon the earth. Their refuge will be the Fire - and how wretched the destination.
trans-unit.target: Nikdy myslieť, že neveriacim spôsobujú zlyhanie [Allah], na zemi. Svoje útočisko bude oheň - a ako biedne miesto určenia.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, let those whom your right hands possess and those who have not [yet] reached puberty among you ask permission of you [before entering] at three times: before the dawn prayer and when you put aside your clothing [for rest] at noon and after the night prayer. [These are] three times of privacy for you. There is no blame upon you nor upon them beyond these [periods], for they continually circulate among you - some of you, among others. Thus does Allah make clear to you the verses; and Allah is Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: O vás, ktorí ste uverili, nech tí, ktorým rukami právo vlastniť a tých, ktorí neboli [ešte] dosiahne puberty u vás požiadať o povolenie u [pred vstupom] na trikrát: pred svitaní modlitby a keď si odložil oblečenie [pre zvyšok] napoludnie a večer modlitieb. [Sú] trikrát ochrany osobných údajov pre vás. Nie je bez viny na vás, ani na ne mimo tieto [obdobie], na ktoré neustále kolujú medzi vás - niektorí z vás, okrem iného. Preto sa Boh objasniť na vás verše; a Allah je znalosť a múdry.

trans-unit.source: And when the children among you reach puberty, let them ask permission [at all times] as those before them have done. Thus does Allah make clear to you His verses; and Allah is Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: A keď deti medzi vami dosiahnu puberty, či žiadať o povolenie [po celú dobu] ako tie pred nimi urobil. Preto sa Boh objasniť na vás jeho verše; a Allah je znalosť a múdry.

trans-unit.source: And women of post-menstrual age who have no desire for marriage - there is no blame upon them for putting aside their outer garments [but] not displaying adornment. But to modestly refrain [from that] is better for them. And Allah is Hearing and Knowing.
trans-unit.target: A ženy post-menštruačný veku, ktorí majú túžbu po manželstve - neexistuje žiadny vinu na ne za ponecháme stranou svoje odevy [ale] nezobrazuje ozdobou. Ale skromne zdržia [že] je pre nich lepšie. A Allah je sluch a vedomím.

trans-unit.source: There is not upon the blind [any] constraint nor upon the lame constraint nor upon the ill constraint nor upon yourselves when you eat from your [own] houses or the houses of your fathers or the houses of your mothers or the houses of your brothers or the houses of your sisters or the houses of your father's brothers or the houses of your father's sisters or the houses of your mother's brothers or the houses of your mother's sisters or [from houses] whose keys you possess or [from the house] of your friend. There is no blame upon you whether you eat together or separately. But when you enter houses, give greetings of peace upon each other - a greeting from Allah, blessed and good. Thus does Allah make clear to you the verses [of ordinance] that you may understand.
trans-unit.target: Nie je nie na blind, [žiadne] obmedzenie ani chromý obmedzenia ani na chorých obmedzenia ani na seba, keď budete jesť vlastné [] domy alebo domy svojich otcov alebo domy vašej matky, alebo domoch svojich bratov alebo domy vašej sestry alebo domy bratov svojho otca domov vášho otca, sestry alebo domy bratov vašej matky alebo domy vašej matky, sestry alebo [Domov] ktorého kľúče, ktoré vlastníte alebo [z domu] vášho priateľa. Nie je žiadnu vinu na vás, či budete jesť spoločne alebo oddelene. Ale keď zadáte domov, pozdrav mieru na seba - pozdrav od Boha, požehnanie a dobré. Preto sa Alah objasniť na vás verše [nariadenia], ktoré môže pochopiť.

trans-unit.source: The believers are only those who believe in Allah and His Messenger and, when they are [meeting] with him for a matter of common interest, do not depart until they have asked his permission. Indeed, those who ask your permission, [O Muhammad] - those are the ones who believe in Allah and His Messenger. So when they ask your permission for something of their affairs, then give permission to whom you will among them and ask forgiveness for them of Allah. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Veriaci sú len tí, ktorí veria v Alah a jeho posol, a keď oni sú [stretnutia] s ním za záležitosť spoločného záujmu, neodchyľujú, kým oni žiadali jeho súhlas. V skutočnosti tí, ktorí sa opýtajte sa svojho oprávnenia [Mohamed] - to sú tí, ktorí veria v Alah a jeho posol. Tak keď sa opýtať vášho súhlasu niečo svoje záležitosti, potom dať súhlas, ktorým budete medzi nimi a požiadať o odpustenie pre nich Alaha. Vskutku, Boh je odpúšťajúci a Milosrdných.

trans-unit.source: Do not make [your] calling of the Messenger among yourselves as the call of one of you to another. Already Allah knows those of you who slip away, concealed by others. So let those beware who dissent from the Prophet's order, lest fitnah strike them or a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: [Vaše] volania posla medzi sebou ako volanie z vás neurobí do druhého. Už Alah vie, tých z vás, ktorí sklzu preč, skryté iní. Tak nech tie pozor, ktorí nesúhlasiť z proroka objednávky, inak fitnah štrajk im, alebo bolestivé trest.

trans-unit.source: Unquestionably, to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and earth. Already He knows that upon which you [stand] and [knows] the Day when they will be returned to Him and He will inform them of what they have done. And Allah is Knowing of all things.
trans-unit.target: Nesporne, Bohu patrí, čo je na nebi i na zemi. Už vie, že na ktorom ste [štát] a [vie] deň, kedy sa vrátia sa k nemu a on oznámi im, čo majú urobiť. A Allah je znalosť všetkých vecí.

trans-unit.source: Blessed is He who sent down the Criterion upon His Servant that he may be to the worlds a warner -
trans-unit.target: Blahoslavený je ten, kto zoslal kritérium na jeho sluha, že on môže byť svety warner-

trans-unit.source: He to whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth and who has not taken a son and has not had a partner in dominion and has created each thing and determined it with [precise] determination.
trans-unit.target: Ten Komu patrí panstva nebies a Zeme a kto neprijal syna a nemá partner panstva a vytvoril každú vec a stanovuje, že s [presnejšie].

trans-unit.source: But they have taken besides Him gods which create nothing, while they are created, and possess not for themselves any harm or benefit and possess not [power to cause] death or life or resurrection.
trans-unit.target: Ale okrem neho prijali bohov, ktoré vytvárajú nič, zatiaľ čo oni vytvárajú a vlastnia nie pre seba žiadne poškodiť alebo prospech a vlastniť nie [moc spôsobiť] smrť alebo život, alebo vzkriesenie.

trans-unit.source: And those who disbelieve say, "This [Qur'an] is not except a falsehood he invented, and another people assisted him in it." But they have committed an injustice and a lie.
trans-unit.target: A tí, ktorí neveria povedať: "Toto [Korán] nie je okrem lož, že on vynašiel, a ďalší ľudia pomáhať mu v ňom." Ale spáchali bezprávie a lož.

trans-unit.source: And they say, "Legends of the former peoples which he has written down, and they are dictated to him morning and afternoon."
trans-unit.target: A oni hovoria, "legendy bývalých obyvateľov, ktorý napísal, a oni sú dané mu ráno a popoludní."

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "It has been revealed by He who knows [every] secret within the heavens and the earth. Indeed, He is ever Forgiving and Merciful."
trans-unit.target: Napríklad: [Mohamed], "to bolo odhalené kto vie [každý] tajomstvo do neba a Zeme. V skutočnosti, on je niekedy odpúšťajúci a milosrdný."

trans-unit.source: And they say, "What is this messenger that eats food and walks in the markets? Why was there not sent down to him an angel so he would be with him a warner?
trans-unit.target: A hovoria: "čo je to posol, ktorý zje jedlo a chodí na trhoch? Prečo tam nebola odoslaná k nemu anjel tak by bol s ním warner?

trans-unit.source: Or [why is not] a treasure presented to him [from heaven], or does he [not] have a garden from which he eats?" And the wrongdoers say, "You follow not but a man affected by magic."
trans-unit.target: Alebo [prečo nie] poklad predkladá mu [z neba] alebo [nie] má záhradu, z ktorej jej? " A zloèinci povedať, "sledovať ale človek ovplyvnený mágie."

trans-unit.source: Look how they strike for you comparisons; but they have strayed, so they cannot [find] a way.
trans-unit.target: Pozrite sa, ako udrieť si porovnania; ale sa zatoulal, takže nemôžu [Hľadať] spôsobom.

trans-unit.source: Blessed is He who, if He willed, could have made for you [something] better than that - gardens beneath which rivers flow - and could make for you palaces.
trans-unit.target: Blahoslavený je ten, kto ak on chcel, mohol sa môžete [niečo] lepšie, než že - záhrady pod ktoré toku rieky - a mohli si palácov.

trans-unit.source: But they have denied the Hour, and We have prepared for those who deny the Hour a Blaze.
trans-unit.target: Ale oni odmietli hodinu a pripravili pre tých, ktorí popierajú hodinu žiari.

trans-unit.source: When the Hellfire sees them from a distant place, they will hear its fury and roaring.
trans-unit.target: Keď Hellfire vidia zo vzdialeného miesta, budú počuť jeho zúrivosť a reval.

trans-unit.source: And when they are thrown into a narrow place therein bound in chains, they will cry out thereupon for destruction.
trans-unit.target: A keď sú hozený do úzke miesta v nich viazaná reťaze, budú plakať následne likvidáciu.

trans-unit.source: [They will be told], "Do not cry this Day for one destruction but cry for much destruction."
trans-unit.target: [Oni povedia], "Neplač tento deň jeden zničenie ale plakať veľkú zničenie."

trans-unit.source: Say, "Is that better or the Garden of Eternity which is promised to the righteous? It will be for them a reward and destination.
trans-unit.target: Povedať: "je to lepšie alebo Záhrada večnosti, ktorý je sľúbil, že spravodlivý? To bude pre nich odmenou a určenia.

trans-unit.source: For them therein is whatever they wish, [while] abiding eternally. It is ever upon your Lord a promise [worthy to be] requested.
trans-unit.target: Nimi sa v ňom čo chcú, [pri] rešpektujúci naveky. Je to niekedy na svojho pána sľub [hoden byť] požaduje.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] the Day He will gather them and that which they worship besides Allah and will say, "Did you mislead these, My servants, or did they [themselves] stray from the way?"
trans-unit.target: A [spomenúť] deň sa stretnú ich a to, čo uctievajú okrem Alaha a povie: "nemal zavádzať, toto moji služobníci, alebo urobil samy [] blúdiť z cesty?"

trans-unit.source: They will say, "Exalted are You! It was not for us to take besides You any allies. But You provided comforts for them and their fathers until they forgot the message and became a people ruined."
trans-unit.target: Povedia, "povýšil ste! Nebolo to pre nás, aby okrem vás všetkých spojencov. Ale ste poskytli komfort pre nich a ich otcovia až zabudla správa a stal ľudia zničili."

trans-unit.source: So they will deny you, [disbelievers], in what you say, and you cannot avert [punishment] or [find] help. And whoever commits injustice among you - We will make him taste a great punishment.
trans-unit.target: Tak budú popierať vás, [neveriacim], čo hovoríte, a nemôže odvrátiť [trest] alebo [Vyhľadať] pomoc. A ten, kto sa dopustí nespravodlivosti medzi vami - urobíme mu chuť veľký trest.

trans-unit.source: And We did not send before you, [O Muhammad], any of the messengers except that they ate food and walked in the markets. And We have made some of you [people] as trial for others - will you have patience? And ever is your Lord, Seeing.
trans-unit.target: A sme neposlal pred vami, [Mohamed], niektorého z poslov, okrem toho, že oni jedli jedlo a chodil na trhoch. A urobili sme niektoré ste [ľudia] ako skúšobné pre ostatných - budete mať trpezlivosť? A niekedy je váš pán videl.

trans-unit.source: And those who do not expect the meeting with Us say, "Why were not angels sent down to us, or [why] do we [not] see our Lord?" They have certainly become arrogant within themselves and [become] insolent with great insolence.
trans-unit.target: A tých, ktorí neočakávajú, stretnutie s nami povedať, "prečo nie anjeli poslali k nám, alebo [prečo] [nie] vidíme nášho Pána?" Majú určite stane arogantný do seba a [sa] drzý s veľkou drzosť.

trans-unit.source: The day they see the angels - no good tidings will there be that day for the criminals, and [the angels] will say, "Prevented and inaccessible."
trans-unit.target: Deň vidí anjelov - žiadna dobrá zvesť tam bude ten deň pre zločincov a [anjeli] povie "zabrániť a neprístupné.

trans-unit.source: And We will regard what they have done of deeds and make them as dust dispersed.
trans-unit.target: A budeme považovať, čo urobili, skutky a nech ako prach, rozptýlený.

trans-unit.source: The companions of Paradise, that Day, are [in] a better settlement and better resting place.
trans-unit.target: Spoločníci raja, že deň, [v] lepšie riešenie a lepšie odpočívajú miesto.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] the Day when the heaven will split open with [emerging] clouds, and the angels will be sent down in successive descent.
trans-unit.target: A [] deň kedy neba bude prasknúť [nové] mraky a anjeli budú zoslal v postupných zostup.

trans-unit.source: True sovereignty, that Day, is for the Most Merciful. And it will be upon the disbelievers a difficult Day.
trans-unit.target: Pravda suverenity, to je deň, Most Milosrdných. A to bude na neveriacim a ťažký deň.

trans-unit.source: And the Day the wrongdoer will bite on his hands [in regret] he will say, "Oh, I wish I had taken with the Messenger a way.
trans-unit.target: A deň páchateľ bude hrýzť na ruky [v ľútosti] povie "Ach, kiež by som si vzal s Messenger tak.

trans-unit.source: Oh, woe to me! I wish I had not taken that one as a friend.
trans-unit.target: Ach, beda mi! Kiež by som nebral ten za priateľa.

trans-unit.source: He led me away from the remembrance after it had come to me. And ever is Satan, to man, a deserter."
trans-unit.target: Viedol ma od spomienka po to musel prísť ku mne. A niekedy je Satan, človeka, dezertér."

trans-unit.source: And the Messenger has said, "O my Lord, indeed my people have taken this Qur'an as [a thing] abandoned."
trans-unit.target: A posol povedal "O môj pane, naozaj my ľudia prijali tento Korán ako [to] opustené."

trans-unit.source: And thus have We made for every prophet an enemy from among the criminals. But sufficient is your Lord as a guide and a helper.
trans-unit.target: A tak sme sa pre každý prorok nepriateľa spomedzi zločinci. Ale stačí sa svojho pána ako sprievodca a Pomocník.

trans-unit.source: And those who disbelieve say, "Why was the Qur'an not revealed to him all at once?" Thus [it is] that We may strengthen thereby your heart. And We have spaced it distinctly.
trans-unit.target: A tých, ktorí neveriť hovoria: "Prečo Korán nebola odhalená mu všetko naraz?" Teda [je], že sme mohli posilniť tým svoje srdce. A budeme mať rozmiestnené to výrazne.

trans-unit.source: And they do not come to you with an argument except that We bring you the truth and the best explanation.
trans-unit.target: A oni nie prísť k vám s argumentom okrem toho, že vám prinášame pravdu a najlepšie vysvetlenie.

trans-unit.source: The ones who are gathered on their faces to Hell - those are the worst in position and farthest astray in [their] way.
trans-unit.target: Tí, ktorí sa zhromaždili na ich tvárach do pekla - sú to najhoršie pozície a najďalej scestie [ich] spôsobom.

trans-unit.source: And We had certainly given Moses the Scripture and appointed with him his brother Aaron as an assistant.
trans-unit.target: A mali sme určite dal Moses písmo a menovaný s ním jeho brata Árona ako asistent.

trans-unit.source: And We said, "Go both of you to the people who have denied Our signs." Then We destroyed them with [complete] destruction.
trans-unit.target: A my sme povedali: "Choďte obaja pre ľudí, ktorí odmietli našich značiek." Potom sme ich zničil [doplňte] likvidáciu.

trans-unit.source: And the people of Noah - when they denied the messengers, We drowned them, and We made them for mankind a sign. And We have prepared for the wrongdoers a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: A ľudia Noe - keď popreli poslov, utopil sme im a my sa im pre ľudstvo znamenie. A pripravili sme pre zloèinci bolestivé trest.

trans-unit.source: And [We destroyed] 'Aad and Thamud and the companions of the well and many generations between them.
trans-unit.target: A [sme zničili] "Aad a Thamud a spoločníci, no a mnoho generácií medzi nimi.

trans-unit.source: And for each We presented examples [as warnings], and each We destroyed with [total] destruction.
trans-unit.target: Pre každého sme prezentovali príklady [ako varovanie] a každý sme zničili [súčet] likvidáciu.

trans-unit.source: And they have already come upon the town which was showered with a rain of evil. So have they not seen it? But they are not expecting resurrection.
trans-unit.target: A oni už prichádzajú na mesto, ktorá osprchoval sa s dažďom zla. Tak oni videli to? Ale nie sú očakávajú vzkriesenie.

trans-unit.source: And when they see you, [O Muhammad], they take you not except in ridicule, [saying], "Is this the one whom Allah has sent as a messenger?
trans-unit.target: A keď vás uvidia, [Mohamed], berú vás nie okrem zesměšňování, [povedať], "je to ten, ktorého Boh poslal ako posla?

trans-unit.source: He almost would have misled us from our gods had we not been steadfast in [worship of] them." But they are going to know, when they see the punishment, who is farthest astray in [his] way.
trans-unit.target: On skoro by majú uvedený do omylu nás od našich bohov sme neboli vytrvalí v [uctievanie] im. " Ale chcú vedieť, keď vidí, že trest, ktorý je najďalej scestie [jeho] spôsobom.

trans-unit.source: Have you seen the one who takes as his god his own desire? Then would you be responsible for him?
trans-unit.target: Videli ste ten, kto sa ako Boh vlastného želania? Potom by ste byť zodpovedný za neho?

trans-unit.source: Or do you think that most of them hear or reason? They are not except like livestock. Rather, they are [even] more astray in [their] way.
trans-unit.target: Alebo si myslíte, že väčšina z nich počuť alebo dôvod? Nie sú výnimkou ako dobytok. Trochu, oni sú [] ešte scestie [ich] spôsobom.

trans-unit.source: Have you not considered your Lord - how He extends the shadow, and if He willed, He could have made it stationary? Then We made the sun for it an indication.
trans-unit.target: Ste za svojho pána - ako sa rozširuje tieň a on chcel, mohol si urobil to stacionárne? Potom sme sa slnko to údaj.

trans-unit.source: Then We hold it in hand for a brief grasp.
trans-unit.target: Potom budeme držať v ruke na Stručný prehľad.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who has made the night for you as clothing and sleep [a means for] rest and has made the day a resurrection.
trans-unit.target: A je to on, kto urobil v noci si oblečenie a zvyšok spánku [prostriedok] a urobila deň vzkriesenia.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who sends the winds as good tidings before His mercy, and We send down from the sky pure water
trans-unit.target: Je to on, kto posiela vetry ako dobrá zvesť pred jeho milosrdenstvo a pošleme z neba čistej vody

trans-unit.source: That We may bring to life thereby a dead land and give it as drink to those We created of numerous livestock and men.
trans-unit.target: Že môžeme priviesť k životu, čím krajina mŕtvych a dať ako nápoj tým sme vytvorili množstvo hospodárskych zvierat a ľudí.

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly distributed it among them that they might be reminded, but most of the people refuse except disbelief.
trans-unit.target: A budeme mať určite distribuované medzi nimi, ktorý môže pripomenúť, ale väčšina ľudí odmietajú okrem neveriacky.

trans-unit.source: And if We had willed, We could have sent into every city a warner.
trans-unit.target: A ak sme mali vôľou, sme zaslali do každého mesta warner.

trans-unit.source: So do not obey the disbelievers, and strive against them with the Qur'an a great striving.
trans-unit.target: Takže nie počúvať neveriacim a usilovať sa proti nim s Korán veľké úsilie.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who has released [simultaneously] the two seas, one fresh and sweet and one salty and bitter, and He placed between them a barrier and prohibiting partition.
trans-unit.target: Je to on, kto bol prepustený [súčasne] dvoch morí, jedna čerstvá a sladké a jednu slanú a horkú a sa umiestnil medzi nimi bariéra a zákazu oblasť.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who has created from water a human being and made him [a relative by] lineage and marriage. And ever is your Lord competent [concerning creation].
trans-unit.target: A to je ten, kto vytvoril z vody človeka a z neho [príbuzný] rodokmeňa a manželstva. A niekedy je príslušný [týkajúce sa vytvorenia] svojho pána.

trans-unit.source: But they worship rather than Allah that which does not benefit them or harm them, and the disbeliever is ever, against his Lord, an assistant [to Satan].
trans-unit.target: Ale uctievajú skôr ako Boh, ktorý nemá úžitok ani poškodiť a neveriacich je niekedy, proti svojmu pánovi, asistent [Satan].

trans-unit.source: And We have not sent you, [O Muhammad], except as a bringer of good tidings and a warner.
trans-unit.target: A my vám poslal, [Mohamed], s výnimkou ako prinášajúci dobrú zvesť a warner.

trans-unit.source: Say, "I do not ask of you for it any payment - only that whoever wills might take to his Lord a way."
trans-unit.target: Povedať: "nie žiadam od vás na to výplatu - len to, že ten, kto chce môže trvať jeho pána spôsobom."

trans-unit.source: And rely upon the Ever-Living who does not die, and exalt [Allah] with His praise. And sufficient is He to be, with the sins of His servants, Acquainted -
trans-unit.target: A spoliehať na Ever-život, ktorý nemá zomrieť, a oslavovať [Allah] s jeho chvále. Dostatočne má byť s hriechmi svojich služobníkov, zoznámiť -

trans-unit.source: He who created the heavens and the earth and what is between them in six days and then established Himself above the Throne - the Most Merciful, so ask about Him one well informed.
trans-unit.target: Ten, kto vytvoril nebies a Zeme a čo je medzi nimi za šesť dní a potom nasledovala nad trón - Most Milosrdných, požiadajú o ňom jeden dobre informovaní.

trans-unit.source: And when it is said to them, "Prostrate to the Most Merciful," they say, "And what is the Most Merciful? Should we prostrate to that which you order us?" And it increases them in aversion.
trans-unit.target: Keď sa povie im, "Přemoci na Most Milosrdných," hovoria: "a čo je najviac Milosrdných? Mali sme přemoci, ktorú si objednáte nás?" A to zvýšením odpor.

trans-unit.source: Blessed is He who has placed in the sky great stars and placed therein a [burning] lamp and luminous moon.
trans-unit.target: Blahoslavený je ten, kto má umiestnené veľké hviezdy oblohy a umiestnené v ňom [horiace] svetlo a svetelný mesiac.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who has made the night and the day in succession for whoever desires to remember or desires gratitude.
trans-unit.target: A je to on, kto urobil noc a deň za sebou kto chce pamätať alebo túžby vďačnosť.

trans-unit.source: And the servants of the Most Merciful are those who walk upon the earth easily, and when the ignorant address them [harshly], they say [words of] peace,
trans-unit.target: Služobníci Najpodstatnejšou sú tí, ktorí chodia na zemi ľahko a keď nepoznajú ich riešenie [kruto], hovoria, že mier [slová],

trans-unit.source: And those who spend [part of] the night to their Lord prostrating and standing [in prayer]
trans-unit.target: A tých, ktorí trávia [časť] v noci ich pán prostrating a Stáleho [v modlitbe]

trans-unit.source: And those who say, "Our Lord, avert from us the punishment of Hell. Indeed, its punishment is ever adhering;
trans-unit.target: A tí, ktorí hovoria: "náš Pán, odvrátiť od nás trest peklo. V skutočnosti jeho trest stále dodržiavanie;

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it is evil as a settlement and residence."
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti je to zla ako osada a pobyt."

trans-unit.source: And [they are] those who, when they spend, do so not excessively or sparingly but are ever, between that, [justly] moderate
trans-unit.target: A [sú] tí, ktorí, keď trávia, nie nadmerne alebo striedmo, ale sú niekedy, že [správne] mierny

trans-unit.source: And those who do not invoke with Allah another deity or kill the soul which Allah has forbidden [to be killed], except by right, and do not commit unlawful sexual intercourse. And whoever should do that will meet a penalty.
trans-unit.target: A tí, ktorí nemajú odvolávať s Alah iného Božstva alebo zabiť dušu, ktoré Alah zakázané [zabil], s výnimkou práva, a to nie spáchať protiprávne pohlavný styk. A kto by to splní trest.

trans-unit.source: Multiplied for him is the punishment on the Day of Resurrection, and he will abide therein humiliated -
trans-unit.target: Násobí pre neho je trest na deň vzkriesenia, a on bude dodržiavať v ňom poníženie-

trans-unit.source: Except for those who repent, believe and do righteous work. For them Allah will replace their evil deeds with good. And ever is Allah Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: S výnimkou tých, ktorí pokánie, veriť a robiť, dielo. Im Alah nahradí svoje zlé skutky dobré. A niekedy je Boh odpúšťa a Milosrdných.

trans-unit.source: And he who repents and does righteousness does indeed turn to Allah with [accepted] repentance.
trans-unit.target: A on, ktorí pokánie a to spravodlivosť naozaj zase Alah s [akceptované] pokánie.

trans-unit.source: And [they are] those who do not testify to falsehood, and when they pass near ill speech, they pass by with dignity.
trans-unit.target: A [sú] kto nemôže vypovedať lož, a keď prejdú v blízkosti chorých reči, absolvovali dôstojne.

trans-unit.source: And those who, when reminded of the verses of their Lord, do not fall upon them deaf and blind.
trans-unit.target: A tí ktorí, keď pripomenul verše svojho pána, nepatrí im hluchí a slepí.

trans-unit.source: And those who say, "Our Lord, grant us from among our wives and offspring comfort to our eyes and make us an example for the righteous."
trans-unit.target: A tí, ktorí hovoria, "náš Pán nám udeliť spomedzi našich manželiek a potomstvo pohodlie pre naše oči a aby nám napríklad za spravodlivý."

trans-unit.source: Those will be awarded the Chamber for what they patiently endured, and they will be received therein with greetings and [words of] peace.
trans-unit.target: Tie budú udelené komory pre čo trpezlivo vydržal a oni dostane v ňom s pozdravmi a [slová] mier.

trans-unit.source: Abiding eternally therein. Good is the settlement and residence.
trans-unit.target: Dodržiavanie večne v ňom. Je dobré o zúčtovanie a pobytu.

trans-unit.source: Say, "What would my Lord care for you if not for your supplication?" For you [disbelievers] have denied, so your denial is going to be adherent.
trans-unit.target: Napríklad: "Čo by môj pán starostlivosť pre vás, ak nie pre svoje prosbe?" Pre vás [neveriacim] poprel, takže vaše odmietnutie bude prívrženec.

trans-unit.source: Ta, Seen, Meem.
trans-unit.target: Ta, videl, Mîm.

trans-unit.source: These are the verses of the clear Book.
trans-unit.target: Sú to verše jasne knihy.

trans-unit.source: Perhaps, [O Muhammad], you would kill yourself with grief that they will not be believers.
trans-unit.target: Snáď [Mohamed], by zabiť seba zale nebudú veriacich.

trans-unit.source: If We willed, We could send down to them from the sky a sign for which their necks would remain humbled.
trans-unit.target: Ak sme vôľou, sme mohli poslať nadol im z neba znamenie, ktoré by zostali krky pokoril.

trans-unit.source: And no revelation comes to them anew from the Most Merciful except that they turn away from it.
trans-unit.target: A žiadne zjavenie príde k nim znova od Najpodstatnejšou okrem toho, že sa zase preč od toho.

trans-unit.source: For they have already denied, but there will come to them the news of that which they used to ridicule.
trans-unit.target: Už odmietli, ale príde k nim novinky, ktoré sa použili na zesměšňování.

trans-unit.source: Did they not look at the earth - how much We have produced therein from every noble kind?
trans-unit.target: Oni sa pozrel na zem - koľko sme vyrobili v nej z každého druhu ušľachtilej?

trans-unit.source: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
trans-unit.target: Naozaj to je znamenie, ale väčšina z nich boli nesmie byť veriaci.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
trans-unit.target: A skutočne, svojho pána - on je postáv by, je Milosrdných.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] when your Lord called Moses, [saying], "Go to the wrongdoing people -
trans-unit.target: A [zmienka] keď váš pán volal Moses [povedať], "ísť o previnenie ľudí-

trans-unit.source: The people of Pharaoh. Will they not fear Allah?"
trans-unit.target: Ľudia faraóna. Bude sa báť Boha?"

trans-unit.source: He said, "My Lord, indeed I fear that they will deny me
trans-unit.target: On povedal: "môj pane, v skutočnosti som strach, že budú popierať mi

trans-unit.source: And that my breast will tighten and my tongue will not be fluent, so send for Aaron.
trans-unit.target: A mojej hrudi sprísni a môj jazyk nebude plynulo, takže poslať pre Aaron.

trans-unit.source: And they have upon me a [claim due to] sin, so I fear that they will kill me."
trans-unit.target: A majú na mňa [tvrdenie kvôli] hriech, tak mám strach, že ma zabije."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "No. Go both of you with Our signs; indeed, We are with you, listening.
trans-unit.target: [Allah] povedal: "číslo Ísť na vás naše známky; Vskutku, sme s vami, počúvanie.

trans-unit.source: Go to Pharaoh and say, 'We are the messengers of the Lord of the worlds,
trans-unit.target: Prejsť na faraóna a hovoria, "sme poslov pán svetov,

trans-unit.source: [Commanded to say], "Send with us the Children of Israel."'"
trans-unit.target: [Prikázal povedať], Send u nás synov Izraela."" "

trans-unit.source: [Pharaoh] said, "Did we not raise you among us as a child, and you remained among us for years of your life?
trans-unit.target: [Faraóna] povedal: "neboli sme zvýšiť si medzi nás ako dieťa, a ste zostalo medzi nami rokov svojho života?

trans-unit.source: And [then] you did your deed which you did, and you were of the ungrateful."
trans-unit.target: A [potom] vy ste svoj skutok, ktorý ste urobili a ste boli nevďační."

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "I did it, then, while I was of those astray.
trans-unit.target: [Moses] povedal: "urobil som to, potom, keď som bol tých scestie.

trans-unit.source: So I fled from you when I feared you. Then my Lord granted me wisdom and prophethood and appointed me [as one] of the messengers.
trans-unit.target: Tak som utiekol od vás, keď som sa bál. Potom môj pán udelil mi múdrosť a proroctvá a vymenoval ma [ako jeden] posl.

trans-unit.source: And is this a favor of which you remind me - that you have enslaved the Children of Israel?"
trans-unit.target: A je to prospech mi - pripomínajú, že majú enslaved deti Izraela?"

trans-unit.source: Said Pharaoh, "And what is the Lord of the worlds?"
trans-unit.target: Faraón povedal, "a čo je pán svetov?"

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "The Lord of the heavens and earth and that between them, if you should be convinced."
trans-unit.target: [Moses] povedal: "Pán neba a Zeme, a že medzi nimi, ak by ste mali byť presvedčený."

trans-unit.source: [Pharaoh] said to those around him, "Do you not hear?"
trans-unit.target: [Faraóna] povedal, k tým okolo neho, "nie Počuješ?"

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "Your Lord and the Lord of your first forefathers."
trans-unit.target: [Moses] povedal, "Svojho pána a pán prvý predkov."

trans-unit.source: [Pharaoh] said, "Indeed, your 'messenger' who has been sent to you is mad."
trans-unit.target: [Faraóna] povedal: "Vskutku, váš"posol", ktorý bol odoslaný na vás je šialený."

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "Lord of the east and the west and that between them, if you were to reason."
trans-unit.target: [Moses] povedal: "Pán východ a západ a že medzi nimi, keby ste mali dôvod."

trans-unit.source: [Pharaoh] said, "If you take a god other than me, I will surely place you among those imprisoned."
trans-unit.target: [Faraóna] povedal: "Ak budete mať Boha okrem mňa, budem určite miesto si medzi tie uväznený."

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "Even if I brought you proof manifest?"
trans-unit.target: [Moses] povedal: "Aj keď som vás uviedol dôkaz manifest?"

trans-unit.source: [Pharaoh] said, "Then bring it, if you should be of the truthful."
trans-unit.target: [Faraóna] povedal, "tak ju, ak by ste mali byť o pravdivé."

trans-unit.source: So [Moses] threw his staff, and suddenly it was a serpent manifest.
trans-unit.target: Tak [Moses] hodil jeho zamestnancov, a zrazu to bolo zjavné hada.

trans-unit.source: And he drew out his hand; thereupon it was white for the observers.
trans-unit.target: A nakreslil ruku; Následne bola biela pre pozorovateľov.

trans-unit.source: [Pharaoh] said to the eminent ones around him, "Indeed, this is a learned magician.
trans-unit.target: [Faraóna] povedal, tie predné okolo neho "v skutočnosti to je naučil kúzelník.

trans-unit.source: He wants to drive you out of your land by his magic, so what do you advise?"
trans-unit.target: Chce riadiť vás mimo vašej krajiny podľa jeho kúzlo, tak čo by ste poradiť? "

trans-unit.source: They said, "Postpone [the matter of] him and his brother and send among the cities gatherers
trans-unit.target: Oni povedali: "odložiť [otázka] ho a jeho brat a poslať medzi mestami zberača

trans-unit.source: Who will bring you every learned, skilled magician."
trans-unit.target: Kto vám prinesie každý dozvedel, skúsený mág."

trans-unit.source: So the magicians were assembled for the appointment of a well-known day.
trans-unit.target: Takže kúzelníkov zhromaždili na vymenovanie známy deň.

trans-unit.source: And it was said to the people, "Will you congregate
trans-unit.target: A to bolo povedané, ľudia, "sa budete stretávať

trans-unit.source: That we might follow the magicians if they are the predominant?"
trans-unit.target: Aby mohli sledujeme kúzelníkov ak sú prevládajúci?"

trans-unit.source: And when the magicians arrived, they said to Pharaoh, "Is there indeed for us a reward if we are the predominant?"
trans-unit.target: A keď prišli kúzelníkov, povedali faraóna, "je tam naozaj pre nás odmenu ak sme prevládajúci?"

trans-unit.source: He said, "Yes, and indeed, you will then be of those near [to me]."
trans-unit.target: On povedal: "áno, a naozaj, potom budete v blízkosti tých [ku mne]."

trans-unit.source: Moses said to them, "Throw whatever you will throw."
trans-unit.target: Moses hovorí im "hodiť čokoľvek sa vám bude hodiť."

trans-unit.source: So they threw their ropes and their staffs and said, "By the might of Pharaoh, indeed it is we who are predominant."
trans-unit.target: Aby hodil ich lán a ich štáby a povedal: "Tým by faraóna, naozaj je to my, ktorí sú prevládajúce."

trans-unit.source: Then Moses threw his staff, and at once it devoured what they falsified.
trans-unit.target: Potom Moses hodil jeho zamestnancov, a naraz to hltal, čo sú sfalšované.

trans-unit.source: So the magicians fell down in prostration [to Allah].
trans-unit.target: Takže kúzelníkov padol v vyčerpanie [aby Allah].

trans-unit.source: They said, "We have believed in the Lord of the worlds,
trans-unit.target: Povedali, že "sme uverili v pána svety,

trans-unit.source: The Lord of Moses and Aaron."
trans-unit.target: Pán Moses a Árona."

trans-unit.source: [Pharaoh] said, "You believed Moses before I gave you permission. Indeed, he is your leader who has taught you magic, but you are going to know. I will surely cut off your hands and your feet on opposite sides, and I will surely crucify you all."
trans-unit.target: [Faraóna] povedal: "ste uverili Moses, predtým, než som dal povolenie. V skutočnosti, on je váš vodca, ktorý sa vyučuje mágia, ale budete vedieť. Bude určite odrezať ruky a nohy v protiľahlých stranách, a ja bude určite všetci ukrižovať."

trans-unit.source: They said, "No harm. Indeed, to our Lord we will return.
trans-unit.target: Oni povedali: "nič zlého. Vskutku, nášho Pána, vrátime.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, we aspire that our Lord will forgive us our sins because we were the first of the believers."
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti sme aspirovat že náš Pán odpusť nám naše hriechy pretože sme boli prvý z veriacich."

trans-unit.source: And We inspired to Moses, "Travel by night with My servants; indeed, you will be pursued."
trans-unit.target: A sme inšpirovaní k Moses, "Cestovanie v noci s moji služobníci; v skutočnosti vás bude pokračovať."

trans-unit.source: Then Pharaoh sent among the cities gatherers
trans-unit.target: Potom faraón poslal medzi mestami zberača

trans-unit.source: [And said], "Indeed, those are but a small band,
trans-unit.target: [A povedal] "naozaj, to sú ale malá skupina,

trans-unit.source: And indeed, they are enraging us,
trans-unit.target: A naozaj, oni sú enraging nás,

trans-unit.source: And indeed, we are a cautious society... "
trans-unit.target: A naozaj, sme opatrný spoločnosti... "

trans-unit.source: So We removed them from gardens and springs
trans-unit.target: Takže sme odstránili zo záhrady a pružiny

trans-unit.source: And treasures and honorable station -
trans-unit.target: A poklady a čestné stanice-

trans-unit.source: Thus. And We caused to inherit it the Children of Israel.
trans-unit.target: Teda. A my to zdedia deti Izraela.

trans-unit.source: So they pursued them at sunrise.
trans-unit.target: Takže si naháňal je pri východe slnka.

trans-unit.source: And when the two companies saw one another, the companions of Moses said, "Indeed, we are to be overtaken!"
trans-unit.target: A kedy sa tieto dve spoločnosti videl jeden druhého, spoločníci Moses povedal: "V skutočnosti sme sa!"

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "No! Indeed, with me is my Lord; He will guide me."
trans-unit.target: [Moses] povedal: "nie! So mnou je skutočne môj pán; On vás povedie ma."

trans-unit.source: Then We inspired to Moses, "Strike with your staff the sea," and it parted, and each portion was like a great towering mountain.
trans-unit.target: Potom budeme inšpirovať Moses "Strike s vašimi pracovníkmi mora", sa rozišli a každá Porcia bola ako veľká Hora týčiaci.

trans-unit.source: And We advanced thereto the pursuers.
trans-unit.target: A my jeho prenasledovatelia.

trans-unit.source: And We saved Moses and those with him, all together.
trans-unit.target: A sme spasení Moses a tie, ktoré sú s ním, všetko dohromady.

trans-unit.source: Then We drowned the others.
trans-unit.target: Potom sme sa utopil ostatných.

trans-unit.source: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
trans-unit.target: Naozaj to je znamenie, ale väčšina z nich boli nesmie byť veriaci.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
trans-unit.target: A skutočne, svojho pána - on je postáv by, je Milosrdných.

trans-unit.source: And recite to them the news of Abraham,
trans-unit.target: A recitovať im Novinky Abraháma,

trans-unit.source: When he said to his father and his people, "What do you worship?"
trans-unit.target: Keď povedal, že jeho otec a jeho ľudia, "čo vás uctievať?"

trans-unit.source: They said, "We worship idols and remain to them devoted."
trans-unit.target: Povedali, že "Uctievanie idolov a zostávajú im venoval."

trans-unit.source: He said, "Do they hear you when you supplicate?
trans-unit.target: On povedal: "to počuje, keď si snažně prosiť?

trans-unit.source: Or do they benefit you, or do they harm?"
trans-unit.target: Využívať môžete alebo škodiť si?"

trans-unit.source: They said, "But we found our fathers doing thus."
trans-unit.target: Povedal, "ale zistili sme, našich otcov, robiť tak."

trans-unit.source: He said, "Then do you see what you have been worshipping,
trans-unit.target: On povedal: "tak vidíte, čo ste už boli uctievať,

trans-unit.source: You and your ancient forefathers?
trans-unit.target: Vás a vašich dávnych predkov?

trans-unit.source: Indeed, they are enemies to me, except the Lord of the worlds,
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti sú nepriatelia mi okrem pán svetov,

trans-unit.source: Who created me, and He [it is who] guides me.
trans-unit.target: Kto vytvoril ma, a on [to je kto] sprievodca ma.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who feeds me and gives me drink.
trans-unit.target: A to je ten, ktorý kŕmi ma a dáva mi piť.

trans-unit.source: And when I am ill, it is He who cures me
trans-unit.target: A keď som chorá, je to on, kto ma vylieči

trans-unit.source: And who will cause me to die and then bring me to life
trans-unit.target: A kto spôsobí, že mi zomrie a potom mi prinesie do života

trans-unit.source: And who I aspire that He will forgive me my sin on the Day of Recompense."
trans-unit.target: A kto I ašpirovať, že on mi odpustí môj hriech na deň odmenu."

trans-unit.source: [And he said], "My Lord, grant me authority and join me with the righteous.
trans-unit.target: [A povedal], "môj pane, daj mi orgánu a Pripoj sa ku mne spravodlivý.

trans-unit.source: And grant me a reputation of honor among later generations.
trans-unit.target: A daj mi povesť česť medzi neskoršie generácie.

trans-unit.source: And place me among the inheritors of the Garden of Pleasure.
trans-unit.target: A miesto ma medzi dedičmi záhrade potešenie.

trans-unit.source: And forgive my father. Indeed, he has been of those astray.
trans-unit.target: A odpustí môj otec. V skutočnosti, on bol tých scestie.

trans-unit.source: And do not disgrace me on the Day they are [all] resurrected -
trans-unit.target: A nie hanbu mi deň, oni [všetko] vzkriesil-

trans-unit.source: The Day when there will not benefit [anyone] wealth or children
trans-unit.target: V deň keď tam bude nie prospech, [niekto] bohatstvo alebo deti

trans-unit.source: But only one who comes to Allah with a sound heart."
trans-unit.target: Ale iba ten, kto prichádza k Bohu s zvuk srdca."

trans-unit.source: And Paradise will be brought near [that Day] to the righteous.
trans-unit.target: A raj bude uvedená v blízkosti [ten deň] spravodliví.

trans-unit.source: And Hellfire will be brought forth for the deviators,
trans-unit.target: A Hellfire sa vyviedol na deviators,

trans-unit.source: And it will be said to them, "Where are those you used to worship
trans-unit.target: A uviedla im, "kde sú tie, ktoré ste použili na uctievanie

trans-unit.source: Other than Allah? Can they help you or help themselves?"
trans-unit.target: Iné ako Boh? Možno sa vám alebo pomôcť sami?"

trans-unit.source: So they will be overturned into Hellfire, they and the deviators
trans-unit.target: Tak bude zrušený do Hellfire a ich deviators

trans-unit.source: And the soldiers of Iblees, all together.
trans-unit.target: A vojakov Iblees, všetko dohromady.

trans-unit.source: They will say while they dispute therein,
trans-unit.target: Budú hovoriť, zatiaľ čo popierajú, že v ňom

trans-unit.source: "By Allah, we were indeed in manifest error
trans-unit.target: "Alah, sme boli naozaj zjavnou

trans-unit.source: When we equated you with the Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: Keď sme sa stotožňovať s pánovi svetov.

trans-unit.source: And no one misguided us except the criminals.
trans-unit.target: A nikto nám zavádzajúce okrem zločincov.

trans-unit.source: So now we have no intercessors
trans-unit.target: Takže teraz máme nie intercessors

trans-unit.source: And not a devoted friend.
trans-unit.target: A nie oddaného priateľa.

trans-unit.source: Then if we only had a return [to the world] and could be of the believers... "
trans-unit.target: Potom, ak sme len návratu [svetu] a mohli veriaci... "

trans-unit.source: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
trans-unit.target: Naozaj to je znamenie, ale väčšina z nich boli nesmie byť veriaci.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
trans-unit.target: A skutočne, svojho pána - on je postáv by, je Milosrdných.

trans-unit.source: The people of Noah denied the messengers
trans-unit.target: Ľudia z Noah poprel poslov

trans-unit.source: When their brother Noah said to them, "Will you not fear Allah?
trans-unit.target: Keď ich brat Noah povedal, "sa budete báť Alah?

trans-unit.source: Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.
trans-unit.target: Samozrejme, že som vám dôveryhodného posla.

trans-unit.source: So fear Allah and obey me.
trans-unit.target: Takže strach Alah a počúvať mňa.

trans-unit.source: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: A nie žiadam vás o to akejkoľvek platby. Moja platba je len od pána svetov.

trans-unit.source: So fear Allah and obey me."
trans-unit.target: Takže strach Alah a počúvať mňa."

trans-unit.source: They said, "Should we believe you while you are followed by the lowest [class of people]?"
trans-unit.target: Povedali, že "By sme veriť aj keď, sú nasledované najnižšiu [triedu ľudí]?"

trans-unit.source: He said, "And what is my knowledge of what they used to do?
trans-unit.target: Povedal: "a čo je mi známe, na čo boli zvyknutí robiť?

trans-unit.source: Their account is only upon my Lord, if you [could] perceive.
trans-unit.target: Účet je len na môj pán, ak vnímate mohli.

trans-unit.source: And I am not one to drive away the believers.
trans-unit.target: A já nejsem jeden zahnať veriacich.

trans-unit.source: I am only a clear warner."
trans-unit.target: Ja som len jasné warner."

trans-unit.source: They said, "If you do not desist, O Noah, you will surely be of those who are stoned."
trans-unit.target: Oni povedali: "Ak ustat, O Noah, ste určite bude tých, ktorí sú ukameňovanie."

trans-unit.source: He said, "My Lord, indeed my people have denied me.
trans-unit.target: On povedal: "môj pane, naozaj my ľudia odmietli ma.

trans-unit.source: Then judge between me and them with decisive judgement and save me and those with me of the believers."
trans-unit.target: Potom sudca medzi mnou a nim s rozhodujúci úsudok a zachrániť ma a tie so mnou veriacich."

trans-unit.source: So We saved him and those with him in the laden ship.
trans-unit.target: Tak sme uložili ho a ty s ním naloženej lode.

trans-unit.source: Then We drowned thereafter the remaining ones.
trans-unit.target: Potom sme sa utopil potom zostávajúce.

trans-unit.source: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
trans-unit.target: Naozaj to je znamenie, ale väčšina z nich boli nesmie byť veriaci.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
trans-unit.target: A skutočne, svojho pána - on je postáv by, je Milosrdných.

trans-unit.source: 'Aad denied the messengers
trans-unit.target: "Aad poprel poslov

trans-unit.source: When their brother Hud said to them, "Will you not fear Allah?
trans-unit.target: Keď ich brat Hud povedal, "sa budete báť Alah?

trans-unit.source: Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.
trans-unit.target: Samozrejme, že som vám dôveryhodného posla.

trans-unit.source: So fear Allah and obey me.
trans-unit.target: Takže strach Alah a počúvať mňa.

trans-unit.source: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: A nie žiadam vás o to akejkoľvek platby. Moja platba je len od pána svetov.

trans-unit.source: Do you construct on every elevation a sign, amusing yourselves,
trans-unit.target: Urobiť si postaviť na každom povýšenie znamenie, zábavný seba,

trans-unit.source: And take for yourselves palaces and fortresses that you might abide eternally?
trans-unit.target: A vziať na seba palácov a pevností, ktoré možno zostanete naveky?

trans-unit.source: And when you strike, you strike as tyrants.
trans-unit.target: A keď ste štrajk, štrajk ako tyran.

trans-unit.source: So fear Allah and obey me.
trans-unit.target: Takže strach Alah a počúvať mňa.

trans-unit.source: And fear He who provided you with that which you know,
trans-unit.target: A ten, kto za predpokladu, že s tým, čo viete, strach

trans-unit.source: Provided you with grazing livestock and children
trans-unit.target: Ak ste s pasenie dobytka a deti

trans-unit.source: And gardens and springs.
trans-unit.target: A záhrad a pramene.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, I fear for you the punishment of a terrible day."
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti som strach pre vás trest hrozný deň."

trans-unit.source: They said, "It is all the same to us whether you advise or are not of the advisors.
trans-unit.target: Povedali, že "je to všetko rovnaký k nám poradiť alebo nie sú poradcov.

trans-unit.source: This is not but the custom of the former peoples,
trans-unit.target: To nie je, ale vlastné bývalých obyvateľov,

trans-unit.source: And we are not to be punished."
trans-unit.target: A my sme sa potrestaný."

trans-unit.source: And they denied him, so We destroyed them. Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
trans-unit.target: A oni zaprel, tak sme ich zničil. Naozaj to je znamenie, ale väčšina z nich boli nesmie byť veriaci.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
trans-unit.target: A skutočne, svojho pána - on je postáv by, je Milosrdných.

trans-unit.source: Thamud denied the messengers
trans-unit.target: Thamud poprel poslov

trans-unit.source: When their brother Salih said to them, "Will you not fear Allah?
trans-unit.target: Keď ich brat Salih povedal, "sa budete báť Alah?

trans-unit.source: Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.
trans-unit.target: Samozrejme, že som vám dôveryhodného posla.

trans-unit.source: So fear Allah and obey me.
trans-unit.target: Takže strach Alah a počúvať mňa.

trans-unit.source: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: A nie žiadam vás o to akejkoľvek platby. Moja platba je len od pána svetov.

trans-unit.source: Will you be left in what is here, secure [from death],
trans-unit.target: Budete sa vľavo v čom je tu, bezpečné [od smrti]

trans-unit.source: Within gardens and springs
trans-unit.target: Do záhrady a pružiny

trans-unit.source: And fields of crops and palm trees with softened fruit?
trans-unit.target: A polia plodín a palmy s zmäkčovanie ovocie?

trans-unit.source: And you carve out of the mountains, homes, with skill.
trans-unit.target: A začnete vyřezávat z hôr, domy s zručností.

trans-unit.source: So fear Allah and obey me.
trans-unit.target: Takže strach Alah a počúvať mňa.

trans-unit.source: And do not obey the order of the transgressors,
trans-unit.target: A nie poslúchnuť rozkaz hriešnikov,

trans-unit.source: Who cause corruption in the land and do not amend."
trans-unit.target: Ktorý spôsobujú poškodenie pôdy a nemeňte.

trans-unit.source: They said, "You are only of those affected by magic.
trans-unit.target: Povedali, že "ste len z tých, ktoré sú ovplyvnené mágie.

trans-unit.source: You are but a man like ourselves, so bring a sign, if you should be of the truthful."
trans-unit.target: Ste ale človek ako my, tak aby znamenie, ak by ste mali byť o pravdivé."

trans-unit.source: He said, "This is a she-camel. For her is a [time of] drink, and for you is a [time of] drink, [each] on a known day.
trans-unit.target: On povedal: "to je ona-ťavy. Pre ňu je nápoj [čas] a pre vás je [čas] piť [každý] známy deň.

trans-unit.source: And do not touch her with harm, lest you be seized by the punishment of a terrible day."
trans-unit.target: A nedotýkajte jej poškodenia, inak vás budú zabavené trest hrozný deň."

trans-unit.source: But they hamstrung her and so became regretful.
trans-unit.target: Ale ochromená jej a tak sa stal poľutovaniahodné.

trans-unit.source: And the punishment seized them. Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
trans-unit.target: A trest im. Naozaj to je znamenie, ale väčšina z nich boli nesmie byť veriaci.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
trans-unit.target: A skutočne, svojho pána - on je postáv by, je Milosrdných.

trans-unit.source: The people of Lot denied the messengers
trans-unit.target: Ľudia veľa poprel poslov

trans-unit.source: When their brother Lot said to them, "Will you not fear Allah?
trans-unit.target: Kedy ich moc brat povedal, že im "sa budete báť Alah?

trans-unit.source: Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.
trans-unit.target: Samozrejme, že som vám dôveryhodného posla.

trans-unit.source: So fear Allah and obey me.
trans-unit.target: Takže strach Alah a počúvať mňa.

trans-unit.source: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: A nie žiadam vás o to akejkoľvek platby. Moja platba je len od pána svetov.

trans-unit.source: Do you approach males among the worlds
trans-unit.target: Máte prístup mužov medzi svetmi

trans-unit.source: And leave what your Lord has created for you as mates? But you are a people transgressing."
trans-unit.target: A čo váš pán vytvoril pre vás ako kamaráti? Ale sú ľudia zaobchádzania v dôsledku porušenia."

trans-unit.source: They said, "If you do not desist, O Lot, you will surely be of those evicted."
trans-unit.target: Oni povedali: "Ak ustat, O veľa, iste budete tých vysťahovaní."

trans-unit.source: He said, "Indeed, I am, toward your deed, of those who detest [it].
trans-unit.target: On povedal: "skutočne som k svojej čin, tých, ktorí majú nenávidět [to].

trans-unit.source: My Lord, save me and my family from [the consequence of] what they do."
trans-unit.target: Môj pane, uložiť mňa a moju rodinu z [dôsledkom] čo robiť. "

trans-unit.source: So We saved him and his family, all,
trans-unit.target: Tak sme ušetrili jemu a jeho rodine, všetkým,

trans-unit.source: Except an old woman among those who remained behind.
trans-unit.target: Okrem starej ženy medzi tými, ktorí zostali.

trans-unit.source: Then We destroyed the others.
trans-unit.target: Potom sme zničili iní.

trans-unit.source: And We rained upon them a rain [of stones], and evil was the rain of those who were warned.
trans-unit.target: Pršalo sme na ne dážď [kamene] a zla bol dážď, tých, ktorí boli upozornení.

trans-unit.source: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
trans-unit.target: Naozaj to je znamenie, ale väčšina z nich boli nesmie byť veriaci.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
trans-unit.target: A skutočne, svojho pána - on je postáv by, je Milosrdných.

trans-unit.source: The companions of the thicket denied the messengers
trans-unit.target: Spoločníci křoví poprel poslov

trans-unit.source: When Shu'ayb said to them, "Will you not fear Allah?
trans-unit.target: Pri Shu'ayb im povedal, "sa budete báť Alah?

trans-unit.source: Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.
trans-unit.target: Samozrejme, že som vám dôveryhodného posla.

trans-unit.source: So fear Allah and obey me.
trans-unit.target: Takže strach Alah a počúvať mňa.

trans-unit.source: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: A nie žiadam vás o to akejkoľvek platby. Moja platba je len od pána svetov.

trans-unit.source: Give full measure and do not be of those who cause loss.
trans-unit.target: Plnej miere a nie byť tých, ktorí spôsobujú stratu.

trans-unit.source: And weigh with an even balance.
trans-unit.target: A váži s rovnováhy.

trans-unit.source: And do not deprive people of their due and do not commit abuse on earth, spreading corruption.
trans-unit.target: Nezbavujú ľudí ich splatnosti a nedopustil zneužitia na zemi, rozšírenia korupcie.

trans-unit.source: And fear He who created you and the former creation."
trans-unit.target: A ten, kto ste a bývalý vytvorenie strach."

trans-unit.source: They said, "You are only of those affected by magic.
trans-unit.target: Povedali, že "ste len z tých, ktoré sú ovplyvnené mágie.

trans-unit.source: You are but a man like ourselves, and indeed, we think you are among the liars.
trans-unit.target: Ste ale človek ako my, a skutočne si myslíme, že ste medzi klamárov.

trans-unit.source: So cause to fall upon us fragments of the sky, if you should be of the truthful."
trans-unit.target: Tak spôsobiť, aby na nás fragmenty z neba, ak by ste mali byť o pravdivé."

trans-unit.source: He said, "My Lord is most knowing of what you do."
trans-unit.target: On povedal: "Môj pán je väčšina vedieť, čo robíte."

trans-unit.source: And they denied him, so the punishment of the day of the black cloud seized them. Indeed, it was the punishment of a terrible day.
trans-unit.target: A oni zaprel, tak trest deň čierny mrak chytil je. V skutočnosti to bol trest hrozný deň.

trans-unit.source: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
trans-unit.target: Naozaj to je znamenie, ale väčšina z nich boli nesmie byť veriaci.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
trans-unit.target: A skutočne, svojho pána - on je postáv by, je Milosrdných.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, the Qur'an is the revelation of the Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: A skutočne, Korán je zjavenie pánovi svetov.

trans-unit.source: The Trustworthy Spirit has brought it down
trans-unit.target: Dôveryhodné ducha sa znížil

trans-unit.source: Upon your heart, [O Muhammad] - that you may be of the warners -
trans-unit.target: Na svoje srdce, [Mohamed] - ktorý môže byť v meste warners-

trans-unit.source: In a clear Arabic language.
trans-unit.target: V jasné Arabský jazyk.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, it is [mentioned] in the scriptures of former peoples.
trans-unit.target: A naozaj, to je [uvedených] v písmach bývalých obyvateľov.

trans-unit.source: And has it not been a sign to them that it is recognized by the scholars of the Children of Israel?
trans-unit.target: A nebol im znamenie je rozpoznaný učenci deti Izraela?

trans-unit.source: And even if We had revealed it to one among the foreigners
trans-unit.target: A aj keby sme mali odhalil jeden medzi cudzincami

trans-unit.source: And he had recited it to them [perfectly], they would [still] not have been believers in it.
trans-unit.target: A on mal prednášal na nich [dokonale], ktoré by [stále] neboli veriaci v to.

trans-unit.source: Thus have We inserted disbelief into the hearts of the criminals.
trans-unit.target: Tak sme vložili neveriacky do sŕdc zločinci.

trans-unit.source: They will not believe in it until they see the painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: Nebudú veriť v to dovtedy, kým vidí bolestivé trest.

trans-unit.source: And it will come to them suddenly while they perceive [it] not.
trans-unit.target: A príde k nim zrazu hoci vnímajú, že [to] nie.

trans-unit.source: And they will say, "May we be reprieved?"
trans-unit.target: A povedia, "Možno sme sa reprieved?"

trans-unit.source: So for Our punishment are they impatient?
trans-unit.target: Tak pre náš trest sú netrpezlivý?

trans-unit.source: Then have you considered if We gave them enjoyment for years
trans-unit.target: Potom ste uvažovali, ak sme dali im radosť rokov

trans-unit.source: And then there came to them that which they were promised?
trans-unit.target: A potom tam prišiel k nim, ktoré boli sľúbil?

trans-unit.source: They would not be availed by the enjoyment with which they were provided.
trans-unit.target: Oni by byť nie využila potešenie, ktoré boli poskytnuté.

trans-unit.source: And We did not destroy any city except that it had warners
trans-unit.target: A sme nezničil nejaké mesto, okrem toho, že mal warners

trans-unit.source: As a reminder; and never have We been unjust.
trans-unit.target: Ako pripomenutie; a nikdy sme neboli nespravodlivé.

trans-unit.source: And the devils have not brought the revelation down.
trans-unit.target: A devils nie zvrhli zjavenia.

trans-unit.source: It is not allowable for them, nor would they be able.
trans-unit.target: Nie je prípustné pre nich, ani oni by mohli.

trans-unit.source: Indeed they, from [its] hearing, are removed.
trans-unit.target: Skutočne, od [jeho] sluch, sú odstránené.

trans-unit.source: So do not invoke with Allah another deity and [thus] be among the punished.
trans-unit.target: Takže nie odvolávať s Alah iného Božstva a [teda] medzi potrestaný.

trans-unit.source: And warn, [O Muhammad], your closest kindred.
trans-unit.target: A varovať, [Mohamed], najbližšie príbuzenstvo.

trans-unit.source: And lower your wing to those who follow you of the believers.
trans-unit.target: A krídla pre tých, ktorí za vami veriacich.

trans-unit.source: And if they disobey you, then say, "Indeed, I am disassociated from what you are doing."
trans-unit.target: A ak ich porušujú, potom povedal, "Vskutku, ja som priradenia čo robíte."

trans-unit.source: And rely upon the Exalted in Might, the Merciful,
trans-unit.target: A spoliehať na postáv by, je Milosrdných

trans-unit.source: Who sees you when you arise
trans-unit.target: Komu ste, keď ste vznikajú

trans-unit.source: And your movement among those who prostrate.
trans-unit.target: A váš pohyb medzi tými, ktorí přemoci.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, He is the Hearing, the Knowing.
trans-unit.target: On je skutočne pojednávaní vedieť.

trans-unit.source: Shall I inform you upon whom the devils descend?
trans-unit.target: Budem informovať, na ktorého devils zostúpiť?

trans-unit.source: They descend upon every sinful liar.
trans-unit.target: Zostúpi na všetky hriešne klamár.

trans-unit.source: They pass on what is heard, and most of them are liars.
trans-unit.target: Prejsť na to, čo je počuť, a väčšina z nich sú klamári.

trans-unit.source: And the poets - [only] the deviators follow them;
trans-unit.target: A básnikov - [len] deviators za nimi;

trans-unit.source: Do you not see that in every valley they roam
trans-unit.target: Nie ste vidieť, že v každej doline sa túlať

trans-unit.source: And that they say what they do not do? -
trans-unit.target: A ktoré hovoria, že to, čo oni nerobia? -

trans-unit.source: Except those [poets] who believe and do righteous deeds and remember Allah often and defend [the Muslims] after they were wronged. And those who have wronged are going to know to what [kind of] return they will be returned.
trans-unit.target: Okrem týchto [básnikov] ktorí veriť a konať spravodlivé skutky nezabudnite Alah často a brániť [moslimov] potom, čo oni boli poškodené. A tých, ktorí ublížili bude vedieť, čo [druh] návrat budú vrátené.

trans-unit.source: Ta, Seen. These are the verses of the Qur'an and a clear Book
trans-unit.target: Ta, nevidel. Sú to verše z Koránu a jasné kníh

trans-unit.source: As guidance and good tidings for the believers
trans-unit.target: Ako usmernenie a radostnú zvesť, pre veriacich

trans-unit.source: Who establish prayer and give zakah, and of the Hereafter they are certain [in faith].
trans-unit.target: Ktorí vytvárajú modlitby a dať Zakát, a ďalej sú určité [vo viere].

trans-unit.source: Indeed, for those who do not believe in the Hereafter, We have made pleasing to them their deeds, so they wander blindly.
trans-unit.target: Naozaj, pre tých, ktorí neveria v nižšie, sme urobili príjemný im svoje skutky, tak túlať slepo.

trans-unit.source: Those are the ones for whom there will be the worst of punishment, and in the Hereafter they are the greatest losers.
trans-unit.target: To sú tie, pre koho bude najhoršie trest a ďalej sú najväčší porazení.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, [O Muhammad], you receive the Qur'an from one Wise and Knowing.
