trans-unit.target: Tak, že budú popierať to, čo sme im udelili, a budú mať na sebe. Ale chcú vedieť.

trans-unit.source: Have they not seen that We made [Makkah] a safe sanctuary, while people are being taken away all around them? Then in falsehood do they believe, and in the favor of Allah they disbelieve?
trans-unit.target: Oni nevideli že sme urobili [Makkah] bezpečné útočisko, zatiaľ čo ľudia sú prijímané ďaleko okolo nich? Potom v lož oni veria, a len Boh im neveriť?

trans-unit.source: And who is more unjust than one who invents a lie about Allah or denies the truth when it has come to him? Is there not in Hell a [sufficient] residence for the disbelievers?
trans-unit.target: A kto je viac nespravodlivé, ako ten, kto vymyslí lož o Alah alebo popiera pravdu, keď to prišlo k nemu? Je tam v peklo [dostatočné] pobyt pre neveriacim?

trans-unit.source: And those who strive for Us - We will surely guide them to Our ways. And indeed, Allah is with the doers of good.
trans-unit.target: A tí, ktorí sa usilujú o nás - sme určite viesť ich k našej cesty. A skutočne, Alah je s konajte dobro.

trans-unit.source: Alif, Lam, Meem.
trans-unit.target: Alif, Lam, Mîm.

trans-unit.source: The Byzantines have been defeated
trans-unit.target: Byzantínci boli porazení

trans-unit.source: In the nearest land. But they, after their defeat, will overcome.
trans-unit.target: V najbližšej pevniny. Ale oni, po ich porážke sa prekonať.

trans-unit.source: Within three to nine years. To Allah belongs the command before and after. And that day the believers will rejoice
trans-unit.target: V rámci troch do deviatich rokov. Alah patrí príkaz pred a po. A ten deň sa veriaci budú radovať

trans-unit.source: In the victory of Allah. He gives victory to whom He wills, and He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Víťazstvo Alaha. Dáva víťazstvo komu on chce, a on je postáv by, je Milosrdných.

trans-unit.source: [It is] the promise of Allah. Allah does not fail in His promise, but most of the people do not know.
trans-unit.target: [Je] sľub Alah. Alah nezabudla v jeho sľub, ale väčšina ľudí nevie.

trans-unit.source: They know what is apparent of the worldly life, but they, of the Hereafter, are unaware.
trans-unit.target: Vedia, čo je zrejmé z pozemský život, ale že z nižšie, nie sú vedomí.

trans-unit.source: Do they not contemplate within themselves? Allah has not created the heavens and the earth and what is between them except in truth and for a specified term. And indeed, many of the people, in [the matter of] the meeting with their Lord, are disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: Nie zamýšľajú, v sebe? Boh nevytvoril nebesia a zem a aký je medzi nimi výnimkou v pravde a na zadané obdobie. A v skutočnosti, mnoho ľudí, [otázka] stretnutie s ich pán sa neveriacim.

trans-unit.source: Have they not traveled through the earth and observed how was the end of those before them? They were greater than them in power, and they plowed the earth and built it up more than they have built it up, and their messengers came to them with clear evidences. And Allah would not ever have wronged them, but they were wronging themselves.
trans-unit.target: Oni neboli cestoval cez zem a pozorovať, ako bolo na konci tých pred nimi? Boli väčšie, než je v silách a orať zem a postavil ho viac, ako si to vybudovali a ich poslovia k nim prišiel s jasné dôkazy. A Boh by nie niekedy ublížili im, ale oni boli wronging sami.

trans-unit.source: Then the end of those who did evil was the worst [consequence] because they denied the signs of Allah and used to ridicule them.
trans-unit.target: Potom koniec tých, ktorí zlo bolo najhoršie [dôsledkom], pretože popieral znamenia Alaha a použili na zesměšňování im.

trans-unit.source: Allah begins creation; then He will repeat it; then to Him you will be returned.
trans-unit.target: Boh začne Tvorba; potom on bude opakovať potom k nemu vám budú vrátené.

trans-unit.source: And the Day the Hour appears the criminals will be in despair.
trans-unit.target: A deň, hodina sa zločinci bude v zúfalstve.

trans-unit.source: And there will not be for them among their [alleged] partners any intercessors, and they will [then] be disbelievers in their partners.
trans-unit.target: Nie je pre nich medzi žiakmi [údajne] žiadne intercessors a [potom] budú neveriacim vo svojich partnerov.

trans-unit.source: And the Day the Hour appears - that Day they will become separated.
trans-unit.target: A deň, hodina zdá - ten deň sa oddeliť.

trans-unit.source: And as for those who had believed and done righteous deeds, they will be in a garden [of Paradise], delighted.
trans-unit.target: A pokiaľ ide o tých, ktorí verili a urobil spravodlivé skutky, budú v záhrade [raj], radosť.

trans-unit.source: But as for those who disbelieved and denied Our verses and the meeting of the Hereafter, those will be brought into the punishment [to remain].
trans-unit.target: Ale pokiaľ ide o tých, kto pochyboval, a poprieť naše verše a zasadnutie ďalej, tie budú prevedené do trest [naďalej].

trans-unit.source: So exalted is Allah when you reach the evening and when you reach the morning.
trans-unit.target: Tak povýšil je Alah, keď sa večer a keď ráno.

trans-unit.source: And to Him is [due all] praise throughout the heavens and the earth. And [exalted is He] at night and when you are at noon.
trans-unit.target: A k nemu sa [všetko] chvála nebies a Zeme. [Povýšil má] v noci, a keď sa napoludnie.

trans-unit.source: He brings the living out of the dead and brings the dead out of the living and brings to life the earth after its lifelessness. And thus will you be brought out.
trans-unit.target: Prináša život z mŕtvych, a prináša mŕtve z živého a prináša do života na zemi po jeho lifelessness. A tak sa zahrnie.

trans-unit.source: And of His signs is that He created you from dust; then, suddenly you were human beings dispersing [throughout the earth].
trans-unit.target: A jeho príznakov je, že vás stvoril z prachu; potom, zrazu ste boli ľudské bytosti rozptyľovať [po celej krajine].

trans-unit.source: And of His signs is that He created for you from yourselves mates that you may find tranquillity in them; and He placed between you affection and mercy. Indeed in that are signs for a people who give thought.
trans-unit.target: A z jeho značiek je, že on vytvoril pre vás od seba kamaráti, že môžete nájsť pokoj v nich; a sa umiestnil medzi si lásku a milosrdenstvo. Naozaj v tom, že sú značky pre ľudí, ktorí dávajú myšlienka.

trans-unit.source: And of His signs is the creation of the heavens and the earth and the diversity of your languages and your colors. Indeed in that are signs for those of knowledge.
trans-unit.target: A jeho znamenie je vytvorenie nebesia a zem a rozmanitosť jazykov a farbami. Naozaj v tom, že sú príznaky pre tých poznatkov.

trans-unit.source: And of His signs is your sleep by night and day and your seeking of His bounty. Indeed in that are signs for a people who listen.
trans-unit.target: A jeho znamenie je váš spánok noc a deň a vaše hľadanie jeho štedrosť. Naozaj v tom, že sú príznaky pre ľudí, ktorí počúvajú.

trans-unit.source: And of His signs is [that] He shows you the lightning [causing] fear and aspiration, and He sends down rain from the sky by which He brings to life the earth after its lifelessness. Indeed in that are signs for a people who use reason.
trans-unit.target: Jeho príznaky [že] on ukazuje blesky [spôsobuje] strach a ašpirácie, a on pošle nadol dážď z neba, ktorý prináša do života zem po jeho lifelessness. Naozaj v tom, že sú príznaky pre ľudí, ktorí používajú dôvod.

trans-unit.source: And of His signs is that the heaven and earth remain by His command. Then when He calls you with a [single] call from the earth, immediately you will come forth.
trans-unit.target: A jeho príznakov je, že nebo a zem zostane jeho príkazom. Potom, keď pozýva vás s [jednej] výzvy zo Zeme, hneď vám príde späť.

trans-unit.source: And to Him belongs whoever is in the heavens and earth. All are to Him devoutly obedient.
trans-unit.target: A k nemu patrí, kto je na nebi i na zemi. Sú všetci mu oddane poslušný.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who begins creation; then He repeats it, and that is [even] easier for Him. To Him belongs the highest attribute in the heavens and earth. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
trans-unit.target: A to je ten, kto začína Tvorba; potom sa mu to opakuje, a to je [ešte] jednoduchšie pre neho. K nemu patrí najvyššia atribút na nebi i na zemi. A on je postáv by, múdry.

trans-unit.source: He presents to you an example from yourselves. Do you have among those whom your right hands possess any partners in what We have provided for you so that you are equal therein [and] would fear them as your fear of one another [within a partnership]? Thus do We detail the verses for a people who use reason.
trans-unit.target: On predstavuje pre vás napríklad od seba. Ste medzi tými, ktorých ruky právo vlastniť akékoľvek partnerov čo sme poskytli pre vás, aby ste v ňom rovnajú [a] by im strach ako strach z navzájom [v rámci partnerstva]? Preto budeme podrobne verše pre ľudí, ktorí používajú dôvod.

trans-unit.source: But those who wrong follow their [own] desires without knowledge. Then who can guide one whom Allah has sent astray? And for them there are no helpers.
trans-unit.target: Ale tí, ktorí zle sledovať vlastné [] túžby bez vedomia. Potom kto môže viesť ten, koho Boh poslal scestie? A pre nich neexistujú žiadni pomocníci.

trans-unit.source: So direct your face toward the religion, inclining to truth. [Adhere to] the fitrah of Allah upon which He has created [all] people. No change should there be in the creation of Allah. That is the correct religion, but most of the people do not know.
trans-unit.target: Takže priamo tváre smerom k náboženstvo, inklinující k pravde. [Dodržiavať] fitrah Alah, na ktorom bol vytvorený [všetky] ľudí. Žiadna zmena treba pri tvorbe Alah. To je správne náboženstvo, ale väčšina ľudí nevie.

trans-unit.source: [Adhere to it], turning in repentance to Him, and fear Him and establish prayer and do not be of those who associate others with Allah
trans-unit.target: [Dodržiavať to], otáčanie v pokánie, a strach ho a vytvoriť modlitba a nebyť tých, ktorí pridružiť iné Alah

trans-unit.source: [Or] of those who have divided their religion and become sects, every faction rejoicing in what it has.
trans-unit.target: [Alebo] tých, ktorí majú rozdeliť svoje náboženstvo a stal sekty, Každá frakcia radujú v to, čo.

trans-unit.source: And when adversity touches the people, they call upon their Lord, turning in repentance to Him. Then when He lets them taste mercy from Him, at once a party of them associate others with their Lord,
trans-unit.target: A keď nešťastie sa dotýka ľudí, vyzvať svojho pána, otáčanie v pokánie k nemu. Potom keď si necháva ich chuť milosť a z neho naraz strana z nich pridružiť iné svojho pána,

trans-unit.source: So that they will deny what We have granted them. Then enjoy yourselves, for you are going to know.
trans-unit.target: Tak, že budú popierať to, čo sme im udelili. Potom si sami, lebo budete vedieť.

trans-unit.source: Or have We sent down to them an authority, and it speaks of what they were associating with Him?
trans-unit.target: Alebo sme poslali k nim orgán, a hovorí o to, čo oni boli spájali s ním?

trans-unit.source: And when We let the people taste mercy, they rejoice therein, but if evil afflicts them for what their hands have put forth, immediately they despair.
trans-unit.target: A keď necháme milosť a chuť ľudí, radovať sa v ňom, ale ak zlo postihuje ich za čo ruky sa vystrel, okamžite to zúfalstvo.

trans-unit.source: Do they not see that Allah extends provision for whom He wills and restricts [it]? Indeed, in that are signs for a people who believe.
trans-unit.target: Nie sú vidieť, že Alah rozširuje ustanovenia pre koho chce, a [to] obmedzuje? Skutočnosti, že sú príznaky pre ľudí, ktorí veria.

trans-unit.source: So give the relative his right, as well as the needy and the traveler. That is best for those who desire the countenance of Allah, and it is they who will be the successful.
trans-unit.target: Tak, aby relatívna, jeho práva, ako aj potrebným a cestovateľ. To je najlepšie pre tých, ktorí túžia tvár Alah, a to oni, kto bude úspešný.

trans-unit.source: And whatever you give for interest to increase within the wealth of people will not increase with Allah. But what you give in zakah, desiring the countenance of Allah - those are the multipliers.
trans-unit.target: A čo dáte za záujem zvýšiť do bohatstva ľudí bude vzrastať Alah. Ale čo si dať Zakát, želajúc si tvár Alah - tie sú šíriteľmi.

trans-unit.source: Allah is the one who created you, then provided for you, then will cause you to die, and then will give you life. Are there any of your "partners" who does anything of that? Exalted is He and high above what they associate with Him.
trans-unit.target: Boh je ten, ktorý ste vytvorili, potom pre vás, potom spôsobí, že budete zomrieť, a potom vám život. Sú tam niektorý z vašich "partnerov", kto robí niečo z toho? Vyvýšený je on a vysoko nad to, čo sa spájajú s ním.

trans-unit.source: Corruption has appeared throughout the land and sea by [reason of] what the hands of people have earned so He may let them taste part of [the consequence of] what they have done that perhaps they will return [to righteousness].
trans-unit.target: Korupcia sa objavil v celej zeme a mora od [dôvod] čo rúk ľudí, ktorí zarobili, tak on môže nechať chuť časť [dôsledkom] čo urobili, že možno sa vráti [Božia spravodlivosť].

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "Travel through the land and observe how was the end of those before. Most of them were associators [of others with Allah].
trans-unit.target: Napríklad: [Mohamed], "cestovať po krajine a pozorovať, ako bola pred koncom. Väčšina z nich boli priradení [druhých s Allah].

trans-unit.source: So direct your face toward the correct religion before a Day comes from Allah of which there is no repelling. That Day, they will be divided.
trans-unit.target: Takže priamo tváre smerom k správne náboženstvo pred denne prichádza od Boha, z ktorých nie je žiadny odpudzuje. Ten deň, budú rozdelené.

trans-unit.source: Whoever disbelieves - upon him is [the consequence of] his disbelief. And whoever does righteousness - they are for themselves preparing,
trans-unit.target: Kto neverí - mu vyplýva [zo] jeho nedôvera. A ten, kto robí spravodlivosť - sú pre seba pripravovať,

trans-unit.source: That He may reward those who have believed and done righteous deeds out of His bounty. Indeed, He does not like the disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: Že on môže odmeniť tých, ktorí verili a urobil spravodlivé skutky z jeho štedrosť. V skutočnosti, on nemá rád neveriacim.

trans-unit.source: And of His signs is that He sends the winds as bringers of good tidings and to let you taste His mercy and so the ships may sail at His command and so you may seek of His bounty, and perhaps you will be grateful.
trans-unit.target: A jeho príznakov je, že mu posiela vetry ako poslovia dobrú zvesť a aby vám chuť jeho milosrdenstvo a tak lode môžu plávať na jeho príkaz a tak môžete požiadať o jeho štedrosť a možno vám bude vďačný.

trans-unit.source: And We have already sent messengers before you to their peoples, and they came to them with clear evidences; then We took retribution from those who committed crimes, and incumbent upon Us was support of the believers.
trans-unit.target: Máme už poslal poslov pred vami ich národy a prišli k nim s jasné dôkazy; potom sme sa odplata za tých, ktorí spáchali zločiny a pripadajúcich na nás bola podpora veriacich.

trans-unit.source: It is Allah who sends the winds, and they stir the clouds and spread them in the sky however He wills, and He makes them fragments so you see the rain emerge from within them. And when He causes it to fall upon whom He wills of His servants, immediately they rejoice
trans-unit.target: Je to Boh, kto posiela vetry a miešajte mraky a šíriť ich v nebi, ale on chce, a robí ich fragmenty, takže vidíte, že dážď vynorí z v nich. A ak on spôsobuje, že jeseň koho on závetu, jeho zamestnancov, okamžite sa radovať

trans-unit.source: Although they were, before it was sent down upon them - before that, in despair.
trans-unit.target: Hoci boli, predtým to bolo zoslal na ne - pred tým, v zúfalstve.

trans-unit.source: So observe the effects of the mercy of Allah - how He gives life to the earth after its lifelessness. Indeed, that [same one] will give life to the dead, and He is over all things competent.
trans-unit.target: Tak pozorovať účinky na milosť a nemilosť Boha - ako on dáva život na zemi po jeho lifelessness. Naozaj, že [samá] dám život mŕtvy, a on je nad všetkými vecami, ktoré sú príslušné.

trans-unit.source: But if We should send a [bad] wind and they saw [their crops] turned yellow, they would remain thereafter disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: Ale ak budeme posielať [zlé] vetra a videli [ich plodiny] obrátil žltej, by zostali potom neveriacim.

trans-unit.source: So indeed, you will not make the dead hear, nor will you make the deaf hear the call when they turn their backs, retreating.
trans-unit.target: Takže naozaj, nebudete robiť mŕtveho počuť, ani si nepočujúcich počuť volanie, keď sa vrátim, ustupujúce.

trans-unit.source: And you cannot guide the blind away from their error. You will only make hear those who believe in Our verses so they are Muslims [in submission to Allah].
trans-unit.target: A nemôže viesť slepého od ich chyba. Budete robiť počuť tých, ktorí veria v naše verše, tak oni sú moslimovia [v predloženie Allah].

trans-unit.source: Allah is the one who created you from weakness, then made after weakness strength, then made after strength weakness and white hair. He creates what He wills, and He is the Knowing, the Competent.
trans-unit.target: Boh je ten, kto vás stvoril z slabosť, potom sa po slabosť sila, potom sa po silu slabosť a biele vlasy. Vytvára to, čo on chce, a on je znalosť, kompetentní.

trans-unit.source: And the Day the Hour appears the criminals will swear they had remained but an hour. Thus they were deluded.
trans-unit.target: A deň, hodina sa zločinci bude prisahať zotrvali ale za hodinu. Preto boli oklamany.

trans-unit.source: But those who were given knowledge and faith will say, "You remained the extent of Allah 's decree until the Day of Resurrection, and this is the Day of Resurrection, but you did not used to know."
trans-unit.target: Ale tí, ktorí dostali vedomosti a vieru hovoriť, "ste zostal v rozsahu vyhlášky Alaha až v deň zmŕtvychvstania, a to je deň vzkriesenia, ale didn'ti používal vedieť."

trans-unit.source: So that Day, their excuse will not benefit those who wronged, nor will they be asked to appease [Allah].
trans-unit.target: Tak, že deň, ich ospravedlnenie nebude čerpať tých, ktorí ublížili, ani sa pýtali upokojiť [Boh].

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly presented to the people in this Qur'an from every [kind of] example. But, [O Muhammad], if you should bring them a sign, the disbelievers will surely say, "You [believers] are but falsifiers."
trans-unit.target: A určite sme prezentovali ľuďom v tejto Qur'an z každých [druh] príklad. Ale [Mohamed], ak by ste mali priniesť im znamenie, iste bude hovoriť neveriacim "[veriacich] ste ale falsifiers."

trans-unit.source: Thus does Allah seal the hearts of those who do not know.
trans-unit.target: Preto Alah tesnenie srdcia tých, ktorí nevedia.

trans-unit.source: So be patient. Indeed, the promise of Allah is truth. And let them not disquiet you who are not certain [in faith].
trans-unit.target: Takže buďte trpezliví. Prísľub Alah je skutočne pravda. A nech nie ste, ktorí nie sú určité [vo viere] disquiet.

trans-unit.source: Alif, Lam, Meem.
trans-unit.target: Alif, Lam, Mîm.

trans-unit.source: These are verses of the wise Book,
trans-unit.target: Sú to verše múdre knihy,

trans-unit.source: As guidance and mercy for the doers of good
trans-unit.target: Ako usmernenie a milosť pre konajte dobro

trans-unit.source: Who establish prayer and give zakah, and they, of the Hereafter, are certain [in faith].
trans-unit.target: Kto vytvorí modlitby a dať Zakát, a oni z nižšie, sú určité [vo viere].

trans-unit.source: Those are on [right] guidance from their Lord, and it is those who are the successful.
trans-unit.target: Tie sú na [vpravo] usmernenie od ich pána, a to je tých, ktorí sú úspešní.

trans-unit.source: And of the people is he who buys the amusement of speech to mislead [others] from the way of Allah without knowledge and who takes it in ridicule. Those will have a humiliating punishment.
trans-unit.target: A ľudí je ten, kto si kúpi pobavenie reči do omylu [others] od spôsobu, akým Boh bez vedomia a ktorý trvá výsmech. Tie budú mať poni ujúce tresty.

trans-unit.source: And when our verses are recited to him, he turns away arrogantly as if he had not heard them, as if there was in his ears deafness. So give him tidings of a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: A keď naše verše sú prednášal na neho, odvráti arogantne akoby on nepočul, ako keby tam bol v jeho uši hluchota. Tak mu zvesť o bolestivé trest.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who believe and do righteous deeds - for them are the Gardens of Pleasure.
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti tí, ktorí veria, a robiť spravodlivé činy - pre nich sú záhrady radosť.

trans-unit.source: Wherein they abide eternally; [it is] the promise of Allah [which is] truth. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
trans-unit.target: Pričom dodržia naveky; [je] sľub Alah, [ktoré] pravda. A on je postáv by, múdry.

trans-unit.source: He created the heavens without pillars that you see and has cast into the earth firmly set mountains, lest it should shift with you, and dispersed therein from every creature. And We sent down rain from the sky and made grow therein [plants] of every noble kind.
trans-unit.target: Stvoril nebesia bez pilierov, ktoré vidíte a obsadil do Zeme pevne stanovenej hôr, inak by sa presunúť s vami a rozptýlené v nej z každého tvora. A sme zoslal dážď z neba a pestovať v ňom [zariadenia] každý šľachtic druhu.

trans-unit.source: This is the creation of Allah. So show Me what those other than Him have created. Rather, the wrongdoers are in clear error.
trans-unit.target: To je vytvorenie Alah. Tak, ukáž mi, čo tí, ako ho vytvorili. Skôr zloèinci sú jasné chyba.

trans-unit.source: And We had certainly given Luqman wisdom [and said], "Be grateful to Allah." And whoever is grateful is grateful for [the benefit of] himself. And whoever denies [His favor] - then indeed, Allah is Free of need and Praiseworthy.
trans-unit.target: A mali sme určite dal Luqmani múdrosť [a povedal], "Vďačný Bohu." A kto je vďačná vďačná [výhody] sám. A ten, kto popiera [doma] - potom skutočne Alah je zadarmo, potreby a Praiseworthy.

trans-unit.source: And [mention, O Muhammad], when Luqman said to his son while he was instructing him, "O my son, do not associate [anything] with Allah. Indeed, association [with him] is great injustice."
trans-unit.target: A [zmienka, Mohamed], keď Luqmani povedal jeho syn zatiaľ čo on bol prikázal mu, "môj synu, nespájajú [niečo] s Alláh. Združenie [s ním] je naozaj veľká nespravodlivosť."

trans-unit.source: And We have enjoined upon man [care] for his parents. His mother carried him, [increasing her] in weakness upon weakness, and his weaning is in two years. Be grateful to Me and to your parents; to Me is the [final] destination.
trans-unit.target: A budeme mať vymeral na človeka [starostlivosti] pre svojich rodičov. Jeho matka ho [zvýšenie jej] nosila v slabosti na slabosť a jeho odstavenie je dva roky. Byť vďačný pre mňa a svojich rodičov; pre mňa je [konečné] miesto určenia.

trans-unit.source: But if they endeavor to make you associate with Me that of which you have no knowledge, do not obey them but accompany them in [this] world with appropriate kindness and follow the way of those who turn back to Me [in repentance]. Then to Me will be your return, and I will inform you about what you used to do.
trans-unit.target: Ale ak sa budú snažiť, aby ste sa mnou pridruženému, ktoré ste žiadne vedomosti, nie počúvať ich ale sprevádzame v [tomto] svet s láskavosťou vhodné a Sledujte cestu tých, ktorí sa vrátiť ku mne [v pokánia]. Potom mi bude váš návrat, a bude vás informovať o tom, čo ste zvyknutí robiť.

trans-unit.source: [And Luqman said], "O my son, indeed if wrong should be the weight of a mustard seed and should be within a rock or [anywhere] in the heavens or in the earth, Allah will bring it forth. Indeed, Allah is Subtle and Acquainted.
trans-unit.target: [A Luqmani povedal], "môj synu, v skutočnosti ak zle by mala byť váha horčičné semienko a by mali byť do skaly alebo [kdekoľvek] na nebi alebo na zemi, Alah prinesie späť. Alah je skutočne jemné a Acquainted.

trans-unit.source: O my son, establish prayer, enjoin what is right, forbid what is wrong, and be patient over what befalls you. Indeed, [all] that is of the matters [requiring] determination.
trans-unit.target: O môjho syna, vytvoriť modlitba, nariaďuje, čo je správne, chráň, čo sa deje, a byť trpezlivý cez to, befalls vás. [Všetky], ktoré je skutočne určovania záležitostí, [ktoré].

trans-unit.source: And do not turn your cheek [in contempt] toward people and do not walk through the earth exultantly. Indeed, Allah does not like everyone self-deluded and boastful.
trans-unit.target: A zase vašu tvár [v opovrhnutie] voči ľuďom a nie chodiť po zemi:. Naozaj, Boh nemá rád každý samostatne oklamany a sebavedome.

trans-unit.source: And be moderate in your pace and lower your voice; indeed, the most disagreeable of sounds is the voice of donkeys."
trans-unit.target: Sa stredne vaše tempo a znížiť svoj hlas; v skutočnosti, najviac nepríjemné zvuky je hlas somáre."

trans-unit.source: Do you not see that Allah has made subject to you whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth and amply bestowed upon you His favors, [both] apparent and unapparent? But of the people is he who disputes about Allah without knowledge or guidance or an enlightening Book [from Him].
trans-unit.target: Nie ste vidieť, že Alah urobil za vás, čo je v nebesiach a čo je na zemi a bohato obdarila si jeho priazeň, [ako] vyplýva aj unapparent? Ale ľudí je ten, kto pochybuje o Alah bez vedomostí alebo usmernenie alebo poučné knihy [od neho].

trans-unit.source: And when it is said to them, "Follow what Allah has revealed," they say, "Rather, we will follow that upon which we found our fathers." Even if Satan was inviting them to the punishment of the Blaze?
trans-unit.target: A keď sa hovorí, "Nasleduj to, čo Boh ukázal," hovoria, že "Skôr, budeme sledovať, po ktorých sme zistili naši otcovia." Aj keď Satan bol vyzve ich, aby trest požiar?

trans-unit.source: And whoever submits his face to Allah while he is a doer of good - then he has grasped the most trustworthy handhold. And to Allah will be the outcome of [all] matters.
trans-unit.target: A každý, kto tvrdí jeho tvár Alah, zatiaľ čo on je dobrý - muž činu, potom on pochopil najdôveryhodnejší držadlo. A Boh bude výsledok [všetky] záležitosti.

trans-unit.source: And whoever has disbelieved - let not his disbelief grieve you. To Us is their return, and We will inform them of what they did. Indeed, Allah is Knowing of that within the breasts.
trans-unit.target: A kto má pochyboval - nech nie jeho neveriacky budete smúti. Pre nás je ich návratu a budeme informovať, čo robili. Alah je skutočne vedieť, že v prsia.

trans-unit.source: We grant them enjoyment for a little; then We will force them to a massive punishment.
trans-unit.target: Poskytujeme im potešenie, pre trochu; potom sme donúti masívne trestu.

trans-unit.source: And if you asked them, "Who created the heavens and earth?" they would surely say, "Allah." Say, "[All] praise is [due] to Allah "; but most of them do not know.
trans-unit.target: A ak budete opýtaný, "Ktorý stvoril nebo a zem?" by určite hovoria, "Boh." Hovoria, že "[všetky] chvála je [spôsobené] Boha"; ale väčšina z nich nevie.

trans-unit.source: To Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and earth. Indeed, Allah is the Free of need, the Praiseworthy.
trans-unit.target: Bohu patrí, čo je na nebi i na zemi. Alah je skutočne zadarmo potreby, Praiseworthy.

trans-unit.source: And if whatever trees upon the earth were pens and the sea [was ink], replenished thereafter by seven [more] seas, the words of Allah would not be exhausted. Indeed, Allah is Exalted in Might and Wise.
trans-unit.target: A ak všetky stromy na zemi boli perá a more [bol atrament], doplňovaný potom sedem morí [viac], slov Alah by nevyčerpá. Vskutku, Alah je vyvýšené Might a múdry.

trans-unit.source: Your creation and your resurrection will not be but as that of a single soul. Indeed, Allah is Hearing and Seeing.
trans-unit.target: Svoj výtvor a svojho vzkriesenia nebudú ale ako jedinej duše. Vskutku, Alah je vypočutie a videnie.

trans-unit.source: Do you not see that Allah causes the night to enter the day and causes the day to enter the night and has subjected the sun and the moon, each running [its course] for a specified term, and that Allah, with whatever you do, is Acquainted?
trans-unit.target: Nie vidíte že Alah spôsobuje v noci do dňa a spôsobuje dňom do noci a má vystavený, slnko a mesiac, každý beží [jeho priebehu] pre zadaný výraz, a že Alah s čokoľvek robíte, je zoznámiť?

trans-unit.source: That is because Allah is the Truth, and that what they call upon other than Him is falsehood, and because Allah is the Most High, the Grand.
trans-unit.target: To je preto, že Boh je pravda a že to, čo hovoria na okrem neho je lož, a preto Alah je Most High, Grand.

trans-unit.source: Do you not see that ships sail through the sea by the favor of Allah that He may show you of His signs? Indeed in that are signs for everyone patient and grateful.
trans-unit.target: Nie ste vidieť, že lode sa plavia cez more v prospech Alah, že on môže ukázať vám jeho znamenie? Naozaj v tom, že sú príznaky pre každého pacienta a vďačný.

trans-unit.source: And when waves come over them like canopies, they supplicate Allah, sincere to Him in religion. But when He delivers them to the land, there are [some] of them who are moderate [in faith]. And none rejects Our signs except everyone treacherous and ungrateful.
trans-unit.target: A keď prídu vlny nad nimi ako markízy, snažně prosit Alaha, úprimne mu v náboženstve. Ale keď on im dodáva do pôdy, existuje [niektorí] z nich, ktorí sú mierne [vo viere]. A žiadny odmieta našich značiek okrem všetci zradné a nevďačný.

trans-unit.source: O mankind, fear your Lord and fear a Day when no father will avail his son, nor will a son avail his father at all. Indeed, the promise of Allah is truth, so let not the worldly life delude you and be not deceived about Allah by the Deceiver.
trans-unit.target: O ľudstvo, strachu svojho pána a strach, deň, keď otca bude využívať svojho syna, ani syn využije otca vôbec. Vskutku, sľub, že Boh je pravda, tak nech nie pozemský život si klamať a nie sa oklamať o Alah podvodník.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah [alone] has knowledge of the Hour and sends down the rain and knows what is in the wombs. And no soul perceives what it will earn tomorrow, and no soul perceives in what land it will die. Indeed, Allah is Knowing and Acquainted.
trans-unit.target: Vskutku, Alah [sám] má vedomosti o hodinu a pošle nadol dážď a vie, čo je v lona. Žiadna duša vníma, čo bude zajtra zarábať a žiadna duša vníma, v akej krajine zomrie. Alah je skutočne vedieť a Acquainted.

trans-unit.source: Alif, Lam, Meem.
trans-unit.target: Alif, Lam, Mîm.

trans-unit.source: [This is] the revelation of the Book about which there is no doubt from the Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: [Je] zjavenia knihy, o ktorých nie je pochýb od pána svetov.

trans-unit.source: Or do they say, "He invented it"? Rather, it is the truth from your Lord, [O Muhammad], that you may warn a people to whom no warner has come before you [so] perhaps they will be guided.
trans-unit.target: Alebo hovoria, "Že on vynašiel to"? Skôr, je to pravda od svojho pána, [Mohamed], že môže varovať ľudí, ktorým žiadne warner má prísť pred vami [tak] snáď budú riadiť.

trans-unit.source: It is Allah who created the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them in six days; then He established Himself above the Throne. You have not besides Him any protector or any intercessor; so will you not be reminded?
trans-unit.target: Je to Boh, ktorý vytvoril nebies a Zeme a čo je medzi nimi v šiestich dní; potom založil sám nad trón. Máte nie mimo neho nejaké chránič alebo akékoľvek obhajcu; tak sa vám nemôže byť pripomenul?

trans-unit.source: He arranges [each] matter from the heaven to the earth; then it will ascend to Him in a Day, the extent of which is a thousand years of those which you count.
trans-unit.target: Zabezpečuje [každý] veci z neba na zem; potom bude stúpať s ním denne, ktorého rozsah je tisíc rokov tých, ktoré ste spoľahnúť.

trans-unit.source: That is the Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, the Exalted in Might, the Merciful,
trans-unit.target: Ktorý je vševedúci neviditeľné a svedkom postáv by, je Milosrdných

trans-unit.source: Who perfected everything which He created and began the creation of man from clay.
trans-unit.target: Kto k dokonalosti, všetko, čo stvoril a začal stvorení človeka z hliny.

trans-unit.source: Then He made his posterity out of the extract of a liquid disdained.
trans-unit.target: Potom on robil jeho potomstvo z kvapaliny pohŕdal.

trans-unit.source: Then He proportioned him and breathed into him from His [created] soul and made for you hearing and vision and hearts; little are you grateful.
trans-unit.target: Potom rástla ho a vdýchol mu z jeho [vytvorené] dušu a ste vypočutie a videnie a srdce; trochu ste vďační.

trans-unit.source: And they say, "When we are lost within the earth, will we indeed be [recreated] in a new creation?" Rather, they are, in [the matter of] the meeting with their Lord, disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: A oni hovoria, "keď sme stratili v zemi, sme naozaj bude [znova] nové stvorenie?" Trochu, oni sú v [otázka] stretnutie s ich pán, neveriacim.

trans-unit.source: Say, "The angel of death will take you who has been entrusted with you. Then to your Lord you will be returned."
trans-unit.target: Povedať: "anjel smrti sa vám, ktorí ste bola poverená. Potom váš pán vám budú vrátené."

trans-unit.source: If you could but see when the criminals are hanging their heads before their Lord, [saying], "Our Lord, we have seen and heard, so return us [to the world]; we will work righteousness. Indeed, we are [now] certain."
trans-unit.target: Ak by mohli, ale vidieť, keď zločinci sú zavesené hlavy pred ich pán [povedať], "nášho Pána, sme videli a počuli, tak vrátiť nás [vo svete]; budeme pracovať spravodlivosť. V skutočnosti sme teraz] niektoré."

trans-unit.source: And if We had willed, We could have given every soul its guidance, but the word from Me will come into effect [that] "I will surely fill Hell with jinn and people all together.
trans-unit.target: A ak sme mali vôľou, mohli sme dali každá duša jeho vedenie, ale slovo odo mňa príde do platnosti [že] "som sa určite naplní peklo jinn a ľudí dohromady.

trans-unit.source: So taste [punishment] because you forgot the meeting of this, your Day; indeed, We have [accordingly] forgotten you. And taste the punishment of eternity for what you used to do."
trans-unit.target: Tak Ochutnajte [trest], pretože ste zabudli na zasadnutí tento deň; v skutočnosti sme [preto] zabudli ste. A chuť trest večnosti, na čo ste zvyknutí robiť."

trans-unit.source: Only those believe in Our verses who, when they are reminded by them, fall down in prostration and exalt [Allah] with praise of their Lord, and they are not arrogant.
trans-unit.target: Len tí veria v naše verše, ktorí, keď si pamätám, padajú vyčerpanie a povýši [Allah] s chválou svojho pána, a nie arogantný.

trans-unit.source: They arise from [their] beds; they supplicate their Lord in fear and aspiration, and from what We have provided them, they spend.
trans-unit.target: Vyplývajú z [ich] lôžok; Oni snažně prosiť svojho pána v strachu a ašpirácie, a z čo sme poskytli im, trávia.

trans-unit.source: And no soul knows what has been hidden for them of comfort for eyes as reward for what they used to do.
trans-unit.target: A žiadna duša vie, čo má skryté pre ich pohodlie pre oči ako odmenu za to, čo bývali.

trans-unit.source: Then is one who was a believer like one who was defiantly disobedient? They are not equal.
trans-unit.target: Potom je ten, kto bol veriaci ako ten, kto bol vyzývavo neposlušný? Nie sú rovnaké.

trans-unit.source: As for those who believed and did righteous deeds, for them will be the Gardens of Refuge as accommodation for what they used to do.
trans-unit.target: Pokiaľ ide o tých, ktorí verili a urobil spravodlivé skutky, pre nich bude záhrady útočisko ako ubytovanie pre čo boli zvyknutí robiť.

trans-unit.source: But as for those who defiantly disobeyed, their refuge is the Fire. Every time they wish to emerge from it, they will be returned to it while it is said to them, "Taste the punishment of the Fire which you used to deny."
trans-unit.target: Ale pre tých, ktorí sa vyzývavo neposlúchli, svoje útočisko je oheň. Zakaždým, keď sa chcú vymaniť sa z neho, budú vrátené na to, keď sa hovorí, že je "Chuť trest ohňa, ktorý ste použili popierať."

trans-unit.source: And we will surely let them taste the nearer punishment short of the greater punishment that perhaps they will repent.
trans-unit.target: A určite dáme im chuť bližšie trest krátky väčší trest, ktorý možno bude robiť pokánie.

trans-unit.source: And who is more unjust than one who is reminded of the verses of his Lord; then he turns away from them? Indeed We, from the criminals, will take retribution.
trans-unit.target: A kto je viac nespravodlivé, ako ten ktorý sa pripomenul veršov svojho pána; potom odvráti sa od nich? V skutočnosti, od zločincov, podnikneme odplaty.

trans-unit.source: And We certainly gave Moses the Scripture, so do not be in doubt over his meeting. And we made the Torah guidance for the Children of Israel.
trans-unit.target: A určite sme dali Moses písma, takže nebuďte pochybnosti nad jeho stretnutie. A my sa Tóra usmernenia pre deti Izraela.

trans-unit.source: And We made from among them leaders guiding by Our command when they were patient and [when] they were certain of Our signs.
trans-unit.target: A urobili sme spomedzi ich predstavitelia vedenia podľa nášho velenia, keď boli trpezliví a [] boli niektoré z našich značiek.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, your Lord will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection concerning that over which they used to differ.
trans-unit.target: Vskutku, váš Pán bude súdiť medzi nimi na deň vzkriesenia, ktoré používajú líšiť o.

trans-unit.source: Has it not become clear to them how many generations We destroyed before them, [as] they walk among their dwellings? Indeed in that are signs; then do they not hear?
trans-unit.target: To nestal jasné, koľko generácií sme zničili pred nimi, [ako] chodí medzi ich obydlia? Naozaj v tom, že sú príznaky; potom oni nepočuje?

trans-unit.source: Have they not seen that We drive the water [in clouds] to barren land and bring forth thereby crops from which their livestock eat and [they] themselves? Then do they not see?
trans-unit.target: Oni nevideli že ideme vody [v oblakoch] neplodné pôdy a priviesť späť tým plodiny z ich zvieratá jedia a [oni]? Potom sa nevidí?

trans-unit.source: And they say, "When will be this conquest, if you should be truthful?"
trans-unit.target: A hovoria: "Kedy bude toto dobytie, ak by ste mali byť pravdivé?"

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "On the Day of Conquest the belief of those who had disbelieved will not benefit them, nor will they be reprieved."
trans-unit.target: Napríklad: [Mohamed], "deň dobytie presvedčenie tých, ktorí mali pochyboval nebude čerpať ich, ani ich reprieved."

trans-unit.source: So turn away from them and wait. Indeed, they are waiting.
trans-unit.target: Takže zase preč od nich a čakať. V skutočnosti čakajú.

trans-unit.source: O Prophet, fear Allah and do not obey the disbelievers and the hypocrites. Indeed, Allah is ever Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: O proroka, strach Alah a nepočúvajú, neveriacim a pokrytci. Alah je skutočne vôbec vedieť a múdry.

trans-unit.source: And follow that which is revealed to you from your Lord. Indeed Allah is ever, with what you do, Acquainted.
trans-unit.target: A sledovať to, čo sa prejavuje na vás od pána vášho. Naozaj Alah je niekedy, s čo robíte, oboznámený.

trans-unit.source: And rely upon Allah; and sufficient is Allah as Disposer of affairs.
trans-unit.target: A spoliehať sa na Boha; a dostatočná je Alah zneškodňovateľ vecí.

trans-unit.source: Allah has not made for a man two hearts in his interior. And He has not made your wives whom you declare unlawful your mothers. And he has not made your adopted sons your [true] sons. That is [merely] your saying by your mouths, but Allah says the truth, and He guides to the [right] way.
trans-unit.target: Boh sa pre človeka dve srdcia v jeho interiéri. A nebol vykonaný svoje ženy ktorým vyhlásiť nezákonné vašej matky. A nebol vykonaný adoptívnych synov svojich synov [pravda]. Čiže [len] vaše ústa, ale Alah hovorí pravdu, a že sprievodca [správne].

trans-unit.source: Call them by [the names of] their fathers; it is more just in the sight of Allah. But if you do not know their fathers - then they are [still] your brothers in religion and those entrusted to you. And there is no blame upon you for that in which you have erred but [only for] what your hearts intended. And ever is Allah Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Volať ktoré [mena] ich otcovia; je to viac len v očiach Alah. Ale ak neviete ich otcovia - potom sú [stále] svojich bratov v náboženstve a sú zverené k vám. A nie je tam žiadne vinu na vás za to čo ste prehnane ale [len pre] čo vaše srdcia určené. A niekedy je Boh odpúšťa a Milosrdných.

trans-unit.source: The Prophet is more worthy of the believers than themselves, and his wives are [in the position of] their mothers. And those of [blood] relationship are more entitled [to inheritance] in the decree of Allah than the [other] believers and the emigrants, except that you may do to your close associates a kindness [through bequest]. That was in the Book inscribed.
trans-unit.target: Prorok je viac hoden veriaci, než oni sami, a jeho manželky sú [postavenie] matkami. A tých vzťahov [krv] viac oprávnení [dedičstvo] vo vyhláške Alaha ako [Ostatné] veriacich a emigranti, s výnimkou, že môžete urobiť pre vašich blízkych spolupracovníkov láskavosť [prostredníctvom dedičstva]. To bolo v knihe zapísaných.

trans-unit.source: And [mention, O Muhammad], when We took from the prophets their covenant and from you and from Noah and Abraham and Moses and Jesus, the son of Mary; and We took from them a solemn covenant.
trans-unit.target: A [zmienka, Mohamed], keď sme z prorokov, ich paktu a od vás a Noe, Abrahám Moses a Ježiš, syn Márie; a my sme si od nich slávnostné zmluvu.

trans-unit.source: That He may question the truthful about their truth. And He has prepared for the disbelievers a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: Že môžu pýtať pravdivé o ich pravdu. A on pripravil neveriacim bolestivé trest.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, remember the favor of Allah upon you when armies came to [attack] you and We sent upon them a wind and armies [of angels] you did not see. And ever is Allah, of what you do, Seeing.
trans-unit.target: O vás, ktorí ste uverili, pamäti prospech Boh na vás pri armády prišiel [útok] a poslali sme im vietor a armády [anjeli] ste nevideli. A niekedy je Alah, čo robiť, vidieť.

trans-unit.source: [Remember] when they came at you from above you and from below you, and when eyes shifted [in fear], and hearts reached the throats and you assumed about Allah [various] assumptions.
trans-unit.target: [Nezabudnite], keď prišiel na teba zhora a zospodu si a keď oči presunula [v strachu], a srdce dosiahol hrdla a predpokladať, o Alah [rôzne] predpoklady.

trans-unit.source: There the believers were tested and shaken with a severe shaking.
trans-unit.target: Tam boli testované veriacich a zmietanú ťažké trasie.

trans-unit.source: And [remember] when the hypocrites and those in whose hearts is disease said, "Allah and His Messenger did not promise us except delusion,"
trans-unit.target: A [pamätať] keď pokrytci a tí, ktorých srdce je choroba povedal: "Alah a jeho posol to nesľúbila nás okrem klamu"

trans-unit.source: And when a faction of them said, "O people of Yathrib, there is no stability for you [here], so return [home]." And a party of them asked permission of the Prophet, saying, "Indeed, our houses are unprotected," while they were not exposed. They did not intend except to flee.
trans-unit.target: A keď frakcie im povedal: "O ľudí Yathrib, neexistuje žiadny stabilitu pre vás [tu], takže návrat [home]." A strana z nich požiadal o povolenie proroka, riekol: "Naše domy sú v skutočnosti nechránené," kým neboli vystavené. Oni nezamýšľala okrem sa utiecť.

trans-unit.source: And if they had been entered upon from all its [surrounding] regions and fitnah had been demanded of them, they would have done it and not hesitated over it except briefly.
trans-unit.target: A ak oni boli vstúpil od všetkých jeho [okolo] regióny a fitnah boli požadoval od nich, oni by to urobili, a nie váhal nad ním okrem krátko.

trans-unit.source: And they had already promised Allah before not to turn their backs and flee. And ever is the promise to Allah [that about which one will be] questioned.
trans-unit.target: A už sľúbil Alah pred obrátiť chrbtom a utiecť. A niekedy je sľub, že Alah, [že o tom, ktorý z nich bude] spochybnil.

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "Never will fleeing benefit you if you should flee from death or killing; and then [if you did], you would not be given enjoyment [of life] except for a little."
trans-unit.target: J. [Mohamed], "nikdy utekajú prospeje vám ak by utiecť z dôvodu smrti alebo zabíjania; a potom [Ak ste], by nedal potešenie [života] s výnimkou málo. "

trans-unit.source: Say, "Who is it that can protect you from Allah if He intends for you an ill or intends for you a mercy?" And they will not find for themselves besides Allah any protector or any helper.
trans-unit.target: Povedať: "Kto je to, že vás môže ochrániť od Boha ak on chce pre vás je zle alebo si chce milosrdenstvo?" A že nebudete nájsť pre seba okrem Alaha chránič alebo akékoľvek pomocné.

trans-unit.source: Already Allah knows the hinderers among you and those [hypocrites] who say to their brothers, "Come to us," and do not go to battle, except for a few,
trans-unit.target: Už Alah vie hinderers medzi vás a tie [pokrytci] kto povedať ich bratia, "Príďte k nám," a ísť do boja, s výnimkou niekoľkých málo,

trans-unit.source: Indisposed toward you. And when fear comes, you see them looking at you, their eyes revolving like one being overcome by death. But when fear departs, they lash you with sharp tongues, indisposed toward [any] good. Those have not believed, so Allah has rendered their deeds worthless, and ever is that, for Allah, easy.
trans-unit.target: Spôsobilý k vám. A keď strach, vidíte im pozerá na teba, oči točiace sa ako, že prekonať smrť. Ale keď strach odchádza, oni si bič s ostrým jazykom, spôsobilý k [] ničomu. Tých nie veril, tak Boh poskytol svoje skutky bezcenné a niekedy je, že pre Alaha, jednoduché.

trans-unit.source: They think the companies have not [yet] withdrawn. And if the companies should come [again], they would wish they were in the desert among the bedouins, inquiring [from afar] about your news. And if they should be among you, they would not fight except for a little.
trans-unit.target: Myslí, že spoločnosti majú nie [ešte] zrušené. A ak spoločnosti [znova], chcú by boli v púšti u beduínov [z diaľky] informujete svoje novinky. A ak by mali byť medzi vami, by bojovať s výnimkou málo.

trans-unit.source: There has certainly been for you in the Messenger of Allah an excellent pattern for anyone whose hope is in Allah and the Last Day and [who] remembers Allah often.
trans-unit.target: Tam určite bol pre vás v posla Alláhova vynikajúci vzor pre každého, ktorého nádejou je Boh a posledný deň a [ktorí] spomína Alah často.

trans-unit.source: And when the believers saw the companies, they said, "This is what Allah and His Messenger had promised us, and Allah and His Messenger spoke the truth." And it increased them only in faith and acceptance.
trans-unit.target: A keď veriaci videl spoločnosti, povedali, "to je to, čo Boh nám sľúbil jeho posol a Alah a jeho posol hovoril pravdu." A to im zvýšili len vo viere a prijatie.

trans-unit.source: Among the believers are men true to what they promised Allah. Among them is he who has fulfilled his vow [to the death], and among them is he who awaits [his chance]. And they did not alter [the terms of their commitment] by any alteration -
trans-unit.target: Medzi veriacich sú muži pravda to, čo sľúbil Boh. Medzi nimi je ten, kto splnil svoj sľub [až do smrti] a medzi nimi je ten, kto čaká [svoju šancu]. A oni nezmenil [podmienky ich záväzku] o akejkoľvek zmene-

trans-unit.source: That Allah may reward the truthful for their truth and punish the hypocrites if He wills or accept their repentance. Indeed, Allah is ever Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Že Alah môže odmeniť pravdivé, za ich pravdu a trestať pokrytci, ak on chce alebo akceptovať ich pokánie. Boh je naozaj niekedy odpúšťajúci a milosrdný.

trans-unit.source: And Allah repelled those who disbelieved, in their rage, not having obtained any good. And sufficient was Allah for the believers in battle, and ever is Allah Powerful and Exalted in Might.
trans-unit.target: A Allah odrazil tých, kto pochyboval, svoje zlosti nie získali nejaké dobré. A dostatočné bol Boh pre veriacich v bitke, a niekedy je Boh mocný a postáv by.

trans-unit.source: And He brought down those who supported them among the People of the Scripture from their fortresses and cast terror into their hearts [so that] a party you killed, and you took captive a party.
trans-unit.target: Priviezol si tých, ktorí podporovali ich medzi ľuďmi písmo z ich pevnosti a obsadenie teroru do svojich sŕdc, [aby] strana si zabil a vzal zajatí stranou.

trans-unit.source: And He caused you to inherit their land and their homes and their properties and a land which you have not trodden. And ever is Allah, over all things, competent.
trans-unit.target: A spôsobil, že ste zdedili ich pôdy a ich domovov a ich vlastnosti a pozemky, ktoré majú nie šliapať. A niekedy je Alaha, cez všetky veci príslušný.

trans-unit.source: O Prophet, say to your wives, "If you should desire the worldly life and its adornment, then come, I will provide for you and give you a gracious release.
trans-unit.target: O proroka, hovoria, že na vašej manželky, "Ak ste mali túžbu, pozemský život a jeho ozdobou, potom príde, budem poskytnúť pre vás a vám milostivý uvoľnenie.

trans-unit.source: But if you should desire Allah and His Messenger and the home of the Hereafter - then indeed, Allah has prepared for the doers of good among you a great reward."
trans-unit.target: Ale ak by Alah a jeho posol a domov ďalej - potom skutočne Boh pripravil pre konajte dobré medzi vami veľká odmena."

trans-unit.source: O wives of the Prophet, whoever of you should commit a clear immorality - for her the punishment would be doubled two fold, and ever is that, for Allah, easy.
trans-unit.target: O manželky proroka, kto z vás by sa mali zaviazať jasné nemorálnosť - pre jej trest bude dvojnásobná dva krát, a stále je, Alah, jednoduché.

trans-unit.source: And whoever of you devoutly obeys Allah and His Messenger and does righteousness - We will give her her reward twice; and We have prepared for her a noble provision.
trans-unit.target: A kto z vás vrúcne počúva Alah a jeho posol, a to spravodlivosť - dáme ju jej odmena dvakrát; a pripravili sme pre ňu ušľachtilý ustanovenie.

trans-unit.source: O wives of the Prophet, you are not like anyone among women. If you fear Allah, then do not be soft in speech [to men], lest he in whose heart is disease should covet, but speak with appropriate speech.
trans-unit.target: O manželky proroka, nie ste ako niekto medzi ženami. Ak máte strach, Alah, potom nebolo mäkké v prejave [muži], inak on v ktorých srdce je ochorenie by túži, ale hovoriť s vhodným reči.

trans-unit.source: And abide in your houses and do not display yourselves as [was] the display of the former times of ignorance. And establish prayer and give zakah and obey Allah and His Messenger. Allah intends only to remove from you the impurity [of sin], O people of the [Prophet's] household, and to purify you with [extensive] purification.
trans-unit.target: A dodržiavať vo svojich domov a zobrazovať seba ako [bol] zobrazenie bývalý časy nevedomosti. A vytvoriť modlitba a dať Zakát a počúvať Alah a jeho posol. Boh chce len odoberie nečistoty [hriech], O ľudí [prorok] domácnosti, a očistiť si s [rozsiahle] čistenie.

trans-unit.source: And remember what is recited in your houses of the verses of Allah and wisdom. Indeed, Allah is ever Subtle and Acquainted [with all things].
trans-unit.target: A pamätajte, čo je Prednes vo svojich domoch veršov Alah a múdrosti. Vskutku, Alah je niekedy jemnejšie a oboznámený [s všecko].

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the Muslim men and Muslim women, the believing men and believing women, the obedient men and obedient women, the truthful men and truthful women, the patient men and patient women, the humble men and humble women, the charitable men and charitable women, the fasting men and fasting women, the men who guard their private parts and the women who do so, and the men who remember Allah often and the women who do so - for them Allah has prepared forgiveness and a great reward.
trans-unit.target: Vskutku, moslimských mužov a moslimských žien, veriť mužov a veriť ženy, poslušný mužov a poslušný ženy, pravdivé muži a pravdivé žien pacienta mužov a pacient ženy, pokorní mužmi a skromných žien, charitatívne mužov a charitatívne žien nalačno mužov a pôst ženy, muži, ktorí strážiť ich prirodzení a ženy, ktorí tak , a muži, ktorí pamätajú Alah často a ženy, ktorí si tak - pre nich Boh pripravil odpustenie a veľký Odmeňte.

trans-unit.source: It is not for a believing man or a believing woman, when Allah and His Messenger have decided a matter, that they should [thereafter] have any choice about their affair. And whoever disobeys Allah and His Messenger has certainly strayed into clear error.
trans-unit.target: Nie je veriť mužom alebo ženou veriť, keď Alah a jeho posol rozhodli záležitosť, aby mali [potom] nerozhoduje o ich záležitosť. A kto nepočúva Alah a jeho posol má určite zablúdil do jasná chyba.

trans-unit.source: And [remember, O Muhammad], when you said to the one on whom Allah bestowed favor and you bestowed favor, "Keep your wife and fear Allah," while you concealed within yourself that which Allah is to disclose. And you feared the people, while Allah has more right that you fear Him. So when Zayd had no longer any need for her, We married her to you in order that there not be upon the believers any discomfort concerning the wives of their adopted sons when they no longer have need of them. And ever is the command of Allah accomplished.
trans-unit.target: A [Pamätajte, Mohamed], keď ste povedal, aby ten, na koho Boh prepožičal láskavosť a vám dal láskavosť, "Udržať svoju ženu a strach, Alah," kým ste ukrytých v sebe, že ktoré Alah je zverejniť. A ste sa bál ľudí, zatiaľ čo Boh má viac vpravo, aby ste sa ho bojí. Takže keď Zájdi už nie je potrebné ju, môžeme ju vzal vám v poradí že tam nie je možné na veriacich žiadne nepohodlie týkajúce sa manželky svojich dvoch adoptívnych synov, keď už majú potrebné z nich. A niekedy je príkaz Alah dosiahnuť.

trans-unit.source: There is not to be upon the Prophet any discomfort concerning that which Allah has imposed upon him. [This is] the established way of Allah with those [prophets] who have passed on before. And ever is the command of Allah a destiny decreed.
trans-unit.target: Tam nie je potrebné na proroka, žiadne nepohodlie, o tom, ktoré Alah uložila na neho. [Je] zavedený spôsob Alah s týmito [proroci] ktorí zložili predtým. A niekedy je príkaz Alah nariadil osud.

trans-unit.source: [Allah praises] those who convey the messages of Allah and fear Him and do not fear anyone but Allah. And sufficient is Allah as Accountant.
trans-unit.target: [Allah chváli] kto tlmočiť posolstvo Boha a strach ho a nebudú báť nikoho, ale Boh. A dostatočná je Boh ako účtovník.

trans-unit.source: Muhammad is not the father of [any] one of your men, but [he is] the Messenger of Allah and last of the prophets. And ever is Allah, of all things, Knowing.
trans-unit.target: Muhammad nie je otec [žiadne] jeden z vašich mužov, ale [je] posla Alláhova a posledný z prorokov. A niekedy je Alah, zo všetkých vecí, vedieť.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, remember Allah with much remembrance
trans-unit.target: O vás, ktorí ste uverili, nezabudnite Alah s oveľa spomienka

trans-unit.source: And exalt Him morning and afternoon.
trans-unit.target: A oslavovať ho ráno a popoludní.

trans-unit.source: It is He who confers blessing upon you, and His angels [ask Him to do so] that He may bring you out from darknesses into the light. And ever is He, to the believers, Merciful.
trans-unit.target: To je ten, kto udeľuje požehnanie na vás a jeho anjeli, [Opýtajte sa ho na to], že on môže Vyvediem vás z darknesses do svetla. A niekedy je ten, na veriacich, Milosrdných.

trans-unit.source: Their greeting the Day they meet Him will be, "Peace." And He has prepared for them a noble reward.
trans-unit.target: Ich pozdrav deň im stretnúť sa s ním bude, "Mier". A on pripravil pre nich vznešené odmeny.

trans-unit.source: O Prophet, indeed We have sent you as a witness and a bringer of good tidings and a warner.
trans-unit.target: O proroka, skutočne sme vám poslali ako svedok a prinášajúci dobrú zvesť a warner.

trans-unit.source: And one who invites to Allah, by His permission, and an illuminating lamp.
trans-unit.target: A ten, kto pozýva na Alaha, jeho súhlas a osvetľovacie zariadenie.

trans-unit.source: And give good tidings to the believers that they will have from Allah great bounty.
trans-unit.target: A dať dobrú zvesť veriacich, ktoré budú mať od Alaha veľkú odmenu.

trans-unit.source: And do not obey the disbelievers and the hypocrites but do not harm them, and rely upon Allah. And sufficient is Allah as Disposer of affairs.
trans-unit.target: A nie počúvať neveriacim a pokrytci, ale to nie je ublížiť, a spoliehať sa na Boha. A dostatočná je Alah zneškodňovateľ vecí.

trans-unit.source: O You who have believed, when you marry believing women and then divorce them before you have touched them, then there is not for you any waiting period to count concerning them. So provide for them and give them a gracious release.
trans-unit.target: O vás, ktorí uverili, keď manželstvo veriť ženy a potom rozvodu je, ako ste sa dotkol, potom tam nie je pre vás žiadne čakacia doba počítať, ktoré sa ich týkajú. Tak zabezpečiť ich a dať im milostivý uvoľnenie.

trans-unit.source: O Prophet, indeed We have made lawful to you your wives to whom you have given their due compensation and those your right hand possesses from what Allah has returned to you [of captives] and the daughters of your paternal uncles and the daughters of your paternal aunts and the daughters of your maternal uncles and the daughters of your maternal aunts who emigrated with you and a believing woman if she gives herself to the Prophet [and] if the Prophet wishes to marry her, [this is] only for you, excluding the [other] believers. We certainly know what We have made obligatory upon them concerning their wives and those their right hands possess, [but this is for you] in order that there will be upon you no discomfort. And ever is Allah Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: O proroka, naozaj sme sa zákonné vám vaše manželky, ktorým ste dali ich riadne odškodné a tie tvoja pravica má z čo Boh vrátil [o zajatcov] a dcéry otcovej strýkov a dcéry otcovskej teta a dcéry matiek strýkovia a dcéry vaše matky tety, ktorí emigrovali a veriť žene, ak ona dáva sama prorok [a] Prorok sa chce oženiť sa s ňou, [je] len pre vás, okrem [Ostatné] veriacich. Určite vieme, čo sme urobili povinné im ich manželky a tí rukách právo vlastniť, [ale je to pre vás] aby sa bude na vás žiadne nepohodlie. A niekedy je Boh odpúšťa a Milosrdných.

trans-unit.source: You, [O Muhammad], may put aside whom you will of them or take to yourself whom you will. And any that you desire of those [wives] from whom you had [temporarily] separated - there is no blame upon you [in returning her]. That is more suitable that they should be content and not grieve and that they should be satisfied with what you have given them - all of them. And Allah knows what is in your hearts. And ever is Allah Knowing and Forbearing.
trans-unit.target: Ste [Mohamed], môžu odložiť kým sa z nich alebo sa do seba, koho budete. A všetky, že budete chcieť z tých [ženy] od koho ste [dočasné] oddelené - neexistuje žiadny vinu na vás [pri návrate ju]. To je vhodnejšie, že by mal byť obsah a nie truchlit, a že by mali byť spokojní s to, čo ste im - všetky z nich. A Boh vie, čo je vo vašich srdciach. A niekedy je poznať Boha a Forbearing.

trans-unit.source: Not lawful to you, [O Muhammad], are [any additional] women after [this], nor [is it] for you to exchange them for [other] wives, even if their beauty were to please you, except what your right hand possesses. And ever is Allah, over all things, an Observer.
trans-unit.target: Nie zákonné vám [Mohamed], sú [ďalšie] ženy po [to], [je], ani sa ich vymeniť za [Ostatné] manželky, aj keď ich krásu, prosím vás, okrem pravou rukou, čo má. A niekedy je Alah, nad všetkými vecami, ako pozorovateľ.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, do not enter the houses of the Prophet except when you are permitted for a meal, without awaiting its readiness. But when you are invited, then enter; and when you have eaten, disperse without seeking to remain for conversation. Indeed, that [behavior] was troubling the Prophet, and he is shy of [dismissing] you. But Allah is not shy of the truth. And when you ask [his wives] for something, ask them from behind a partition. That is purer for your hearts and their hearts. And it is not [conceivable or lawful] for you to harm the Messenger of Allah or to marry his wives after him, ever. Indeed, that would be in the sight of Allah an enormity.
trans-unit.target: O vás, ktorí ste uverili, nezadávajte domy proroka okrem prípadov, kedy sú povolené pre jedlo, bez čakania na svoju pripravenosť. Ale keď budete vyzvaní, zadajte; a keď ste zjedli, rozptýliť, bez sa snaží zostať na konverzáciu. Naozaj, že [správanie] bol znepokojujúce proroka, a on je plachý [zamietol] vás. Ale Boh nie je plachý pravdy. A keď o niečo iadate [jeho manželky], požiadajte spoza oblasť. To je čistejšie pre vaše srdce a ich srdcia. A to nie je [mysliteľné alebo zákonné] môžete poškodiť posla Alláhova alebo si vziať jeho manželky po ňom vôbec. Naozaj, to by bolo v očiach Alah obludnosť.

trans-unit.source: Whether you reveal a thing or conceal it, indeed Allah is ever, of all things, Knowing.
trans-unit.target: Či odhaliť vec alebo zakryť to, naozaj Alah vôbec, je zo všetkých vecí, vedieť.

trans-unit.source: There is no blame upon women concerning their fathers or their sons or their brothers or their brothers' sons or their sisters' sons or their women or those their right hands possess. And fear Allah. Indeed Allah is ever, over all things, Witness.
trans-unit.target: Neexistuje žiadny vinu na ženy o svojich otcov alebo svojich synov alebo ich bratia alebo ich bratia synov alebo ich sestry synov alebo ich ženy alebo tí rukách právo vlastniť. A strach, Alah. Naozaj Alah je niekedy, nad všetkými vecami, svedok.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah confers blessing upon the Prophet, and His angels [ask Him to do so]. O you who have believed, ask [Allah to confer] blessing upon him and ask [Allah to grant him] peace.
trans-unit.target: Vskutku, Alah udeľuje požehnanie prorok a jeho anjeli, [Opýtajte sa ho na to]. O vás, ktorí ste uverili, opýtajte sa [Allah zveriť] požehnanie mu a spýtajte [Allah priznať mu] mier.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who abuse Allah and His Messenger - Allah has cursed them in this world and the Hereafter and prepared for them a humiliating punishment.
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti tí, ktorí zneužívajú Alah a jeho posol - Alah má nadával im v tomto svete a ďalej a pripravili pre nich ponižujúce tresty.

trans-unit.source: And those who harm believing men and believing women for [something] other than what they have earned have certainly born upon themselves a slander and manifest sin.
trans-unit.target: A tí, ktorí poškodzujú veriť mužov a veriť ženy [niečo] iné ako to, čo si vyslúžili určite narodil na seba ohovárania a zjavne hriechu.

trans-unit.source: O Prophet, tell your wives and your daughters and the women of the believers to bring down over themselves [part] of their outer garments. That is more suitable that they will be known and not be abused. And ever is Allah Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: O proroka, povedať svoje ženy a vaše dcéry a žien, veriacich, aby sami [časť] ich odevy. To je vhodnejšie, že bude známe, a nie byť zneužívané. A niekedy je Boh odpúšťa a Milosrdných.

trans-unit.source: If the hypocrites and those in whose hearts is disease and those who spread rumors in al-Madinah do not cease, We will surely incite you against them; then they will not remain your neighbors therein except for a little.
trans-unit.target: Ak pokrytci a tí, ktorých srdce je choroba, a tých, ktorí šíria fámy v al Madinah neprestávajú, budeme určite navádzať vás proti nim; potom im nezostane vašich susedov v ňom okrem trochu.

trans-unit.source: Accursed wherever they are found, [being] seized and massacred completely.
trans-unit.target: Prekliaty všade tam, kde sa nachádzajú, že zabavené a masakrováni úplne.

trans-unit.source: [This is] the established way of Allah with those who passed on before; and you will not find in the way of Allah any change.
trans-unit.target: [Je] zavedený spôsob Alah s tými, ktorí prešli na predtým; a nenájdete v ceste Alah žiadne zmeny.

trans-unit.source: People ask you concerning the Hour. Say," Knowledge of it is only with Allah. And what may make you perceive? Perhaps the Hour is near."
trans-unit.target: Ľudia pýtajú o hodinu. Povedať,"to je len Alah. A čo môžu urobiť, budete vnímať? Snáď hodinu je blízko."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah has cursed the disbelievers and prepared for them a Blaze.
trans-unit.target: Skutočne, Alah má prekliaty neveriacim a pripravili pre nich žiari.

trans-unit.source: Abiding therein forever, they will not find a protector or a helper.
trans-unit.target: Dodržiavanie v ňom navždy, nenájdete protektor alebo Pomocníka.

trans-unit.source: The Day their faces will be turned about in the Fire, they will say, "How we wish we had obeyed Allah and obeyed the Messenger."
trans-unit.target: Deň ich tváre sa otočil o v ohni, povedia, "Ako Prajeme sme počúvali Boha a poslúchol posol."

trans-unit.source: And they will say, "Our Lord, indeed we obeyed our masters and our dignitaries, and they led us astray from the [right] way.
trans-unit.target: A oni povedia: "nášho Pána, skutočne sme počúvali našich majstrov a naše významné osobnosti a oni nás zviesť z [správne].

trans-unit.source: Our Lord, give them double the punishment and curse them with a great curse."
trans-unit.target: Náš Pán, im dvojitý trest a nadávať im veľkým prekliatím."

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, be not like those who abused Moses; then Allah cleared him of what they said. And he, in the sight of Allah, was distinguished.
trans-unit.target: O vás, ktorí ste uverili, nebude ako tie, ktoré zneužívané Moses; potom Boh vymazané mu povedali, že to, čo. A on, v očiach Alah, bolo odlíšené.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, fear Allah and speak words of appropriate justice.
trans-unit.target: O vás, ktorí ste uverili, strach Alah a hovoriť slová vhodné spravodlivosti.

trans-unit.source: He will [then] amend for you your deeds and forgive you your sins. And whoever obeys Allah and His Messenger has certainly attained a great attainment.
trans-unit.target: [Potom] bude doplniť si vaše skutky a odpustil vám vaše hriechy. A kto počúva Alah a jeho posol určite dosiahol skvelé vzdelania.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, we offered the Trust to the heavens and the earth and the mountains, and they declined to bear it and feared it; but man [undertook to] bear it. Indeed, he was unjust and ignorant.
trans-unit.target: Skutočne sme ponúkli dôvera nebesia a zem a hory, a odmietla vydržať a bál. ale muž [zaviazali] vydržať. Naozaj, on bol nespravodlivý a ignorant.

trans-unit.source: [It was] so that Allah may punish the hypocrite men and hypocrite women and the men and women who associate others with Him and that Allah may accept repentance from the believing men and believing women. And ever is Allah Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: [Bolo] tak, že Alah môže potrestať pokrytec mužov a pokrytec žien a mužov a žien, ktorí spájať, iní s ním a že Alah môže prijať pokánie z podozrenia mužov a veriť ženy. A niekedy je Boh odpúšťa a Milosrdných.

trans-unit.source: [All] praise is [due] to Allah, to whom belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth, and to Him belongs [all] praise in the Hereafter. And He is the Wise, the Acquainted.
trans-unit.target: [Všetky] chvála je [spôsobené] Alaha, komu patrí, čo je v nebesiach a čo je na zemi a k nemu patrí [všetko] chvály v nižšie. A on je múdry, Acquainted.

trans-unit.source: He knows what penetrates into the earth and what emerges from it and what descends from the heaven and what ascends therein. And He is the Merciful, the Forgiving.
trans-unit.target: On vie, čo preniká do zeme a čo vzíde z neho a čo zostupuje z neba a čo v ňom stúpa. A on je Milosrdných, odpúšťajúci.

trans-unit.source: But those who disbelieve say, "The Hour will not come to us." Say, "Yes, by my Lord, it will surely come to you. [Allah is] the Knower of the unseen." Not absent from Him is an atom's weight within the heavens or within the earth or [what is] smaller than that or greater, except that it is in a clear register -
trans-unit.target: Ale tých, ktorí neveria, "hodinu nepríde k nám." Povedať: "áno, môj pán, to určite príde k vám. [Allah je] vševedúci neviditeľné. " Nie chýba mu hmotnosť atómu je do neba alebo do zeme alebo [to] menšia ako alebo väčšou, okrem toho, že je to jasné, registra -

trans-unit.source: That He may reward those who believe and do righteous deeds. Those will have forgiveness and noble provision.
trans-unit.target: Že on môže odmeniť tých, ktorí veria, a robiť spravodlivé skutky. Tie budú mať odpustenie a ušľachtilý ustanovenie.

trans-unit.source: But those who strive against Our verses [seeking] to cause failure - for them will be a painful punishment of foul nature.
trans-unit.target: Ale tých, ktorí sa snažia proti našej verše [Hľadám] spôsobiť zlyhanie - pre nich bude bolestivé trest faul charakteru.

trans-unit.source: And those who have been given knowledge see that what is revealed to you from your Lord is the truth, and it guides to the path of the Exalted in Might, the Praiseworthy.
trans-unit.target: A tých, ktorí dostali vedomosti vidieť, že to, čo je odhalené na vás od svojho pána, je pravda, a prevedie na cestu postáv by, Praiseworthy.

trans-unit.source: But those who disbelieve say, "Shall we direct you to a man who will inform you [that] when you have disintegrated in complete disintegration, you will [then] be [recreated] in a new creation?
trans-unit.target: Ale tí, ktorí neveria hovoria, "My riadi ste muž ktorý vás bude informovať [že] keď ste sa rozpadol úplného rozpadu, [a] budete [znova] nové stvorenie?

trans-unit.source: Has he invented about Allah a lie or is there in him madness?" Rather, they who do not believe in the Hereafter will be in the punishment and [are in] extreme error.
trans-unit.target: On vymyslel o Alah lož alebo je v ňom šialenstvo?" Naopak, tí, ktorí neveria v nižšie bude trest a [sú] extrémne chyba.

trans-unit.source: Then, do they not look at what is before them and what is behind them of the heaven and earth? If We should will, We could cause the earth to swallow them or [could] let fall upon them fragments from the sky. Indeed in that is a sign for every servant turning back [to Allah].
trans-unit.target: Potom, majú sa pozrieť na to, čo je pred nimi a čo je za nimi nebo a zem? Ak by sme sa, sme mohli spôsobiť Zeme prehltnúť alebo mohli pustiť na ich fragmenty z neba. Naozaj v tom je znak pre každý zamestnanec obrátil [Boh].

trans-unit.source: And We certainly gave David from Us bounty. [We said], "O mountains, repeat [Our] praises with him, and the birds [as well]." And We made pliable for him iron,
trans-unit.target: A sme určite dal David od nás odmenu. [Už], "O horách, opakovať [naše] chváli s ním a vtáky [aj]." A urobili sme poddajné pre neho železa,

trans-unit.source: [Commanding him], "Make full coats of mail and calculate [precisely] the links, and work [all of you] righteousness. Indeed I, of what you do, am Seeing."
trans-unit.target: [Veliaci ho], "vykonať úplný kabáty na mail [presne] výpočet odkazy a práce [Všetci] spravodlivosť. Skutočne, čo robíte, som videl."

trans-unit.source: And to Solomon [We subjected] the wind - its morning [journey was that of] a month - and its afternoon [journey was that of] a month, and We made flow for him a spring of [liquid] copper. And among the jinn were those who worked for him by the permission of his Lord. And whoever deviated among them from Our command - We will make him taste of the punishment of the Blaze.
trans-unit.target: A Šalamúnove [sme podrobili] vietor - jej ráno [cesty bolo, že] mesiac - a jeho popoludňajší [cesty bolo, že] za mesiac, a my sa tok pre neho jar [tekuté] medi. A medzi jinn boli tí, ktorí pracovali pre neho so zvolením svojho pána. A ten, kto medzi nich odchýlil od nášho velenia - urobíme mu chuť trest požiar.

trans-unit.source: They made for him what he willed of elevated chambers, statues, bowls like reservoirs, and stationary kettles. [We said], "Work, O family of David, in gratitude." And few of My servants are grateful.
trans-unit.target: Urobili pre neho to, čo on chcel zvýšené komôr, sochy, misy ako zásobníky a stacionárne kanvice. [Už], "Práca, rodina O David, z vďačnosti." A pár mojich zamestnancov sú vďační.

trans-unit.source: And when We decreed for Solomon death, nothing indicated to the jinn his death except a creature of the earth eating his staff. But when he fell, it became clear to the jinn that if they had known the unseen, they would not have remained in humiliating punishment.
trans-unit.target: A keď sme nariadil Šalamún smrť, nič nenasvedčovalo na jinn smrti okrem tvor na zemi, jesť jeho zamestnancov. Ale keď padol, bolo jasné, na jinn, že keby známe neviditeľné, oni by zostať v ponižujúce tresty.

trans-unit.source: There was for [the tribe of] Saba' in their dwelling place a sign: two [fields of] gardens on the right and on the left. [They were told], "Eat from the provisions of your Lord and be grateful to Him. A good land [have you], and a forgiving Lord."
trans-unit.target: Tam bol [pokolenia] Saba "v ich obydlia miesto znamenia: dve záhrady [oblasti], vpravo a vľavo. [Boli povedali], "Jedzte z ustanovenia svojho pána a musíme mu byť vďační. Dobré pôdy [ste], a odpúšťajúci pána. "

trans-unit.source: But they turned away [refusing], so We sent upon them the flood of the dam, and We replaced their two [fields of] gardens with gardens of bitter fruit, tamarisks and something of sparse lote trees.
trans-unit.target: Ale oni sa otočil [odmieta], tak sme poslali na nich povodní priehrady a nahradili sme ich dvoch [oblasti] záhrady so záhradami, horké ovocie, vďaka kríku tamarišky a niečo riedke lote stromov.

trans-unit.source: [By] that We repaid them because they disbelieved. And do We [thus] repay except the ungrateful?
trans-unit.target: [Podľa] ktoré sme ich splatiť, pretože oni pochyboval. A my [teda] vrátiť okrem nevďačný?

trans-unit.source: And We placed between them and the cities which We had blessed [many] visible cities. And We determined between them the [distances of] journey, [saying], "Travel between them by night or day in safety."
trans-unit.target: A sme sa umiestnili medzi nimi a miest, ktoré sme požehnal [veľa] viditeľné miest. A sme zistili medzi nimi [vzdialenosti] cesty [povedať], "Cestovanie medzi nimi noc alebo deň bezpečnosti."

trans-unit.source: But [insolently] they said, "Our Lord, lengthen the distance between our journeys," and wronged themselves, so We made them narrations and dispersed them in total dispersion. Indeed in that are signs for everyone patient and grateful.
trans-unit.target: Ale [nestoudně] povedali, "Náš Pán predĺžiť vzdialenosť medzi naše cesty" a poškodené sami, tak sme sa ich rozprávanie a im rozptýlené v celkový rozptyl. Naozaj v tom, že sú príznaky pre každého pacienta a vďačný.

trans-unit.source: And Iblees had already confirmed through them his assumption, so they followed him, except for a party of believers.
trans-unit.target: A Iblees potvrdil už cez ne jeho predpoklad, takže za ním, okrem strany veriacich.

trans-unit.source: And he had over them no authority except [it was decreed] that We might make evident who believes in the Hereafter from who is thereof in doubt. And your Lord, over all things, is Guardian.
trans-unit.target: A on mal nad nimi žiadny orgán okrem [bolo rozhodnuté] možno aby sme jasné, kto verí v nižšie, z kto je jej pochybnosti. A váš pán nad všetkými vecami, je strážcom.

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "Invoke those you claim [as deities] besides Allah." They do not possess an atom's weight [of ability] in the heavens or on the earth, and they do not have therein any partnership [with Him], nor is there for Him from among them any assistant.
trans-unit.target: Napríklad: [Mohamed], "Uplatniť tých tvrdíte, že [ako božstvá] okrem Alaha." Nemajú atóm hmotnosť [možnosti] na nebi alebo na zemi, a oni nemajú v ňom žiadne partnerstva [s ním], neexistuje ani pre neho spomedzi nich akékoľvek asistent.

trans-unit.source: And intercession does not benefit with Him except for one whom He permits. [And those wait] until, when terror is removed from their hearts, they will say [to one another], "What has your Lord said?" They will say, "The truth." And He is the Most High, the Grand.
trans-unit.target: A príhovor prospech s ním okrem jeden koho on povolení. [A tí čakať] kým odstránení teroru zo svojho srdca [k sebe], povedia "čo má váš Pán povedal?" Povedia, "Pravda." A on je najvyšší, Grand.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Who provides for you from the heavens and the earth?" Say, "Allah. And indeed, we or you are either upon guidance or in clear error."
trans-unit.target: Hovoria: "Kto poskytuje pre vás z neba a zem?" Povedať "Alah. A skutočne sme, alebo sú na usmernenie alebo vymazať omylom."

trans-unit.source: Say, "You will not be asked about what we committed, and we will not be asked about what you do."
