trans-unit.source: And those who believe and do righteous deeds and believe in what has been sent down upon Muhammad - and it is the truth from their Lord - He will remove from them their misdeeds and amend their condition.
trans-unit.target: A tých, ktorí veria a spravodlivé skutky a veriť v to, čo poslal na Muhammad - a je to pravda od ich pána - on odstráni z nich svoje zločiny a zmeniť ich stav.

trans-unit.source: That is because those who disbelieve follow falsehood, and those who believe follow the truth from their Lord. Thus does Allah present to the people their comparisons.
trans-unit.target: To je preto, že tí, ktorí neveria nasledovať lož, a tých, ktorí veria, že nasledovať pravda od ich pána. Tak robí Alah predstaviť ľuďom ich porovnanie.

trans-unit.source: So when you meet those who disbelieve [in battle], strike [their] necks until, when you have inflicted slaughter upon them, then secure their bonds, and either [confer] favor afterwards or ransom [them] until the war lays down its burdens. That [is the command]. And if Allah had willed, He could have taken vengeance upon them [Himself], but [He ordered armed struggle] to test some of you by means of others. And those who are killed in the cause of Allah - never will He waste their deeds.
trans-unit.target: Takže keď stretnete tých, ktorí neveria v bitke], štrajk [ich] krky do doby, kedy ste spôsobili zabitie im potom zabezpečiť ich dlhopisy, a buď [] láskavosť potom alebo výkupné, [ich] kým vojny stanovuje jeho zaťaženia. Že [je príkaz]. A ak Boh bol chcel, mohol si vziať pomstu na nich, [sám], ale [nariadil ozbrojený boj] niektorí z vás testovať pomocou ostatných. A tí, ktorí sú zabití v záujme Alaha - nikdy sa ten odpad ich skutky.

trans-unit.source: He will guide them and amend their condition
trans-unit.target: On nebude viesť ich a meniť ich stav

trans-unit.source: And admit them to Paradise, which He has made known to them.
trans-unit.target: A priznať im do raja, ktorý urobil na nich.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, if you support Allah, He will support you and plant firmly your feet.
trans-unit.target: O vás, ktorí ste uverili, ak podporujete Alah, že bude podporovať a rastlina pevne nohy.

trans-unit.source: But those who disbelieve - for them is misery, and He will waste their deeds.
trans-unit.target: Ale tí, ktorí neveria - pre nich je bieda, a on bude strácať svoje skutky.

trans-unit.source: That is because they disliked what Allah revealed, so He rendered worthless their deeds.
trans-unit.target: To je preto, že nemal rád čo Boh odhalil, bol vydaný bezcenné svoje skutky.

trans-unit.source: Have they not traveled through the land and seen how was the end of those before them? Allah destroyed [everything] over them, and for the disbelievers is something comparable.
trans-unit.target: Oni nie cestoval cez pozemok a vidieť, ako bolo na konci tých pred nimi? Alah zničené [všetko] nad nimi a neveriacim je niečo porovnateľné.

trans-unit.source: That is because Allah is the protector of those who have believed and because the disbelievers have no protector.
trans-unit.target: To je preto, že Alah je ochranca tých, ktorí uverili a pretože neveriacim žiadny protektor.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah will admit those who have believed and done righteous deeds to gardens beneath which rivers flow, but those who disbelieve enjoy themselves and eat as grazing livestock eat, and the Fire will be a residence for them.
trans-unit.target: Vskutku, Alah sa priznať, že tých, ktorí verili a urobil spravodlivé skutky do záhrady, pod ktoré riek prietoku, ale tí, ktorí neveria vyblázniť a jesť na pasenie dobytka jesť a oheň bude pobyt pre nich.

trans-unit.source: And how many a city was stronger than your city [Makkah] which drove you out? We destroyed them; and there was no helper for them.
trans-unit.target: A koľko mesto bolo silnejšie ako vaše mesto [Makkah], ktorý riadil vás? Sme zničil; a tam bol žiadny Pomocník pre nich.

trans-unit.source: So is he who is on clear evidence from his Lord like him to whom the evil of his work has been made attractive and they follow their [own] desires?
trans-unit.target: Tak je ten, kto je na jasný dôkaz svojho pána ako ho komu zlo jeho práce bola vykonaná za atraktívne a sledujú vlastné [] túžby?

trans-unit.source: Is the description of Paradise, which the righteous are promised, wherein are rivers of water unaltered, rivers of milk the taste of which never changes, rivers of wine delicious to those who drink, and rivers of purified honey, in which they will have from all [kinds of] fruits and forgiveness from their Lord, like [that of] those who abide eternally in the Fire and are given to drink scalding water that will sever their intestines?
trans-unit.target: Popis raja, ktorý sľúbil, spravodliví, wherein sú neupravené potoky vody, rieky mlieko chuť, ktorá sa nikdy nezmení, riek vína, ktoré sú vynikajúce pre tých, ktorí pijú, a riek čistený medu, v ktorom budú mať od všetkých [druhy z] ovocia a odpustenie od svojho pána, ako [to], ktorí dodržiavajú naveky v ohni a sú uvedené na pitie horúcej vody, ktorý preruší ich čriev?

trans-unit.source: And among them, [O Muhammad], are those who listen to you, until when they depart from you, they say to those who were given knowledge, "What has he said just now?" Those are the ones of whom Allah has sealed over their hearts and who have followed their [own] desires.
trans-unit.target: A medzi nimi [Mohamed], sú tí, ktorí počúvajú, až keď sa odchyľujú od vás, budú teda pre tých, ktorí dostali vedomosti, "To, čo on povedal práve teraz?" To sú tie, ktorých Boh bol zapečatený nad ich srdcia a ktorí za vlastné [] túžby.

trans-unit.source: And those who are guided - He increases them in guidance and gives them their righteousness.
trans-unit.target: A tí, ktorí sú vedení - on sa zvyšujú v usmernení a dáva im ich spravodlivosť.

trans-unit.source: Then do they await except that the Hour should come upon them unexpectedly? But already there have come [some of] its indications. Then what good to them, when it has come, will be their remembrance?
trans-unit.target: Potom čakajú okrem toho, že hodina by mala prísť na nich neočakávane? Ale už tam prišli [niektoré] jeho označení. Potom čo je dobré, keď to prišlo, bude ich pamiatku?

trans-unit.source: So know, [O Muhammad], that there is no deity except Allah and ask forgiveness for your sin and for the believing men and believing women. And Allah knows of your movement and your resting place.
trans-unit.target: Takže viem [Mohamed], že neexistuje žiadne božstvo okrem Alah, a požiadať o odpustenie za svoje hriechy a veriť mužov a veriť ženy. A Alah vie váš pohyb a miesto svojho odpočinku.

trans-unit.source: Those who believe say, "Why has a surah not been sent down? But when a precise surah is revealed and fighting is mentioned therein, you see those in whose hearts is hypocrisy looking at you with a look of one overcome by death. And more appropriate for them [would have been]
trans-unit.target: Tých, ktorí veria, že hovoria: "prečo surah nebola odoslaná? Ale keď presné surah odhalil a boj je uvedených tamtiež, vidíte, že tí, ktorých srdce je pokrytectvo na teba pozerá s pohľadom jednej prekonať smrť. A vhodné pre nich [bolo]

trans-unit.source: Obedience and good words. And when the matter [of fighting] was determined, if they had been true to Allah, it would have been better for them.
trans-unit.target: Poslušnosť a dobrých slov. A keď veci [boj] určila, keby bol verný Boh, bolo by pre nich lepšie.

trans-unit.source: So would you perhaps, if you turned away, cause corruption on earth and sever your [ties of] relationship?
trans-unit.target: Tak by ste možno, keď ste preč, spôsobiť poškodenie na zemi a sever váš vzťah [väzby]?

trans-unit.source: Those [who do so] are the ones that Allah has cursed, so He deafened them and blinded their vision.
trans-unit.target: Osoby [to] sú tie, ktoré Alah nadával, tak im ohlušil a zaslepený svoju víziu.

trans-unit.source: Then do they not reflect upon the Qur'an, or are there locks upon [their] hearts?
trans-unit.target: Potom sa neodráža na Korán, alebo sú tam zámky na [ich] srdce?

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who reverted back [to disbelief] after guidance had become clear to them - Satan enticed them and prolonged hope for them.
trans-unit.target: Naozaj, tých, ktorí sa vrátila späť [do neveriacky] po vedením ukázalo im - Satan láka ich a dlhodobé Dúfam, pre nich.

trans-unit.source: That is because they said to those who disliked what Allah sent down, "We will obey you in part of the matter." And Allah knows what they conceal.
trans-unit.target: To je, pretože oni hovorili k tým, ktorí sa nepáčilo, čo Boh zoslal, "budeme vás počúvať časť hmoty." A Boh vie, čo skrývať.

trans-unit.source: Then how [will it be] when the angels take them in death, striking their faces and their backs?
trans-unit.target: Potom ako [bude] Keď anjeli im smrť, zarážajúce, ich tváre a ich chrbtom?

trans-unit.source: That is because they followed what angered Allah and disliked [what earns] His pleasure, so He rendered worthless their deeds.
trans-unit.target: To je preto, že sledovali, čo hneval Alah a rád [čo zarobí] jeho potešenie, takže bol vydaný bezcenné svoje skutky.

trans-unit.source: Or do those in whose hearts is disease think that Allah would never expose their [feelings of] hatred?
trans-unit.target: Alebo tí, ktorých srdce je choroba myslíte, že Alah by nikdy nevystavujte ich [pocit] nenávisť?

trans-unit.source: And if We willed, We could show them to you, and you would know them by their mark; but you will surely know them by the tone of [their] speech. And Allah knows your deeds.
trans-unit.target: A ak sme vôľou, sme mohli ukázať im na vás a by poznať ich ochrannou známkou; ale iste poznáte ich tón [ich] reči. A Alah vie svoje skutky.

trans-unit.source: And We will surely test you until We make evident those who strive among you [for the cause of Allah] and the patient, and We will test your affairs.
trans-unit.target: Budeme určite testovať si kým robíme zrejmé, tých, ktorí sa snažia u vás [o príčine Allah] a pacient a budeme testovať svoje záležitosti.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who disbelieved and averted [people] from the path of Allah and opposed the Messenger after guidance had become clear to them - never will they harm Allah at all, and He will render worthless their deeds.
trans-unit.target: Skutočne tých, kto pochyboval a odvrátiť [ľudia] z cesty Božej a proti poslem po vedením ukázalo im - nikdy sa poškodiť Alah vôbec, a on odplatí bezcenné, ich skutky.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, obey Allah and obey the Messenger and do not invalidate your deeds.
trans-unit.target: O vás, ktorí ste uverili, počúvať Boha a počúvať posol a neruší svoje skutky.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who disbelieved and averted [people] from the path of Allah and then died while they were disbelievers - never will Allah forgive them.
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti tí, ktorí pochyboval a odvrátiť [ľudia] z cesty Božej a potom zomrel, zatiaľ čo oni boli neveriacim - nikdy Alah odpustí im.

trans-unit.source: So do not weaken and call for peace while you are superior; and Allah is with you and will never deprive you of [the reward of] your deeds.
trans-unit.target: Takže nie oslabiť a žiadajú pokoj, v režime superior; Boh je s vami a nikdy vás pripraviť o [odmena] vaše skutky.

trans-unit.source: [This] worldly life is only amusement and diversion. And if you believe and fear Allah, He will give you your rewards and not ask you for your properties.
trans-unit.target: [Tento pozemský život je len zábavu a rozptýlenie. A ak si myslíte, a strach, Alah, on vám vaše odmeny a nie pýtať na vaše vlastnosti.

trans-unit.source: If He should ask you for them and press you, you would withhold, and He would expose your unwillingness.
trans-unit.target: Ak by vás požiadať o ne a klávesy, by zadržať, a on by vystaviť vaše neochota.

trans-unit.source: Here you are - those invited to spend in the cause of Allah - but among you are those who withhold [out of greed]. And whoever withholds only withholds [benefit] from himself; and Allah is the Free of need, while you are the needy. And if you turn away, He will replace you with another people; then they will not be the likes of you.
trans-unit.target: Tu sú - pozvaní stráviť v záujme Alaha - ale medzi vami, sú tí, ktorí zadržať [z chamtivosti]. A ten, kto len zatají zatají [výhody] od seba; a Alah je zadarmo, je potrebné, keď sa ľuďom v núdzi. A ak dáte preč, on vám nahradí iným ľuďom; potom nebude vám rád.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We have given you, [O Muhammad], a clear conquest
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti sme dali vám, [Mohamed], jasné víťazstvo

trans-unit.source: That Allah may forgive for you what preceded of your sin and what will follow and complete His favor upon you and guide you to a straight path
trans-unit.target: Že Alah môže odpustiť si, čo predchádza svoj hriech a čo bude nasledovať a dokončiť jeho láskavosť na vás a vás cesta priamo

trans-unit.source: And [that] Allah may aid you with a mighty victory.
trans-unit.target: A [že] vám môže pomôcť s mighty víťazstvo.

trans-unit.source: It is He who sent down tranquillity into the hearts of the believers that they would increase in faith along with their [present] faith. And to Allah belong the soldiers of the heavens and the earth, and ever is Allah Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: Je to on, kto zoslal pokoj do sŕdc veriacich, že by sa zvýšili vo viere spolu s ich [tohto] viery. Bohu patrí vojakov z neba a Zeme a niekedy je Boh vedel a múdry.

trans-unit.source: [And] that He may admit the believing men and the believing women to gardens beneath which rivers flow to abide therein eternally and remove from them their misdeeds - and ever is that, in the sight of Allah, a great attainment -
trans-unit.target: [A] že veriť muži a ženy, ktoré veriť mu môže priznať záhrady pod ktorým riek prietoku dodržiavali v ňom naveky a odstrániť z nich svoje misdeeds - a niekedy je, že v očiach Alah, skvelé vzdelania-

trans-unit.source: And [that] He may punish the hypocrite men and hypocrite women, and the polytheist men and polytheist women - those who assume about Allah an assumption of evil nature. Upon them is a misfortune of evil nature; and Allah has become angry with them and has cursed them and prepared for them Hell, and evil it is as a destination.
trans-unit.target: A [že] sa môže potrestať pokrytec muži a ženy pokrytec, polytheist a mužov polytheist - tých, ktorí predpokladajú o Alah predpoklad zlého charakteru. Na nich je nešťastie zlé povahy; a Allah sa stala zlosť s nimi a nadával im a pripravené pre ich peklo a zlo je ako cieľ.

trans-unit.source: And to Allah belong the soldiers of the heavens and the earth. And ever is Allah Exalted in Might and Wise.
trans-unit.target: A Bohu patrí vojakov z neba a Zeme. A niekedy je Boh povýšil v sile a múdry.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We have sent you as a witness and a bringer of good tidings and a warner
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti sme vám poslali ako svedok a prinášajúci dobrú zvesť a warner

trans-unit.source: That you [people] may believe in Allah and His Messenger and honor him and respect the Prophet and exalt Allah morning and afternoon.
trans-unit.target: Že ste [ľudia] môže veriť v Alah a jeho posol a ctiť ho a rešpektovať prorok a oslavovať Boha ráno a popoludní.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who pledge allegiance to you, [O Muhammad] - they are actually pledging allegiance to Allah. The hand of Allah is over their hands. So he who breaks his word only breaks it to the detriment of himself. And he who fulfills that which he has promised Allah - He will give him a great reward.
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti tí, ktorí sľub vernosti ste [Mohamed] - oni sú vlastne istenie vernosť Alah. Alah je rukami. Takže kto prestávky jeho slová len prestávky na úkor seba. A ten, kto splní čo sľúbil Alah - on sa mu veľká odmena.

trans-unit.source: Those who remained behind of the bedouins will say to you, "Our properties and our families occupied us, so ask forgiveness for us." They say with their tongues what is not within their hearts. Say, "Then who could prevent Allah at all if He intended for you harm or intended for you benefit? Rather, ever is Allah, with what you do, Acquainted.
trans-unit.target: Tí, ktorí zostali z beduín povedia vám, "naše vlastnosti a naše rodiny obsadené nás, tak požiadať o odpustenie pre nás." Hovoria jazykom, čo nie je v ich srdciach. Napríklad: "potom kto by mohol zabrániť Alah vôbec, ak je určený pre vás poškodiť alebo určené na prospech? Skôr, niekedy je Alah, s čo robíte, oboznámený.

trans-unit.source: But you thought that the Messenger and the believers would never return to their families, ever, and that was made pleasing in your hearts. And you assumed an assumption of evil and became a people ruined."
trans-unit.target: Ale ste si mysleli, že posol a veriaci nikdy vrátiť do ich rodiny, kedykoľvek, a to bolo potešujúce vo vašich srdciach. A predpokladá, že predpoklad zla a stal ľudia zničili."

trans-unit.source: And whoever has not believed in Allah and His Messenger - then indeed, We have prepared for the disbelievers a Blaze.
trans-unit.target: A nie ten, kto veril v Alah a jeho posol - potom v skutočnosti, sme pripravili pre neveriacim žiari.

trans-unit.source: And to Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth. He forgives whom He wills and punishes whom He wills. And ever is Allah Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: A Bohu patrí panstva neba a Zeme. On odpúšťa, ktorého vôle a trestá koho on chce. A niekedy je Boh odpúšťa a Milosrdných.

trans-unit.source: Those who remained behind will say when you set out toward the war booty to take it, "Let us follow you." They wish to change the words of Allah. Say, "Never will you follow us. Thus did Allah say before." So they will say, "Rather, you envy us." But [in fact] they were not understanding except a little.
trans-unit.target: Tí, ktorí zostali bude hovoriť, keď sa vydáte smerom k vojnová korisť si ju, "Poďme za tebou." Chcú zmeniť slová Alaha. Povedal: "nikdy sa vám za nami. Teda Boh hovoril pred." Tak hovoria, "skôr závidia nám." Ale oni boli [v skutočnosti] nechápal okrem trochu.

trans-unit.source: Say to those who remained behind of the bedouins, "You will be called to [face] a people of great military might; you may fight them, or they will submit. So if you obey, Allah will give you a good reward; but if you turn away as you turned away before, He will punish you with a painful punishment."
trans-unit.target: Povedať tým, ktorí zostali z beduín, "môžete sa bude volať [čeliť] ľudia veľkú vojenskú silu; môže bojovať proti nim, alebo predloží. Takže ak ste počúvať, Alah vám dobrú odmenu; ale ak vás zase preč, ako ste sa otočil pred, že budú trestať vás s bolestivé trest."

trans-unit.source: There is not upon the blind any guilt or upon the lame any guilt or upon the ill any guilt [for remaining behind]. And whoever obeys Allah and His Messenger - He will admit him to gardens beneath which rivers flow; but whoever turns away - He will punish him with a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: Nie je na blind viny alebo chromý viny alebo chorých viny [pre zostávajúce za]. A kto počúva Alah a jeho posol - on sa priznať mu záhrady pod ktoré toku rieky; ale ten, kto odvracia -, on ho bude trestať s bolestivé trest.

trans-unit.source: Certainly was Allah pleased with the believers when they pledged allegiance to you, [O Muhammad], under the tree, and He knew what was in their hearts, so He sent down tranquillity upon them and rewarded them with an imminent conquest
trans-unit.target: Určite bol Alah potešený s veriacimi, keď sľúbil vernosť vám [Mohamed], pod stromom, a on vedel, čo bolo v ich srdciach tak zoslal pokoja na ne a ne odmenení bezprostredné dobytie

trans-unit.source: And much war booty which they will take. And ever is Allah Exalted in Might and Wise.
trans-unit.target: A veľa vojnová korisť, ktoré budú mať. A niekedy je Boh povýšil v sile a múdry.

trans-unit.source: Allah has promised you much booty that you will take [in the future] and has hastened for you this [victory] and withheld the hands of people from you - that it may be a sign for the believers and [that] He may guide you to a straight path.
trans-unit.target: Alah prisľúbila veľkú korisť, že budete mať [v budúcnosti] a ponáhľal pre vás [víťazstvo] a zadržané rúk ľudí, ktorí od vás - to môže byť príznakom pre veriacich a [že] on vás cesta priamo.

trans-unit.source: And [He promises] other [victories] that you were [so far] unable to [realize] which Allah has already encompassed. And ever is Allah, over all things, competent.
trans-unit.target: A [on sľubuje] Ostatné [víťazstvo] [zatiaľ] ste nemohli uskutočniť [] ktoré Alah sa už zaoberala. A niekedy je Alaha, cez všetky veci príslušný.

trans-unit.source: And if those [Makkans] who disbelieve had fought you, they would have turned their backs [in flight]. Then they would not find a protector or a helper.
trans-unit.target: A ak tie [Makkans] ktorí neveria bojovali ste, že by otočil chrbtom [v lete]. Potom by sa nájsť protektor alebo Pomocníka.

trans-unit.source: [This is] the established way of Allah which has occurred before. And never will you find in the way of Allah any change.
trans-unit.target: [Je] sídlom spôsobom Boha, ku ktorému došlo pred. A nikdy nájdete v ceste Alah všetky zmeny.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who withheld their hands from you and your hands from them within [the area of] Makkah after He caused you to overcome them. And ever is Allah of what you do, Seeing.
trans-unit.target: A je to on, kto zadržané rukami od vás a vaše ruky z nich v rámci [oblasti] Makkah po spôsobil, že sa ich prekonať. A niekedy je Alah, čo robiť, vidieť.

trans-unit.source: They are the ones who disbelieved and obstructed you from al-Masjid al-Haram while the offering was prevented from reaching its place of sacrifice. And if not for believing men and believing women whom you did not know - that you might trample them and there would befall you because of them dishonor without [your] knowledge - [you would have been permitted to enter Makkah]. [This was so] that Allah might admit to His mercy whom He willed. If they had been apart [from them], We would have punished those who disbelieved among them with painful punishment
trans-unit.target: Oni sú tí, kto pochyboval a bránila vám z al Masjid al-Haram, kým ponuka zabránila dosiahnuť svoje miesto obete. A ak nie veriť mužov a veriť ženy, ktorým ste nevedeli,-že im môžu šliapať a nie by stretnúť môžete kvôli ich hanbu bez [vaše] znalosti - [vám by bolo umožnené vstúpiť Makkah]. [To bolo tak] že Alah môže pripustiť, aby jeho milosrdenstvo, koho on chcel. Keby boli najsledovanejšími [im], sme by potrestaní tých, kto pochyboval medzi nimi s bolestivé trest

trans-unit.source: When those who disbelieved had put into their hearts chauvinism - the chauvinism of the time of ignorance. But Allah sent down His tranquillity upon His Messenger and upon the believers and imposed upon them the word of righteousness, and they were more deserving of it and worthy of it. And ever is Allah, of all things, Knowing.
trans-unit.target: Keď tí, kto pochyboval dal do ich sŕdc šovinizmu - šovinizmu doby nevedomosti. Ale Boh zoslal svojho pokoja, jeho posol a veriaci a uložené slovo spravodlivosť, a boli to zaslúži a zaslúži to. A niekedy je Alah, zo všetkých vecí, vedieť.

trans-unit.source: Certainly has Allah showed to His Messenger the vision in truth. You will surely enter al-Masjid al-Haram, if Allah wills, in safety, with your heads shaved and [hair] shortened, not fearing [anyone]. He knew what you did not know and has arranged before that a conquest near [at hand].
trans-unit.target: Určite má Alah ukázal jeho posol videnie v pravde. Určite zadáte Abraj al-Haram, ak Alah závetov, bezpečnosť, s hlavami oholil a [vlasy] skrátiť, nie zo strachu [niekto]. Vedel, čo nevedel, a má usporiadané pred tým dobytie blízko [na strane].

trans-unit.source: It is He who sent His Messenger with guidance and the religion of truth to manifest it over all religion. And sufficient is Allah as Witness.
trans-unit.target: Je to on, kto poslal jeho posol s vedením a náboženstvo pravdy zjavné, že cez všetky náboženstva. A dostatočná je Boh ako svedok.

trans-unit.source: Muhammad is the Messenger of Allah; and those with him are forceful against the disbelievers, merciful among themselves. You see them bowing and prostrating [in prayer], seeking bounty from Allah and [His] pleasure. Their mark is on their faces from the trace of prostration. That is their description in the Torah. And their description in the Gospel is as a plant which produces its offshoots and strengthens them so they grow firm and stand upon their stalks, delighting the sowers - so that Allah may enrage by them the disbelievers. Allah has promised those who believe and do righteous deeds among them forgiveness and a great reward.
trans-unit.target: Muhammad je posol Boha; a tých, ktorí s ním silný proti neveriacim, milosrdný medzi sebou. Vidíte ich vydutosti a prostrating [v modlitbe], hľadanie odmien od Alaha a [jeho] radosť. Je ich značka na tvárach zo stopy vyčerpanie. To je ich opis v Tóry. A ich opis v evanjelium ako rastlina, ktorá produkuje jeho odnože a posilňuje ich, aby rast firmy a stoja na ich stonky, poteší sowers - tak že Alah môže rozzúriť nimi neveriacim. Boh sľúbil, že tých, ktorí veria, a robiť spravodlivé skutky medzi nimi, odpustenie a veľký Odmeňte.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, do not put [yourselves] before Allah and His Messenger but fear Allah. Indeed, Allah is Hearing and Knowing.
trans-unit.target: O vás, ktorí ste uverili, nedávajte [seba] pred Alah a jeho posol, ale strach Alah. Alah je skutočne sluchu a vedomím.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, do not raise your voices above the voice of the Prophet or be loud to him in speech like the loudness of some of you to others, lest your deeds become worthless while you perceive not.
trans-unit.target: O vás, ktorí ste uverili, zvýšiť svoj hlas nad hlas proroka ani sa nahlas, aby ho v reči ako hlasitosť niektorých z vás ostatných, inak tvoje skutky stanú bezcenné, zatiaľ čo vnímate, že nie.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who lower their voices before the Messenger of Allah - they are the ones whose hearts Allah has tested for righteousness. For them is forgiveness and great reward.
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti tí, ktorí znížiť ich hlasy pred posla Alláhova - oni sú tí, ktorých srdce Alah bol testovaný pre spravodlivosť. Pre nich je odpustenie a veľká odmena.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who call you, [O Muhammad], from behind the chambers - most of them do not use reason.
trans-unit.target: Tých, ktorí hovoria vám, [Mohamed], spoza komory - väčšina z nich v skutočnosti, nepoužívajte dôvod.

trans-unit.source: And if they had been patient until you [could] come out to them, it would have been better for them. But Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: A keby bol pacient dovtedy, kým sa mohli vyjsť s nimi, bolo by pre nich lepšie. Ale Boh je odpúšťajúci a Milosrdných.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, if there comes to you a disobedient one with information, investigate, lest you harm a people out of ignorance and become, over what you have done, regretful.
trans-unit.target: O vás, ktorí ste uverili, ak príde k vám jeden neposlušný informácie, vyšetrovať, inak poškodiť ľudí z nevedomosti a stal za to, čo ste urobili, poľutovaniahodné.

trans-unit.source: And know that among you is the Messenger of Allah. If he were to obey you in much of the matter, you would be in difficulty, but Allah has endeared to you the faith and has made it pleasing in your hearts and has made hateful to you disbelief, defiance and disobedience. Those are the [rightly] guided.
trans-unit.target: A viem, že u vás je posla Alláhova. Keby sa počúvať v podstate veci, by sa v ťažkostiach, ale Boh sa vám zapáčil viery a bolo potešujúce vo vašich srdciach a urobila nenávistné sa neveriacky a vzdoru, neposlušnosti. Tie sú [správne] so sprievodcom.

trans-unit.source: [It is] as bounty from Allah and favor. And Allah is Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: [Je] ako odmenu od Boha a láskavosť. A Allah je znalosť a múdry.

trans-unit.source: And if two factions among the believers should fight, then make settlement between the two. But if one of them oppresses the other, then fight against the one that oppresses until it returns to the ordinance of Allah. And if it returns, then make settlement between them in justice and act justly. Indeed, Allah loves those who act justly.
trans-unit.target: A ak by mali bojovať dve frakcie medzi veriacich, potom vysporiadanie medzi dvoma. Ale ak jeden z nich utláča ostatné, potom bojovať proti utláča, kým sa vráti do vyhlášky Alah. A ak sa vráti, aby vysporiadanie medzi nimi v oblasti spravodlivosti a spravodlivo konať. V skutočnosti Boh miluje tých, ktorí konajú spravodlivo.

trans-unit.source: The believers are but brothers, so make settlement between your brothers. And fear Allah that you may receive mercy.
trans-unit.target: Veriaci sú ale bratia, aby vysporiadanie medzi svojich bratov. A strach, Alah, že dostanete milosť.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, let not a people ridicule [another] people; perhaps they may be better than them; nor let women ridicule [other] women; perhaps they may be better than them. And do not insult one another and do not call each other by [offensive] nicknames. Wretched is the name of disobedience after [one's] faith. And whoever does not repent - then it is those who are the wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: O vás, ktorí ste uverili, nech ľudia zosmiešňujú [iný] ľudí; možno môže byť lepšie ani nech ženy výsmech [Ostatné] ženy; možno môže byť lepšie ako oni. A Neurážajte sa navzájom, a nie volať navzájom [útok] prezývky. Úbohý je názov neposlušnosť po [jedna] viery. A kto nie je pokánie - potom je tých, ktorí sú zloèinci.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, avoid much [negative] assumption. Indeed, some assumption is sin. And do not spy or backbite each other. Would one of you like to eat the flesh of his brother when dead? You would detest it. And fear Allah; indeed, Allah is Accepting of repentance and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: O vás, ktorí ste uverili, zabrániť veľa [negatívny] predpoklad. V skutočnosti, niektoré predpoklad je hriech. A špionážne ani backbite navzájom. Jeden z vás chceli jesť mäso svojho brata, keď mŕtvi? By nenávidieť ho. A strach Alah; Boh je naozaj prijatie pokánia a Milosrdných.

trans-unit.source: O mankind, indeed We have created you from male and female and made you peoples and tribes that you may know one another. Indeed, the most noble of you in the sight of Allah is the most righteous of you. Indeed, Allah is Knowing and Acquainted.
trans-unit.target: O ľudstvo, skutočne sme vytvorili ste mužského či ženského a ťa národy a kmene, že môžu spoznať jeden druhého. V skutočnosti väčšina noble vás v očiach Alah je najviac spravodlivý vás. Alah je skutočne vedieť a Acquainted.

trans-unit.source: The bedouins say, "We have believed." Say, "You have not [yet] believed; but say [instead], 'We have submitted,' for faith has not yet entered your hearts. And if you obey Allah and His Messenger, He will not deprive you from your deeds of anything. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful."
trans-unit.target: Beduín povedať: "Sme uverili." Povedať, "ste [ešte] veril; ale povedať [miesto], "Sme podali," pre vieru ešte nevstúpila vaše srdcia. A ak budete počúvať Alah a jeho posol, že nemala zbavovať vás od vašich skutkov nič. Vskutku, Boh je odpúšťajúci a Milosrdných."

trans-unit.source: The believers are only the ones who have believed in Allah and His Messenger and then doubt not but strive with their properties and their lives in the cause of Allah. It is those who are the truthful.
trans-unit.target: Veriaci sú len tí, ktorí uverili v Alah a jeho posol a potom pochybovať nie ale sa snažiť ich vlastnosti a ich život v záujme Alaha. To je tých, ktorí sú pravdivé.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Would you acquaint Allah with your religion while Allah knows whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth, and Allah is Knowing of all things?"
trans-unit.target: Povedať, "by oboznámiť Alah s vaše náboženstvo, zatiaľ čo Boh vie, čo je v nebesiach a čo je na zemi, a Alah je vedieť všetko?"

trans-unit.source: They consider it a favor to you that they have accepted Islam. Say, "Do not consider your Islam a favor to me. Rather, Allah has conferred favor upon you that He has guided you to the faith, if you should be truthful."
trans-unit.target: Považujú za láskavosť vám že prijali Islam. Hovoria, "za vaše Islam láskavosť ku mne. Skôr Boh zveril láskavosť na vás, že má riadiť vás k viere, ak je pravdivé."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah knows the unseen [aspects] of the heavens and the earth. And Allah is Seeing of what you do.
trans-unit.target: Vskutku, Alah vie neviditeľné [aspekty] nebo a zem. A Allah je vidieť, čo robíte.

trans-unit.source: Qaf. By the honored Qur'an...
trans-unit.target: QAF. Tým poctený Korán...

trans-unit.source: But they wonder that there has come to them a warner from among themselves, and the disbelievers say, "This is an amazing thing.
trans-unit.target: Ale sa čudujú, že tam má prísť k nim warner spomedzi seba a neveriacim povedať: "to je úžasná vec.

trans-unit.source: When we have died and have become dust, [we will return to life]? That is a distant return."
trans-unit.target: Keď sme zomreli a stali prachu, [vrátime k životu]? To je ďaleko návrat."

trans-unit.source: We know what the earth diminishes of them, and with Us is a retaining record.
trans-unit.target: Vieme, čo zem znižuje z nich, a u nás je udržanie záznamu.

trans-unit.source: But they denied the truth when it came to them, so they are in a confused condition.
trans-unit.target: Ale popreli pravdu, keď to prišlo, tak oni sú vo zmetenom stave.

trans-unit.source: Have they not looked at the heaven above them - how We structured it and adorned it and [how] it has no rifts?
trans-unit.target: Oni sa pozrel nebo nad nimi - ako sme štruktúrovaný ho, a zdobili ho a [ako] nemá žiadne rozpory?

trans-unit.source: And the earth - We spread it out and cast therein firmly set mountains and made grow therein [something] of every beautiful kind,
trans-unit.target: A Zeme - sme ju šíriť von a cast v ňom pevne stanovený hory a stanoviť, pestovať v ňom [niečo] každý krásny druhu,

trans-unit.source: Giving insight and a reminder for every servant who turns [to Allah].
trans-unit.target: Dáva prehľad a pripomenutie pre každého zamestnanca, ktorý ukáže [Boh].

trans-unit.source: And We have sent down blessed rain from the sky and made grow thereby gardens and grain from the harvest
trans-unit.target: A sme zoslal požehnaný dážď z neba a tým rastú záhrady a zrna z úrody

trans-unit.source: And lofty palm trees having fruit arranged in layers -
trans-unit.target: A vznešené palmy má ovocie usporiadané vo vrstvách-

trans-unit.source: As provision for the servants, and We have given life thereby to a dead land. Thus is the resurrection.
trans-unit.target: Ako poskytovanie zamestnancov a dali sme tým život mŕtvy pôdy. Preto je vzkriesenie.

trans-unit.source: The people of Noah denied before them, and the companions of the well and Thamud
trans-unit.target: Ľudia z Noah poprel pred nimi a spoločníci dobre a Thamud

trans-unit.source: And 'Aad and Pharaoh and the brothers of Lot
trans-unit.target: A "Aad a faraóna a bratia veľa

trans-unit.source: And the companions of the thicket and the people of Tubba'. All denied the messengers, so My threat was justly fulfilled.
trans-unit.target: A spoločníci krovia a ľudia Tubba ". Všetkých popieral poslov, tak spravodlivo naplnila moje hrozbu.

trans-unit.source: Did We fail in the first creation? But they are in confusion over a new creation.
trans-unit.target: Skrachovali sme prvý tvorby? Ale oni sú v zmätok nad novým stvorením.

trans-unit.source: And We have already created man and know what his soul whispers to him, and We are closer to him than [his] jugular vein
trans-unit.target: Sme už vytvorili človeka a vedieť, čo šepká mu svoju dušu a sme bližšie k nemu ako [jeho] hrdlová žila

trans-unit.source: When the two receivers receive, seated on the right and on the left.
trans-unit.target: Keď dva prijímače, sediaci vpravo a vľavo.

trans-unit.source: Man does not utter any word except that with him is an observer prepared [to record].
trans-unit.target: Muž nie vysloviť nejaké slovo, okrem toho, že sa s ním je pozorovateľ pripravený [záznam].

trans-unit.source: And the intoxication of death will bring the truth; that is what you were trying to avoid.
trans-unit.target: A intoxikácie smrti prinesie pravdu; to je to, čo ste sa snažili vyhnúť.

trans-unit.source: And the Horn will be blown. That is the Day of [carrying out] the threat.
trans-unit.target: A bude fúkané roh. To je deň vykonávania [] hrozba.

trans-unit.source: And every soul will come, with it a driver and a witness.
trans-unit.target: A každá duša bude prísť s ním vodič a svedok.

trans-unit.source: [It will be said], "You were certainly in unmindfulness of this, and We have removed from you your cover, so your sight, this Day, is sharp."
trans-unit.target: [To bude povedal] "si bol určite v unmindfulness to a odstránili sme od vás váš kryt, takže váš zrak, tento deň je ostrý."

trans-unit.source: And his companion, [the angel], will say, "This [record] is what is with me, prepared."
trans-unit.target: A jeho spoločník [angel], hovoriť, "tento [záznam] čo je so mnou pripravené."

trans-unit.source: [Allah will say], "Throw into Hell every obstinate disbeliever,
trans-unit.target: [Allah povie], "hodiť do pekla každý tvrdohlavý neveriacich

trans-unit.source: Preventer of good, aggressor, and doubter,
trans-unit.target: Preventer dobra a agresor pochybovač,

trans-unit.source: Who made [as equal] with Allah another deity; then throw him into the severe punishment."
trans-unit.target: Kto robil [rovnú] s Alah iného Božstva; potom hodiť ho do prísne potrestanie."

trans-unit.source: His [devil] companion will say, "Our Lord, I did not make him transgress, but he [himself] was in extreme error."
trans-unit.target: Jeho spoločník [diabol] povie "Nášho Pána, nerobil mu prestúpiť, ale on [sám] bol extrémne omylom."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] will say, "Do not dispute before Me, while I had already presented to you the warning.
trans-unit.target: [Allah] bude hovoriť: "nie je v spore predo mnou, aj keď už mal prezentované vám varovanie.

trans-unit.source: The word will not be changed with Me, and never will I be unjust to the servants."
trans-unit.target: Slovo sa nezmení so mnou a nikdy nebude byť nespravodlivé služobníkom."

trans-unit.source: On the Day We will say to Hell, "Have you been filled?" and it will say, "Are there some more,"
trans-unit.target: Deň budeme hovoriť do pekla "Ste boli obsadené?", a to povedia, "Je tam viac"

trans-unit.source: And Paradise will be brought near to the righteous, not far,
trans-unit.target: A raj priniesol blízko spravodlivý, nie je ďaleko,

trans-unit.source: [It will be said], "This is what you were promised - for every returner [to Allah] and keeper [of His covenant]
trans-unit.target: [To bude povedal:], "to je, čo ste boli sľúbil - každý vracajúci [aby Allah] a držiteľ [svoj sľub]

trans-unit.source: Who feared the Most Merciful unseen and came with a heart returning [in repentance].
trans-unit.target: Kto bál Najpodstatnejšou neviditeľné a prišiel so srdcom návrat [pokánia].

trans-unit.source: Enter it in peace. This is the Day of Eternity."
trans-unit.target: Zadajte ho v pokoji. To je deň večnosti."

trans-unit.source: They will have whatever they wish therein, and with Us is more.
trans-unit.target: Majú čo chcú v ňom, a u nás je viac.

trans-unit.source: And how many a generation before them did We destroy who were greater than them in [striking] power and had explored throughout the lands. Is there any place of escape?
trans-unit.target: A koľko generácie pred nimi urobil zničíme ktorí boli väčšie ako ich [zarážajúce] sily a preskúmal v celom pozemky. Is tam akýkoľvek miesto úteku?

trans-unit.source: Indeed in that is a reminder for whoever has a heart or who listens while he is present [in mind].
trans-unit.target: Naozaj v tom, že je pripomienkou toho, kto má srdce alebo kto načúva, zatiaľ čo on je prítomný [v mysli].

trans-unit.source: And We did certainly create the heavens and earth and what is between them in six days, and there touched Us no weariness.
trans-unit.target: A sme určite vytvoriť nebies a Zeme a čo je medzi nimi v šiestich dňoch, a tam nás dotkol, žiadna únava.

trans-unit.source: So be patient, [O Muhammad], over what they say and exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord before the rising of the sun and before its setting,
trans-unit.target: Tak buďte trpezliví, [Mohamed], cez to, čo hovoria a povýši [Allah] s chválou svojho pána a pred vychádzajúceho slnka a jeho nastavenie

trans-unit.source: And [in part] of the night exalt Him and after prostration.
trans-unit.target: A [časť] noci oslavovať ho a vyčerpanie.

trans-unit.source: And listen on the Day when the Caller will call out from a place that is near -
trans-unit.target: A počúvať na deň, kedy volajúci bude volať z miesta, ktoré je blízko-

trans-unit.source: The Day they will hear the blast [of the Horn] in truth. That is the Day of Emergence [from the graves].
trans-unit.target: Deň budú počuť výbuch [Horn] v pravde. To je deň vzniku [z hrobov].

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it is We who give life and cause death, and to Us is the destination
trans-unit.target: Vskutku, sme to my, kto dal život a spôsobujú smrť a nám je cieľ

trans-unit.source: On the Day the earth breaks away from them [and they emerge] rapidly; that is a gathering easy for Us.
trans-unit.target: Deň Zeme prestávky od nich [a vznikajú]; to je jednoduché pre nás stretnutie.

trans-unit.source: We are most knowing of what they say, and you are not over them a tyrant. But remind by the Qur'an whoever fears My threat.
trans-unit.target: Sme, že väčšina vedieť, čo hovoria, a nie ste cez ne tyran. Ale pripomenúť Korán, ten, kto obáva môj hrozbu.

trans-unit.source: By those [winds] scattering [dust] dispersing
trans-unit.target: Tie [vetrom] rozptyl [prachu] rozptyľuje

trans-unit.source: And those [clouds] carrying a load [of water]
trans-unit.target: A tie [mraky] niesť zaťaženie [vody]

trans-unit.source: And those [ships] sailing with ease
trans-unit.target: A tie [lode] plavba s ľahkosťou

trans-unit.source: And those [angels] apportioning [each] matter,
trans-unit.target: A tie [anjeli] [každý] rozdelenie hmoty,

trans-unit.source: Indeed, what you are promised is true.
trans-unit.target: Čo ste sľúbil je skutočne pravda.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, the recompense is to occur.
trans-unit.target: A skutočne, odmenu má nastať.

trans-unit.source: By the heaven containing pathways,
trans-unit.target: Neba, obsahujúce dráh,

trans-unit.source: Indeed, you are in differing speech.
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti ste rôzne reči.

trans-unit.source: Deluded away from the Qur'an is he who is deluded.
trans-unit.target: Pošetilou od Korán je ten, kto je pošetilou.

trans-unit.source: Destroyed are the falsifiers
trans-unit.target: Zničil sa falsifiers

trans-unit.source: Who are within a flood [of confusion] and heedless.
trans-unit.target: Kto sa v záplave [zámeny] a nepozorný.

trans-unit.source: They ask, "When is the Day of Recompense?"
trans-unit.target: Pýtajú: "Keď je deň odplatím?"

trans-unit.source: [It is] the Day they will be tormented over the Fire
trans-unit.target: [Je] deň, bude sa trápi nad ohňom

trans-unit.source: [And will be told], "Taste your torment. This is that for which you were impatient."
trans-unit.target: [A bude povedané], "chuť vášho trápenia. To je, že na ktoré ste boli netrpezliví."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the righteous will be among gardens and springs,
trans-unit.target: Skutočne spravodliví budú záhradami a prameňov,

trans-unit.source: Accepting what their Lord has given them. Indeed, they were before that doers of good.
trans-unit.target: Prijatie, čo ich Pán dal im. V skutočnosti boli predtým že konajte dobro.

trans-unit.source: They used to sleep but little of the night,
trans-unit.target: Používajú spať, ale málo, v noci,

trans-unit.source: And in the hours before dawn they would ask forgiveness,
trans-unit.target: A v hodinách pred svitaním oni by požiadať o odpustenie,

trans-unit.source: And from their properties was [given] the right of the [needy] petitioner and the deprived.
trans-unit.target: A z ich vlastnosti [keďže] práva [potrebujú] navrhovateľa a odkázaným.

trans-unit.source: And on the earth are signs for the certain [in faith]
trans-unit.target: A na zemi sú príznaky určitú [vo viere]

trans-unit.source: And in yourselves. Then will you not see?
trans-unit.target: A sami. Potom sa vám nevidí?

trans-unit.source: And in the heaven is your provision and whatever you are promised.
trans-unit.target: A v nebi je vaše poskytovanie a čo nám sľúbil.

trans-unit.source: Then by the Lord of the heaven and earth, indeed, it is truth - just as [sure as] it is that you are speaking.
trans-unit.target: Potom pán neba i Zeme, je naozaj pravda - len ako [že] je, že hovoríte.

trans-unit.source: Has there reached you the story of the honored guests of Abraham? -
trans-unit.target: Tam dosiahla vás príbeh poctený hostia Abraháma? -

trans-unit.source: When they entered upon him and said, "[We greet you with] peace." He answered, "[And upon you] peace, [you are] a people unknown.
trans-unit.target: Keď vstúpil na neho a povedal: "[Srdečne Vás s] mier." On odpovedal: "[a na vás] mieru, [ste] neznámych ľudí.

trans-unit.source: Then he went to his family and came with a fat [roasted] calf
trans-unit.target: Potom odišiel do svojej rodiny a prišiel s tuku [pečené] teľa

trans-unit.source: And placed it near them; he said, "Will you not eat?"
trans-unit.target: A umiestnené v blízkosti; on povedal: "Nebude vám jesť?"

trans-unit.source: And he felt from them apprehension. They said, "Fear not," and gave him good tidings of a learned boy.
trans-unit.target: A on sa cítil z ich obavy. Povedal, "Neboj sa", a dal mu dobrá zvesť dozvedel chlapca.

trans-unit.source: And his wife approached with a cry [of alarm] and struck her face and said, "[I am] a barren old woman!"
trans-unit.target: A jeho manželka, priblížil s výkrik [alarm] a zasiahol tvár a povedal: "[som] neplodná stará žena!"

trans-unit.source: They said, "Thus has said your Lord; indeed, He is the Wise, the Knowing."
trans-unit.target: Oni povedali: "tak vyhlásil svojho pána; v skutočnosti, on je múdry, znalosť."

trans-unit.source: [Abraham] said, "Then what is your business [here], O messengers?"
trans-unit.target: [Abraham] povedal: "tak čo je vaše podnikanie [tu], O poslov?"

trans-unit.source: They said, "Indeed, we have been sent to a people of criminals
trans-unit.target: Povedali, že "v skutočnosti sme zaslali ľudia zločincov

trans-unit.source: To send down upon them stones of clay,
trans-unit.target: Poslať po nich kamene z hliny,

trans-unit.source: Marked in the presence of your Lord for the transgressors."
trans-unit.target: Označené v prítomnosti svojho pána za hriešnikov."

trans-unit.source: So We brought out whoever was in the cities of the believers.
trans-unit.target: Tak sme vytiahli ten, kto bol v mestách veriacich.

trans-unit.source: And We found not within them other than a [single] house of Muslims.
trans-unit.target: A našli sme do nich iné [jediný] dom moslimov.

trans-unit.source: And We left therein a sign for those who fear the painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: A nechali sme v ňom znamením pre tých, ktorí sa obávajú bolestivé trest.

trans-unit.source: And in Moses [was a sign], when We sent him to Pharaoh with clear authority.
trans-unit.target: A v Moses [bolo znamenie], keď sme ho poslali do faraóna s jasným orgánu.

trans-unit.source: But he turned away with his supporters and said," A magician or a madman."
trans-unit.target: Ale on sa obrátil preč s jeho stúpencov a povedal,"kúzelník alebo šialenec."

trans-unit.source: So We took him and his soldiers and cast them into the sea, and he was blameworthy.
trans-unit.target: Tak sme sa ho a jeho vojaci a ich obsadenie do mora, a bol blameworthy.

trans-unit.source: And in 'Aad [was a sign], when We sent against them the barren wind.
trans-unit.target: A "Aad [bolo znamenie], keď sme poslali proti nim neplodná vietor.

trans-unit.source: It left nothing of what it came upon but that it made it like disintegrated ruins.
trans-unit.target: To nič to narazil nechal, ale že to robil to ako dezintegrované ruiny.

trans-unit.source: And in Thamud, when it was said to them, "Enjoy yourselves for a time."
trans-unit.target: A v Thamud, keď bol povedal im, "užívajte si čas."

trans-unit.source: But they were insolent toward the command of their Lord, so the thunderbolt seized them while they were looking on.
trans-unit.target: Ale oni boli drzý na príkaz svojho pána, takže blesk ich chytil, keď sa pozrieme.

trans-unit.source: And they were unable to arise, nor could they defend themselves.
trans-unit.target: A nemohli vzniknúť ani nemohol sa brániť.

trans-unit.source: And [We destroyed] the people of Noah before; indeed, they were a people defiantly disobedient.
trans-unit.target: A [sme zničili] ľudia Noah predtým; v skutočnosti boli ľudia vyzývavo neposlušný.

trans-unit.source: And the heaven We constructed with strength, and indeed, We are [its] expander.
trans-unit.target: Nebo sme postavená pevnosť a skutočne sme [jeho] expander.

trans-unit.source: And the earth We have spread out, and excellent is the preparer.
trans-unit.target: Krajina máme rozložiť a výborný je zhotoviteľa.

trans-unit.source: And of all things We created two mates; perhaps you will remember.
trans-unit.target: A všetkých vecí sme vytvorili dva kamaráti; možno si spomeniete.

trans-unit.source: So flee to Allah. Indeed, I am to you from Him a clear warner.
trans-unit.target: Tak utiecť Alah. Samozrejme, že som sa od neho jasné warner.

trans-unit.source: And do not make [as equal] with Allah another deity. Indeed, I am to you from Him a clear warner.
trans-unit.target: A nie vyrovnať [ako] s Alah iného Božstva. Samozrejme, že som sa od neho jasné warner.

trans-unit.source: Similarly, there came not to those before them any messenger except that they said, "A magician or a madman."
trans-unit.target: Podobne prišiel nie na tých pred nimi akejkoľvek posol okrem toho, že hovorili, "kúzelník alebo šialenec."

trans-unit.source: Did they suggest it to them? Rather, they [themselves] are a transgressing people.
trans-unit.target: Urobil to naznačujú ich? Skôr [] sú sami transgressing ľudí.

trans-unit.source: So leave them, [O Muhammad], for you are not to be blamed.
trans-unit.target: Nechajte ich, [Mohamed], pre vás nie na svedomí.

trans-unit.source: And remind, for indeed, the reminder benefits the believers.
trans-unit.target: A pripomenúť, pre skutočne pripomenutie výhody veriacich.

trans-unit.source: And I did not create the jinn and mankind except to worship Me.
trans-unit.target: A som nevytvoril, jinn a ľudstvo okrem uctievanie, Me.

trans-unit.source: I do not want from them any provision, nor do I want them to feed Me.
trans-unit.target: Nechcete, aby z nich ustanovenie, ani nechcem, aby kŕmenie ma.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it is Allah who is the [continual] Provider, the firm possessor of strength.
trans-unit.target: Naozaj, je to Boh, kto je [neustále] poskytovateľ, firma vlastníkom silu.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, for those who have wronged is a portion [of punishment] like the portion of their predecessors, so let them not impatiently urge Me.
trans-unit.target: A naozaj, pre tých, ktorí ublížili, je časť [trest] ako časť ich predchodcovia, tak nech nie netrpezlivo naliehala na mňa.

trans-unit.source: And woe to those who have disbelieved from their Day which they are promised.
trans-unit.target: A Beda tým, ktorí majú pochyboval z ich dňa, ktoré sú sľúbil.

trans-unit.source: By the mount
trans-unit.target: Podľa pripojenia

trans-unit.source: And [by] a Book inscribed
trans-unit.target: A [o] kniha zapísaných

trans-unit.source: In parchment spread open
trans-unit.target: V pergamen šíriť otvorené

trans-unit.source: And [by] the frequented House
trans-unit.target: A [o] frekventovaných House

trans-unit.source: And [by] the heaven raised high
trans-unit.target: A [o] nebo vznesené vysoko

trans-unit.source: And [by] the sea filled [with fire],
trans-unit.target: A [o] more plné [ohňom]

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the punishment of your Lord will occur.
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti dôjde k smrti svojho pána.

trans-unit.source: Of it there is no preventer.
trans-unit.target: To nie je žiadny preventer.

trans-unit.source: On the Day the heaven will sway with circular motion
trans-unit.target: Deň sa hojdať neba s kruhovým pohybom

trans-unit.source: And the mountains will pass on, departing -
trans-unit.target: A hory prejde na odlietajúce -

trans-unit.source: Then woe, that Day, to the deniers,
trans-unit.target: Potom Beda, ten deň, na popierači

trans-unit.source: Who are in [empty] discourse amusing themselves.
trans-unit.target: Ktorí sú v [prázdny] prejav zábavné sami.

trans-unit.source: The Day they are thrust toward the fire of Hell with a [violent] thrust, [its angels will say],
trans-unit.target: Deň sa ťah smerom k pekelného s [násilné] ťah v [jeho anjeli budú hovoriť],

trans-unit.source: "This is the Fire which you used to deny.
trans-unit.target: "Toto je oheň, ktorý ste použili poprieť.

trans-unit.source: Then is this magic, or do you not see?
trans-unit.target: Potom je to kúzlo, alebo si nevidí?

trans-unit.source: [Enter to] burn therein; then be patient or impatient - it is all the same for you. You are only being recompensed [for] what you used to do."
trans-unit.target: [Enter] horieť v ňom; Potom pacient alebo netrpezliví - je to všetky rovnaké pre vás. Ste sú len byť odmenený [k], čo ste zvyknutí robiť."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the righteous will be in gardens and pleasure,
trans-unit.target: Skutočne spravodliví budú v záhradách a radosť,

trans-unit.source: Enjoying what their Lord has given them, and their Lord protected them from the punishment of Hellfire.
trans-unit.target: Teší to, čo ich Pán dal im a ich pán neochránila od trestu Hellfire.

trans-unit.source: [They will be told], "Eat and drink in satisfaction for what you used to do."
trans-unit.target: [Oni povedia], "Jedlo a pitie v spokojnosti, na čo ste zvyknutí robiť."

trans-unit.source: They will be reclining on thrones lined up, and We will marry them to fair women with large, [beautiful] eyes.
trans-unit.target: Oni sa ležiace na tróny postavili a sme im vziať spravodlivé ženám s veľkými, [krásne] oči.

trans-unit.source: And those who believed and whose descendants followed them in faith - We will join with them their descendants, and We will not deprive them of anything of their deeds. Every person, for what he earned, is retained.
trans-unit.target: A tí, ktorí verili, ktorého potomkovia ich nasledovať vo viere - Pripájame sa s nimi ich potomkov a sme nezbavuje im niečo svoje skutky. Každý človek, za čo získal, sa zachová.

trans-unit.source: And We will provide them with fruit and meat from whatever they desire.
trans-unit.target: A poskytneme im ovocie a mäso čo si želajú.

trans-unit.source: They will exchange with one another a cup [of wine] wherein [results] no ill speech or commission of sin.
trans-unit.target: Vymenia navzájom šálku [víno] wherein [výsledky] Komisia hriechu ani zle reči.

trans-unit.source: There will circulate among them [servant] boys [especially] for them, as if they were pearls well-protected.
trans-unit.target: Tam bude cirkulovať medzi nimi [zamestnanec] chlapci [najmä] pre nich, ako keby boli perly dobre chránené.

trans-unit.source: And they will approach one another, inquiring of each other.
trans-unit.target: A že bude prístup jeden druhého, pátraniach navzájom.

trans-unit.source: They will say, "Indeed, we were previously among our people fearful [of displeasing Allah].
trans-unit.target: Oni povedia: "v skutočnosti sme boli predtým u našich ľudí strašný [nespokojný Allah].

trans-unit.source: So Allah conferred favor upon us and protected us from the punishment of the Scorching Fire.
trans-unit.target: Tak Boh prenesených prospech na nás a chrániť nás od trestu popálenie ohňom.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, we used to supplicate Him before. Indeed, it is He who is the Beneficent, the Merciful."
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti sme použili k snažně prosiť ho. V skutočnosti je to on, ktorý je dobročinný, je Milosrdných."

trans-unit.source: So remind [O Muhammad], for you are not, by the favor of your Lord, a soothsayer or a madman.
trans-unit.target: Takže pripomínajú [Mohamed], pre vás nie sú v prospech svojho pána, veštec alebo šialenec.

trans-unit.source: Or do they say [of you], "A poet for whom we await a misfortune of time?"
trans-unit.target: Alebo hovoria [u], "Básnik, pre koho čakáme nešťastie času?"

trans-unit.source: Say, "Wait, for indeed I am, with you, among the waiters."
trans-unit.target: Povedať, "Čakať, naozaj som, s vami, u čašníkov."

trans-unit.source: Or do their minds command them to [say] this, or are they a transgressing people?
trans-unit.target: Alebo si ich myseľ prikázal im to [povedať], alebo sú transgressing ľudí?

trans-unit.source: Or do they say, "He has made it up"? Rather, they do not believe.
trans-unit.target: Alebo hovoria, "urobil to"? Naopak, neveria.

trans-unit.source: Then let them produce a statement like it, if they should be truthful.
trans-unit.target: Potom nech vypracuje výkaz mi to, ak by mali byť pravdivé.

trans-unit.source: Or were they created by nothing, or were they the creators [of themselves]?
trans-unit.target: Sa vytvoril nič alebo boli tvorcovia [seba]?

trans-unit.source: Or did they create the heavens and the earth? Rather, they are not certain.
trans-unit.target: Alebo si vytvárajú nebo a zem? Naopak, nie sú určité.

trans-unit.source: Or have they the depositories [containing the provision] of your Lord? Or are they the controllers [of them]?
trans-unit.target: Alebo ich depozitárov [obsahujúce ustanovenie] svojho pána? Alebo sú kontrolórmi [ich]?

trans-unit.source: Or have they a stairway [into the heaven] upon which they listen? Then let their listener produce a clear authority.
trans-unit.target: Alebo budú mať schodisko [do neba] ktorý počúvajú? Nech ich poslucháč produkujú jasné orgánu.

trans-unit.source: Or has He daughters while you have sons?
trans-unit.target: Alebo má on dcéry, keď máte synov?

trans-unit.source: Or do you, [O Muhammad], ask of them a payment, so they are by debt burdened down?
trans-unit.target: Alebo si, [Mohamed], požiadať z nich platby, takže sú dlh zaťažený dole?

trans-unit.source: Or have they [knowledge of] the unseen, so they write [it] down?
trans-unit.target: Alebo oni [poznanie] neviditeľné, takže si zapíšte [to]?

trans-unit.source: Or do they intend a plan? But those who disbelieve - they are the object of a plan.
trans-unit.target: Alebo nemajú v úmysle plán? Ale tí, ktorí neveria - sú predmetom plánu.

trans-unit.source: Or have they a deity other than Allah? Exalted is Allah above whatever they associate with Him.
trans-unit.target: Alebo oni Boha okrem Alaha? Vyvýšený je Boh nad čokoľvek spájajú s ním.

trans-unit.source: And if they were to see a fragment from the sky falling, they would say, "[It is merely] clouds heaped up."
trans-unit.target: A keby boli vidieť fragment z neba padá, povedali, "[je to len] mraky nazhromaždil."

trans-unit.source: So leave them until they meet their Day in which they will be struck insensible -
trans-unit.target: Nechajte ich až splnia svoj deň, v ktorom sa bude zasiahnutý necitlivé-

trans-unit.source: The Day their plan will not avail them at all, nor will they be helped.
trans-unit.target: V deň ich plán sa nevyužijú ich vôbec, ani im pomohol.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, for those who have wronged is a punishment before that, but most of them do not know.
trans-unit.target: A naozaj, pre tých, ktorí ublížili je trest pred tým, ale väčšina z nich nevie.

trans-unit.source: And be patient, [O Muhammad], for the decision of your Lord, for indeed, you are in Our eyes. And exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord when you arise.
trans-unit.target: A buďte trpezliví, [Mohamed], rozhodnutia svojho pána, pre naozaj, ste v našich očiach. A oslavovať [Allah] s chválou svojho pána, keď vám vznikajú.

trans-unit.source: And in a part of the night exalt Him and after [the setting of] the stars.
trans-unit.target: A v časti noci oslavovať ho a po [Nastavenie] hviezdy.

trans-unit.source: By the star when it descends,
trans-unit.target: Hviezda, keď sa zostupuje,

trans-unit.source: Your companion [Muhammad] has not strayed, nor has he erred,
trans-unit.target: Váš spoločník [Muhammad] nie sa odchýlili, ani dopustil on,

trans-unit.source: Nor does he speak from [his own] inclination.
trans-unit.target: Ani sa mu hovoriť od [vlastnú] sklonu.

trans-unit.source: It is not but a revelation revealed,
trans-unit.target: Nie je to ale Zjavenie ukázalo,

trans-unit.source: Taught to him by one intense in strength -
trans-unit.target: Učil ho jeden intenzívny silový-

trans-unit.source: One of soundness. And he rose to [his] true form
trans-unit.target: Jeden z spoľahlivosť. A vstal k [jeho] skutočnú podobu

trans-unit.source: While he was in the higher [part of the] horizon.
trans-unit.target: Zatiaľ čo on bol vo vyšších [časť] horizont.

trans-unit.source: Then he approached and descended
trans-unit.target: Potom sa blížil a zostúpil

trans-unit.source: And was at a distance of two bow lengths or nearer.
trans-unit.target: A bol vo vzdialenosti dĺžky dvoch luk alebo bližšie.

trans-unit.source: And he revealed to His Servant what he revealed.
trans-unit.target: A on ukázal na svojho služobníka, čo odhalil.

trans-unit.source: The heart did not lie [about] what it saw.
trans-unit.target: Srdce nemal klamať [o], čo videl.

trans-unit.source: So will you dispute with him over what he saw?
trans-unit.target: Tak bude spor s ním cez čo videl?

trans-unit.source: And he certainly saw him in another descent
trans-unit.target: A určite ho videl v ďalší zostup

trans-unit.source: At the Lote Tree of the Utmost Boundary -
trans-unit.target: V Lote strom maximálnu hranicu-

trans-unit.source: Near it is the Garden of Refuge -
trans-unit.target: V blízkosti je Záhrada útočisko-

trans-unit.source: When there covered the Lote Tree that which covered [it].
trans-unit.target: Keď tam zahrnuté Lote strom, že ktoré [to].

trans-unit.source: The sight [of the Prophet] did not swerve, nor did it transgress [its limit].
trans-unit.target: Pohľad [prorok] sa uhnúť, ani som ju prestúpiť [limit].

trans-unit.source: He certainly saw of the greatest signs of his Lord.
trans-unit.target: Určite videl najväčšie znamenia svojho pána.

trans-unit.source: So have you considered al-Lat and al-'Uzza?
trans-unit.target: Takže máte za al-Lat a al-"Uzza?

trans-unit.source: And Manat, the third - the other one?
trans-unit.target: A Turkménsky Manat, tretí - ten druhý?

trans-unit.source: Is the male for you and for Him the female?
trans-unit.target: Je male, pre vás aj pre neho žena?

trans-unit.source: That, then, is an unjust division.
trans-unit.target: Potom, že je nespravodlivé.

trans-unit.source: They are not but [mere] names you have named them - you and your forefathers - for which Allah has sent down no authority. They follow not except assumption and what [their] souls desire, and there has already come to them from their Lord guidance.
trans-unit.target: Nie sú ale [len] mená ste pomenovali ich - vás a vašich predkov -, pre ktoré má Boh zoslal žiadny orgán. Sledujú nie okrem predpoklad a čo [ich] duše túžia a tam už prišiel k nim ich pán usmernenie.

trans-unit.source: Or is there for man whatever he wishes?
trans-unit.target: Alebo je tu človek, čo chce?

trans-unit.source: Rather, to Allah belongs the Hereafter and the first [life].
trans-unit.target: Naopak, Alah patrí ďalej a prvý [život].

trans-unit.source: And how many angels there are in the heavens whose intercession will not avail at all except [only] after Allah has permitted [it] to whom He wills and approves.
trans-unit.target: A koľko anjeli nie sú v nebi ktorého príhovor sa nevyužijú vôbec výnimkou [len] po Boh dovolil, [to] komu on chce a schvaľuje.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who do not believe in the Hereafter name the angels female names,
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti tí, ktorí neveria v nižšie názov anjeli ženských mien,

trans-unit.source: And they have thereof no knowledge. They follow not except assumption, and indeed, assumption avails not against the truth at all.
trans-unit.target: A oni ich nemajú žiadne vedomosti. Riadia sa nie s výnimkou predpoklad a skutočne predpoklad využíva nie proti pravde vôbec.

trans-unit.source: So turn away from whoever turns his back on Our message and desires not except the worldly life.
trans-unit.target: Tak zase ten, kto obracia chrbtom na náš odkaz a túžby nie okrem pozemský život.

trans-unit.source: That is their sum of knowledge. Indeed, your Lord is most knowing of who strays from His way, and He is most knowing of who is guided.
trans-unit.target: To je ich súčet vedomostí. Vskutku, svojho pána, je väčšina vedomím toho, kto zablúdi z jeho cesty, a on je väčšina vedomím toho, ktorá je vedená.

trans-unit.source: And to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth - that He may recompense those who do evil with [the penalty of] what they have done and recompense those who do good with the best [reward] -
trans-unit.target: A Alah patrí čo je v nebesiach a čo je na zemi - že on môže odmeniť tých, ktorí zlo s [trest] čo urobil a odmeniť tých, ktorí nemajú dobré s najlepšími [odmena] -

trans-unit.source: Those who avoid the major sins and immoralities, only [committing] slight ones. Indeed, your Lord is vast in forgiveness. He was most knowing of you when He produced you from the earth and when you were fetuses in the wombs of your mothers. So do not claim yourselves to be pure; He is most knowing of who fears Him.
trans-unit.target: Tí, ktorí vyhnúť sa hlavné hriechy a immoralities len [spáchania] malé. Vskutku, svojho pána, je obrovská v odpustenie. Bol to väčšina nevie vás, kedy si naštudoval, zo Zeme, a keď ste plodov v lona vašej matky. Tak sa nesnažia sami sa čistý; Je, že väčšina vedomím toho, kto sa obáva, mu.

trans-unit.source: Have you seen the one who turned away
trans-unit.target: Videli ste ten, kto sa odvrátil

trans-unit.source: And gave a little and [then] refrained?
trans-unit.target: Dal trochu a [potom] upustil?

trans-unit.source: Does he have knowledge of the unseen, so he sees?
trans-unit.target: Má vedomosti o neviditeľné, takže vidí?

trans-unit.source: Or has he not been informed of what was in the scriptures of Moses
trans-unit.target: Alebo mu nebola informovaná, čo bolo v Písme Moses

trans-unit.source: And [of] Abraham, who fulfilled [his obligations] -
trans-unit.target: A [] Abraháma, ktorí splnili [jeho povinnosti]-

trans-unit.source: That no bearer of burdens will bear the burden of another
trans-unit.target: Že žiadny nosič záťaže bude niesť bremeno druhého

trans-unit.source: And that there is not for man except that [good] for which he strives
trans-unit.target: A že neexistuje žiadny muž okrem že [dobré] ktorý sa usiluje

trans-unit.source: And that his effort is going to be seen -
trans-unit.target: A že jeho úsilie smeruje k videniu-

trans-unit.source: Then he will be recompensed for it with the fullest recompense
trans-unit.target: Potom on bude odmenený za to s naplno odmenu

trans-unit.source: And that to your Lord is the finality
trans-unit.target: A že váš pán je konečné

trans-unit.source: And that it is He who makes [one] laugh and weep
trans-unit.target: A že je to on, kto robí [jedna] smiať a plakať

trans-unit.source: And that it is He who causes death and gives life
trans-unit.target: A že je to on, kto spôsobí smrť a dáva život

trans-unit.source: And that He creates the two mates - the male and female -
trans-unit.target: A že on vytvára dvoch kamarátov - samec a samica-

trans-unit.source: From a sperm-drop when it is emitted
trans-unit.target: Zo spermie-drop, kedy je emitovaných

trans-unit.source: And that [incumbent] upon Him is the next creation
trans-unit.target: A že [úradujúci] mu je ďalšie vytváranie

trans-unit.source: And that it is He who enriches and suffices
trans-unit.target: A že je to on, ktorý obohacuje a stačí

trans-unit.source: And that it is He who is the Lord of Sirius
trans-unit.target: A že je to on, kto je pán Sirius

trans-unit.source: And that He destroyed the first [people of] 'Aad
trans-unit.target: A že on zničil prvý [ľudia] "Aad

trans-unit.source: And Thamud - and He did not spare [them] -
trans-unit.target: A Thamud - a on robil nie náhradné [ich]-

trans-unit.source: And the people of Noah before. Indeed, it was they who were [even] more unjust and oppressing.
trans-unit.target: A ľudia z Noah pred. Naozaj, bolo to oni, kto [ešte] nespravodlivé a útlaku.

trans-unit.source: And the overturned towns He hurled down
trans-unit.target: Prevrátený miest on hodil nadol

trans-unit.source: And covered them by that which He covered.
trans-unit.target: A sa vzťahuje to, čo on, na ktoré sa vzťahuje.

trans-unit.source: Then which of the favors of your Lord do you doubt?
trans-unit.target: Potom, čo zdvorilosti svojho pána máte pochybnosti?

trans-unit.source: This [Prophet] is a warner like the former warners.
trans-unit.target: Tento [prorok] je warner ako bývalý warners.

trans-unit.source: The Approaching Day has approached.
trans-unit.target: Blíži deň sa priblížil.

trans-unit.source: Of it, [from those] besides Allah, there is no remover.
trans-unit.target: Ho, [tí] popri Alláhu, neexistuje žiadny odstraňovač.

trans-unit.source: Then at this statement do you wonder?
trans-unit.target: Potom na toto vyhlásenie vás zaujíma?

trans-unit.source: And you laugh and do not weep
trans-unit.target: A môžete sa smiať a plakať, nie

trans-unit.source: While you are proudly sporting?
trans-unit.target: Zatiaľ čo vy ste hrdo športové?

trans-unit.source: So prostrate to Allah and worship [Him].
trans-unit.target: Takže přemoci Bohu a uctievanie [ho].

trans-unit.source: The Hour has come near, and the moon has split [in two].
trans-unit.target: Hodina má priblížiť a mesiac rozdelil [v dvoch].

trans-unit.source: And if they see a miracle, they turn away and say, "Passing magic."
trans-unit.target: A ak vidí zázrak, odvrátil a povedať: "Okolo mágie."

trans-unit.source: And they denied and followed their inclinations. But for every matter is a [time of] settlement.
trans-unit.target: A poprel a nasledovať svoje sklony. Ale v každom prípade je osada [čas].

trans-unit.source: And there has already come to them of information that in which there is deterrence -
trans-unit.target: A tam už prišiel o informácie, že akým je odstrašenie-

trans-unit.source: Extensive wisdom - but warning does not avail [them].
trans-unit.target: Rozsiahle múdrosti - ale upozornenie nezvýhodňuje [ich].

trans-unit.source: So leave them, [O Muhammad]. The Day the Caller calls to something forbidding,
trans-unit.target: Nechajte ich, [Mohamed]. Deň volajúci volania niečo zakazuje,

trans-unit.source: Their eyes humbled, they will emerge from the graves as if they were locusts spreading,
trans-unit.target: Ich očiach pokoru, vznikajú bude z hrobov ako keby boli kobylky šírenia,

trans-unit.source: Racing ahead toward the Caller. The disbelievers will say, "This is a difficult Day."
trans-unit.target: Rýchle napredovanie smerom k volajúcemu. Neveriacim povie, "To je ťažký deň."

trans-unit.source: The people of Noah denied before them, and they denied Our servant and said, "A madman," and he was repelled.
trans-unit.target: Ľudia z Noah poprel pred nimi, a poprel náš sluha a povedal: "Blázon", a on bol odrazil.

trans-unit.source: So he invoked his Lord, "Indeed, I am overpowered, so help."
trans-unit.target: Tak bol dovolávať svojho pána, "Vskutku, ja som premohol, a tak pomôcť."

trans-unit.source: Then We opened the gates of the heaven with rain pouring down
trans-unit.target: Potom sme otvorili bránu neba dážď steká

trans-unit.source: And caused the earth to burst with springs, and the waters met for a matter already predestined.
trans-unit.target: Spôsobené zem praskla s prameňmi a vody sa stretol za záležitosť už predurčený.

trans-unit.source: And We carried him on a [construction of] planks and nails,
trans-unit.target: A sme mu taká [konštrukcia] dosky a klince,

trans-unit.source: Sailing under Our observation as reward for he who had been denied.
trans-unit.target: Plachtenie podľa nášho pozorovania ako odmenu za ten, kto bol odmietnutý.

trans-unit.source: And We left it as a sign, so is there any who will remember?
trans-unit.target: A sme vľavo na znamenie, tak je tam každý, kto si bude pamätať?

trans-unit.source: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.
trans-unit.target: A ako [vážne] bol môj trest a varovania.

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?
trans-unit.target: A určite sme urobili Korán jednoduchý na pamiatku, tak je tam každý, kto si bude pamätať?

trans-unit.source: 'Aad denied; and how [severe] were My punishment and warning.
trans-unit.target: "Aad odmietnutý; a ako [vážne] bol môj trest a varovania.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We sent upon them a screaming wind on a day of continuous misfortune,
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti sme poslali na nich kričí vietor je dňom nepretržitého nešťastie,

trans-unit.source: Extracting the people as if they were trunks of palm trees uprooted.
trans-unit.target: Extrahovanie ľudí, ako keby boli kmene palmy vykoreniť.

trans-unit.source: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.
trans-unit.target: A ako [vážne] bol môj trest a varovania.

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?
trans-unit.target: A určite sme urobili Korán jednoduchý na pamiatku, tak je tam každý, kto si bude pamätať?

trans-unit.source: Thamud denied the warning
trans-unit.target: Thamud poprel varovania

trans-unit.source: And said, "Is it one human being among us that we should follow? Indeed, we would then be in error and madness.
trans-unit.target: A povedal: "je to jedna ľudská bytosť medzi nás, že sme sa mali riadiť? Vskutku, potom by sme chybu a šialenstvo.

trans-unit.source: Has the message been sent down upon him from among us? Rather, he is an insolent liar."
trans-unit.target: Správu poslal na neho spomedzi nás? Skôr, že je drzý klamár."

trans-unit.source: They will know tomorrow who is the insolent liar.
trans-unit.target: Zajtra budú vedieť, kto je drzý klamár.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We are sending the she-camel as trial for them, so watch them and be patient.
trans-unit.target: Vskutku, posielame ona-ťavy, ako skúšobná verzia, takže sledovať ich a byť trpezlivý.

trans-unit.source: And inform them that the water is shared between them, each [day of] drink attended [by turn].
trans-unit.target: A informovať ich, že voda je zdieľaná medzi sebou, každý nápoj [deň] zúčastnilo [zapnúť].

trans-unit.source: But they called their companion, and he dared and hamstrung [her].
trans-unit.target: Ale oni volali ich spoločník a odvážil a ochromená [ju].

trans-unit.source: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.
trans-unit.target: A ako [vážne] bol môj trest a varovania.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We sent upon them one blast from the sky, and they became like the dry twig fragments of an [animal] pen.
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti sme poslali na nich jeden výbuch z neba, a oni sa stali ako suchá ratolesť fragmenty [zvierat] pero.

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?
trans-unit.target: A určite sme urobili Korán jednoduchý na pamiatku, tak je tam každý, kto si bude pamätať?

trans-unit.source: The people of Lot denied the warning.
trans-unit.target: Ľudia veľa poprel varovanie.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We sent upon them a storm of stones, except the family of Lot - We saved them before dawn
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti sme poslali na nich búrka kameňov, okrem rodinné dávky - sme ich zachránil pred svitaním

trans-unit.source: As favor from us. Thus do We reward he who is grateful.
trans-unit.target: Ako láskavosť od nás. Preto ten, kto je vďačný odmeníme.

trans-unit.source: And he had already warned them of Our assault, but they disputed the warning.
trans-unit.target: A on už varoval, je náš útok, ale sú sporné varovanie.

trans-unit.source: And they had demanded from him his guests, but We obliterated their eyes, [saying], "Taste My punishment and warning."
trans-unit.target: A že požadovala od neho jeho hostia, ale sme zničili svoje oči [povedať], "Chuť môj trest a varovania."

trans-unit.source: And there came upon them by morning an abiding punishment.
trans-unit.target: A tam narazili na nich ráno rešpektujúce trest.

trans-unit.source: So taste My punishment and warning.
trans-unit.target: Tak Ochutnajte môj trest a varovania.

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?
trans-unit.target: A určite sme urobili Korán jednoduchý na pamiatku, tak je tam každý, kto si bude pamätať?

trans-unit.source: And there certainly came to the people of Pharaoh warning.
trans-unit.target: A tam určite prišiel ľuďom faraóna upozornenie.

trans-unit.source: They denied Our signs, all of them, so We seized them with a seizure of one Exalted in Might and Perfect in Ability.
trans-unit.target: Popreli našich značiek, všetky z nich, takže sme sa chytil s záchvat jeden postáv v by a dokonalé schopnosti.

trans-unit.source: Are your disbelievers better than those [former ones], or have you immunity in the scripture?
trans-unit.target: Sú lepšie ako tie [bývalý tie] vaše neveriacim, alebo máte imunitu v Písme?

trans-unit.source: Or do they say, "We are an assembly supporting [each other]"?
trans-unit.target: Alebo hovoria, "My sme zhromaždenie [vzájomnej podpory]"?

trans-unit.source: [Their] assembly will be defeated, and they will turn their backs [in retreat].
trans-unit.target: [Ich] zhromaždenia bude porazený a budú zase chrbtom [na ústupe].

trans-unit.source: But the Hour is their appointment [for due punishment], and the Hour is more disastrous and more bitter.
trans-unit.target: Ale hodina je ich vymenovanie [riadnu trest], a hodiny viac katastrofálne a viac horké.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the criminals are in error and madness.
trans-unit.target: Vskutku, zločinci sú chyby a šialenstvo.

trans-unit.source: The Day they are dragged into the Fire on their faces [it will be said], "Taste the touch of Saqar."
trans-unit.target: Deň sú vliekli do ohňa na tvárach [to bude povedal], "Chuť na dotyk Saqar."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, all things We created with predestination.
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti, všetky veci, sme vytvorili s predurčenie.
