trans-unit.target: A budú mať piť šálku [víno] ktorých zmes je zázvor

trans-unit.source: [From] a fountain within Paradise named Salsabeel.
trans-unit.target: [Z] fontána v raji menom Salsabeel.

trans-unit.source: There will circulate among them young boys made eternal. When you see them, you would think them [as beautiful as] scattered pearls.
trans-unit.target: Tam bude cirkulovať medzi nimi mladí chlapci sa večný. Keď vidíte, by si nimi [krásna ako] rozptýlené perly.

trans-unit.source: And when you look there [in Paradise], you will see pleasure and great dominion.
trans-unit.target: A keď sa pozriete tam [v raji], budete vidieť radosť a veľké panstva.

trans-unit.source: Upon the inhabitants will be green garments of fine silk and brocade. And they will be adorned with bracelets of silver, and their Lord will give them a purifying drink.
trans-unit.target: Na obyvateľa bude zelená odevov z jemného hodvábu a brokátu. Sú zdobené náramky zo striebra a ich pán im čistenia nápoj.

trans-unit.source: [And it will be said], "Indeed, this is for you a reward, and your effort has been appreciated."
trans-unit.target: [A to bude povedal] "Naozaj, je to pre vás odmenu a posilňovalo svoje úsilie."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it is We who have sent down to you, [O Muhammad], the Qur'an progressively.
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti je to my, ktorí poslali k vám [Mohamed], Korán postupne.

trans-unit.source: So be patient for the decision of your Lord and do not obey from among them a sinner or ungrateful [disbeliever].
trans-unit.target: Takže buďte trpezliví rozhodnutia svojho pána a nie počúvať spomedzi nich hriešnik, alebo nevďačný [neveriacich].

trans-unit.source: And mention the name of your Lord [in prayer] morning and evening
trans-unit.target: A uviesť meno Pána [v modlitbe] ráno a večer

trans-unit.source: And during the night prostrate to Him and exalt Him a long [part of the] night.
trans-unit.target: A v noci přemoci mu a oslavovať ho dlho [časť] noc.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, these [disbelievers] love the immediate and leave behind them a grave Day.
trans-unit.target: Vskutku, tieto [neveriacim] Milujem okamžité a nechať za sebou vážne deň.

trans-unit.source: We have created them and strengthened their forms, and when We will, We can change their likenesses with [complete] alteration.
trans-unit.target: Sme ich vytvorili a posilniť svoje formuláre, a keď budeme, môžeme zmeniť ich podobizne s [doplňte] zmena.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, this is a reminder, so he who wills may take to his Lord a way.
trans-unit.target: Naozaj, je pripomienkou, takže ten, kto chce môže trvať jeho pána spôsobom.

trans-unit.source: And you do not will except that Allah wills. Indeed, Allah is ever Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: A nie sa, okrem toho, že Boh chce. Alah je skutočne vôbec vedieť a múdry.

trans-unit.source: He admits whom He wills into His mercy; but the wrongdoers - He has prepared for them a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: Pripúšťa, že koho on chce do svojej milosti; ale zloèinci - on pripravil pre nich bolestivé trest.

trans-unit.source: By those [winds] sent forth in gusts
trans-unit.target: Tie [vetrom] poslaných nárazy

trans-unit.source: And the winds that blow violently
trans-unit.target: A vetry, ktoré fúkajú násilne

trans-unit.source: And [by] the winds that spread [clouds]
trans-unit.target: A [o] vietor ktorý šíri [mraky]

trans-unit.source: And those [angels] who bring criterion
trans-unit.target: A tie [anjeli] kto prinesie kritérium

trans-unit.source: And those [angels] who deliver a message
trans-unit.target: A tie [anjeli] kto doručiť správu

trans-unit.source: As justification or warning,
trans-unit.target: Ako zdôvodnenie alebo upozornenie,

trans-unit.source: Indeed, what you are promised is to occur.
trans-unit.target: Čo ste sľúbil je skutočne dôjde.

trans-unit.source: So when the stars are obliterated
trans-unit.target: Takže keď hviezdy sú prekonané

trans-unit.source: And when the heaven is opened
trans-unit.target: A po otvorení neba

trans-unit.source: And when the mountains are blown away
trans-unit.target: A keď hory sú fúkané preč

trans-unit.source: And when the messengers' time has come...
trans-unit.target: A keď prišiel čas poslov...

trans-unit.source: For what Day was it postponed?
trans-unit.target: Čo deň to odložilo?

trans-unit.source: For the Day of Judgement.
trans-unit.target: V deň rozsudku.

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is the Day of Judgement?
trans-unit.target: A čo si budete vedieť, čo je súdny deň?

trans-unit.source: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
trans-unit.target: Beda, že deň na popierači.

trans-unit.source: Did We not destroy the former peoples?
trans-unit.target: Sme nezničil bývalých obyvateľov?

trans-unit.source: Then We will follow them with the later ones.
trans-unit.target: Potom sme sa podľa nich s nich neskôr.

trans-unit.source: Thus do We deal with the criminals.
trans-unit.target: Takto môžeme riešiť zločinci.

trans-unit.source: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
trans-unit.target: Beda, že deň na popierači.

trans-unit.source: Did We not create you from a liquid disdained?
trans-unit.target: Sme nevytvorili ste od kvapaliny pohŕdal?

trans-unit.source: And We placed it in a firm lodging
trans-unit.target: A sme umiestnili do firmy ubytovanie

trans-unit.source: For a known extent.
trans-unit.target: Pre známy rozsah.

trans-unit.source: And We determined [it], and excellent [are We] to determine.
trans-unit.target: A sme zistili, že [to], a je to výborný [sme] určiť.

trans-unit.source: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
trans-unit.target: Beda, že deň na popierači.

trans-unit.source: Have We not made the earth a container
trans-unit.target: Sme neurobili Zeme kontajnera

trans-unit.source: Of the living and the dead?
trans-unit.target: Živých a mŕtvych?

trans-unit.source: And We placed therein lofty, firmly set mountains and have given you to drink sweet water.
trans-unit.target: A umiestnené v nich vznešené, pevne stanovená hôr a dali piť sladkú vodu.

trans-unit.source: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
trans-unit.target: Beda, že deň na popierači.

trans-unit.source: [They will be told], "Proceed to that which you used to deny.
trans-unit.target: [Oni povedia], "pokračovať, ktoré ste použili poprieť.

trans-unit.source: Proceed to a shadow [of smoke] having three columns
trans-unit.target: Pokračovať do tieňa [dym] majú tri stĺpce

trans-unit.source: [But having] no cool shade and availing not against the flame."
trans-unit.target: [Ale so] bez chládku a využijú nie proti plameň. "

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it throws sparks [as huge] as a fortress,
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti to vrhá iskry [ako obrovský] ako pevnosť,

trans-unit.source: As if they were yellowish [black] camels.
trans-unit.target: Ako keby boli žltkasté [čierna] tiav.

trans-unit.source: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
trans-unit.target: Beda, že deň na popierači.

trans-unit.source: This is a Day they will not speak,
trans-unit.target: Je to deň, nebude hovoriť,

trans-unit.source: Nor will it be permitted for them to make an excuse.
trans-unit.target: Ani sa povolí, aby sa ospravedlniť.

trans-unit.source: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
trans-unit.target: Beda, že deň na popierači.

trans-unit.source: This is the Day of Judgement; We will have assembled you and the former peoples.
trans-unit.target: To je súdny deň; Sme sa zhromaždili, vy a bývalých obyvateľov.

trans-unit.source: So if you have a plan, then plan against Me.
trans-unit.target: Takže ak máte v pláne, potom plán proti mne.

trans-unit.source: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
trans-unit.target: Beda, že deň na popierači.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the righteous will be among shades and springs
trans-unit.target: Skutočne spravodliví prednesú odtiene a pružiny

trans-unit.source: And fruits from whatever they desire,
trans-unit.target: A ovocie z nech si to želajú,

trans-unit.source: [Being told], "Eat and drink in satisfaction for what you used to do."
trans-unit.target: [Povedané], "Jedlo a pitie v spokojnosti, na čo ste zvyknutí robiť."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.
trans-unit.target: Skutočne oceňujeme tak konajte dobro.

trans-unit.source: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
trans-unit.target: Beda, že deň na popierači.

trans-unit.source: [O disbelievers], eat and enjoy yourselves a little; indeed, you are criminals.
trans-unit.target: [O neveriacim], jesť a majú sami málo; v skutočnosti ste zločincov.

trans-unit.source: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
trans-unit.target: Beda, že deň na popierači.

trans-unit.source: And when it is said to them, "Bow [in prayer]," they do not bow.
trans-unit.target: A keď sa povie im, "Lúk [v modlitbe]," lúk.

trans-unit.source: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
trans-unit.target: Beda, že deň na popierači.

trans-unit.source: Then in what statement after the Qur'an will they believe?
trans-unit.target: Potom v čo vyhlásenie po Korán im veriť?

trans-unit.source: About what are they asking one another?
trans-unit.target: O tom, čo oni žiadajú navzájom?

trans-unit.source: About the great news -
trans-unit.target: O skvelé novinky-

trans-unit.source: That over which they are in disagreement.
trans-unit.target: Že, nad ktorými sú nezhody.

trans-unit.source: No! They are going to know.
trans-unit.target: nie! Chcú vedieť.

trans-unit.source: Then, no! They are going to know.
trans-unit.target: Potom č! Chcú vedieť.

trans-unit.source: Have We not made the earth a resting place?
trans-unit.target: Sme neurobili Zeme miesto k odpočinku?

trans-unit.source: And the mountains as stakes?
trans-unit.target: A hory ako stávky?

trans-unit.source: And We created you in pairs
trans-unit.target: A vytvorili sme si vo dvojiciach

trans-unit.source: And made your sleep [a means for] rest
trans-unit.target: A v pokoji spať [prostriedok]

trans-unit.source: And made the night as clothing
trans-unit.target: A noc ako odev

trans-unit.source: And made the day for livelihood
trans-unit.target: A deň na živobytie

trans-unit.source: And constructed above you seven strong [heavens]
trans-unit.target: A je to postavené nad vami sedem silný [nebies]

trans-unit.source: And made [therein] a burning lamp
trans-unit.target: A neurčujú [] horiace svetlo

trans-unit.source: And sent down, from the rain clouds, pouring water
trans-unit.target: A odoslané, od dažďovej mraky, nalievanie vody

trans-unit.source: That We may bring forth thereby grain and vegetation
trans-unit.target: Že prinášame môže ďalej tým obilia a vegetácie

trans-unit.source: And gardens of entwined growth.
trans-unit.target: A záhrad prepletené rastu.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the Day of Judgement is an appointed time -
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti Súdny deň je určený čas-

trans-unit.source: The Day the Horn is blown and you will come forth in multitudes
trans-unit.target: Dňa roh je fúkané a príde tam v zástupy

trans-unit.source: And the heaven is opened and will become gateways
trans-unit.target: A neba otvorí a bude brány

trans-unit.source: And the mountains are removed and will be [but] a mirage.
trans-unit.target: A hory sú odstránené a budú [ale] mirage.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Hell has been lying in wait
trans-unit.target: Vskutku, peklo má bol číha

trans-unit.source: For the transgressors, a place of return,
trans-unit.target: Pre previnilcov, miesto návratu

trans-unit.source: In which they will remain for ages [unending].
trans-unit.target: V ktorej zostanú celé veky [nekonečné].

trans-unit.source: They will not taste therein [any] coolness or drink
trans-unit.target: Nebude chuť v ňom [žiadne] chlad alebo nápoj

trans-unit.source: Except scalding water and [foul] purulence -
trans-unit.target: S výnimkou horúcej vody a [faul] purulence -

trans-unit.source: An appropriate recompense.
trans-unit.target: Vhodné odmenu.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, they were not expecting an account
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti, oni boli nečakal účet

trans-unit.source: And denied Our verses with [emphatic] denial.
trans-unit.target: A poprieť naše verše s [dôrazný] popieranie.

trans-unit.source: But all things We have enumerated in writing.
trans-unit.target: Ale všetky veci sme si vymenoval písomne.

trans-unit.source: "So taste [the penalty], and never will We increase you except in torment."
trans-unit.target: "Takže chuť [trest] a nikdy sme zvýši vám okrem trápenia."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, for the righteous is attainment -
trans-unit.target: Skutočne spravodliví je dosiahnutie-

trans-unit.source: Gardens and grapevines
trans-unit.target: Záhrad a záhonov viniča

trans-unit.source: And full-breasted [companions] of equal age
trans-unit.target: A full-breasted [spoločníci] rovnakého veku

trans-unit.source: And a full cup.
trans-unit.target: A plný pohár.

trans-unit.source: No ill speech will they hear therein or any falsehood -
trans-unit.target: Žiadne choré reči sa budú v ňom počuť alebo akéhokoľvek lož -

trans-unit.source: [As] reward from your Lord, [a generous] gift [made due by] account,
trans-unit.target: [Ako] odmenu od svojho pána, [roky] dar [ktoré] účet,

trans-unit.source: [From] the Lord of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them, the Most Merciful. They possess not from Him [authority for] speech.
trans-unit.target: [Z] pán neba a Zeme, a čo je medzi nimi, Most Milosrdných. Majú z neho [orgán pre] reči.

trans-unit.source: The Day that the Spirit and the angels will stand in rows, they will not speak except for one whom the Most Merciful permits, and he will say what is correct.
trans-unit.target: Deň, že ducha a anjeli budú stáť v radoch, sa nebude hovoriť s výnimkou jedného ktorých Najpodstatnejšou povolení a povie, čo je správne.

trans-unit.source: That is the True Day; so he who wills may take to his Lord a [way of] return.
trans-unit.target: To je pravda dňa; takže ten, kto chce môže k svojmu pánovi [spôsob] vrátiť.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We have warned you of a near punishment on the Day when a man will observe what his hands have put forth and the disbeliever will say, "Oh, I wish that I were dust!"
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti sme varovali ste blízko smrti v deň, kedy človek bude pozorovať čo ruky sa vystrel a neveriacich bude hovoriť: "Ach, já si, že som bol prach!"

trans-unit.source: By those [angels] who extract with violence
trans-unit.target: Tie [anjeli] kto extrakt s násilím

trans-unit.source: And [by] those who remove with ease
trans-unit.target: A [] tí ktorí odstrániť s ľahkosťou

trans-unit.source: And [by] those who glide [as if] swimming
trans-unit.target: A [o] tí ktorí kĺzať [akoby] plávanie

trans-unit.source: And those who race each other in a race
trans-unit.target: A tí, ktorí pretekať medzi sebou v závode

trans-unit.source: And those who arrange [each] matter,
trans-unit.target: A tí, ktorí usporiadať [každý] veci,

trans-unit.source: On the Day the blast [of the Horn] will convulse [creation],
trans-unit.target: Deň bude výbuch [Horn] convulse [vytvorenie],

trans-unit.source: There will follow it the subsequent [one].
trans-unit.target: Tam bude nasledovať ďalšie [jedna].

trans-unit.source: Hearts, that Day, will tremble,
trans-unit.target: Srdce, že deň sa trasú,

trans-unit.source: Their eyes humbled.
trans-unit.target: Ich oči pokorený.

trans-unit.source: They are [presently] saying, "Will we indeed be returned to [our] former state [of life]?
trans-unit.target: [Momentálne] hovoria, "sme skutočne vráti na [naše] bývalý štát [života]?

trans-unit.source: Even if we should be decayed bones?
trans-unit.target: Aj v prípade, že by sme mali byť pokazené kosti?

trans-unit.source: They say, "That, then, would be a losing return."
trans-unit.target: Hovoria, že "To, že potom bude stráca výnos."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it will be but one shout,
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti je ale jeden výkrik,

trans-unit.source: And suddenly they will be [alert] upon the earth's surface.
trans-unit.target: A zrazu bude [upozornenie] na zemskom povrchu.

trans-unit.source: Has there reached you the story of Moses? -
trans-unit.target: Že dosiahla vás príbeh Moses? -

trans-unit.source: When his Lord called to him in the sacred valley of Tuwa,
trans-unit.target: Keď jeho pán volal mu v sacred valley Nell

trans-unit.source: "Go to Pharaoh. Indeed, he has transgressed.
trans-unit.target: "Ísť na faraóna. V skutočnosti má prestúpil.

trans-unit.source: And say to him, 'Would you [be willing to] purify yourself
trans-unit.target: A povedať mu, "by ste [byť ochotný] očistiť sami

trans-unit.source: And let me guide you to your Lord so you would fear [Him]?'"
trans-unit.target: A dovoľte mi vás do svojho pána, tak by sa obávajú [mu]? ""

trans-unit.source: And he showed him the greatest sign,
trans-unit.target: A ten mu ukázal najväčší znamením,

trans-unit.source: But Pharaoh denied and disobeyed.
trans-unit.target: Ale faraóna poprel a neposlúchol.

trans-unit.source: Then he turned his back, striving.
trans-unit.target: Potom sa obrátil chrbtom, usilovať.

trans-unit.source: And he gathered [his people] and called out
trans-unit.target: A on zhromaždil [svojho ľudu] a zavolal

trans-unit.source: And said, "I am your most exalted lord."
trans-unit.target: A povedal: "som svoje najvznešenejšie pána."

trans-unit.source: So Allah seized him in exemplary punishment for the last and the first [transgression].
trans-unit.target: Tak Boh chytil ho exemplárne tresty pre posledný a prvý [prestúpenie].

trans-unit.source: Indeed in that is a warning for whoever would fear [Allah].
trans-unit.target: Naozaj v tom, že je varovanie pre toho, kto by sa báť [Boh].

trans-unit.source: Are you a more difficult creation or is the heaven? Allah constructed it.
trans-unit.target: Ste vytvorenie ťažšie alebo je nebo? Alah je postavená.

trans-unit.source: He raised its ceiling and proportioned it.
trans-unit.target: Zdvihol jej strop a rástla to.

trans-unit.source: And He darkened its night and extracted its brightness.
trans-unit.target: A on sa zatmí jeho noc a získava jeho jas.

trans-unit.source: And after that He spread the earth.
trans-unit.target: A potom že sa šíri Zeme.

trans-unit.source: He extracted from it its water and its pasture,
trans-unit.target: Je extrahovaný z neho, jeho vody a jeho pastviny,

trans-unit.source: And the mountains He set firmly
trans-unit.target: A hory postavil pevne

trans-unit.source: As provision for you and your grazing livestock.
trans-unit.target: Ako ustanovenie pre vás a vaše pasenia hospodárskych zvierat.

trans-unit.source: But when there comes the greatest Overwhelming Calamity -
trans-unit.target: Ale keď príde najväčší ohromujúci kalamita-

trans-unit.source: The Day when man will remember that for which he strove,
trans-unit.target: V deň, kedy človek bude pamätať, že pre ktorý on usiloval,

trans-unit.source: And Hellfire will be exposed for [all] those who see -
trans-unit.target: A Hellfire budú vystavené na [všetky] tí, ktorí vidia-

trans-unit.source: So as for he who transgressed
trans-unit.target: Tak ako ten, kto prestúpil

trans-unit.source: And preferred the life of the world,
trans-unit.target: A radšej život sveta

trans-unit.source: Then indeed, Hellfire will be [his] refuge.
trans-unit.target: Vskutku, potom Hellfire bude [jeho] útočisko.

trans-unit.source: But as for he who feared the position of his Lord and prevented the soul from [unlawful] inclination,
trans-unit.target: Ale pokiaľ ide o ten kto bál postavenie svojho pána a zabrániť dušu z [protiprávne] sklonu,

trans-unit.source: Then indeed, Paradise will be [his] refuge.
trans-unit.target: Potom skutočne raj bude [jeho] útočisko.

trans-unit.source: They ask you, [O Muhammad], about the Hour: when is its arrival?
trans-unit.target: Žiadajú vás, [Mohamed], o hodinu: Kedy je jeho príchodu?

trans-unit.source: In what [position] are you that you should mention it?
trans-unit.target: V [miesto] ste si, že by ste mali spomenúť, že?

trans-unit.source: To your Lord is its finality.
trans-unit.target: Je jeho konečnosť svojho pána.

trans-unit.source: You are only a warner for those who fear it.
trans-unit.target: Ste len warner pre tých, ktorí sa obávajú, že.

trans-unit.source: It will be, on the Day they see it, as though they had not remained [in the world] except for an afternoon or a morning thereof.
trans-unit.target: To bude, na deň vidí, akoby zotrvali nie [v rámci] s výnimkou popoludňajšej alebo ráno jej.

trans-unit.source: The Prophet frowned and turned away
trans-unit.target: Prorok sa zamračil a odvrátil

trans-unit.source: Because there came to him the blind man, [interrupting].
trans-unit.target: Pretože tu prišiel k nemu slepec [prerušenia].

trans-unit.source: But what would make you perceive, [O Muhammad], that perhaps he might be purified
trans-unit.target: Ale čo by vás vnímať, [Mohamed], že možno mu môže byť čistené

trans-unit.source: Or be reminded and the remembrance would benefit him?
trans-unit.target: Alebo treba pripomenúť a pamiatku mu prospeje?

trans-unit.source: As for he who thinks himself without need,
trans-unit.target: Pokiaľ ten, kto si myslí, že sám bez potreby

trans-unit.source: To him you give attention.
trans-unit.target: Mu dať pozor.

trans-unit.source: And not upon you [is any blame] if he will not be purified.
trans-unit.target: A nie na vás [je akékoľvek vinu] Ak on bude nie vyčistené.

trans-unit.source: But as for he who came to you striving [for knowledge]
trans-unit.target: Ale ako on, ktorí prišli k vám snaží [poznanie]

trans-unit.source: While he fears [Allah],
trans-unit.target: Zatiaľ čo on sa obáva [Boh],

trans-unit.source: From him you are distracted.
trans-unit.target: Od neho sa rozptyľovať.

trans-unit.source: No! Indeed, these verses are a reminder;
trans-unit.target: nie! Vskutku, tieto verše sú pripomienkou;

trans-unit.source: So whoever wills may remember it.
trans-unit.target: Takže ten, kto chce môže si to pamätať.

trans-unit.source: [It is recorded] in honored sheets,
trans-unit.target: [Je zaznamenané] poctený listov,

trans-unit.source: Exalted and purified,
trans-unit.target: Vyvýšené a čistený,

trans-unit.source: [Carried] by the hands of messenger-angels,
trans-unit.target: [Urobiť] ruky messenger-anjeli,

trans-unit.source: Noble and dutiful.
trans-unit.target: Ušľachtilý a poslušná.

trans-unit.source: Cursed is man; how disbelieving is he.
trans-unit.target: Prekliaty je človek; ako neveriacky je on.

trans-unit.source: From what substance did He create him?
trans-unit.target: Aké látky sa mu vytvoriť ho?

trans-unit.source: From a sperm-drop He created him and destined for him;
trans-unit.target: Od poklesu spermie ho stvoril a určené pre neho;

trans-unit.source: Then He eased the way for him;
trans-unit.target: Potom sa zmiernil tak, ako ho;

trans-unit.source: Then He causes his death and provides a grave for him.
trans-unit.target: Potom spôsobuje jeho smrť a hrob ustanovuje ho.

trans-unit.source: Then when He wills, He will resurrect him.
trans-unit.target: Potom, keď on chce, on ho vzkriesi.

trans-unit.source: No! Man has not yet accomplished what He commanded him.
trans-unit.target: nie! Muž sa ešte nedokončilo čo mu prikázal.

trans-unit.source: Then let mankind look at his food -
trans-unit.target: Potom nech ľudstvo, pozrite sa na jeho jedlo-

trans-unit.source: How We poured down water in torrents,
trans-unit.target: Ako sme sa rútiace sa vody v torrenty,

trans-unit.source: Then We broke open the earth, splitting [it with sprouts],
trans-unit.target: Potom sme sa rozišli otvoriť Zeme, rozdelenie [to s kel],

trans-unit.source: And caused to grow within it grain
trans-unit.target: A spôsobil rast v ňom zrno

trans-unit.source: And grapes and herbage
trans-unit.target: A hrozno a porastom

trans-unit.source: And olive and palm trees
trans-unit.target: A olivovými a palmovými stromami

trans-unit.source: And gardens of dense shrubbery
trans-unit.target: A záhrad husté kroviny

trans-unit.source: And fruit and grass -
trans-unit.target: Ovocie a trávy-

trans-unit.source: [As] enjoyment for you and your grazing livestock.
trans-unit.target: [Ako] potešenie pre vás a vaše pasenia hospodárskych zvierat.

trans-unit.source: But when there comes the Deafening Blast
trans-unit.target: Ale keď príde ohlušujúci výbuch

trans-unit.source: On the Day a man will flee from his brother
trans-unit.target: Deň človek bude utiecť z jeho brat

trans-unit.source: And his mother and his father
trans-unit.target: A jeho matka a otec

trans-unit.source: And his wife and his children,
trans-unit.target: A jeho žena, a jeho deti,

trans-unit.source: For every man, that Day, will be a matter adequate for him.
trans-unit.target: Pre každého muža, ten deň bude dostatočné pre neho veci.

trans-unit.source: [Some] faces, that Day, will be bright -
trans-unit.target: [Niektoré] tváre, že deň, bude jasné-

trans-unit.source: Laughing, rejoicing at good news.
trans-unit.target: Smiechu, radosti na dobré správy.

trans-unit.source: And [other] faces, that Day, will have upon them dust.
trans-unit.target: A [Ostatné] tváre, že deň bude mať na ne prach.

trans-unit.source: Blackness will cover them.
trans-unit.target: Temnota ich pokrytie.

trans-unit.source: Those are the disbelievers, the wicked ones.
trans-unit.target: Sú to neveriacim, tie zlé.

trans-unit.source: When the sun is wrapped up [in darkness]
trans-unit.target: Keď slnko zhrnula [v tme]

trans-unit.source: And when the stars fall, dispersing,
trans-unit.target: A keď hviezdy na jeseň, výdajom,

trans-unit.source: And when the mountains are removed
trans-unit.target: A hory sú odstránené

trans-unit.source: And when full-term she-camels are neglected
trans-unit.target: A ak sú zanedbávané donosených ona-ťavy

trans-unit.source: And when the wild beasts are gathered
trans-unit.target: A keď sa zhromaždili zverou

trans-unit.source: And when the seas are filled with flame
trans-unit.target: A pri mori sú plné plameň

trans-unit.source: And when the souls are paired
trans-unit.target: A keď sú spárované duše

trans-unit.source: And when the girl [who was] buried alive is asked
trans-unit.target: Keď dievčina [bola] pochovaný živý je požiadaný

trans-unit.source: For what sin she was killed
trans-unit.target: Za aký hriech by ona bola zabitá

trans-unit.source: And when the pages are made public
trans-unit.target: A keď stránky sú sprístupnené verejnosti

trans-unit.source: And when the sky is stripped away
trans-unit.target: A keď obloha je vyzliekol preč

trans-unit.source: And when Hellfire is set ablaze
trans-unit.target: A keď sa spaľovali Hellfire

trans-unit.source: And when Paradise is brought near,
trans-unit.target: A keď je raj v blízkosti,

trans-unit.source: A soul will [then] know what it has brought [with it].
trans-unit.target: Duša [potom] bude vedieť, čo prináša [s].

trans-unit.source: So I swear by the retreating stars -
trans-unit.target: Tak prisahám, ustupujúce hviezd-

trans-unit.source: Those that run [their courses] and disappear -
trans-unit.target: Spustiť [ich kurzov] a zmizne-

trans-unit.source: And by the night as it closes in
trans-unit.target: A v noci ako to zavrie

trans-unit.source: And by the dawn when it breathes
trans-unit.target: A Dawn, keď dýcha

trans-unit.source: [That] indeed, the Qur'an is a word [conveyed by] a noble messenger
trans-unit.target: [Že] v skutočnosti Korán je slovo [dopraviť] ušľachtilý posol

trans-unit.source: [Who is] possessed of power and with the Owner of the Throne, secure [in position],
trans-unit.target: [Kto je] posadnutý moc a s majiteľom trón, bezpečné [v]

trans-unit.source: Obeyed there [in the heavens] and trustworthy.
trans-unit.target: Poslúchol [v nebesiach] a dôveryhodný.

trans-unit.source: And your companion is not [at all] mad.
trans-unit.target: A váš spoločník nie je [všetko] šialený.

trans-unit.source: And he has already seen Gabriel in the clear horizon.
trans-unit.target: A on už videl Gabriel v jasný horizont.

trans-unit.source: And Muhammad is not a withholder of [knowledge of] the unseen.
trans-unit.target: A Muhammad nie je withholder [poznanie] neviditeľné.

trans-unit.source: And the Qur'an is not the word of a devil, expelled [from the heavens].
trans-unit.target: A Korán nie je slovo diabol, vylúčený [z nebies].

trans-unit.source: So where are you going?
trans-unit.target: Tak kam ideš?

trans-unit.source: It is not except a reminder to the worlds
trans-unit.target: Nie je výnimkou pripomenutie svety

trans-unit.source: For whoever wills among you to take a right course.
trans-unit.target: Za ten, kto chce medzi vami, aby správny kurz.

trans-unit.source: And you do not will except that Allah wills - Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: A ste nie bude okrem Alaha závet - pán svetov.

trans-unit.source: When the sky breaks apart
trans-unit.target: Keď obloha zlomí oddelene

trans-unit.source: And when the stars fall, scattering,
trans-unit.target: A keď hviezdy na jeseň, rozptyl,

trans-unit.source: And when the seas are erupted
trans-unit.target: A pri mori sú prerezané

trans-unit.source: And when the [contents of] graves are scattered,
trans-unit.target: A keď sú roztrúsené po hroby [obsah]

trans-unit.source: A soul will [then] know what it has put forth and kept back.
trans-unit.target: Duša [potom] vedieť čo má vystrel a prednedávnom.

trans-unit.source: O mankind, what has deceived you concerning your Lord, the Generous,
trans-unit.target: O ľudstvo, čo si o svojho pána, veľkorysý, podviedla

trans-unit.source: Who created you, proportioned you, and balanced you?
trans-unit.target: Kto vás stvoril, ste urastený a vyvážené ste?

trans-unit.source: In whatever form He willed has He assembled you.
trans-unit.target: V akejkoľvek forme, on chcel zostavil on vás.

trans-unit.source: No! But you deny the Recompense.
trans-unit.target: nie! Ale odmietnete odmenu.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, [appointed] over you are keepers,
trans-unit.target: A v skutočnosti [menovaný] nad vami sú chovatelia,

trans-unit.source: Noble and recording;
trans-unit.target: Ušľachtilý a nahrávanie;

trans-unit.source: They know whatever you do.
trans-unit.target: Oni vedia, čo robíte.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure,
trans-unit.target: Skutočne spravodliví budú v radosti,

trans-unit.source: And indeed, the wicked will be in Hellfire.
trans-unit.target: A skutočne, bezbožní budú v Hellfire.

trans-unit.source: They will [enter to] burn therein on the Day of Recompense,
trans-unit.target: Oni sa [enter] horieť v ňom na deň odmenu,

trans-unit.source: And never therefrom will they be absent.
trans-unit.target: A nikdy z nich budú chýbať.

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense?
trans-unit.target: A čo si budete vedieť, čo je deň odmeniť?

trans-unit.source: Then, what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense?
trans-unit.target: Potom, čo si vás vedieť, čo je deň odmeniť?

trans-unit.source: It is the Day when a soul will not possess for another soul [power to do] a thing; and the command, that Day, is [entirely] with Allah.
trans-unit.target: Je to deň, kedy duša bude mať pre ďalšie duše [moc robiť] vec; a príkaz, ktorý deň je [celkom] s Alláh.

trans-unit.source: Woe to those who give less [than due],
trans-unit.target: Beda tým, ktorí dávajú necelých [má],

trans-unit.source: Who, when they take a measure from people, take in full.
trans-unit.target: Ktorí, keď sa opatrenie od ľudí, sa v plnom rozsahu.

trans-unit.source: But if they give by measure or by weight to them, they cause loss.
trans-unit.target: Ale ak dávajú opatrenie alebo ich hmotnosti, spôsobiť stratu.

trans-unit.source: Do they not think that they will be resurrected
trans-unit.target: Nie si myslia, že budú vzkriesení

trans-unit.source: For a tremendous Day -
trans-unit.target: Hrozný deň-

trans-unit.source: The Day when mankind will stand before the Lord of the worlds?
trans-unit.target: V deň, kedy ľudstvo bude stáť pred pánom svetov?

trans-unit.source: No! Indeed, the record of the wicked is in sijjeen.
trans-unit.target: nie! Sijjeen je skutočne zlý záznam.

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is sijjeen?
trans-unit.target: A čo si budete vedieť, čo je sijjeen?

trans-unit.source: It is [their destination recorded in] a register inscribed.
trans-unit.target: Je to [miesto určenia zaznamenané] registri zapísaný.

trans-unit.source: Woe, that Day, to the deniers,
trans-unit.target: Beda, že deň na popierači

trans-unit.source: Who deny the Day of Recompense.
trans-unit.target: Ktorí popierajú, že deň odmeniť.

trans-unit.source: And none deny it except every sinful transgressor.
trans-unit.target: A nikto poprieť, že okrem všetkých hriešnych prestúpení.

trans-unit.source: When Our verses are recited to him, he says, "Legends of the former peoples."
trans-unit.target: Keď sa prednáša naše verše k nemu, on hovorí, "Legendy bývalého národov."

trans-unit.source: No! Rather, the stain has covered their hearts of that which they were earning.
trans-unit.target: nie! Skôr škvrny ktoré svoje srdce, to, čo oni boli zarábať.

trans-unit.source: No! Indeed, from their Lord, that Day, they will be partitioned.
trans-unit.target: nie! Skutočne od svojho pána, ten deň, že budú rozdelené.

trans-unit.source: Then indeed, they will [enter and] burn in Hellfire.
trans-unit.target: Potom v skutočnosti budú [vstúpiť a] horieť v pekelnom ohni.

trans-unit.source: Then it will be said [to them], "This is what you used to deny."
trans-unit.target: Potom to bude vraj [im], "To je to, čo ste sa poprieť."

trans-unit.source: No! Indeed, the record of the righteous is in 'illiyyun.
trans-unit.target: nie! Vskutku, záznam spravodlivého je v "illiyyun.

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is 'illiyyun?
trans-unit.target: A čo môže vám vedieť, čo je "illiyyun?

trans-unit.source: It is [their destination recorded in] a register inscribed
trans-unit.target: Je to [miesto určenia zaznamenané] zapísaný register

trans-unit.source: Which is witnessed by those brought near [to Allah].
trans-unit.target: Ktorá je svedkom tých, priniesol v blízkosti [Boh].

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure
trans-unit.target: Skutočne spravodliví budú v potešenie

trans-unit.source: On adorned couches, observing.
trans-unit.target: Na zdobené gauča, pozorovanie.

trans-unit.source: You will recognize in their faces the radiance of pleasure.
trans-unit.target: Spoznáte ich tváre, žiara potešenie.

trans-unit.source: They will be given to drink [pure] wine [which was] sealed.
trans-unit.target: Budú mať na pitie vína [čistý], [ktorý bol] zapečatené.

trans-unit.source: The last of it is musk. So for this let the competitors compete.
trans-unit.target: To posledné je pižmo. Takže pre túto dajte konkurentov súťažiť.

trans-unit.source: And its mixture is of Tasneem,
trans-unit.target: A jeho zmes je Tasneem,

trans-unit.source: A spring from which those near [to Allah] drink.
trans-unit.target: Jar, ktoré ktoré v blízkosti [Allah] piť.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who committed crimes used to laugh at those who believed.
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti tí, ktorí spáchal zločiny, použili sa smiať na tých, ktorí verili.

trans-unit.source: And when they passed by them, they would exchange derisive glances.
trans-unit.target: A keď šli okolo nich, oni by výmenu posmešne pohľady.

trans-unit.source: And when they returned to their people, they would return jesting.
trans-unit.target: A keď sa vrátili do svojich ľudí, sa vráti, žart.

trans-unit.source: And when they saw them, they would say, "Indeed, those are truly lost."
trans-unit.target: A keď videl, že povie, "Naozaj, to sú naozaj stratil."

trans-unit.source: But they had not been sent as guardians over them.
trans-unit.target: Ale nie boli zaslané ako strážcovia nad nimi.

trans-unit.source: So Today those who believed are laughing at the disbelievers,
trans-unit.target: Takže dnes, sú tí, ktorí uverili smeje neveriacim,

trans-unit.source: On adorned couches, observing.
trans-unit.target: Na zdobené gauča, pozorovanie.

trans-unit.source: Have the disbelievers [not] been rewarded [this Day] for what they used to do?
trans-unit.target: Neveriacim [nie] bol odmenený [dnes] na čo boli zvyknutí robiť?

trans-unit.source: When the sky has split [open]
trans-unit.target: Keď oblohu rozdelil [otvoriť]

trans-unit.source: And has responded to its Lord and was obligated [to do so]
trans-unit.target: Reagovala na jeho pán a bol povinný [to]

trans-unit.source: And when the earth has been extended
trans-unit.target: A keď bol rozšírený Zeme

trans-unit.source: And has cast out that within it and relinquished [it]
trans-unit.target: A obsadenie, ktoré v ňom a vzdal [to]

trans-unit.source: And has responded to its Lord and was obligated [to do so] -
trans-unit.target: Reagovala na jeho pán a bol povinný [to]-

trans-unit.source: O mankind, indeed you are laboring toward your Lord with [great] exertion and will meet it.
trans-unit.target: O ľudstvo, naozaj sú pracně na svojho pána s [veľký] námahe a to splní.

trans-unit.source: Then as for he who is given his record in his right hand,
trans-unit.target: Potom, ako ten, ktorý je vzhľadom k jeho rekord v pravej ruke

trans-unit.source: He will be judged with an easy account
trans-unit.target: Súdil s easy účet

trans-unit.source: And return to his people in happiness.
trans-unit.target: A vrátiť sa k svojmu ľudu v šťastie.

trans-unit.source: But as for he who is given his record behind his back,
trans-unit.target: Ale pokiaľ ide o to kto je vzhľadom k jeho rekord za chrbtom,

trans-unit.source: He will cry out for destruction
trans-unit.target: On bude kričať na zničenie

trans-unit.source: And [enter to] burn in a Blaze.
trans-unit.target: A [enter] horieť v žiari.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, he had [once] been among his people in happiness;
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti [raz] bol medzi svojimi ľuďmi šťastie;

trans-unit.source: Indeed, he had thought he would never return [to Allah].
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti si si myslel, že on by nikdy vrátiť [Boh].

trans-unit.source: But yes! Indeed, his Lord was ever of him, Seeing.
trans-unit.target: Ale áno! Vskutku, jeho pán bol niekedy ho vidieť.

trans-unit.source: So I swear by the twilight glow
trans-unit.target: Tak prisahám, že twilight žiara

trans-unit.source: And [by] the night and what it envelops
trans-unit.target: A [] v noci a to, čo ho obklopuje

trans-unit.source: And [by] the moon when it becomes full
trans-unit.target: A [o] mesiac, keď sa stane plne

trans-unit.source: [That] you will surely experience state after state.
trans-unit.target: [Že] určite zažijete štátu po štátu.

trans-unit.source: So what is [the matter] with them [that] they do not believe,
trans-unit.target: Takže čo je [otázka] s nimi, [že] neveria,

trans-unit.source: And when the Qur'an is recited to them, they do not prostrate [to Allah]?
trans-unit.target: A keď Korán je prednes na ne, oni nie přemoci [aby Allah]?

trans-unit.source: But those who have disbelieved deny,
trans-unit.target: Ale tí, ktorí majú pochyboval poprieť,

trans-unit.source: And Allah is most knowing of what they keep within themselves.
trans-unit.target: A Allah je väčšina vedomím toho, čo vedú do seba.

trans-unit.source: So give them tidings of a painful punishment,
trans-unit.target: Takže im zvesť o bolestivé trest,

trans-unit.source: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds. For them is a reward uninterrupted.
trans-unit.target: S výnimkou tých, ktorí veria, a robiť spravodlivé skutky. Pre nich je odmena bez prerušenia.

trans-unit.source: By the sky containing great stars
trans-unit.target: Sky, obsahujúce veľké hviezdy

trans-unit.source: And [by] the promised Day
trans-unit.target: A [o] sľúbil deň

trans-unit.source: And [by] the witness and what is witnessed,
trans-unit.target: [Podľa] svedok, a čo je svedkom,

trans-unit.source: Cursed were the companions of the trench
trans-unit.target: Prekliaty boli spoločníkmi priekopa

trans-unit.source: [Containing] the fire full of fuel,
trans-unit.target: [S] oheň plný paliva,

trans-unit.source: When they were sitting near it
trans-unit.target: Kedy sedeli blízko

trans-unit.source: And they, to what they were doing against the believers, were witnesses.
trans-unit.target: A oni, čo robili proti veriacim, boli svedkovia.

trans-unit.source: And they resented them not except because they believed in Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Praiseworthy,
trans-unit.target: A oni nie len neznášal, pretože verili v Boha, postáv by, Praiseworthy,

trans-unit.source: To whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth. And Allah, over all things, is Witness.
trans-unit.target: Komu patrí panstva neba a Zeme. A Boh, nad všetkými vecami, je svedkom.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who have tortured the believing men and believing women and then have not repented will have the punishment of Hell, and they will have the punishment of the Burning Fire.
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti tí, ktorí mucili veriť mužov a ženy veriť a potom nerobili pokánie bude mať trest peklo a majú trest horí oheň.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds will have gardens beneath which rivers flow. That is the great attainment.
trans-unit.target: Naozaj, tých, ktorí verili a urobil spravodlivé skutky budú mať záhrady pod ktoré toku rieky. To je skvelé vzdelania.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the vengeance of your Lord is severe.
trans-unit.target: Je naozaj ťažké pomstou svojho pána.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it is He who originates [creation] and repeats.
trans-unit.target: Naozaj, je to on, kto pochádza [vytvorenie] a opakuje.

trans-unit.source: And He is the Forgiving, the Affectionate,
trans-unit.target: A on je odpúšťajúci, Affectionate,

trans-unit.source: Honorable Owner of the Throne,
trans-unit.target: Čestné majiteľ trónu,

trans-unit.source: Effecter of what He intends.
trans-unit.target: Effecter na to, čo zamýšľa.

trans-unit.source: Has there reached you the story of the soldiers -
trans-unit.target: Tam si dosiahol príbeh vojakov-

trans-unit.source: [Those of] Pharaoh and Thamud?
trans-unit.target: [Tí] Faraón a Thamud?

trans-unit.source: But they who disbelieve are in [persistent] denial,
trans-unit.target: Ale tí, ktorí neveria v [pretrvávajúci] popretie,

trans-unit.source: While Allah encompasses them from behind.
trans-unit.target: Zatiaľ čo Boh zahŕňa ich zozadu.

trans-unit.source: But this is an honored Qur'an
trans-unit.target: Ale to je poctený Korán

trans-unit.source: [Inscribed] in a Preserved Slate.
trans-unit.target: [Zapísaný] v konzervovaných bridlice.

trans-unit.source: By the sky and the night comer -
trans-unit.target: Z neba a prichádzajúci večer-

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is the night comer?
trans-unit.target: A čo si budete vedieť, čo je prichádzajúci večer?

trans-unit.source: It is the piercing star -
trans-unit.target: Je to piercing star-

trans-unit.source: There is no soul but that it has over it a protector.
trans-unit.target: Neexistuje žiadna duša, ale že má nad ním protektor.

trans-unit.source: So let man observe from what he was created.
trans-unit.target: Tak nech človek pozorovať z čo stvoril.

trans-unit.source: He was created from a fluid, ejected,
trans-unit.target: On bol vytvorený z kvapaliny, vysunutá,

trans-unit.source: Emerging from between the backbone and the ribs.
trans-unit.target: Vznikajúce z chrbtice a rebier.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah, to return him [to life], is Able.
trans-unit.target: Boh ho vrátiť [k životu], je skutočne schopný.

trans-unit.source: The Day when secrets will be put on trial,
trans-unit.target: V deň, keď tajomstvo sa dal na súd,

trans-unit.source: Then man will have no power or any helper.
trans-unit.target: Potom človek bude mať žiadnu právomoc alebo akékoľvek pomocné.

trans-unit.source: By the sky which returns [rain]
trans-unit.target: Sky, ktorý vráti [dážď]

trans-unit.source: And [by] the earth which cracks open,
trans-unit.target: A [o] zem ktorá trhliny otvoriť,

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the Qur'an is a decisive statement,
trans-unit.target: Vskutku, Korán je rozhodujúci výpis

trans-unit.source: And it is not amusement.
trans-unit.target: A to nie je zábavné.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, they are planning a plan,
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti, ktoré plánujú plán,

trans-unit.source: But I am planning a plan.
trans-unit.target: Ale plánujem plán.

trans-unit.source: So allow time for the disbelievers. Leave them awhile.
trans-unit.target: Tak poskytol čas neveriacim. Nechať chvíľu.

trans-unit.source: Exalt the name of your Lord, the Most High,
trans-unit.target: Oslavovať meno svojho pána, najvyššieho,

trans-unit.source: Who created and proportioned
trans-unit.target: Kto vytvoril a rástla

trans-unit.source: And who destined and [then] guided
trans-unit.target: Určených a [potom] Sprievodca

trans-unit.source: And who brings out the pasture
trans-unit.target: A kto vynáša pasienky

trans-unit.source: And [then] makes it black stubble.
trans-unit.target: A [potom] je to čierna strnisko.

trans-unit.source: We will make you recite, [O Muhammad], and you will not forget,
trans-unit.target: Vypracujeme vám prednášať [Mohamed], a nebudete zabudnúť,

trans-unit.source: Except what Allah should will. Indeed, He knows what is declared and what is hidden.
trans-unit.target: Okrem toho, čo Boh by sa. Naozaj, on vie, čo je vyhlásené a čo sa skrýva.

trans-unit.source: And We will ease you toward ease.
trans-unit.target: A sme vám uľahčí smerom jednoduchosť.

trans-unit.source: So remind, if the reminder should benefit;
trans-unit.target: Takže pripomenie, ak by mali mať prospech upomienky;

trans-unit.source: He who fears [Allah] will be reminded.
trans-unit.target: Ten, kto sa bojí [Allah] upozornený.

trans-unit.source: But the wretched one will avoid it -
trans-unit.target: Ale ten úbohý zabráni-

trans-unit.source: [He] who will [enter and] burn in the greatest Fire,
trans-unit.target: [On] kto bude [enter a] spáliť najväčší požiar

trans-unit.source: Neither dying therein nor living.
trans-unit.target: Úmrtia v ňom ani žiť.

trans-unit.source: He has certainly succeeded who purifies himself
trans-unit.target: On sa určite podarilo, ktorý očisťuje sa

trans-unit.source: And mentions the name of his Lord and prays.
trans-unit.target: Uvádza meno svojho pána a modlí.

trans-unit.source: But you prefer the worldly life,
trans-unit.target: Ale radšej pozemský život,

trans-unit.source: While the Hereafter is better and more enduring.
trans-unit.target: Ďalej je lepšie a trvalejší.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, this is in the former scriptures,
trans-unit.target: Naozaj, je to v bývalej písma,

trans-unit.source: The scriptures of Abraham and Moses.
trans-unit.target: Písma Abraháma a Moses.

trans-unit.source: Has there reached you the report of the Overwhelming [event]?
trans-unit.target: Tam dosiahla vám správa Overwhelming [akcie]?

trans-unit.source: [Some] faces, that Day, will be humbled,
trans-unit.target: [Niektoré] tváre, že deň, bude ponížený,

trans-unit.source: Working [hard] and exhausted.
trans-unit.target: Usilovne [] a vyčerpaný.

trans-unit.source: They will [enter to] burn in an intensely hot Fire.
trans-unit.target: Oni sa [enter] spáliť intenzívne horúcom ohni.

trans-unit.source: They will be given drink from a boiling spring.
trans-unit.target: Budú mať nápoj z vriacej jar.

trans-unit.source: For them there will be no food except from a poisonous, thorny plant
trans-unit.target: Pre nich bude existovať žiadne jedlo, okrem z jedov, tŕnisté rastliny

trans-unit.source: Which neither nourishes nor avails against hunger.
trans-unit.target: Ktoré vyživuje ani využíva proti hladu.

trans-unit.source: [Other] faces, that Day, will show pleasure.
trans-unit.target: [Ostatné] tváre, že deň, ukáže potešenie.

trans-unit.source: With their effort [they are] satisfied
trans-unit.target: S ich úsilím [sú] spokojný

trans-unit.source: In an elevated garden,
trans-unit.target: Zvýšené záhrade,

trans-unit.source: Wherein they will hear no unsuitable speech.
trans-unit.target: Ktorom budú počuť žiadne nevhodné reči.

trans-unit.source: Within it is a flowing spring.
trans-unit.target: Vnútri je sypký jar.

trans-unit.source: Within it are couches raised high
trans-unit.target: Vnútri to sú lehátka vznesené vysoko

trans-unit.source: And cups put in place
trans-unit.target: A poháre

trans-unit.source: And cushions lined up
trans-unit.target: A vankúše, ktoré sa zoradili

trans-unit.source: And carpets spread around.
trans-unit.target: A koberce šíriť okolo seba.

trans-unit.source: Then do they not look at the camels - how they are created?
trans-unit.target: Potom sa nepozerajte ťavy - ako sú vytvorené?

trans-unit.source: And at the sky - how it is raised?
trans-unit.target: A na oblohe - ako je nesený?

trans-unit.source: And at the mountains - how they are erected?
trans-unit.target: A na horách - ako oni sú postavené?

trans-unit.source: And at the earth - how it is spread out?
trans-unit.target: A na zemi - ako sa šíri?

trans-unit.source: So remind, [O Muhammad]; you are only a reminder.
trans-unit.target: Takže pripomínajú [Mohamed]; ste len pripomenutie.

trans-unit.source: You are not over them a controller.
trans-unit.target: Nie je nad nimi radič.

trans-unit.source: However, he who turns away and disbelieves -
trans-unit.target: Avšak ten, kto odvracia a neverí -

trans-unit.source: Then Allah will punish him with the greatest punishment.
trans-unit.target: Potom Boh bude trestať ho s najväčším trestom.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, to Us is their return.
trans-unit.target: Pre nás je skutočne ich návratu.

trans-unit.source: Then indeed, upon Us is their account.
trans-unit.target: Vskutku, potom na nás je ich účet.

trans-unit.source: By the dawn
trans-unit.target: Dawn

trans-unit.source: And [by] ten nights
trans-unit.target: A [o] desať nocí

trans-unit.source: And [by] the even [number] and the odd
trans-unit.target: A [] aj [číslo] a nepárne

trans-unit.source: And [by] the night when it passes,
trans-unit.target: A [v noci, kedy to prejde, o]

trans-unit.source: Is there [not] in [all] that an oath [sufficient] for one of perception?
trans-unit.target: Je [nie] [všetko], [dostatočná] na jeden z vnímania prísahu?

trans-unit.source: Have you not considered how your Lord dealt with 'Aad -
trans-unit.target: Uvažovali ste nie, ako svojho pána sa zaoberal "Aad -

trans-unit.source: [With] Iram - who had lofty pillars,
trans-unit.target: [S] IRAM - ktorý mal vznešené pilierov,

trans-unit.source: The likes of whom had never been created in the land?
trans-unit.target: Rád koho nikdy bol vytvorený v krajine?

trans-unit.source: And [with] Thamud, who carved out the rocks in the valley?
trans-unit.target: A [s] Thamud, ktorý vybojoval skaly v doline?

trans-unit.source: And [with] Pharaoh, owner of the stakes? -
trans-unit.target: [S] faraóna, vlastník podielov? -

trans-unit.source: [All of] whom oppressed within the lands
trans-unit.target: [Všetky] koho utláčané do krajiny

trans-unit.source: And increased therein the corruption.
trans-unit.target: A v ňom korupcie.

trans-unit.source: So your Lord poured upon them a scourge of punishment.
trans-unit.target: Tak svojho pána na ne naleje metlou trest.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, your Lord is in observation.
trans-unit.target: Pozorovanie je skutočne svojho pána.

trans-unit.source: And as for man, when his Lord tries him and [thus] is generous to him and favors him, he says, "My Lord has honored me."
trans-unit.target: A pokiaľ ide o muža, keď jeho pán sa ho snaží a [teda] je štedrý k nemu a uprednostňuje ho, on hovorí, "môj Pán bol poctený ma."

trans-unit.source: But when He tries him and restricts his provision, he says, "My Lord has humiliated me."
trans-unit.target: Ale keď sa ho snaží a obmedzuje jeho ustanovenie hovorí: "môj pán sa ponížil ma."

trans-unit.source: No! But you do not honor the orphan
trans-unit.target: nie! Ale tú česť sirota

trans-unit.source: And you do not encourage one another to feed the poor.
trans-unit.target: A nemajú radi, navzájom kŕmiť chudobných.

trans-unit.source: And you consume inheritance, devouring [it] altogether,
trans-unit.target: A môžete konzumovať dedičstva hltat [to]

trans-unit.source: And you love wealth with immense love.
trans-unit.target: A máte radi bohatstvo s obrovskou láskou.

trans-unit.source: No! When the earth has been leveled - pounded and crushed -
trans-unit.target: nie! Keď zem zrovnal - rozdrvila a drvené-

trans-unit.source: And your Lord has come and the angels, rank upon rank,
trans-unit.target: A svojho pána a anjelov, hodnosti na hodnosť,

trans-unit.source: And brought [within view], that Day, is Hell - that Day, man will remember, but what good to him will be the remembrance?
trans-unit.target: A priniesol [v zobrazení], že deň je peklo - tento deň, človek zapamätá, ale k čomu mu bude spomienka?

trans-unit.source: He will say, "Oh, I wish I had sent ahead [some good] for my life."
trans-unit.target: On bude hovoriť: "Ach, kiež by poslal dopredu [dobré] pre môj život."

trans-unit.source: So on that Day, none will punish [as severely] as His punishment,
trans-unit.target: Ktoré deň, nemá trestať [ako vážne] ako jeho trest,

trans-unit.source: And none will bind [as severely] as His binding [of the evildoers].
trans-unit.target: A nikto sa viažu [ako vážne] ako jeho väzby [zločincov].

trans-unit.source: [To the righteous it will be said], "O reassured soul,
trans-unit.target: [Na spravodlivý to bude povedal] "O upokojila duše,

trans-unit.source: Return to your Lord, well-pleased and pleasing [to Him],
trans-unit.target: Vrátiť do svojho pána dobre spokojný a príjemné [ho],

trans-unit.source: And enter among My [righteous] servants
trans-unit.target: A zadajte medzi moji služobníci [spravodlivé]

trans-unit.source: And enter My Paradise."
trans-unit.target: A zadať môj raj."

trans-unit.source: I swear by this city, Makkah -
trans-unit.target: Prisahám, že toto mesto, Makkah-

trans-unit.source: And you, [O Muhammad], are free of restriction in this city -
trans-unit.target: A vy, [Mohamed], sú bez obmedzenia v tomto meste-

trans-unit.source: And [by] the father and that which was born [of him],
trans-unit.target: A [podľa] otec a že ktoré narodil [ho],

trans-unit.source: We have certainly created man into hardship.
trans-unit.target: Vytvorili sme určite muž do utrpenia.

trans-unit.source: Does he think that never will anyone overcome him?
trans-unit.target: Myslí si, že nikdy nikomu prekonať ho?

trans-unit.source: He says, "I have spent wealth in abundance."
trans-unit.target: On hovorí: "Strávil som bohatstvo v hojnej miere."

trans-unit.source: Does he think that no one has seen him?
trans-unit.target: Si myslí, že ho nikto nevidel?

trans-unit.source: Have We not made for him two eyes?
trans-unit.target: Sme neurobili pre neho dve oči?

trans-unit.source: And a tongue and two lips?
trans-unit.target: A jazyk, a dvoch pery?

trans-unit.source: And have shown him the two ways?
trans-unit.target: A ukázali mu dva spôsoby, ako?

trans-unit.source: But he has not broken through the difficult pass.
trans-unit.target: Ale on to nie je zlomené cez ťažké prejsť.

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is [breaking through] the difficult pass?
trans-unit.target: A čo môže vám vedieť, čo je [prerážať] ťažké prejsť?

trans-unit.source: It is the freeing of a slave
trans-unit.target: To je uvoľnenie otrok

trans-unit.source: Or feeding on a day of severe hunger
trans-unit.target: Alebo kŕmenie deň ťažkou hlad

trans-unit.source: An orphan of near relationship
trans-unit.target: Sirota v blízkosti vzťah

trans-unit.source: Or a needy person in misery
trans-unit.target: Alebo chudobný človek v biede

trans-unit.source: And then being among those who believed and advised one another to patience and advised one another to compassion.
trans-unit.target: A potom sa medzi tých, ktorí verili a navzájom poradil trpezlivosť a navzájom poradil súcit.

trans-unit.source: Those are the companions of the right.
trans-unit.target: Tie sú spoločníci právo.

trans-unit.source: But they who disbelieved in Our signs - those are the companions of the left.
trans-unit.target: Ale oni, kto pochyboval v našej značky - tie sú spoločníci vľavo.

trans-unit.source: Over them will be fire closed in.
trans-unit.target: Nad nimi bude oheň uzavreté.

trans-unit.source: By the sun and its brightness
trans-unit.target: Slnko a jeho jas

trans-unit.source: And [by] the moon when it follows it
trans-unit.target: A [o] mesiac keď vyplýva, že

trans-unit.source: And [by] the day when it displays it
trans-unit.target: A [v deň, keď to zobrazuje podľa]

trans-unit.source: And [by] the night when it covers it
trans-unit.target: A [o] v noci, keď sa vzťahuje na to

trans-unit.source: And [by] the sky and He who constructed it
trans-unit.target: A [z] neba a on kto je konštruované

trans-unit.source: And [by] the earth and He who spread it
trans-unit.target: A [podľa] Zeme a ten kto ju šíriť

trans-unit.source: And [by] the soul and He who proportioned it
trans-unit.target: A [podľa] dušu a on kto to urastený

trans-unit.source: And inspired it [with discernment of] its wickedness and its righteousness,
trans-unit.target: A inšpiroval [s rozlišovanie] jeho zloby a jeho spravodlivosť,

trans-unit.source: He has succeeded who purifies it,
trans-unit.target: On sa podarilo, ktorý čistí

trans-unit.source: And he has failed who instills it [with corruption].
trans-unit.target: A ten kto vzbudzuje [s korupciou].

trans-unit.source: Thamud denied [their prophet] by reason of their transgression,
trans-unit.target: Thamud poprel [ich prorok] z dôvodu ich hriech,

trans-unit.source: When the most wretched of them was sent forth.
trans-unit.target: Keď najviac wretched bol poslaný ďalej.

trans-unit.source: And the messenger of Allah [Salih] said to them, "[Do not harm] the she-camel of Allah or [prevent her from] her drink."
trans-unit.target: A posol Alláha [Salih] povedal, "[nepoškodzujú] Ona-camel Alah alebo [ju] jej pitie."

trans-unit.source: But they denied him and hamstrung her. So their Lord brought down upon them destruction for their sin and made it equal [upon all of them].
trans-unit.target: Ale zaprel a jej ochromená. Tak ich Pán priniesol na ich zničenie za svoje hriechy a sa rovná [na všetky z nich].

trans-unit.source: And He does not fear the consequence thereof.
trans-unit.target: A on nie je strach jej následkom.

trans-unit.source: By the night when it covers
trans-unit.target: V noci, keď sa to týka

trans-unit.source: And [by] the day when it appears
trans-unit.target: A [o] v deň, kedy sa objaví

trans-unit.source: And [by] He who created the male and female,
trans-unit.target: A [] ten kto vytvoril samec a samica,

trans-unit.source: Indeed, your efforts are diverse.
trans-unit.target: Vaše úsilie sú skutočne rozmanité.

trans-unit.source: As for he who gives and fears Allah
trans-unit.target: Pokiaľ ide o ten, kto dáva a obavy Alah

trans-unit.source: And believes in the best [reward],
trans-unit.target: A verí v to najlepšie [odmena]

trans-unit.source: We will ease him toward ease.
trans-unit.target: Sme mu uľahčí smerom jednoduchosť.

trans-unit.source: But as for he who withholds and considers himself free of need
trans-unit.target: No pokiaľ ide o mu zatají a názoru bez potreby

trans-unit.source: And denies the best [reward],
trans-unit.target: A popiera najlepšie [odmena]

trans-unit.source: We will ease him toward difficulty.
trans-unit.target: Sme mu uľahčí smerom k obtiažnosti.

trans-unit.source: And what will his wealth avail him when he falls?
trans-unit.target: A čo bude jeho bohatstvo využívať ho keď spadne?

trans-unit.source: Indeed, [incumbent] upon Us is guidance.
trans-unit.target: [Uložené] na nás je skutočne usmernenia.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, to Us belongs the Hereafter and the first [life].
trans-unit.target: A v skutočnosti nám patrí ďalej a prvý [život].

trans-unit.source: So I have warned you of a Fire which is blazing.
trans-unit.target: Tak som varoval vás ohňa, ktorý je horiace.

trans-unit.source: None will [enter to] burn therein except the most wretched one.
trans-unit.target: Nikto nebude [enter] horieť v ňom okrem najviac úbohý.

trans-unit.source: Who had denied and turned away.
trans-unit.target: Kto bol odmietnutý a odvrátil.

trans-unit.source: But the righteous one will avoid it -
trans-unit.target: Ale ten spravodlivý zabráni-

trans-unit.source: [He] who gives [from] his wealth to purify himself
trans-unit.target: [On] kto dáva [z] jeho bohatstvo čistiť sám

trans-unit.source: And not [giving] for anyone who has [done him] a favor to be rewarded
trans-unit.target: A nie [dať] pre každého, kto má [Hotovo ho] láskavosť odmenení

trans-unit.source: But only seeking the countenance of his Lord, Most High.
trans-unit.target: Ale len hľadá tvár svojho pána, najvyššieho.

trans-unit.source: And he is going to be satisfied.
trans-unit.target: A on bude spokojný.

trans-unit.source: By the morning brightness
trans-unit.target: Od rána jas

trans-unit.source: And [by] the night when it covers with darkness,
trans-unit.target: A [o] v noci, kedy sa vzťahuje s temnotou,

trans-unit.source: Your Lord has not taken leave of you, [O Muhammad], nor has He detested [you].
trans-unit.target: Svojho pána sa rozhodlo opustiť vás, [Mohamed], ani má on nenávidel [vás].

trans-unit.source: And the Hereafter is better for you than the first [life].
trans-unit.target: A ďalej je pre vás lepšie, ako ten prvý [život].

trans-unit.source: And your Lord is going to give you, and you will be satisfied.
trans-unit.target: Váš pán sa chystá dať vám a budete spokojní.

trans-unit.source: Did He not find you an orphan and give [you] refuge?
trans-unit.target: On nenašiel si sirota a dať [vás] útočisko?

trans-unit.source: And He found you lost and guided [you],
trans-unit.target: A zistil, že ste stratili a riadiť [ste],

trans-unit.source: And He found you poor and made [you] self-sufficient.
trans-unit.target: A našiel si chudobný a [ste] sebestačný.

trans-unit.source: So as for the orphan, do not oppress [him].
trans-unit.target: Tak ako pre siroty, neutláčajú [ho].

trans-unit.source: And as for the petitioner, do not repel [him].
trans-unit.target: A pre navrhovateľa, nie odpudzujú [ho].

trans-unit.source: But as for the favor of your Lord, report [it].
trans-unit.target: Ale pokiaľ ide o priazeň svojho pána, správa [to].

trans-unit.source: Did We not expand for you, [O Muhammad], your breast?
trans-unit.target: Urobil nie rozširujeme pre vás [Mohamed], vaše prsia?

trans-unit.source: And We removed from you your burden
trans-unit.target: A sme odstránili od vás vaše zaťaženie

trans-unit.source: Which had weighed upon your back
trans-unit.target: Ktorý sa odváži na chrbát

trans-unit.source: And raised high for you your repute.
trans-unit.target: A zdvihol vysoko pre vás Vaša povesť.

trans-unit.source: For indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.
trans-unit.target: Pre skutočne s utrpenie [bude] ľahko.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.
trans-unit.target: Vskutku, s utrpenie [bude] ľahko.

trans-unit.source: So when you have finished [your duties], then stand up [for worship].
trans-unit.target: Takže keď ste dokončili [svojich], potom postaviť [pre uctievanie].

trans-unit.source: And to your Lord direct [your] longing.
trans-unit.target: A váš pán priame [vaše] túžba.

trans-unit.source: By the fig and the olive
trans-unit.target: Obr a olivových

trans-unit.source: And [by] Mount Sinai
trans-unit.target: A [o] Mount Sinai

trans-unit.source: And [by] this secure city [Makkah],
trans-unit.target: A [o] to bezpečné mesto [Makkah]

trans-unit.source: We have certainly created man in the best of stature;
trans-unit.target: Určite sme vytvorili muž v najlepších postavy;

trans-unit.source: Then We return him to the lowest of the low,
trans-unit.target: Potom vrátime ho na najnižšie nízke,

trans-unit.source: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds, for they will have a reward uninterrupted.
trans-unit.target: S výnimkou pre tých, ktorí veria, a robiť spravodlivé skutky, budú mať odmenu bez prerušenia.

trans-unit.source: So what yet causes you to deny the Recompense?
trans-unit.target: Tak čo ešte spôsobuje, aby ste popierajú odmenu?

trans-unit.source: Is not Allah the most just of judges?
trans-unit.target: Nie je Alah najviac len o sudcov?

trans-unit.source: Recite in the name of your Lord who created -
trans-unit.target: Prednášať v mene svojho pána, ktorý vytvoril-

trans-unit.source: Created man from a clinging substance.
trans-unit.target: Vytvoril človek usadené látky.

trans-unit.source: Recite, and your Lord is the most Generous -
trans-unit.target: Recitovat, a váš pán je najviac veľkorysý-

trans-unit.source: Who taught by the pen -
trans-unit.target: Kto vyučuje pero -

trans-unit.source: Taught man that which he knew not.
trans-unit.target: Samouk muž, ktorý nepoznal.

trans-unit.source: No! [But] indeed, man transgresses
trans-unit.target: nie! [Ale] Vskutku, muž transgresses

trans-unit.source: Because he sees himself self-sufficient.
trans-unit.target: Pretože on vidí sám sebestačný.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, to your Lord is the return.
trans-unit.target: Vskutku, váš pán je návratnosť.

trans-unit.source: Have you seen the one who forbids
trans-unit.target: Videli ste ten, kto zakazuje

trans-unit.source: A servant when he prays?
trans-unit.target: Zamestnanca, keď sa modlí?

trans-unit.source: Have you seen if he is upon guidance
trans-unit.target: Už ste videli, ak má na základe usmernení

trans-unit.source: Or enjoins righteousness?
trans-unit.target: Alebo nariaÄ uje spravodlivosť?

trans-unit.source: Have you seen if he denies and turns away -
trans-unit.target: Už ste videli ak to popiera a odvracia-

trans-unit.source: Does he not know that Allah sees?
trans-unit.target: On vie, že Boh vidí?

trans-unit.source: No! If he does not desist, We will surely drag him by the forelock -
trans-unit.target: nie! Ak ustat, budeme určite pretiahnite ho za prameň vlasov-

trans-unit.source: A lying, sinning forelock.
trans-unit.target: Klamstvo, hreší prameň vlasov.

trans-unit.source: Then let him call his associates;
trans-unit.target: Nechajte ho zavolať jeho blízkych spolupracovníkov;

trans-unit.source: We will call the angels of Hell.
trans-unit.target: Zavoláme anjelov pekla.

trans-unit.source: No! Do not obey him. But prostrate and draw near [to Allah].
trans-unit.target: nie! Nie ho poslúchajú. Ale přemoci a čerpať v blízkosti [Boh].

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We sent the Qur'an down during the Night of Decree.
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti sme zoslal Korán počas noci vyhlášky.

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is the Night of Decree?
trans-unit.target: A čo si budete vedieť, čo je noc vyhláška?

trans-unit.source: The Night of Decree is better than a thousand months.
trans-unit.target: Noc vyhlášky je lepšia ako tisíc mesiacov.

trans-unit.source: The angels and the Spirit descend therein by permission of their Lord for every matter.
trans-unit.target: Anjeli a duch zostúpil v ňom so zvolením svojho pána za každú vec.

trans-unit.source: Peace it is until the emergence of dawn.
trans-unit.target: Mier je až do vzniku svitania.

trans-unit.source: Those who disbelieved among the People of the Scripture and the polytheists were not to be parted [from misbelief] until there came to them clear evidence -
trans-unit.target: Tí, kto pochyboval medzi ľuďmi z Biblie a polyteisty neboli byť rozlúčil [misbelief] kým tam prišiel k nim jasný dôkaz -

trans-unit.source: A Messenger from Allah, reciting purified scriptures
trans-unit.target: Posol od Boha, recitovať čistený písma

trans-unit.source: Within which are correct writings.
trans-unit.target: V rámci ktorého sú správne spisy.

trans-unit.source: Nor did those who were given the Scripture become divided until after there had come to them clear evidence.
trans-unit.target: Ani sa tých, ktorí dané písmo sa delí až potom tam prišiel k nim jasný dôkaz.

trans-unit.source: And they were not commanded except to worship Allah, [being] sincere to Him in religion, inclining to truth, and to establish prayer and to give zakah. And that is the correct religion.
trans-unit.target: A nie oni boli prikázané, okrem uctievanie Alaha, [že] úprimné mu v náboženstve, inklinující k pravde, a vytvoriť modlitba a dať Zakát. A to je správne náboženstvo.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, they who disbelieved among the People of the Scripture and the polytheists will be in the fire of Hell, abiding eternally therein. Those are the worst of creatures.
trans-unit.target: Naozaj, kto pochyboval medzi ľuďmi z Biblie a polyteisty budú pekelného, rešpektujúce večne v ňom. Tie sú najhoršie z tvorov.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, they who have believed and done righteous deeds - those are the best of creatures.
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti, oni, ktorí verili a urobil spravodlivé skutky - tie sú najlepšie tvorov.

trans-unit.source: Their reward with Allah will be gardens of perpetual residence beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide forever, Allah being pleased with them and they with Him. That is for whoever has feared his Lord.
trans-unit.target: Ich odmenou Alah bude záhrady trvalý pobyt pod ktoré toku rieky, pričom bude rešpektovať navždy, Alah je spokojný s nimi a oni s ním. To je pre toho, kto sa obávali svojho pána.

trans-unit.source: When the earth is shaken with its [final] earthquake
trans-unit.target: Keď zem sa otriasla s jeho zemetrasenie [posledný]

trans-unit.source: And the earth discharges its burdens
trans-unit.target: A zem vypúšťanie jeho zaťaženia

trans-unit.source: And man says, "What is [wrong] with it?" -
trans-unit.target: A muž hovorí: "Čo deje [] s ním?"-

trans-unit.source: That Day, it will report its news
trans-unit.target: Ten deň, podá jej Novinky

trans-unit.source: Because your Lord has commanded it.
trans-unit.target: Pretože váš pán prikázal to.

trans-unit.source: That Day, the people will depart separated [into categories] to be shown [the result of] their deeds.
trans-unit.target: Tento deň ľudia vyrazí rozdelený [kategórie] sa zobrazí [výsledok] ich skutky.

trans-unit.source: So whoever does an atom's weight of good will see it,
trans-unit.target: Tak kto je hmotnosť atómu je dobrej vôle vidieť,

trans-unit.source: And whoever does an atom's weight of evil will see it.
trans-unit.target: A kto má atóm hmotnosť zla uvidia.

trans-unit.source: By the racers, panting,
trans-unit.target: Pretekári, lapal po dychu,

trans-unit.source: And the producers of sparks [when] striking
trans-unit.target: A výrobcovia iskry [keď] štrajkujúci

trans-unit.source: And the chargers at dawn,
trans-unit.target: A nabíjačky na úsvite,

trans-unit.source: Stirring up thereby [clouds of] dust,
trans-unit.target: Za stáleho miešania sa čím [oblaky] prach,

trans-unit.source: Arriving thereby in the center collectively,
trans-unit.target: Tým prichádza v centre spoločne

trans-unit.source: Indeed mankind, to his Lord, is ungrateful.
trans-unit.target: Skutočne ľudstvo k svojmu pánovi, je nevďačný.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, he is to that a witness.
trans-unit.target: A skutočne, on je ako svedok.

trans-unit.source: And indeed he is, in love of wealth, intense.
trans-unit.target: A skutočne je, v lásku, bohatstvo, intenzívne.

trans-unit.source: But does he not know that when the contents of the graves are scattered
trans-unit.target: Ale on vie, že keď obsah hroby sú roztrúsené

trans-unit.source: And that within the breasts is obtained,
trans-unit.target: A že v prsia,

trans-unit.source: Indeed, their Lord with them, that Day, is [fully] Acquainted.
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti ich pán s nimi, že deň, [plne] je oboznámený.

trans-unit.source: The Striking Calamity -
trans-unit.target: Štrajkujúci kalamita-

trans-unit.source: What is the Striking Calamity?
trans-unit.target: Čo je zarážajúce kalamita?

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is the Striking Calamity?
trans-unit.target: A čo si budete vedieť, čo je zarážajúce kalamita?

trans-unit.source: It is the Day when people will be like moths, dispersed,
trans-unit.target: Je to deň, kedy ľudia budú ako mory, rozptýlené,

trans-unit.source: And the mountains will be like wool, fluffed up.
trans-unit.target: A hory budú ako vlna, načechral.

trans-unit.source: Then as for one whose scales are heavy [with good deeds],
trans-unit.target: Potom ako ten ktorého váhy sú ťažké [s dobrými skutkami],

trans-unit.source: He will be in a pleasant life.
trans-unit.target: Ten bude v príjemný život.

trans-unit.source: But as for one whose scales are light,
trans-unit.target: Ale pokiaľ ide o jeden ktorých váhy sú ľahké,

trans-unit.source: His refuge will be an abyss.
trans-unit.target: Jeho útočisko bude priepasti.

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what that is?
trans-unit.target: A čo si vás vedieť, čo to je?

trans-unit.source: It is a Fire, intensely hot.
trans-unit.target: Je to oheň, intenzívne horúce.

trans-unit.source: Competition in [worldly] increase diverts you
trans-unit.target: Súťaž [pozemský] zvýšenie presmeruje vás

trans-unit.source: Until you visit the graveyards.
trans-unit.target: Kým vám návštevu cintorínov.

trans-unit.source: No! You are going to know.
trans-unit.target: nie! Budete vedieť.

trans-unit.source: Then no! You are going to know.
trans-unit.target: Potom č! Budete vedieť.

trans-unit.source: No! If you only knew with knowledge of certainty...
trans-unit.target: nie! Keby ste vedeli s vedomím istoty...

trans-unit.source: You will surely see the Hellfire.
trans-unit.target: Budete určite vidieť Hellfire.

trans-unit.source: Then you will surely see it with the eye of certainty.
trans-unit.target: Potom budete určite vidieť okom istoty.

trans-unit.source: Then you will surely be asked that Day about pleasure.
trans-unit.target: Potom si iste vyžiada ten deň o radosť.

trans-unit.source: By time,
trans-unit.target: Do doby,

trans-unit.source: Indeed, mankind is in loss,
trans-unit.target: Vskutku, ľudstvo je v strate,

trans-unit.source: Except for those who have believed and done righteous deeds and advised each other to truth and advised each other to patience.
trans-unit.target: S výnimkou tých, ktorí verili a urobil spravodlivé skutky a odporúča navzájom pravdu a vzájomne poradil trpezlivosť.

trans-unit.source: Woe to every scorner and mocker
trans-unit.target: Beda každý scorner a posměvače

trans-unit.source: Who collects wealth and [continuously] counts it.
trans-unit.target: Kto zhromažďuje bohatstva a [stále] sa počíta.

trans-unit.source: He thinks that his wealth will make him immortal.
trans-unit.target: Myslí si, že jeho bohatstvo bude robiť ho nesmrteľný.

trans-unit.source: No! He will surely be thrown into the Crusher.
trans-unit.target: nie! On bude určite hodený do drviča.

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is the Crusher?
trans-unit.target: A čo si budete vedieť, čo je drvič?

trans-unit.source: It is the fire of Allah, [eternally] fueled,
trans-unit.target: Je to oheň Alaha, [večne] palivo,

trans-unit.source: Which mounts directed at the hearts.
trans-unit.target: Ktoré sa montuje zameraná na srdce.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Hellfire will be closed down upon them
trans-unit.target: Vskutku, Hellfire bude uzavretá na ne

trans-unit.source: In extended columns.
trans-unit.target: V Rozšírené stĺpce.

trans-unit.source: Have you not considered, [O Muhammad], how your Lord dealt with the companions of the elephant?
trans-unit.target: Uvažovali ste o nie, [Mohamed], ako svojho pána sa zaoberal spoločníci slona?

trans-unit.source: Did He not make their plan into misguidance?
trans-unit.target: On nerobil svoj plán do zlé vedenie?

trans-unit.source: And He sent against them birds in flocks,
trans-unit.target: A poslal proti ich vtáky v kŕdľoch,

trans-unit.source: Striking them with stones of hard clay,
trans-unit.target: Zarážajúce je s kameňmi ťažké hliny,

trans-unit.source: And He made them like eaten straw.
trans-unit.target: A on sa im ako jedol slamy.

trans-unit.source: For the accustomed security of the Quraysh -
trans-unit.target: Zvyknutí bezpečnosť Kurajšovcami-

trans-unit.source: Their accustomed security [in] the caravan of winter and summer -
trans-unit.target: Ich zvyknutí bezpečnosti [v] karavan zimné a letné-

trans-unit.source: Let them worship the Lord of this House,
trans-unit.target: Nech uctievajú pán tohto domu,

trans-unit.source: Who has fed them, [saving them] from hunger and made them safe, [saving them] from fear.
trans-unit.target: Kto má dosť, [uložením] od hladu a urobil z nich bezpečné, [uložením] od strachu.

trans-unit.source: Have you seen the one who denies the Recompense?
trans-unit.target: Videli ste ten, kto popiera odmenu?

trans-unit.source: For that is the one who drives away the orphan
trans-unit.target: To je ten, ktorý zaháňa sirota

trans-unit.source: And does not encourage the feeding of the poor.
trans-unit.target: A nemotivuje, kŕmenie chudobných.

trans-unit.source: So woe to those who pray
trans-unit.target: Tak Beda tým, ktorí sa modlia

trans-unit.source: [But] who are heedless of their prayer -
trans-unit.target: [Ale] kto je nepozorný ich modlitby-

trans-unit.source: Those who make show [of their deeds]
trans-unit.target: Tí, ktorí robia show [ich skutky]

trans-unit.source: And withhold [simple] assistance.
trans-unit.target: A zadržať [] pomoci.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We have granted you, [O Muhammad], al-Kawthar.
trans-unit.target: V skutočnosti sme udelili ste [Mohamed], al Kawthar.

trans-unit.source: So pray to your Lord and sacrifice [to Him alone].
trans-unit.target: Tak sa modlil, aby svojho pána a obetovať [s ním sám].

trans-unit.source: Indeed, your enemy is the one cut off.
trans-unit.target: Tvoj nepriateľ je skutočne jeden rez preč.

trans-unit.source: Say, "O disbelievers,
trans-unit.target: Povedať, "O neveriacim,

trans-unit.source: I do not worship what you worship.
trans-unit.target: Nie uctievanie, čo uctievajú.

trans-unit.source: Nor are you worshippers of what I worship.
trans-unit.target: Ani veriacich na to, čo já uctievame.

trans-unit.source: Nor will I be a worshipper of what you worship.
trans-unit.target: Ani sa veriaci na to, čo uctievajú.

trans-unit.source: Nor will you be worshippers of what I worship.
trans-unit.target: Ani vám bude ctitelia čo já uctievame.

trans-unit.source: For you is your religion, and for me is my religion."
trans-unit.target: Pre vás je vaša náboženstvo, a pre mňa je moje náboženstvo."

trans-unit.source: When the victory of Allah has come and the conquest,
trans-unit.target: Keď prišlo víťazstvo Alaha a dobytie

trans-unit.source: And you see the people entering into the religion of Allah in multitudes,
trans-unit.target: A vidíte, ľudí, ktorí vstupujú do náboženstvu Alaha v zástupy,

trans-unit.source: Then exalt [Him] with praise of your Lord and ask forgiveness of Him. Indeed, He is ever Accepting of repentance.
trans-unit.target: Potom vynášať [mu] s chválou svojho pána a požiadať o odpustenie od neho. Naozaj, on je niekedy akceptovanie pokánia.

trans-unit.source: May the hands of Abu Lahab be ruined, and ruined is he.
trans-unit.target: Môžu byť zničené ruky Abu Lahab, a zničil to.

trans-unit.source: His wealth will not avail him or that which he gained.
trans-unit.target: Jeho bohatstvo sa nevyužijú ho alebo ktorý získal.

trans-unit.source: He will [enter to] burn in a Fire of [blazing] flame
trans-unit.target: On sa bude [enter] horieť v ohni [horiace] plameňa

trans-unit.source: And his wife [as well] - the carrier of firewood.
trans-unit.target: S manželkou [aj] - dopravca palivového dreva.

trans-unit.source: Around her neck is a rope of [twisted] fiber.
trans-unit.target: Okolo krku je lano [skrútené] vlákniny.

trans-unit.source: Say, "He is Allah, [who is] One,
trans-unit.target: Povedať: "on je Boh, [ktorý] jeden,

trans-unit.source: Allah, the Eternal Refuge.
trans-unit.target: Boh, večný útočisko.

trans-unit.source: He neither begets nor is born,
trans-unit.target: On plodí ani sa narodí,

trans-unit.source: Nor is there to Him any equivalent."
trans-unit.target: Ani je tam s ním nejaký ekvivalent. "

trans-unit.source: Say, "I seek refuge in the Lord of daybreak
trans-unit.target: Povedať: "Hľadám útočisko v Pánovi Svitanie

trans-unit.source: From the evil of that which He created
trans-unit.target: Od zlo, ktoré stvoril

trans-unit.source: And from the evil of darkness when it settles
trans-unit.target: A od zlého tma, keď sa to usadí

trans-unit.source: And from the evil of the blowers in knots
trans-unit.target: A od zlého dúchadlá v uzloch

trans-unit.source: And from the evil of an envier when he envies."
trans-unit.target: A od zlého envier, keď mu závidí.

trans-unit.source: Say, "I seek refuge in the Lord of mankind,
trans-unit.target: Povedať: "Hľadám útočisko v Pánovi ľudstva,

trans-unit.source: The Sovereign of mankind.
trans-unit.target: Suverénne ľudstva.

trans-unit.source: The God of mankind,
trans-unit.target: Boh ľudstva,

trans-unit.source: From the evil of the retreating whisperer -
trans-unit.target: Od zlého ustupujúce whisperer-

trans-unit.source: Who whispers [evil] into the breasts of mankind -
trans-unit.target: Ktorý šepká [zlo] do prsníkov ľudstva -

trans-unit.source: From among the jinn and mankind."
trans-unit.target: Spomedzi jinn a ľudstvo."
